T08TD4106.2E:90a-11: chung ba mchog tu chung ba dag kyang rab tu 'byin par byed na /
T08TD4106.2E:90a-12: de'i chos ji ltar zab pa yin zhes smod par byed /
T08TD4106.2E:90a-15: bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa nyan thos chen po ri rab dang 'dra ba la skye bo phal po che'i tshogs kyis smras pa skyes par byed kyi 'di'i yon tan bsgrags par bya'o snyam nas /
T08TD4106.2E:90a-16: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa /
T08TD4106.2E:90a-17: kun dga' bo song la lam pa la de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhal nas khyod kyis dge slong ma la chos ston cig ces bka' stsal to zhes gyis shig / tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos tshe dang ldan pa lam pa la 'di skad ces bsgo'o //
T08TD4106.2E:90a-18: de'i tshe na dge slong ma gso spyod 'bul ba gnyis rgyal byed kyi tshal du 'ongs te de gnyis kyis smras pa /
T08TD4106.2E:90a-19: bdag cag dge slong ma'i ston pa su mchis /
T08TD4106.2E:90a-20: dge slong rnams kyis smras pa /
T08TD4106.2E:90a-21: tshe dang ldan pa lam pa'o //
T08TD4106.2E:90a-22: ci lags 'phags pa lam chen pa'am /
T08TD4106.2E:90a-23: tshe dang ldan pa lam pa'o //
T08TD4106.2E:90a-25: phu nu mo ji ltar bud med brnyas pa la ltos /
T08TD4106.2E:90a-26: des zla ba gsum gyis tshigs su bcad pa gcig klags na yang ma lobs pa yin la /
T08TD4106.2E:90a-27: dge slong ma rnams ni sde snod gnyis pa dang /
T08TD4106.2E:90a-28: sde snod gsum pa chos sgrog pa rigs pa dang grol ba'i spobs pa can dag yin na /
T08TD4106.2E:90a-29: de dge slong ma la ston par 'gyur ro //
T08TD4106.2E:90a-30: ji ltar byed pa bltas 'dod ngo zhes tshe dang ldan pa lam pa ga la ba der song ste phyin nas tshe dang ldan pa lam pa'i rkang pa gnyis la mgo pos phyag 'tshal te smras pa /
T08TD4106.2E:90b-0: btsun @90b pa lam pa dgongs su gsol /
T08TD4106.2E:90b-1: rgyal po'i kun dga' ra ba'i dge slong ma'i dge 'dun mthun pa rgyal byed kyi tshal gyi dge slong gi dge 'dun mthun pa'i zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal lo //
T08TD4106.2E:90b-7: kha na ma tho ba ma mchis sam /
T08TD4106.2E:90b-8: bde ba la reg par gnas sam zhes bsnyun gsol lo //
T08TD4106.2E:90b-9: zla ba phyed phyed cing gdams dag dang rjes su bstan pa gsol lo //
T08TD4106.2E:90b-10: 'dun pa'i gso sbyong bgyi bar gsol pa 'debs so //
T08TD4106.2E:90b-11: gsol ba yang ngam mkhyen par gsol lo //
T08TD4106.2E:90b-14: thabs yin no zhes bya ba tsam yang shes pa lta zhes de gnyis dbyar khang du 'dong ba dang /
T08TD4106.2E:90b-15: dge slong ma rnams kyis mthong nas smras pa /
T08TD4106.2E:90b-16: bdag cag dge slong ma'i ston par su byon de gnyis kyis smras pa /
T08TD4106.2E:90b-22: phu nu mo dag ji ltar bud med brnyas pa la ltos /
T08TD4106.2E:90b-23: des zla ba gsum gyis tshigs su bcad pa gcig klags na de yang ma lobs ba yin la /
T08TD4106.2E:90b-24: dge slong ma rnams ni sde snod gnyis pa dang /
T08TD4106.2E:90b-25: sde snod gsum pa chos sgrog pa dang /
T08TD4106.2E:90b-26: rigs pa dang grol ba'i spobs pa can dag yin na des ji ltar dge slong ma la ston par 'gyur /
T08TD4106.2E:90b-27: bdag cag ji ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis zil gyis mnan pa ltar ni ya mtshan can dgu bcu rtsa drug po dag gis kyang bud med gzhan 'ga' yang zil gyis ma mnan to //
T08TD4106.2E:90b-28: dge slong ma bcu gnyis sde dag gis smras pa /
T08TD4106.2E:90b-29: phu nu mo dag cag gis ci nas kyang phyin chad thos pa nyung du 'ga' yang dge slong ma la ston par mi 'gyur ba de ltar bu zan mo'i bu de mi dge bar bya'o zhes de dag gis smras pa /
T08TD4106.2E:90b-30: phu nu mo dag / bdag cag las mi mo drug gis ni yal ga khru bcu gnyis pa dag las seng ge'i khri shoms shig / mi mo drug gis ni mnyan yod du zhugs la lam po che dang /
T08TD4106.2E:91a-0: sum mdo dag tu skye bo phal po che'i tshogs @91a * //
T08TD4106.2E:91a-1: la sang bdag cag dge slong ma'i ston pa nyan thos chen po 'di 'dra ba zhig byon par 'gyur gyi /
T08TD4106.2E:91a-2: khyed cag las gang gis der bden pa dag mthong bar ma gyur pa des yun ring por 'khor bar 'khor ba bya da gos so zhes sgrogs shig / bcu gnyis sde dag las drug gis ni seng ge'i khri de lta bu bshams shing /
T08TD4106.2E:91a-3: drug gis ni mnyan yod du de skad ces bsgrags so //
T08TD4106.2E:91a-4: de nas srog chags 'bum phrag du ma dag las kha cig ltad mo skyes pa na /
T08TD4106.2E:91a-5: kha cig ni sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba dag gis bskul ba na des 'dul bar gyur to //
T08TD4106.2E:91a-6: de nas tshe dang ldan pa lam pa de nyid kyi mtshan mo 'das nas snga dro sham thabs bgos /
T08TD4106.2E:91a-7: lhung bzed dang chos gos thogs nas mnyan yod du bsod snyoms la zhugs so //
T08TD4106.2E:91a-8: de mnyan yod du bsod snyoms la brgyus nas zas kyi bya ba byas te /
T08TD4106.2E:91a-9: phyi dro bsod snyoms mi byed pas lhung bzed dang chos gos mkhos su phab ste /
T08TD4106.2E:91a-10: rkang pa gnyis bkrus nas nang du yang dag 'jog gi phyir gtsug lag khang du zhugs so //
T08TD4106.2E:91a-11: de nas tshe dang ldan pa lam pa phyi 'bred nang du yang dag 'jog las langs te snam sbyar thogs nas phyi bzhin 'brang ba'i dge slong zhig dang /
T08TD4106.2E:91a-12: dge slong ma'i dbyar khang rgyal po'i kun dga' ra ba ga la ba der song ngo //
T08TD4106.2E:91a-13: skye bo phal po che'i tshogs kyis de mthong nas de dag gis smras pa /
T08TD4106.2E:91a-14: dge slong ma'i ston pa de gang yin /
T08TD4106.2E:91a-15: ci dge sbyong snga ma yin nam /
T08TD4106.2E:91a-16: 'on te phyi bzhin 'brang ba'i dge slong yin /
T08TD4106.2E:91a-18: khyed kyis phyi bzhin 'brang ba'i dge slong 'ga' zhig dge slong ma la ston par byed ces thos sam /
T08TD4106.2E:91a-19: dge slong snga ma nyid dge slong ma'i ston pa yin no //
T08TD4106.2E:91a-21: 'dis zla ba gsum gyis tshigs su bcad pa gcig klags na de yang ma lobs pa yin na /
T08TD4106.2E:91a-22: des dge slong ma sde snod gnyis pa dang gsum pa chos sgrog pa rigs pa dang grol ba'i spobs pa can dag la ji ltar ston par 'gyur /
T08TD4106.2E:91a-23: dge sbyong ma sgre byi mo 'di dag gis bdag cag brid par gyur gyis tshur shog 'dong ngo //
T08TD4106.2E:91b-1: ji ltar byed pa yang bltas re zhig sdod cig / de nas tshe dang ldan pa lam ba 'khor de'i nang du zhugs nas seng ge'i khri ga la ba der song ba dang /
T08TD4106.2E:91b-2: ji tsam na yal ga khru bcu gnyis pa dag la seng ge'i khri bshams pa mthong nas des bsams pa /
T08TD4106.2E:91b-3: ci re zhig dad par gyur pa dag gis bshams par gyur pa yin nam /
T08TD4106.2E:91b-4: 'on te tho 'tshams pa'i bsam pa can dag gis bshams pa yin snyam na /
T08TD4106.2E:91b-5: ji tsam na tho 'tshams pa'i bsam pa can dag gis bshams par mthong ngo //
T08TD4106.2E:91b-6: de nas tshe dang ldan pa lam pas /
T08TD4106.2E:91b-7: glang po che'i sna lta bu'i lag pa brkyang ste seng ge'i khri de ji ltar gnas su bshams pa /
T08TD4106.2E:91b-8: de ltar bzhugs nas tshe dang ldan pa lam pa ci nas kyang kha cig gis mthong /
T08TD4106.2E:91b-9: kha cig gis ma mthong ba de ltar seng ge'i khri la 'dug go //
T08TD4106.2E:91b-10: de nas tshe dang ldan pa lam pa ting nge 'dzin 'di lta bu la snyoms par zhugs te /
T08TD4106.2E:91b-11: ji ltar sems mnyam par gzhag na rang gi stan las mi snad bar gyur cing /
T08TD4106.2E:91b-12: shar phyogs kyi steng gi nam mkha' la mngon par 'phags te /
T08TD4106.2E:91b-13: spyod lam bzhi po 'di lta ste /
T08TD4106.2E:91b-18: me'i khams la yang snyoms par 'jug ste /
T08TD4106.2E:91b-19: tshe dang ldan pa lam pa me'i khams la snyoms par zhugs pa'i lus las 'od zer sna tshogs 'di lta ste /
T08TD4106.2E:91b-25: shel dang dngul gyi kha dog lta bu dag byung ngo //
T08TD4106.2E:91b-26: cho 'phrul zung dag kyang rnam par ston te /
T08TD4106.2E:91b-27: lus kyi smad nas me 'bar zhing lus kyi stod nas chu grang mo'i rgyun dag 'byin par byed do //
T08TD4106.2E:91b-28: lus kyi stod nas me 'bar zhing lus kyi smad nas chu grang mo'i rgyun dag 'byin par byed do //
T08TD4106.2E:91b-29: shar phyogs su ji lta ba de bzhin du lho dang nub dang byang phyogs su yang de bzhin te /
T08TD4106.2E:91b-30: des phyogs bzhir rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul rnam pa bzhi bzhi bstan nas /
T08TD4106.2E:91b-31: rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba de phyir bsdus te /
T08TD4106.2E:91b-32: 'khor gyi gung la seng ge'i khri bshams pa nyid la 'dug go //
T08TD4106.2E:92a-1: tshe dang ldan pa lam pas dge slong ma rnams la smras pa /
T08TD4106.2E:92a-2: srid mo dag kho bo zla ba gsum gyis /
T08TD4106.2E:92a-3: lus ngag yid kyis sdig pa mi bya zhing //
T08TD4106.2E:92a-4: 'jig rten kun la yongs 'dzin 'dod bral ba //
T08TD4106.2E:92a-5: dran dang ldan zhing shes bzhin can gyis ni //
T08TD4106.2E:92a-6: snod ldan sdug bsngal gang yin bsten mi bya //
T08TD4106.2E:92a-7: zhes bya ba'i tshigs su bcad pa gcig bzung ste /
T08TD4106.2E:92a-8: kho bo tshigs su bcad pa de nyin mtshan bdun gyi bar du tshig gzhan dag dang /
T08TD4106.2E:92a-9: tshig dang yi ge gzhan dag gis don rnam par 'byed par spro'o //
T08TD4106.2E:92a-10: sring mo dag de la lus zhes bya bas ni bcom ldan 'das kyis lus kyis nyes par spyod pa gsum mi bya bar bstan to //
T08TD4106.2E:92a-11: ngag ces bya bas ni bcom ldan 'das kyis ngag gis nyes par spyod pa bzhi mi bya ba bstan to //
T08TD4106.2E:92a-12: yid kyis zhes bya bas ni bcom ldan 'das kyis yid kyis nyes par spyod pa gsum mi bya ba bstan to /
T08TD4106.2E:92a-13: sdig pa mi bya zhing zhes bya bas ni bcom ldan 'das kyis sdig pa thams cad mi bya ste zhes bya ba bstan to //
T08TD4106.2E:92a-14: 'jig rten kun la zhes bya bas ni bcom ldan 'das kyis nye bar len pa'i phung po thams cad bstan to //
T08TD4106.2E:92a-15: yongs 'dzin zhes bya bas ni bcom ldan 'das kyis yongs 'dzin rnam pa gsum bstan te /
T08TD4106.2E:92a-19: tshe dang ldan pa lam pas ji tsam gyis tshigs su bcad pa phyed kyi don kyang rnam par phye ba de tsam gyis srog chags khri nyes stong gis bden pa ngag mthong ste /
T08TD4106.2E:92a-20: kha cig gis ni rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas /
T08TD4106.2E:92a-21: kha cig gis ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas /
T08TD4106.2E:92a-22: kha cig gis ni phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas /
T08TD4106.2E:92a-23: kha cig gis ni rab du byung ste nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs pas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas so //
T08TD4106.2E:92a-24: kha cig gis ni nyan thos kyi byang chub tu sems bskyed /
T08TD4106.2E:92a-25: kha cig gis ni rang byang chub tu sems bskyed /
T08TD4106.2E:92b-0: kha cig gis ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i @92b sangs rgyas kyi byang chub tu sems bskyed do //
T08TD4106.2E:92b-1: 'khor phal cher ni sangs rgyas la gzhol ba dang /
T08TD4106.2E:92b-3: dge 'dun la bab par rnam par bkod do //
T08TD4106.2E:92b-4: de nas tshe dang ldan pa lam pa 'khor de dag phal cher sangs rgyas la gzhol ba dang /
T08TD4106.2E:92b-6: dge 'dun la bab par rnam par bkod nas stan las langs te song ngo //
T08TD4106.2E:92b-7: de'i tshe na tshe dang ldan pa lam pas ji ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis b'a r'a na sa'i drang srong smra ba ri dags kyi nags su 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi la lan gsum du bzlas te rnam pa bcu gnyis su chos kyi 'khor lo chos dang ldan pa bskor ba rjes su bskor to //
T08TD4106.2E:92b-8: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa /
T08TD4106.2E:92b-9: dge slong dag nga'i nyan thos rnams kyi dge slong sems bsgyur ba la mkhas pa'i nang na 'di lta ste /
T08TD4106.2E:92b-11: de lta bas na chos 'di lta bu dang ldan pa ma gtogs so //
T08TD4106.2E:92b-12: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bslab pa 'dod pa dang /
T08TD4106.2E:92b-13: bslab pa la gus pa dang /
T08TD4106.2E:92b-14: bslab pa la yo byad bsnyungs pa'i bsngags pa brjod nas dge slong rnams la de dang mthun pa dang /
T08TD4106.2E:92b-16: de dang 'tsham pa'i chos dang ldan pa'i bka' mchid mdzad nas /
T08TD4106.2E:92b-17: dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa /
T08TD4106.2E:92b-18: dge slong dag de lta bas na snga ma ni bcas pa yin la /
T08TD4106.2E:92b-20: nga'i nyan thos rnams kyis 'dul ba la bslab pa'i gzhi 'di ltar gdon par bya ste /
T08TD4106.2E:92b-21: yang dge slong gang dge 'dun gyis ma bskos pas dge slong ma la ston na chos 'di lta bu dang ldan pa ma gtogs te ltung byed do zhes gnang ba mdzad de /
T08TD4106.2E:92b-23: gang zag ni tshe dang ldan pa lam pa /
T08TD4106.2E:92b-24: nyon mongs pa dang nyes pa ni med do //
T08TD4106.2E:92b-25: de la yang dge slong gang zhes bya ba ni drug sde 'am /
T08TD4106.2E:92b-26: gzhan yang de lta bu gang yin pa'o //
T08TD4106.2E:92b-27: dge 'dun gyis zhes bya ba ni /
T08TD4106.2E:92b-28: de bzhin gshags pa'i nyan thos kyi dge 'dun gyis so //
T08TD4106.2E:92b-29: ma bskos par zhes bya ba ni gsol ba dang gnyis kyi las kyis so //
T08TD4106.2E:93a-0: dge slong ma la zhes bya ba @93a * //
T08TD4106.2E:93a-2: ston na zhes bya ba ni lhag pa'i tshul khrims dang /
T08TD4106.2E:93a-5: chos 'di lta bu dang ldan pa ma gtogs te zhes bya ba ni cha dang ldan pa lam pa'i chos 'di lta bu dang ldan pa gzhag ste'o /
T08TD4106.2E:93a-6: ltung byed do zhes bya ba ni /
T08TD4106.2E:93a-10: ngan 'gro log par ltung ba dag tu sred bar byed /
T08TD4106.2E:93a-13: gzhan yang ji srid du ltung ba de ma bshags shing so sor ma bshags na dge ba'i chos rnams la sgrib par byed pa ste /
T08TD4106.2E:93a-14: des na ltung byed do zhes gsungs so //
T08TD4106.2E:93a-15: de la ltung ba ji ltar 'gyur zhe na /
T08TD4106.2E:93a-18: sbyor ba'i sbyor bas ltung ba rnam par gzhag pa dang /
T08TD4106.2E:93a-21: phyir bcos pa rnams kyis 'di'i mtshan nyid shes par bya'o //
T08TD4106.2E:93a-22: de la 'dir yang dngos gzhi'i ltung ba rnam par gzhag pa ni /
T08TD4106.2E:93a-23: dge slong dge 'dun gyis gso sbyong bco lnga pa la mtshams kyi nang du spro bar byas te /
T08TD4106.2E:93a-24: gsol ba dang gnyis kyi las kyis ma bskos pa dang /
T08TD4106.2E:93a-26: ston pa phyi ma'i yon tan de dag las gcig dang yang mi ldan pa dang /
T08TD4106.2E:93a-27: ma bskos pa yon tan de dag dang ldan yang rung mi ldan yang rung bas dge slong ma la ston na ma bskos par ston pa'i ltung byed kyi dngos gzhir 'gyur ro //
T08TD4106.2E:93a-28: 'dir dge slong ma'i ston pa dge 'dun gyis spus bdams pa dang /
T08TD4106.2E:93a-29: bsko ba'i rnam par gzhag pa ni 'di yin te /
T08TD4106.2E:93a-30: dge slong chos lnga dang ldan pa dge slong ma'i ston par bskor bar bya'o //
T08TD4106.2E:93a-32: tshul khrims dang ldan pa dang /
T08TD4106.2E:93a-34: gnas brtan rgyal tshab lta bu dang /
T08TD4106.2E:93a-35: grong khyer ba'i skad dang ldan pa dang /
T08TD4106.2E:93a-36: des dge slong ma la lus kyis reg pas sun ma phyung zhing /
T08TD4106.2E:93a-37: gal te sun phyung na yang /
T08TD4106.2E:93a-38: des ltung ba de chos bzhin du phyir byas pa'o //
T08TD4106.2E:93a-39: de la tshul khrims dang ldan pa'i pham par 'gyur ba ma byung ba'o //
T08TD4106.2E:93b-0: mang du thos pa ni @93b 'dul ba dang mdo sde dang ma mo 'dzin pa'o //
T08TD4106.2E:93b-1: gnas brtan rgyal tshab lta bu ni bsnyen par rdzogs nas lo nyi shu las mi nyung ba'o //
T08TD4106.2E:93b-2: grong khyer ba'i skad dang ldan pa ni /
T08TD4106.2E:93b-3: rigs pa dang grol bar smra ba'o //
T08TD4106.2E:93b-4: des dge slong ma la lus kyis reg pas sun ma phyung zhing /
T08TD4106.2E:93b-5: gal te sun phyung na yang des ltung ba de chos bzhin du phyir byas pa ni lus kyis reg pa'i dge 'dun lhag ma'i ltung ba med pa'o //
T08TD4106.2E:93b-6: chos lnga po de dag las gzhi ni nges pa yin no //
T08TD4106.2E:93b-7: mang du thos pa ni med na so sor thar pa'i mdo thon pa yang bsko'o //
T08TD4106.2E:93b-8: de yang med na dge slong ma'i pham par 'gyur ba brgyad dang /
T08TD4106.2E:93b-9: lci ba'i chos brgyad po dag ston nus pa yang bsko'o //
T08TD4106.2E:93b-10: de yang med na dge slong ma'i ston pa phyi ma ni dge slong tshul khrims dang ldan pa gnas brtan rgyal tshab lta bu grong khyer ba'i skad dang ldan pa des dge slong ma la lus kyis reg pas sun ma phyung zhing /
T08TD4106.2E:93b-11: gal te sun phyung na yang des ltung ba de chos bzhin du phyir byas pa yin la /
T08TD4106.2E:93b-12: sring mo dag ci khyed cag dge slong ma'i dge 'dun tshogs sam /
T08TD4106.2E:93b-15: kha na ma tho ba med dam /
T08TD4106.2E:93b-16: byed cag la dge 'dun gyis ma bskos pa gang zag 'ga' zhig ston par mi byed dam /
T08TD4106.2E:93b-17: khyed cag la ston pa'i gang zag ni 'ga' zhig dge 'dun las 'ong ngo //
T08TD4106.2E:93b-18: khyed cag la dge slong 'ga' yang ston par mi spro'o //
T08TD4106.2E:93b-19: khyed cag gi gdams ngag dang rjes su bstan pa ni dge 'dun las so //
T08TD4106.2E:93b-20: srid mo dag gis bag yod par sgrubs shig ces bya ba de ston nus pa bsko'o //
T08TD4106.2E:93b-21: mang du thos pa'i yan lag de yang snga ma yod pa nyid yin na gnyis pa bskor mi rung la gnyis pa yod na gsum pa bskor mi rung zhing gsum pa yod na bzhi pa bskor mi rung ngo //
T08TD4106.2E:93b-22: dge slong ma'i ston pa de lta bu bsko ba ni dge 'dun gyis gso sbyong bco lnga pa la /
T08TD4106.2E:93b-23: dge 'dun gso sbyong byas pa'i rjes la las kyi mtshams de nyid kyi nang du dge 'dun las dang 'dun pas 'dug cing mthun par gyur pa thams cad kyis spro bar bya ste /
T08TD4106.2E:94a-0: gsol ba dang gnyis kyi las kyis bsko bar @94a * //
T08TD4106.2E:94a-2: cho ga de dag las 'das na las mi 'chags so //
T08TD4106.2E:94a-3: dge slong dge 'dun gyis gso spyod bco lnga pas mtshams kyi nang du spro bar bya ste /
T08TD4106.2E:94a-4: gsol ba dang gnyis kyi las kyis ma bskos pa dge slong ma la ston pa la na smad pa med do //
T08TD4106.2E:94a-5: bskos pa chos lnga dang ston pa phyi ma'i yon tan de dag las gcig dang mi ldan pa dge slong ma la ston pa la na smad pa med do //
T08TD4106.2E:94a-6: ma bskos pa yon tan de dag dang ldan yang rung mi ldan yang rung dge slong ma la ston pa la na smad pa med do //
T08TD4106.2E:94a-7: dge slong ma chos 'di pa la bsnyen par rdzogs pa can ma nyams pa rang bzhin du gnas pa gcig gam /
T08TD4106.2E:94a-10: dge 'dun du langs pa la ston pa la na smad ba med do //
T08TD4106.2E:94a-11: lhag pa'i tshul khrims dang ldan pa'i sems dang /
T08TD4106.2E:94a-12: lhag pa'i shes rab lung nyid du gtogs pa gang yang rung ba'i ston pa la na smad pa med do //
T08TD4106.2E:94a-13: dge slong chos bla ma'i mthu dang ldan pa ma gtogs pa la na smad pa med do //
T08TD4106.2E:94a-14: sngar bskos pa ma gtogs pa la na smad pa med do //
T08TD4106.2E:94a-15: dge 'dun du ma langs pa'i gnas na ston par 'os pa yod pa la dge slong mas gsol ba ma gtogs pa la na smad pa med do //
T08TD4106.2E:94a-16: 'di'i byed la po ni ma bskos par dge slong ma la ston pa'o //
T08TD4106.2E:94a-17: 'di la yan lag lngas dngos gzhi'i ltung bar 'gyur te /
T08TD4106.2E:94a-18: gso sbyong bco lnga po de nyid la mtshams gyi nang du dge 'dun gyis spro bar byas te /
T08TD4106.2E:94a-19: gsol ba dang gnyis kyi las kyis ma bskos pa dang /
T08TD4106.2E:94a-20: bskos pa chos lnga dang ston pa phyi ma'i yon tan de dag las /
T08TD4106.2E:94a-21: gcig dang yang mi ldan pa dang /
T08TD4106.2E:94a-22: ma bskos pa yon tan de dag dang ldan yang rung pa dang /
T08TD4106.2E:94a-23: dge slong ma rang bzhin du gnas pa gcig la sogs pa dang /
T08TD4106.2E:94a-24: sde snod gsum gyi chos gang yang rung ba ston pa'o //
T08TD4106.2E:94a-25: de dag las yan lag ma tshang na ci rigs par na smad do //
T08TD4106.2E:94a-26: sbyor ba'i ltung ba ni nyes byas te /
T08TD4106.2E:94a-27: ji srid du ma bskos par ston pa'i ltung byed kyi sbyor ba brtsams nas dngos gzhi lam thug gi bar du nyes byas so //
T08TD4106.2E:94b-0: dngos @94b gzhi la sbyor ba tha dad pa ji snyed brtsams pa re re la nyes byas re re'o //
T08TD4106.2E:94b-1: dge slong ma ma chags pa dang /
T08TD4106.2E:94b-3: bsnyen par ma rdzogs pa mtshan mi mthun pa dag la nyes byas so //
T08TD4106.2E:94b-4: sde snod gsum gyi chos lung du gtogs pa nyid ma yin pa la nyes byas so //
T08TD4106.2E:94b-5: sbyor ba'i sbyor ba'i lhung ba ni nyes byas phra mo ste /
T08TD4106.2E:94b-6: sbyor ba ji snyed pa la sbyor ba yang de snyed de /
T08TD4106.2E:94b-7: sbyor ba nyes byas kyi sbyor ba'i sbyor ba yang nyes byas te /
T08TD4106.2E:94b-9: lhung ba med pa ni dge slong chos bla ma'i mthu dang ldan pa la lhung ba med do //
T08TD4106.2E:94b-10: sngar bskos pa la lhung ba med do //
T08TD4106.2E:94b-11: dge 'dun du ma langs pa'i gnas na ston par 'os pa la dge slong mas gsol te bstan pa la lhung ba med do //
T08TD4106.2E:94b-12: de la gsol ba 'debs pa'i dge slong ma dag la yang lhung ba med do //
T08TD4106.2E:94b-16: tshor ba dag gis nyen pa la lhung ba med do //
T08TD4106.2E:94b-17: bslab bar bya ba ni dge slong gis yul thams cad la gnas skabs thams cad du ma bskos par snyon pa'i ltung byed du 'gyur ba rnam pa thams cad mi bsten par bslab par bya'o //
T08TD4106.2E:94b-18: ma bskos par ston pa'i ltung byed 'di nyid kyi skabs nas dge slong ma'i ston pa bsko bar bya'o zhes gsungs pa ni 'di ltar bya ste /
T08TD4106.2E:94b-19: dge slong chos lnga dang ldan pa dge slong ma'i ston par bskor bar bya'o //
T08TD4106.2E:94b-21: tshul khrims dang ldan pa dang /
T08TD4106.2E:94b-23: gnas brtan rgyal tshab lta bu dang /
T08TD4106.2E:94b-24: grong khyer ba'i skad dang ldan pa dang /
T08TD4106.2E:94b-25: des dge slong ma la lus kyis reg pas sun ma phyung zhing /
T08TD4106.2E:94b-26: gal te sum phyung na yang /
T08TD4106.2E:94b-27: des ltung ba de chos bzhin du phyir byas pa'o //
T08TD4106.2E:94b-28: chos lnga po de dag las bzhi ni nges pa yin no //
T08TD4106.2E:94b-29: mang du thos pa ni mad na so sor thar pa'i mdo thon pa yang bsko'o //
T08TD4106.2E:94b-30: de yang med na dge slong ma'i pham par 'gyur ba brgyad dang /
T08TD4106.2E:94b-31: lci ba'i chos brgyas po dag ston nus pa yang bsko'o //
T08TD4106.2E:95a-0: de yang med na dag slong ma'i ston pa phyi ma ni dge slong tshul khrims dang ldan pa gnas brtan rgyal tshab lta bu grong khyer ba'i skad dang @95a * //
T08TD4106.2E:95a-1: ldan pa des dge slong ma la lus kyis reg pas sun ma phung zhing /
T08TD4106.2E:95a-2: gal te sun phyung na yang des lhung ba de chos bzhin du phyir byas pa yin la /
T08TD4106.2E:95a-3: sring mo dag ci khyed cag dge slong ma'i dge 'dun tshogs sam /
T08TD4106.2E:95a-6: kha na ma tho ba med dam khyed cag la dge 'dun gyis ma bskos pa'i gang zag 'ga' zhig ston par mi byed dam /
T08TD4106.2E:95a-7: khyed cag la ston pa'i gang zag ni 'ga' zhig dge 'dun las 'ong ngo //
T08TD4106.2E:95a-8: khyed cag la dge slong 'ga' yang ston par mi spro'o //
T08TD4106.2E:95a-9: khyed cag gi gdams ngag dang rjes su bstan pa ni dge 'dun las so //
T08TD4106.2E:95a-10: sring mo dag gis bag yod par sgrubs shig ces bya ba de ston nus pa bsko'o //
T08TD4106.2E:95a-12: gso sbyong bco lnga pa de nyid kyi tshe mtshams kyi nang du dge 'dun thams cad 'dug cing mthun par gyur pas gso sbyong byas nas dge slong ma'i ston pa je dang por spro bar bya ste /
T08TD4106.2E:95a-13: ming 'di zhes bya ba khyod dge slong ma'i ston par spro 'am zhes dri bar bya'o //
T08TD4106.2E:95a-14: gal te spro na des spro'o zhes brjod par bya'o //
T08TD4106.2E:95a-15: de'i 'og tu dge slong gcig gis gsol ba byas te las bya'o //
T08TD4106.2E:95a-17: 'dug la 'di skad ces brjod par bya'o //
T08TD4106.2E:95a-18: dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol /
T08TD4106.2E:95a-19: dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dge slong ma'i ston par spro na /
T08TD4106.2E:95a-20: gal te dge 'dun gyi dus la bab cing bzod na dge 'dun gyis gnang bar mdzod cig dang /
T08TD4106.2E:95a-21: dge 'dun gyis dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi pa dge slong ma'i ston par bskos te /
T08TD4106.2E:95a-22: dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dge slong ma la ston to //
T08TD4106.2E:95a-25: dge 'dun btsun pa rnams gsan du gsol /
T08TD4106.2E:95a-26: dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di /
T08TD4106.2E:95a-27: dge slong ma'i ston par spro na /
T08TD4106.2E:95a-28: de'i slad du dge 'dun gyis dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba dge slong ma'i ston par bskos te /
T08TD4106.2E:95a-29: dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di dge slong ma la ston na /
T08TD4106.2E:95b-0: tshe dang ldan pa dag dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba dge slong ma'i ston par bsko bar bzod pa @95b de dag ni cang ma gsung shig //
T08TD4106.2E:95b-1: gang dag mi bzod pa de dag ni gsungs shig / dge 'dun gyis bzod cing gnang nas /
T08TD4106.2E:95b-2: dge 'dun gyis dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba dge slong ma'i ston par bskos lags te /
T08TD4106.2E:95b-3: 'di ltar cang mi gsung bas de de bzhin du 'dzin to //
T08TD4106.2E:95b-4: phyir bcos pa ni snga ma bzhin no //
T08TD4106.2E:95b-5: ma bskos par ston pa'i ltung byed de nyi shu gcig pa bshad zin to /
T08TD4106.2E:95b-7: // / so sor thar pa'i mdo rgya cher 'grel pa /
T08TD4106.2E:95b-9: bam po nyi shu bzhi ba //
T08TD4106.2E:95b-10: nyi ma nub kyi bar du ston pa'i ltung byed kyi gleng gzhi ni /
T08TD4106.2E:95b-11: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so //
T08TD4106.2E:95b-12: bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa dga' byed la dga' byed kyis dge slong ma la thoms shig / dge slong ma la rjes su ston cig //
T08TD4106.2E:95b-13: dge slong ma la chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis shig ces bka' stsal nas dge slong ma autpa la'i mdog 'khor lnga brgya dang /
T08TD4106.2E:95b-14: tshe dang ldan pa dga' byed gal ba der song ste phyin nas /
T08TD4106.2E:95b-15: tshe dang ldan pa dga' byed kyi rkang pa gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te mtha' gcig tu 'dug go //
T08TD4106.2E:95b-16: tshe dang ldan pa dga' byed kyis bsams pa /
T08TD4106.2E:95b-17: bud med ni shes rab chung ba yin no snyam nas des de la don dang tshig dang /
T08TD4106.2E:95b-18: yi ge mdor bsdus pa dag gis chos bstan to //
T08TD4106.2E:95b-19: de shes rab can yin pas gong nas gong du dri bar byed nas tshe dang ldan pa dga' byed kyis lan btab cing /
T08TD4106.2E:95b-20: des de la ji tsam na nyi ma nub pa'i dus la bab pa de tsam gyi bar du chos bstan nas /
T08TD4106.2E:95b-21: de dag gis de'i rkang pa gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te stan las langs te dong ba dang /
T08TD4106.2E:95b-22: ji tsam na mnyan yod kyi sgo dag bcad par gyur nas dge slong ma rnams kyis sgo ba la sgo phye shig ces bos pa dang /
T08TD4106.2E:95b-23: lde mig dag rgyal po'i pho brang du khyer zin to zhes zer ro //
T08TD4106.2E:95b-26: mnyan yod dang ha cang mi ring ba na kun dga' ra ba zhig yod pa der de dag dong ngo //
T08TD4106.2E:96a-0: bcom ldan 'das kyis shing ljon pa yang rgan @96a * //
T08TD4106.2E:96a-1: rims kyis bsko bar bya'o zhes bka' stsal pas /
T08TD4106.2E:96a-2: de dag shing ljon pa dag rgan rims kyis bskob na gcig la gcig 'bod pa'i sgra mthon po dang /
T08TD4106.2E:96a-3: sgra chen po byung ba mnyan yod 'joms par 'dod pa'i g-yon can lda brgya tsam de na bskungs pa dag gis thos nas /
T08TD4106.2E:96a-4: de dag gis dge slong ma rnams btsun mo'i 'khor yin snyam nas gzhom par brtsams pa dang /
T08TD4106.2E:96a-5: autpa la'i mdog gis rgyal bu 'phags skyes po'i dpung sprul te /
T08TD4106.2E:96a-7: de dag skrag ste byer ro //
T08TD4106.2E:96a-8: dge slong ma dag nang par sngar langs te /
T08TD4106.2E:96a-9: mnyan yod du zhugs pa dang /
T08TD4106.2E:96a-10: bram ze dang khyim bdag gis mthong nas sh'akya'i bu'i dge sbyong rnams kyi chos 'dre ba dang lhag par 'dre shing tshangs par spyad pa spyod pa bzang ngo zhes tho 'tshams par byed nas /
T08TD4106.2E:96a-11: dge slong don nyung du dag ci'i phyir dge slong dag nyi ma nub pa'i dus kyi bar du dge slong ma la ston par byed ces smod par byed /
T08TD4106.2E:96a-13: kha zer bar byed pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol to //
T08TD4106.2E:96a-14: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byung ba 'di dang /
T08TD4106.2E:96a-16: skabs 'di la dge slong gi dge 'dun bsdu ba mdzad de /
T08TD4106.2E:96a-17: tshe dang ldan pa dga' byed la rmas nas /
T08TD4106.2E:96a-20: ma brtags par spyod pa rnam par smad pa mdzad de /
T08TD4106.2E:96a-23: brtags te spyod pa'i bsngags pa brjod nas /
T08TD4106.2E:96a-24: bslab pa bca' ba'i phan yon bcu yang dag par gzigs pas nga'i nyan thos rnams kyis 'dul ba la bslab pa'i gzhi 'di ltar gdon par bya ste /
T08TD4106.2E:96a-25: dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis bskos kyang /
T08TD4106.2E:96a-26: nyi ma nub pa'i dus kyi bar du dge slong ma la ston na ltung byed do zhes bca' ba mdzad de /
T08TD4106.2E:96a-28: gang zag ni tshe dang ldan pa dga' byed /
T08TD4106.2E:96a-29: nyon mongs pa ni bag chags ma byang bas so sor ma brtags pa /
T08TD4106.2E:96a-30: nyes pa ni nyi ma nub kyi bar du dge slong ma la ston pa'o //
T08TD4106.2E:96a-31: de la dge slong zhes bya ba ni chos 'di pa'o //
T08TD4106.2E:96b-0: dge 'dun gyis zhes bya ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyan @96b thos kyi dge 'dun gyis so //
T08TD4106.2E:96b-1: bskos kyang zhes bya ba ni gsol ba dang gnyis kyi las kyis so //
T08TD4106.2E:96b-2: nyi ma nub pa'i dus kyi bar du zhes bya ba ni /
T08TD4106.2E:96b-3: nyi ma nub pa'i dus la bab par ro //
T08TD4106.2E:96b-4: dge slong ma la zhes bya ba ni chos 'di pa la'o //
T08TD4106.2E:96b-5: ston na zhes bya ba ni lhag pa'i tshul khrims dang /
T08TD4106.2E:96b-8: ltung byed do zhes bya ba ni snga ma bzhin no //
T08TD4106.2E:96b-9: de la ltung ba ji ltar 'gyur zhe na /
T08TD4106.2E:96b-12: sbyor ba'i sbyor bas ltung ba rnam par gzhag pa dang /
T08TD4106.2E:96b-15: phyir bcos pa rnams kyis 'di'i mtshan nyid shes par bya'o //
T08TD4106.2E:96b-16: de la 'dir dngos gzhi'i ltung ba rnam par gzhag pa ni dge slong mtshan thog thag tu cho ston pa ma gtogs pas dge slong gis gtsug lag khang sgo phye ba'i dus na /
T08TD4106.2E:96b-17: dge slong ma'i dbyar khang du 'dug pa la sogs pa ma yin par nyi ma nub pa nyid la nyi ma nub pa nyid du 'du shes bzhin du dge slong ma la ston na nyi ma nub kyi bar du ston pa'i ltung byed kyi dngos gzhir 'gyur ro //
T08TD4106.2E:96b-18: dge slong mtshan thog thag tu chos ston pa ma gtogs pa la na smad pa med do //
T08TD4106.2E:96b-19: dge slong gis gtsug lag khang gi sgo phye ba'i mdun na dge slong ma'i dbyar khang 'dug pa la sogs pa ma yin pha la na smad pa mad do //
T08TD4106.2E:96b-20: nyi ma nub pa nyid la nyi ma nub pa nyid du 'du shes pa dang /
T08TD4106.2E:96b-21: yid gnyis za ba la na smad pa med do //
T08TD4106.2E:96b-22: dge slong ma bsnyen par rdzogs pa can ma nyams pa gcig la sogs pa la na smad pa med do //
T08TD4106.2E:96b-25: lhag pa'i shes rab nyid du gtogs pa ston pa la na smad pa med do //
T08TD4106.2E:96b-26: 'di'i byed pa po ni nyi ma nub pa nyid la 'du shes gtso cher byed pa po nyid yin no /
T08TD4106.2E:96b-27: 'di la yan lag lngas dngos gzhi'i ltung bar 'gyur te /
T08TD4106.2E:96b-28: dge slong mtshan thog thag tu chos ston pa ma yin pa dang /
T08TD4106.2E:96b-29: dge slong gis gtsug lag khang sgo phye ba'i mdun na dge slong ma'i dbyar khang 'dug pa la sogs pa ma yin pa dang /
T08TD4106.2E:96b-30: nyi ma nub pa nyid dang /
T08TD4106.2E:97a-2: dge slong ma la ston pa'o //
T08TD4106.2E:97a-3: de dag nyid las yan lag mtshang na ci rigs par na smad do //
T08TD4106.2E:97a-4: sbyor ba'i ltung ba ni nyes byas te /
T08TD4106.2E:97a-5: ji srid du nyi ma nub kyi bar du ston pa'i ltung byed kyi sbyor ba brtsams nas dngos gzhi la ma thug gi bar du nyes byas so //
T08TD4106.2E:97a-6: dngos gzhi la sbyor ba tha dad pa ji snyed brtsams pa re re la nyes byas re re'o //
T08TD4106.2E:97a-7: nyi ma nub pa nyid la nyi ma nub pa nyid du 'du shes pa dang /
T08TD4106.2E:97a-8: yid gnyis za ba la nyes byas so //
T08TD4106.2E:97a-9: dge slong ma ma chags pa dang nyams pa la nyes byas so //
T08TD4106.2E:97a-10: mtshan mi mthun pa bsnyen par ma rdzogs pa la nyes byas so //
T08TD4106.2E:97a-11: lung nyid ma yin pa ston pa la nyes byas so //
T08TD4106.2E:97a-12: sbyor ba'i sbyor ba'i ltung ba ni nyes byas phra mo ste /
T08TD4106.2E:97a-13: sbyor ba ji snyed pa la sbyor ba'i sbyor ba yang de snyed de /
T08TD4106.2E:97a-14: sbyor ba nyes byas kyi sbyor ba'i sbyor ba yang nyes byas te nyes byas phra mo'o //
T08TD4106.2E:97a-15: ltung ba med pa ni dge slong mtshan thog thag tu chos ston pa yin na ltung ba med do //
T08TD4106.2E:97a-16: dge slong gis gtsug lag khang sgo phye ba'i mdun na dge slong ma'i dbyar khang 'dug pa la sogs pa dang dge slong ma myur du thags thogs med par rang gi gnas su phyin par rung ba'i gnas dang /
T08TD4106.2E:97a-17: dge slong ma'i dbyar khang nyid dang /
T08TD4106.2E:97a-18: dge slong ma rnams kyi grong mtha'i gtsug lag khang dang /
T08TD4106.2E:97a-19: khang khyim dag tu ston pa la ltung ba med do //
T08TD4106.2E:97a-23: tshor bdag gis nyen pa la ltung ba med do /
T08TD4106.2E:97a-24: bslab par bya ba ni dge slong gis yul thams cad la gnas skabs thams cad du nyi ma nub kyi bar du ston pa'i ltung byed du 'gyur ba rnam pa thams cad mi bsten par bslab par bya'o //
T08TD4106.2E:97a-25: grong dang gtsug lag khang gi phyi rol du mi bstan par bslab par bya'o //
T08TD4106.2E:97a-26: phyir bcos pa ni snga ma bzhin no //
T08TD4106.2E:97a-27: nyi ma nub kyi bar du ston pa'i ltung byed de nyi shu gnyis pa bshad zin to /
T08TD4106.2E:97b-0: // / zas cung zad tsam gyi phyir ston pa'i ltung byed kyi gleng gzhi ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' rab na bzhugs @97b so //
T08TD4106.2E:97b-1: bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa dga' byed la dga' byed khyed kyis dge slong ma la thoms shig / dge slong ma la rjes su ston cig / dge slong ma la chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis shig ces bka' stsal nas /
T08TD4106.2E:97b-2: dge slong ma skye dgu'i bdag mo chen mo goo ta ma'i 'khor lnga brgya dang tshe dang ldan pa dga' byed gal ba der song ste /
T08TD4106.2E:97b-3: phyin nas tshe dang ldan pa dga' byed kyi rkang pa gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te mtha' gcig tu 'dug go //
T08TD4106.2E:97b-4: de nas tshe dang ldan pa dga' byed kyis de la don dang tshig dang yi ge zab pa zab pa dag gis chos bstan to//
T08TD4106.2E:97b-5: bud med ni shes rab 'chal ba'i phyir brda mi phrad cing /
T08TD4106.2E:97b-7: de nas skye dgu'i bdag mo chen mo goo ta ma'i bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar song ste de skad ces gsol pa dang /
T08TD4106.2E:97b-8: bcom ldan 'das kyis sbyin pa ni mi 'jigs pa'i rgyu yin pas dge slong ma rnams kyis dge slong rnams la bca' lnga po rtsa ba dang /
T08TD4106.2E:97b-11: me tog dang 'bras bu dag dang /
T08TD4106.2E:97b-12: bza' ba lnga po 'bras chan dang /
T08TD4106.2E:97b-24: rgya cang dag gis kun dga' bar 'gyur ba dag bya'o zhes bka' stsal nas dge slong ma dag kha cig gis ni 'o thug / kha cig gis ni zho thug / kha cig gis ni hvags kyi la du dag khyer te rgyal byed kyi tshal du tshe dang ldan pa dga' byed la 'bul du 'ongs pa nye dgas mthong nas smras pa /
T08TD4106.2E:97b-25: nye dgas kyang gal te 'di lta bu dag rnyed par gyur na /
T08TD4106.2E:97b-26: rtag pa kho nar dge slong ma la ston par 'gyur ro //
T08TD4106.2E:97b-27: kho bo tshe dang ldan pa dga' byed chos bzang po'i chos kyis dge slong ma la ston snyam gyi kho bo tshe dang ldan pa dga' byed zas cung zad tsam gyi phyir dge slong ma la ston snyam mi sems so zhes zer nas /
T08TD4106.2E:97b-28: dge slong don nyung du dag ci'i phyir dge slong rnams la 'di skad ces /
T08TD4106.2E:98a-0: dge slong dag zas cung zad tsam gyi phyir dge slong ma la @98a * //
T08TD4106.2E:98a-1: ston par byed ces zer zhes smod par byed /
T08TD4106.2E:98a-3: kha zer bar byed pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol to //
T08TD4106.2E:98a-4: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byung ba 'di dang /
T08TD4106.2E:98a-6: skabs 'di la dge slong gi dge 'dun bsdu ba mdzad de /
T08TD4106.2E:98a-8: dge sbyong gi tshul ma yin pa /
T08TD4106.2E:98a-9: rjes su mthun pa ma yin pa /
T08TD4106.2E:98a-11: tshul dang mthun pa ma yin pa de ni rab tu byung bas bya ba ma yin no zhes rnam grangs du mar rnam par smad de /
T08TD4106.2E:98a-12: bslab pa bca' ba'i phan yon bcu yang dag par gzigs pas nga'i nyan thos rnams kyis 'dul ba la bslab pa'i gzhi 'di ltar gdon par bya ste /
T08TD4106.2E:98a-14: dge slong rnams la 'di skad ces /
T08TD4106.2E:98a-15: dge slong dag gis zas cung zad tsam gyi phyir dge slong ma la ston to zhes zer na ltung phyed do zhes bca' ba mdzad de /
T08TD4106.2E:98a-18: nyon mongs pa ni phrag dog / nyes pa ni phyar ka gtong ba'o //
T08TD4106.2E:98a-19: de la yang dge slong gang zhes bya ba ni sh'akya'i bu nye dga' 'am gzhan yang de lta bu gang yin pa'o //
T08TD4106.2E:98a-20: dge slong rnams la zhes bya ba ni /
T08TD4106.2E:98a-22: 'di skad ces bya ba ni 'di skad ces zer na'o //
T08TD4106.2E:98a-23: dge slong dag ces bya ba ni chos 'di pa dag go //
T08TD4106.2E:98a-24: zas cung zad tsam gyi phyir zhes bya ba ni bca' ba lnga dang bza' ba lnga'i phyir ro //
T08TD4106.2E:98a-25: dge slong ma la zhes bya ba ni chos 'di pa la'o //
T08TD4106.2E:98a-26: ston to zhes zer na zhes bya ba ni lhag pha'i tshul khrims dang /
T08TD4106.2E:98a-29: ltung byed do zhes bya ba ni snga ma bzhin no //
T08TD4106.2E:98a-30: de la ltung ba ji ltar 'gyur zhe na /
T08TD4106.2E:98a-33: sbyor ba'i sbyor bas ltung ba rnam par gzhag pa dang /
T08TD4106.2E:98a-36: phyir bcos pa rnams kyis 'di'i mtshan nyid shes par bya'o //
T08TD4106.2E:98a-37: de la 'dir dngos gzhi'i ltung ba rnam par gzhag pa ni dge slong gis dge slong zas cung zad tsam gyi phyir ston pa ma yin pa la /
T08TD4106.2E:98b-0: dge slong 'di kha zas cung zad tsam gyi phyir dge slong @98b ma la ston to zhes nge nyid dam gzhan nyid la smra na /
T08TD4106.2E:98b-1: zas cung zad tsam gyi phyir ston pa'i ltung byed kyi dngos gzhir 'gyur ro //
T08TD4106.2E:98b-2: zas cung zad tsam gyi phyir ston pa ma yin pa la na smad pa med do //
T08TD4106.2E:98b-3: dge slong de nyid dam gzhan la smras pa la na smad pa med do //
T08TD4106.2E:98b-4: pha rol pos don go ba lan smad pa med do //
T08TD4106.2E:98b-7: dge slong gi 'tsho ba'i yo byad gang yang rung bas phyar ka gtong ba la na smad pa med do //
T08TD4106.2E:98b-8: 'di'i byed pa po ni dge slong ma la ston pa'i dge slong zas cung zad tsam gyi phyir ston pa ma yin pa'o //
T08TD4106.2E:98b-9: 'di la yan lag lngas dngos gzhi'i ltung bar 'gyur te /
T08TD4106.2E:98b-10: dge slong ma la ston pa'i dge slong dang /
T08TD4106.2E:98b-11: zas cung zas kyi phyir ston pa ma yin pa dang /
T08TD4106.2E:98b-12: de la dge slong 'di zas cung zad tsam gyi phyir dge slong ma la ston to zhes phyar ka gtong ba dang /
T08TD4106.2E:98b-13: de nyid dam gzhan la smras pa dang /
T08TD4106.2E:98b-14: pha rol pos don go ba'o //
T08TD4106.2E:98b-15: de dag las yan lag ma tshang na ci rigs par na smad do //
T08TD4106.2E:98b-16: sbyor ba'i ltung ba ni nyes byas te /
T08TD4106.2E:98b-17: ji srid du zas cung zad tsam gyi phyir ston pa'i ltung byed kyi sbyor ba brtsams nas dngos gzhi lam thug gi bar du nyes byas so //
T08TD4106.2E:98b-18: dngos gzhi la sbyor ba tha dad pa ji snyed brtsams pa re re la nyes byas re re'o //
T08TD4106.2E:98b-19: dge slong ma la ston pa'i dge slong ma chags pa dang /
T08TD4106.2E:98b-20: nyams pa la nyes byas so //
T08TD4106.2E:98b-21: dge slong ma la ston pa'i dge slong ma chags pa dang /
T08TD4106.2E:98b-22: nyams pa la nye byas so //
T08TD4106.2E:98b-23: pha rol pos don mgo ba la nyes byas so //
T08TD4106.2E:98b-24: sbyor ba'i sbyor ba'i ltung ba ni nyes byas phra mo ste /
T08TD4106.2E:98b-25: sbyor ba ji snyed pa la sbyor ba'i sbyor ba yang de snyed de /
T08TD4106.2E:98b-26: sbyor ba nyes byas kyi sbyor ba'i sbyor ba yang nyes byas te nyes byas phra mo'o //
T08TD4106.2E:98b-27: ltung ba med pa ni zas cung zad tsam gyi phyir dge slong ma la ston pa bden na ltung ba med do //
T08TD4106.2E:98b-31: tshor ba dag gis nyen ba la ltung ba med do //
T08TD4106.2E:98b-32: bslab par bya ba ni dge slong gis yul thams cad la gnas skabs thams cad du zas cung zad tsam gyi phyir ston pa'i ltung byed du 'gyur ba rnam pa thams cad mi bsten par bslab par bya'o //
T08TD4106.2E:99a-1: chos 'dri ba la mi 'jigs par bya ba'i phyir /
T08TD4106.2E:99a-2: dge slong la zas dbul bar bya'o //
T08TD4106.2E:99a-6: shur bu phre'u yang dbul bar bya'o //
T08TD4106.2E:99a-7: dge slong gis kyang de dag blang bar bya'o //
T08TD4106.2E:99a-8: phyir bcos pa ni snga ma bzhin no //
T08TD4106.2E:99a-9: zas cung zad tsam gyi phyir ston pa'i ltung byed de nyi shu gsum pa bshad zin to /
T08TD4106.2E:99a-11: // / gos sbyin pa'i ltung byed kyi gleng gzhi ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan mnyan yod na rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so //
T08TD4106.2E:99a-12: mnyan yod na tshong dpon zhig 'dug pa des /
T08TD4106.2E:99a-13: rigs mnyam pa las chung ma blangs nas de de dang lhan cig rtse bar byed dga' bar byed /
T08TD4106.2E:99a-14: dga' mgur spyod par byed do //
T08TD4106.2E:99a-15: de rgas pa'i gnas skabs su nye du zad par gyur cing /
T08TD4106.2E:99a-16: nor zad pa dang longs spyod zad par gyur nas des chung ma la smras pa /
T08TD4106.2E:99a-17: bzang mo kho bos da nor bsgrub par mi nus kyi kho bo rab tu 'byung du 'gro'o //
T08TD4106.2E:99a-19: rje'i sras bdag kyang rab tu 'byung ngo //
T08TD4106.2E:99a-20: des chung ma 'di skye dgu'i bdag mo chen mo goo ta ma'i la gsol te /
T08TD4106.2E:99a-21: rab tu byung zhing bsnyen par rdzogs par byas so //
T08TD4106.2E:99a-22: rang yang rgyal byed kyi tshal du song ste /
T08TD4106.2E:99a-23: dge slong gi dge 'dun la gsol nas rab tu byung zhing bsnyen par rdzogs so //
T08TD4106.2E:99a-24: mnyan yod na de grags shing bsod nams che bas thams cad kyis mnyan yod pa'i tshong dpon rab tu byung ngo zhes thos nas /
T08TD4106.2E:99a-29: sman gyi yo byad dag 'bul bas des de dag grub po //
T08TD4106.2E:99a-30: des dus gzhan zhig na snam sbyar dmar ser gyon te /
T08TD4106.2E:99a-31: dge slong ma de'i dbyar khang du song ba dang /
T08TD4106.2E:99a-32: dge slong ma des de'i rkang pa gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te mdun du 'dug nas de'i snam sbyar de la yang dang yang du rtog nas /
T08TD4106.2E:99a-36: lha'i gnas kyi lhag ma bzhin du'o //
T08TD4106.2E:99b-0: bdag gis 'di la snam sbyar @99b 'di sbyin par bya zhing /
T08TD4106.2E:99b-1: bdag gis snam sbyar gzhan btsem par bya'o /
T08TD4106.2E:99b-2: snyam nas des de la sna ma sbyar de byin te song ngo //
T08TD4106.2E:99b-3: de nas bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi 'khor dang bcas pa ko sa la dag tu ljongs rgyur gshegs pas dge slong de snam sbyar med par chog gos stod g-yogs smad g-yogs dang bcas pas ljongs rgyur 'gro ba gzigs pas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la smras pa dang /
T08TD4106.2E:99b-4: tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos de ji ltar gyur pa rgyas par gsol to //
T08TD4106.2E:99b-5: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
T08TD4106.2E:99b-6: kun dga' bo dge slong dag dge slong ma nye du ma yin pa la gos dag sbyin nam /
T08TD4106.2E:99b-8: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
T08TD4106.2E:99b-9: kun dga' po dge slong ma nye du ma yin pa 'di snyam du 'di'i chos gos gsum tshang ngam /
T08TD4106.2E:99b-10: 'on te ma tshang snyam du mi sems par 'di ltar thob po cog len par byed kyi /
T08TD4106.2E:99b-11: nye du la ni byin yang len par mi byed do //
T08TD4106.2E:99b-12: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byung ba 'di dang /
T08TD4106.2E:99b-14: skabs 'di la dge slong gi dge 'dun bsdu ba mdzad de /
T08TD4106.2E:99b-15: dge slong de la rmas nas /
T08TD4106.2E:99b-16: dge sbyong gi tshul ma yin pa /
T08TD4106.2E:99b-17: rjes su mthun pa ma yin pa /
T08TD4106.2E:99b-19: tshul dang mthun pa ma yin pa /
T08TD4106.2E:99b-20: de ni rab tu byung bas bya ba ma yin no zhes rnam grangs du mar rnam par smad de /
T08TD4106.2E:99b-21: bslab pa bca' ba'i phan yon bcu yang dag par gzigs pas /
T08TD4106.2E:99b-22: nga'i nyan thos rnams kyis 'dul pa la bslab pa'i gzhi 'di ltar gdon par bya ste /
T08TD4106.2E:99b-23: yang dge slong gang dge slong ma nye du ma yin pa la gos sbyin na ltung byed do zhes bca' ba mdzad de /
T08TD4106.2E:99b-25: gang zag ni mnyan yod pa la brten pa'i tshong dpon las rab tu byung ba /
T08TD4106.2E:99b-26: nyon mongs pa ni sngon gyi bud med la sred pa /
T08TD4106.2E:99b-27: nyes pa ni dge slong ma nye du ma yin pa la gos sbyin pa'o //
T08TD4106.2E:99b-28: de la yang dge slong gang zhes bya ba ni chos 'di pa'o //
T08TD4106.2E:99b-29: dge slong ma zhes bya ba yang chos 'di pa'o //
T08TD4106.2E:99b-30: nye du ma yin pa la zhes bya ba /
T08TD4106.2E:100a-0: phrugs la brten pa'i bdun pa tshun chad @100a * //
T08TD4106.2E:100a-2: de phan chad ni nye du ma yin no //
T08TD4106.2E:100a-10: nyi 'og gi gos dag las gang yang rung ba'o //
T08TD4106.2E:100a-11: sbyin na zhes bya ba ni bsab mi dgos par ro //
T08TD4106.2E:100a-12: ltung byed do zhes bya ba ni snga ma bzhin no //
T08TD4106.2E:100a-13: de la ltung ba ji ltar 'gyur zhe na /
T08TD4106.2E:100a-16: sbyor ba'i sbyor bas ltung ba rnam par gzhag pa dang /
T08TD4106.2E:100a-19: phyir bcos pa rnams kyis 'di'i mtshan nyid shes par bya'o //
T08TD4106.2E:100a-20: de la 'dir dngos gzhi'i ltung ba rnam par gzhag pa ni dge slong gis dge slong ma'i dge 'dun la gos 'bul ba ma gtogs par /
T08TD4106.2E:100a-21: dge slong ma nye du ma yin ba bor rlag byung ba dang /
T08TD4106.2E:100a-23: bsnyen par rdzogs par byed pa dang /
T08TD4106.2E:100a-24: brje bar 'dod pa ma yin pa la /
T08TD4106.2E:100a-25: der 'du shes pas gos rung ba 'khor gsum khebs pa'i tshad dang ldan byin na /
T08TD4106.2E:100a-26: gos sbyin pa'i ltung byed kyi dngos gzhir 'gyur ro //
T08TD4106.2E:100a-27: dge slong dge slong ma'i dge 'dun la gos 'bul ba ma gtogs pa lan smad pa med do //
T08TD4106.2E:100a-28: dge slong ma nye du ma yin pa la na smad do //
T08TD4106.2E:100a-29: dge slong ma nye du ma yin pa bor rlag byung ba dang /
T08TD4106.2E:100a-31: bsnyen par rdzogs par byed pa dang brje bar 'dod pa ma yin pa la smad pa med do //
T08TD4106.2E:100a-32: dge slong ma nye du ma yin pa la der 'du shes pa dang /
T08TD4106.2E:100a-33: yid gnyis zab la na smad pa med do //
T08TD4106.2E:100a-35: 'khor gsum khebs pa'i tshad dang ldan pa dang /
T08TD4106.2E:100a-36: de bas lhag pa la na smad pa med do //
T08TD4106.2E:100a-37: bsab mi dgos par byin pa la na smad pa med do //
T08TD4106.2E:100a-38: 'di'i byed pa po ni dge slong ma nye du ma yin pa nyid la 'du shes gtso cher byed pa po nyid yin no //
T08TD4106.2E:100a-39: 'di la yan lag drug gis dngos gzhi'i ltung bar 'gyur te /
T08TD4106.2E:100a-40: dge slong dge slong ma'i dge 'dun la gos 'bul ba ma yin pa dang /
T08TD4106.2E:100a-41: dge slong ma nye du ma yin pa dang /
T08TD4106.2E:100b-0: bsnyen par rdzogs @100b par byed pa 'am /
T08TD4106.2E:100b-1: brje bar 'dod pa ma yin pa dang /
T08TD4106.2E:100b-3: gos rung ba 'khor gsum khebs pa'i tshad yan chad dang /
T08TD4106.2E:100b-5: de dag las yan lag ma tshang na ci rigs par na smad do //
T08TD4106.2E:100b-6: sbyor ba'i ltung ba ni nyes byas te /
T08TD4106.2E:100b-7: ji srid du gos sbyin pa'i ltung byed kyi sbyor ba brtsams nas dngos gzhi la ma thug gi bar du nyes byas so //
T08TD4106.2E:100b-8: dngos gzhi la sbyor ba tha dad pa ji snyed brtsams pa re re la nyes byas re re'o //
T08TD4106.2E:100b-9: dge slong ma nyed du ma yin pa nyams pa dang /
T08TD4106.2E:100b-10: ma chags pa la nyes byas so //
T08TD4106.2E:100b-11: mtshan mi mthun pa nye du ma yin pa bsnyen bar ma rdzogs pa la nyes byas so //
T08TD4106.2E:100b-12: dge slong ma nye du la nye du ma yin par 'du shes pa dang /
T08TD4106.2E:100b-13: yid gnyis za ba la nyes byas so //
T08TD4106.2E:100b-15: 'khor gsum khebs pa'i tshad du ma chog pa la nyes byas so //
T08TD4106.2E:100b-16: sbyor ba'i sbyor pa'i ltung ba ni nyes byas phra mo ste /
T08TD4106.2E:100b-17: sbyor ba ji snyed pa la sbyor ba'i sbyor ba yang de snyed de /
T08TD4106.2E:100b-18: sbyor ba nyes byas kyi sbyor ba'i sbyor ba yang nyes byas te /
T08TD4106.2E:100b-20: ltung ba med pa ni dge slong ma'i dge 'dun la gos 'bul pa la ltung ba med do //
T08TD4106.2E:100b-21: dge slong ma nye du la ltung ba med do //
T08TD4106.2E:100b-22: dge slong ma nye du ma yin pa bor rlag byung ba dang /
T08TD4106.2E:100b-24: bsnyen par rdzogs par byed pa dang /
T08TD4106.2E:100b-26: brje bar 'dod pa la ltung ba med do //
T08TD4106.2E:100b-27: g-yar por byin pa la ltung ba med do //
T08TD4106.2E:100b-31: tshor pa dag gis nyen pa la ltung ba med do //
T08TD4106.2E:100b-32: bslab par bya ba ni dge slong gis yul thams cad la gnas skabs thams cad du gos sbyin pa'i ltung byed du 'gyur ba rnam pa thams cad mi bsten par bslab par bya'o //
T08TD4106.2E:100b-33: phyir bcos pa ni sdu ma bzhin no //
T08TD4106.2E:100b-34: gos sbyin pa'i ltung byed de nyi shu bzhi pa bshad zin to /
T08TD4106.2E:100b-36: // / gos byed pa'i ltung byed kyi gleng gzhi ni /
T08TD4106.2E:100b-37: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na /
T08TD4106.2E:100b-38: rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' rab na / bzhugs so //
T08TD4106.2E:101a-0: dge slong ma sbeng ma'i chos gos lda ngan cing snam sbyar @101a * //
T08TD4106.2E:101a-1: yang rnyings nas des ras yug chen zhig rnyed pa tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka la snam sbyar du 'tshem du bcug nas /
T08TD4106.2E:101a-2: drug sde dag log ste ras yug chen de brgyangs nas dras shing drubs te 'char kas snam sbyar de dang tshon sna lda pa'i skud pa khyir te 'chag tu song nas /
T08TD4106.2E:101a-3: snam sbyar de la tshon sna lnga pa'i skud pas bdag nyid sbed ma'i mgul nas 'khyud de 'dug pa zhig skud ris su btsems nas bltab ste /
T08TD4106.2E:101a-5: re zhig ji srid du mtshon gyis ma bcal ba de srid du ma dbye shig / ltung ba dang bcas par gyur ta re zhes smras so //
T08TD4106.2E:101a-6: sbed mas snam sbyar de de bzhin kho nar dbyar khang du 'phags pa dang /
T08TD4106.2E:101a-7: dge slong ma grogs mo dag gis 'phags pa 'char kas snam sbyar ji ltar btsems pa blta'o 'on cig ces byas pa na sbed mas ma ster nas /
T08TD4106.2E:101a-8: de dag gis snam sbyar hud ces phrogs nas phye ste bltas pa dang /
T08TD4106.2E:101a-9: de la tshon sna lnga pa'i skud pas 'char ka sbed ma'i mgul nas 'khyud de 'dug pa skud ris su btsems pa mthong nas /
T08TD4106.2E:101a-10: de dag gis rta gad kyis btab ste smras pa /
T08TD4106.2E:101a-11: sbed ma khyod la 'phags pa 'char kas yun ring mo zhig gis gzod 'khyud do //
T08TD4106.2E:101a-12: de skye dgu'i bdag mo chen mo goo ta m'is thos nas /
T08TD4106.2E:101a-13: nu mo dag drug sde gnas ngan len kun du spyod pa dag gis 'drum pa ltung bas bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa 'jig par byed do zhes zer ba'i skabs de dge slong ma rnams kyis dge slong rnams la brjod nas /
T08TD4106.2E:101a-14: dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol to //
T08TD4106.2E:101a-15: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byung ba 'di dang /
T08TD4106.2E:101a-17: skabs 'di la dge slong gi dge 'dun bsdu ba mdzad de /
T08TD4106.2E:101a-18: tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka la rmas nas /
T08TD4106.2E:101a-19: dge spyong gi tshul ma yin pa /
T08TD4106.2E:101a-20: rjes su mthun pa ma yin pa /
T08TD4106.2E:101a-22: tshul dang mthun pa ma yin pa /
T08TD4106.2E:101a-23: de ni rab tu byung bas bya ba ma yin no zhes rnam grangs du mar rnam par smad de /
T08TD4106.2E:101b-0: bslab pa bca' ba'i phan yon bcu yang dag par gzigs pas nga'i nyan thos rnams kyis @101b 'dul ba la bslab pa'i gzhi 'di ltar gdon par bya ste /
T08TD4106.2E:101b-1: yang dge slong gang dge slong ma nye du ma yin pa'i gos byed na ltang byed do zhes bca' ba mdzad de /
T08TD4106.2E:101b-3: gang zag ni 'char ka / nyon mongs pa ni 'dod chags /
T08TD4106.2E:101b-4: nyes pa ni dge slong ma nye du ma yin pa'i gos byed pa'o //
T08TD4106.2E:101b-5: de la yang dge slong gang zhes bya ba ni /
T08TD4106.2E:101b-7: gzhan yang de lta bu gang yin pa'o //
T08TD4106.2E:101b-8: dge slong ma zhes bya ba ni chos 'di pa'o //
T08TD4106.2E:101b-9: nye du ma yin pa'i zhes bya ba ni /
T08TD4106.2E:101b-10: phyi mo dang mes po dang /
T08TD4106.2E:101b-11: phrugs kyi bdun pa tshun chad ni nye du yin la /
T08TD4106.2E:101b-12: de phan chad ni nye du ma yin no //
T08TD4106.2E:101b-13: gos zhes bya ba ni bdun po bal gos dang /
T08TD4106.2E:101b-18: ko ta ma pa'i gos dang /
T08TD4106.2E:101b-19: nyi 'og gi gos dag las gang yang rung ba'o //
T08TD4106.2E:101b-20: byed na zhes bya ba ni 'tshem na'o //
T08TD4106.2E:101b-21: ltung byed do zhes bya ba ni snga ma bzhin no //
T08TD4106.2E:101b-22: de la ltung ba ji ltar 'gyur zhe na /
T08TD4106.2E:101b-25: sbyor ba'i sbyor bas ltung ba rnam par gzhag pa dang /
T08TD4106.2E:101b-28: phyir bcos pa rnams kyis 'di'i mtshan nyid shes par bya'o //
T08TD4106.2E:101b-29: de la 'dir dngos gzhi'i ltung ba rnam par gzhag pa ni //
T08TD4106.2E:101b-30: dge slong gis dge slong ma nye du ma yin pa la der 'du shes pas gos rung ba 'khor gsum khebs pa'i tshad dang ldan pa byed na gos byed pa'i ltung byed kyi dngos gzhir 'gyur ro //
T08TD4106.2E:101b-31: dge slong ma nye du ma yin pa la der 'du shes pa dang /
T08TD4106.2E:101b-32: yid gnyis za ba la na smad pa med do //
T08TD4106.2E:101b-33: gos rung ba dang 'khor gsum khebs pa'i tshad dang ldan pa dang /
T08TD4106.2E:101b-34: gos de las lhag pa la na smad pa med do //
T08TD4106.2E:101b-35: 'tshem pa la sogs pa byed pa'i rnam pa gang yang rung ba la na smad pa med do //
T08TD4106.2E:101b-37: dge slong ma nye du ma yin pa nyid la 'du shes gtso cher byed pa po nyid yin no //
T08TD4106.2E:101b-38: 'di la yan lag lngas dngos gzhi'i ltung bar 'gyur te /
T08TD4106.2E:101b-39: dge slong ma nye du ma yin pa dang /
T08TD4106.2E:102a-1: khebs pa'i tshad yan chad dang /
T08TD4106.2E:102a-4: de dag las yan lag ma tshang na ci rigs par na smad do //
T08TD4106.2E:102a-5: sbyor ba'i ltung ba ni nyes byas te /
T08TD4106.2E:102a-6: ji srid du gos byed pa'i ltung byed kyi sbyor ba brtsams nas dngos gzhi la ma thug gi bar du nyes byas so //
T08TD4106.2E:102a-7: dngos gzhi la sbyor ba tha dad pa ji snyed brtsams pa re re la nyes byas re re'o //
T08TD4106.2E:102a-8: dge slong ma nye du ma yin pa dang /
T08TD4106.2E:102a-10: ma chags pa la nyes byas so //
T08TD4106.2E:102a-11: mtshan mi mthun pa nye du ma yin pa dang /
T08TD4106.2E:102a-12: bsnyen par ma rdzogs pa la nyes byas so //
T08TD4106.2E:102a-13: dge slong ma nye du ma yin par 'du shes pa dang /
T08TD4106.2E:102a-14: yid gnyis za ba la nyes byas so //
T08TD4106.2E:102a-15: gos mi rung ba dang 'khor gsum khebs pa'i tshad du ma chog pa la nyes byas so //
T08TD4106.2E:102a-16: byed du bcug ba la nyes byas so //
T08TD4106.2E:102a-17: sbyor ba'i sbyor ba'i ltung ba ni nyes byas phra mo ste /
T08TD4106.2E:102a-18: sbyor ba ji snyed pa la sbyor ba'i sbyor ba yang de snyed de /
T08TD4106.2E:102a-19: sbyor ba nyes byas kyi sbyor ba'i sbyor ba yang nyes byas te nyes byas phra mo'o //
T08TD4106.2E:102a-20: ltung ba med pa ni dge slong ma nye du la ltung ba med do //
T08TD4106.2E:102a-24: tshor ba dag gis nyen pa la ltung ba med do //
T08TD4106.2E:102a-25: bslab par bya ba ni dge slong gis yul thams cad la gnas skabs thams cad du gos byed pa'i ltung byed du 'gyur ba rnam pa thams cad mi bsten par bslab par bya'o //
T08TD4106.2E:102a-26: phyir bcos pa ni snga ma bzhin no //
T08TD4106.2E:102a-27: gos byed pa'i ltung byed de nyi shu lnga pa bshad zin to /
T08TD4106.2E:102a-29: // / dge slong ma dang lhan cig 'gron lam du 'jug pa'i ltung byed kyi gleng gzhi ni /
T08TD4106.2E:102a-30: bcas pa dang gnang ba'i dbang gis rnam pa gnyis te /
T08TD4106.2E:102a-32: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so //
T08TD4106.2E:102a-33: drug sde dag gis smras pa /
T08TD4106.2E:102a-34: dga' bo nye dga' lhung bzed nag po can 'di dag rkang pa spre'u zhag gis bskus te 'gro na yang 'gro bar chas pa'i rnyed pa sgrub par byed /
T08TD4106.2E:102a-35: 'ong na yang glo bur du 'ongs pa'i rnyed pa sgrub par byed cing /
T08TD4106.2E:102b-0: skye bo mang @102b po dga' ba dang /
T08TD4106.2E:102b-2: yu bu cag ni khron pa'i rus sbal dang 'dra bar gar yang mi 'dong /
T08TD4106.2E:102b-3: gang nas kyang mi 'ong bas rnyed pa thob pa dang /
T08TD4106.2E:102b-4: skye bo mang po la dga' ba dang /
T08TD4106.2E:102b-5: yid du 'ong bar ga la 'gyur gyi /
T08TD4106.2E:102b-6: yu bu cag kyang ljongs rgyur 'dong ngo zhes de dag dge slong ma'i dbyar khang du dong ste /
T08TD4106.2E:102b-7: dge slong ma bcu gnyis sde dag lam brgyags sbyor du bcug nas de dag kyang khrid cing /
T08TD4106.2E:102b-8: dge slong bsod snyoms pa zhig kyang khrid de ljongs rgyur 'phags so //
T08TD4106.2E:102b-9: de dag gis gang gi tshe mtshams kyi phyi rol du son pa de'i tshe na smras pa /
T08TD4106.2E:102b-10: dga' bo nye dga' bdag cag gis yun ji srid du gzhan gyi spyod lam gyis 'khod par byas /
T08TD4106.2E:102b-11: tshur shog bdag cag rang rang gi spyod lam gyis 'khod par bya'o zhes dang por dga' bo 'dug nas de'i 'og tu dga' mo 'dug / de'i 'og tu dga' bo'i lhan cig gnas pa 'dug / de'i 'og tu dga' mo'i lhan cig gnas pa 'dug / de'i 'og tu dga' bo'i dge tshul 'dug / de'i 'og tu dga' mo'i dge tshul ma 'dug go //
T08TD4106.2E:102b-12: de bzhin du nye dga' dang /
T08TD4106.2E:102b-13: gtsug dga' mo la sogs pa yang spel mar bkod de dong do //
T08TD4106.2E:102b-14: don mthun de dang bram ze zhig lhan cig 'gro ba des de dag mthong nas smras pa /
T08TD4106.2E:102b-20: de'i tsha bo'i chung ma ni 'di yin par shes so //
T08TD4106.2E:102b-21: nye dgas thos nas smras pa /
T08TD4106.2E:102b-22: bkren pa khyod kyi gnya' ba rdog pas mnan nas de lta yin no //
T08TD4106.2E:102b-23: bsod snyoms pa des bsams pa /
T08TD4106.2E:102b-24: bdag shi ba ni bla'i gnas ngan len kun du spyod pa 'di dag dang lhan cig ljongs rgyur 'gro ba ni mi rung ngo snyam nas de phyir log ste /
T08TD4106.2E:102b-25: rgyal byed kyi tshal du song nas des skabs de dge slong rnams la rgyas par brjod pa dang /
T08TD4106.2E:102b-26: dge slong don nyung du dag ci'i phyir dge slong dag dge slong ma'i don mthun dang lhan cig 'thams nas 'gron lam du 'dug par byed ces smod par byed /
T08TD4106.2E:102b-28: kha zer bar byed pa'i skabs de /
T08TD4106.2E:103a-1: rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /
T08TD4106.2E:103a-2: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byung ba 'di dang /
T08TD4106.2E:103a-4: skabs 'di la dge slong gi dge 'dun bsdu ba mdzad de /
T08TD4106.2E:103a-5: drug sde dag la rmas nas /
T08TD4106.2E:103a-6: dge slong gi tshul ma yin pa /
T08TD4106.2E:103a-7: rjes su mthun pa ma yin pa /
T08TD4106.2E:103a-9: tshul dang mthun pa ma yin pa de ni rab tu byung bas bya ba ma yin no zhes rnam grangs du mar rnam par smad de /
T08TD4106.2E:103a-10: bslab pa bca' ba'i phan yon bcu yang dag par gzigs pas /
T08TD4106.2E:103a-11: nga'i nyan thos rnams kyis 'dul ba la bslab pa'i gzhi 'di ltar gdon par bya ste /
T08TD4106.2E:103a-12: yang dge slong gang dge slong ma'i don mthun dang lhan cig 'thams nas 'gron lam du 'jug na ltung byed do zhes bca' ba mdzad de /
T08TD4106.2E:103a-16: nyes pa ni dag slong ma'i don mthun dang lhan cig 'thams nas 'gron lam du 'jug pa'o //
T08TD4106.2E:103a-18: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so //
T08TD4106.2E:103a-19: dge slong ma rab tu mang po dag gis rgyal po'i khab tu dge slong ma'i dbyar khang du rgyal po'i kun dga' bar dbyar gnas par khas blangs nas /
T08TD4106.2E:103a-20: de dag dbyar gyi zla ba gsum po dag 'das nas /
T08TD4106.2E:103a-21: bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal du mnyan yod du phags te /
T08TD4106.2E:103a-22: de dag gis mnyan yod du 'gro ba'i don mthun btsal bar brtsams pa dang /
T08TD4106.2E:103a-23: ji tsam na de dag gis dge slong dang bcas pa'i don mthun mthong nas /
T08TD4106.2E:103a-24: dge slong med pa'i don mthun gzhan btsal bar brtsams pa dang /
T08TD4106.2E:103a-25: ma rnyed nas de dag dge slong dang bcas pa'i den mthun de dang lhan cig mgo snang brtsam gyis 'phags so //
T08TD4106.2E:103a-26: don mthun de shin tu rings par song nas de dag phyi bzhin du 'brang zhing 'gro ba na /
T08TD4106.2E:103a-27: cho ma rkun pa dag gis bcom nas /
T08TD4106.2E:103a-28: de dag mthar gyis mnyan yod du phyin te dge slong ma'i dbyar khang du song ba dang /
T08TD4106.2E:103a-29: dge slong ma rnams kyis mthong nas smras pa /
T08TD4106.2E:103b-0: phu nu mo dag ji ltar @103b bde bar brgyus sam ji ltar bde bar brgyus /
T08TD4106.2E:103b-1: bdag cag chom ma rkun pa dag gis bcom mo //
T08TD4106.2E:103b-2: phu nu mo dag ji ltar bdag cag bcom ldan 'das kyis yongs su btang ba de ltar ni ya mtshan can dgu bcu rtsa drug po dag gis kyang bud med gzhan 'ga' yang yongs su ma btang ngo zhes zer ba'i skabs de dge slong ma rnams kyis dge slong rnams la brjod nas /
T08TD4106.2E:103b-3: dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba dang /
T08TD4106.2E:103b-4: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
T08TD4106.2E:103b-5: de lta bas na dus ma gtogs so //
T08TD4106.2E:103b-6: dge slong dag don mthun dang /
T08TD4106.2E:103b-7: lhan cig ljongs rgyur 'dod pa na /
T08TD4106.2E:103b-8: de dag bsod snyoms kyis phongs par gyur pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /
T08TD4106.2E:103b-9: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
T08TD4106.2E:103b-11: de dag gis sus bskur bar bya ba mi shes nas /
T08TD4106.2E:103b-12: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
T08TD4106.2E:103b-13: rtse rgod kyis bskur bar bya'o //
T08TD4106.2E:103b-14: rtse rgod med na rtse rgod mos bskur bar bya'o //
T08TD4106.2E:103b-15: rtse rgod mo med na dge tshul gyis bskur bar bya'o //
T08TD4106.2E:103b-17: dge tshul mas bskur bar bya'o //
T08TD4106.2E:103b-19: dge slong rnams kyis dge slong ma rnams kyi lam brgyags bskur bar bya zhing /
T08TD4106.2E:103b-20: dge slong ma rnams kyis dge slong rnams la lam brgyags bskur bar bya ste /
T08TD4106.2E:103b-21: dge slong rnams kyis dge slong ma rnams kyi byin len bstabs par bya zhing /
T08TD4106.2E:103b-22: dge slong ma rnams kyis dge slong rnams kyi byin len bstabs par bya'o //
T08TD4106.2E:103b-23: dge slong dag ljongs rgyu zhing 'dong ba na /
T08TD4106.2E:103b-24: gzhan dag na bar gyur nas dge slong dag gis de dag bor te dong nas /
T08TD4106.2E:103b-25: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
T08TD4106.2E:103b-26: mi dor bar bskur bar bya'o //
T08TD4106.2E:103b-28: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
T08TD4106.2E:103b-29: dge slong ma rnams kyis kyang dge slong dag gi bskur bar bya'o //
T08TD4106.2E:103b-30: dge slong ma dag gis rkang pa logs nas 'dzin cing /
T08TD4106.2E:103b-31: dge slong dag mgo logs nas 'dzin pa na dge slong ma dag 'dod chags skyes nas /
T08TD4106.2E:103b-32: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
T08TD4106.2E:104a-1: slong dag gis rkang pa logs nas bzung bar bya zhing /
T08TD4106.2E:104a-2: dge slong ma dag gis mgo logs nas gzung bar bya'o //
T08TD4106.2E:104a-3: de dag grong du phyin nas thams cad sdod pa na de dag bsod snyoms kyis phongs par gyur nas /
T08TD4106.2E:104a-4: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
T08TD4106.2E:104a-5: thams cad kyis bsdad par mi bya bar de na ba'i sman dang zas legs par sbyar te /
T08TD4106.2E:104a-8: dge slong ma rnams la yang de bzhin du bya'o //
T08TD4106.2E:104a-9: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bslab pa 'dod pa dang /
T08TD4106.2E:104a-10: bslab pa la gus pa dang /
T08TD4106.2E:104a-11: bslab pa la yo byad bsnyungs pa'i bsngags pa brjod nas dge slong rnams la de dang mthun pa dang /
T08TD4106.2E:104a-13: de dang 'tsham pa'i chos dang ldan pa'i bka' mchid mdzad nas /
T08TD4106.2E:104a-14: dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa /
T08TD4106.2E:104a-15: dge slong dag de lta bas na /
T08TD4106.2E:104a-16: snga ma ni bcas pa yin la /
T08TD4106.2E:104a-18: nga'i nyan thos rnams kyi 'dul ba la bslab pa'i gzhi 'di ltar gdon par bya ste/ yang dge slong gang dge slong ma'i don mthun dang lhan cig 'thams nas 'gron lam du 'jug na dus ma gtogs te /
T08TD4106.2E:104a-20: de la dus ni 'di yin te /
T08TD4106.2E:104a-21: lam don mthun gyis bgrod par bya ba dgos pa dang bcas par grags pa /
T08TD4106.2E:104a-22: 'jigs pa dang bcas par grags pa /
T08TD4106.2E:104a-23: 'jigs pa tha dad pas 'jigs su rung ba dang bcas par grags pa zhig de la de ni dus yin no zhes gnang ba mdzad de yul ni mnyan yod /
T08TD4106.2E:104a-25: nyon mongs pa dang nyes pa ni med do //
T08TD4106.2E:104a-26: de la yang dge slong gang zhes bya ba ni drug sde 'am gzhan yang de lta bu gang yin pa'o //
T08TD4106.2E:104a-27: dge slong ma'i don mthun dang lhan cig ces bya ba ni snga ma bzhin no //
T08TD4106.2E:104a-28: 'thams nas zhes bya ba ni brda byas nas so /
T08TD4106.2E:104a-29: 'gron lam du zhes bya ba ni dgon pa'i lam du'o //
T08TD4106.2E:104a-30: 'jug na zhes bya ba ni 'gro na'o //
T08TD4106.2E:104a-31: dus ma gtogs te zhes bya ba ni dus gzhag ste'o //
T08TD4106.2E:104a-32: ltung byed do zhes bya ba ni snga ma bzhin no //
T08TD4106.2E:104a-33: de la dus ni 'di yin te /
T08TD4106.2E:104b-0: lam don mthun gyis bgrod par bya ba zhes bya ba ni don mthun med par @104b bgrod mi nus pa'o //
T08TD4106.2E:104b-1: dogs pa dang bcas par grags pa zhes bya ba ni chom rkun pa dang g-yon can gyis 'jigs par grags pa'o //
T08TD4106.2E:104b-2: 'jigs pa dang bcas par grags pa zhes bya ba ni /
T08TD4106.2E:104b-6: 'jigs pa tha dad pas 'jigs su rung ba dang bcas par grags pa zhig na zhes bya ba ni sha sbrang dang /
T08TD4106.2E:104b-10: sdig sbrul gyi 'jigs pa tha dad pas 'jigs su rung ba dang bcas pa grags pa zhig na'o //
T08TD4106.2E:104b-11: de la de ni dus yin no zhes bya ba ni /
T08TD4106.2E:104b-12: bslab pa'i gzhi bcas pa de la de ni gnang ba'i dus yin pa'o //
T08TD4106.2E:104b-13: de la ltung ba ji ltar 'gyur zhe na /
T08TD4106.2E:104b-16: sbyor ba'i sbyor bas ltung ba rnam par gzhag pa dang ltung ba med pa dang bslab par bya ba dang /
T08TD4106.2E:104b-17: phyir bcos pa rnams kyis 'di'i mtshan nyid shes par bya'o //
T08TD4106.2E:104b-18: de la 'dir dngos gzhi'i ltung ba rnam par gzhag pa ni 'jigs pa dang bcas pa'i lam nyid du sngar ma 'thams par dge slong ma dang 'gron thabs cig tu zhugs shing tha mi dad par 'gro ba nyid ma gtogs par dge slong ma gcig dang yang lam las 'da' zhing 'gro na rgyang grags re rer dge slong ma dang lhan cig 'gron lam du 'jug pa'i ltung byed kyi dngos gzhir 'gyur ro //
T08TD4106.2E:104b-19: lam 'jigs pa med pa nyid la na smad pa med do //
T08TD4106.2E:104b-20: dge slong ma bsnyen par rdzogs pa can ma nyams pa gcig yan chad la na smad pa med do //
T08TD4106.2E:104b-21: sngar 'thams pa la na smad pa med do //
T08TD4106.2E:104b-22: lam gcig pa la na smad pa med do //
T08TD4106.2E:104b-23: rgyang grags gcig gi mtha' las 'das pa lan smad pa med do //
T08TD4106.2E:104b-24: nyin mtshan gyi cha la na smad pa med do //
T08TD4106.2E:104b-25: 'di'i byed pa po ni lam 'jigs pa med pa dang /
T08TD4106.2E:104b-26: dge slong ma'i 'gron pa dang 'thams pa'o //
T08TD4106.2E:104b-27: 'di la yan lag sngas dngos gzhi'i ltung bar 'gyur te /
T08TD4106.2E:104b-28: lam 'jigs pa med pa nyid dang /
T08TD4106.2E:104b-29: dge slong ma gcig yan chad kyi 'gron pa dang /
T08TD4106.2E:104b-30: 'thams pa dang lam du zhugs pa dang /
T08TD4106.2E:104b-31: rgyang grags gcig gi mtha' las 'das pa'o //
T08TD4106.2E:105a-0: @105a * // de dag las yan lag ma tshang na ci'i rigs par na smad do //
T08TD4106.2E:105a-1: sbyor ba'i ltung ba ni nyes byas te /
T08TD4106.2E:105a-2: ji srid du dge slong ma dang lhan cig 'gron lam du 'jug pa'i ltung byed kyi sbyor ba brtsams nas dngos gzhi la ma thug gi bar du nyes byas so //
T08TD4106.2E:105a-3: dngos gzhi la sbyor ba tha dad pa ji snyed brtsams pa re re la nyes byas re re'o //
T08TD4106.2E:105a-4: dge slong ma ma chags pa dang /
T08TD4106.2E:105a-5: nyams pa la nyes byas so //
T08TD4106.2E:105a-6: mtshan mi mthun pa bsnyen par ma rdzogs pa la nyes byas so //
T08TD4106.2E:105a-7: rgyang grags kyi phyed du nyes byas so //
T08TD4106.2E:105a-8: sbyor ba'i sbyor ltung ba ni nyes byas phra mo ste /
T08TD4106.2E:105a-9: sbyor ba ji snyed pa la sbyor ba'i sbyor ba yang de snyed de /
T08TD4106.2E:105a-10: sbyor ba nyes byas kyi sbyor ba yang nyes byas te nyes byas phra mo'o //
T08TD4106.2E:105a-11: ltung ba med pa ni lam 'jigs pa dang bcas pa nyid la ltung ba med do //
T08TD4106.2E:105a-12: ma 'thams pa la ltung ba med do //
T08TD4106.2E:105a-13: lam tha dad pa la ltung ba med do //
T08TD4106.2E:105a-17: tshor ba dag gis nyen pa la ltung ba med do //
T08TD4106.2E:105a-18: bslab par bya ba ni dge slong gis yul thams cad la gnas skabs thams cad du dge slong ma dang lhan cig 'gron lam du 'jug pa'i ltung byed du 'gyur ba rnam pa thams cad mi bsten par bslab par bya'o //
T08TD4106.2E:105a-19: dge slong dang dge slong ma 'gron lam du dro bas lam brgyags rin po che lnga 'am /
T08TD4106.2E:105a-20: rin po cher smos pa lnga'am /
T08TD4106.2E:105a-21: bza' bar smos pa lnga las gang sbyor cing 'os pa bskur bar bya'o //
T08TD4106.2E:105a-22: su dag gis bskur bar bya zhe na /
T08TD4106.2E:105a-26: dge tshul mo dag las gang yod pa dag gis bskur bar bya'o //
T08TD4106.2E:105a-27: de dag med na dge slong ma rnams gcig gi lam brgyags gcig gis bskur du rung ngo //
T08TD4106.2E:105a-28: dge slong dang dge slong ma rnams gcig gis gcig gi byin len yang bstabs su rung ngo //
T08TD4106.2E:105a-29: changs pa mtshungs par spyod pa na ba lam du dor bar mi bya'o //
T08TD4106.2E:105a-30: lam du nad kyis btab pa de bskur bar bya'o //
T08TD4106.2E:105a-31: dge slong ma la yang de bzhin du'o //
T08TD4106.2E:105b-0: nad pa @105b bskur ba de la dge slong dang dge slong ma rnams phan tshun gcig gi grogs gcig gis bya'o //
T08TD4106.2E:105b-1: mtshan mi mthun pas mgo logs nas bzung zhing mtshan mthun pas rkang pa logs nas bzung ngo //
T08TD4106.2E:105b-2: grong du phyin pa nyid na nad pa'i sman dang zan legs par sbyar te rang bzhin mthun pa'i nad g-yog gcig kyang bzhag nas bsod snyoms pa la sogs pa la song yang nyes pa med do //
T08TD4106.2E:105b-3: phyir bcos pa ni snga ma bzhin no //
T08TD4106.2E:105b-4: dge slong ma dang lhan cig 'gron lam du 'jug pa'i ltung de nyi shu drug pa bshad zin to /
T08TD4106.2E:105b-6: // / dge slong ma dang lhan cig grur 'jug pa'i ltung byed kyi gleng gzhi ni /
T08TD4106.2E:105b-7: bcas pa dang gnang ba'i dbang gis rnam pa gnyis te /
T08TD4106.2E:105b-8: bcas pa'i gleng gzhi ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so //
T08TD4106.2E:105b-9: drug sde dag gis smras pa /
T08TD4106.2E:105b-10: dga' bo nye dga' ltung bzed nag po can 'di dag ni rkang pa spre'u zhag gis bskus te 'gro na yang 'gro bar chas pa'i rnyed pa sgrub par byed /
T08TD4106.2E:105b-11: 'ong na yang glo bur du 'ongs pa'i rnyed pa sgrub par byed cing /
T08TD4106.2E:105b-12: skye bo mang po dga' ba dang /
T08TD4106.2E:105b-14: yu bu cag ni khron pa'i rus sbal dang 'dra bar gar yang mi 'dong /
T08TD4106.2E:105b-15: gang nas kyang mi bas rnyed pa 'thob pa dang /
T08TD4106.2E:105b-16: skye bo mang po la dga' ba dang /
T08TD4106.2E:105b-17: yid du 'ong bar ga la 'gyur gyi /
T08TD4106.2E:105b-18: yu bu cag kyang grur zhugs te 'dong ngo zhes de dag dge slong ma'i dbyar khang du dong ste dge slong ma bcu gnyis sde dag lam brgyags sbyor du bcug nas de dag kyang khrid cing dge slong bsod snyoms pa zhig kyang khrid de grur 'jug tu 'phags so //
T08TD4106.2E:105b-19: de dag gis gang gi tshe mtshams kyi phyi rol du grur zhugs pa de'i tshe na smras pa /
T08TD4106.2E:105b-20: dga' bo nye dga' bdag cag gis yun ji srid du gzhan gyi spyod lam gyis 'khod par byas /
T08TD4106.2E:105b-21: tshur sheg bdag cag rang rang gi spyod lam gyis 'khod par bya'o zhes dang por dga' bo 'dug nas /
T08TD4106.2E:106a-0: de'i 'og tu dga' mo 'dug / de'i 'og tu dga' bo'i lhan cig gnas pa 'dug / de'i 'og tu dga' mo'i lhan cig gnas pa @106a * //
T08TD4106.2E:106a-1: 'dug / de'i 'og tu dga' bo'i dge tshul 'dug / de'i 'og tu dga' mo'i dge tshul 'dug go //
T08TD4106.2E:106a-2: de bzhin du nye dga' bo dang gtsug dga' mo la sogs pa yang spel mar bkod de dong ngo //
T08TD4106.2E:106a-3: don mthun de dang bram ze zhig lhan cig 'gro ba de sa di dag mthong nas smras pa /
T08TD4106.2E:106a-9: de'i tsha bo ni chung ma ni 'di yin par shes so //
T08TD4106.2E:106a-10: nye dgas thos nas smras pa /
T08TD4106.2E:106a-11: bkren pa khyod kyi gnya' bar rdog pas mnan nas de ltar yin no //
T08TD4106.2E:106a-12: bsod snyoms pa des bsams pa /
T08TD4106.2E:106a-13: bdag shi ba ni bla'i gnas ngan len kun du spyod pa 'di dag dang /
T08TD4106.2E:106a-14: lhan cig ljongs rgyur 'gro ba ni mi rung ngo snyam nas de phyir log ste /
T08TD4106.2E:106a-15: rgyal byed kyi tshal du song nas des skabs de dge slong rnams la rgyas par brjod pa dang /
T08TD4106.2E:106a-16: dge slong don nyung du dag ci'i phyir dge slong dag dge slong ma'i don mthun dang lhan cig 'thams nas grur 'jug par byed ces smod par byed /
T08TD4106.2E:106a-18: kha zer bar byed pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol to //
T08TD4106.2E:106a-19: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byung ba 'di dang /
T08TD4106.2E:106a-21: skabs 'di la dge slong gi dge 'dun bsdu ba mdzad de /
T08TD4106.2E:106a-22: drug sde dag la rmas nas /
T08TD4106.2E:106a-23: dge sbyong gi tshul ma yin pa /
T08TD4106.2E:106a-24: rjes su mthun pa ma yin pa /
T08TD4106.2E:106a-26: tshul dang mthun pa ma yin pa /
T08TD4106.2E:106a-27: de ni rab tu byung bas bya ba ma yin no zhes rnam grangs du mar rnam par smad de /
T08TD4106.2E:106a-28: bslab pa bca' ba'i phan yon bcu yang dag par gzigs pas nga'i nyan thos rnams kyis 'dul ba la bslab pa'i gzhi 'di ltar gdon par bya ste /
T08TD4106.2E:106a-29: yang dge slong gang dge slong gang dge slong ma'i don mthun dang lhan cig 'thams nas /
T08TD4106.2E:106a-30: gru gcig tu 'jug cing gyen du 'gro 'am thur du 'gron lhung byed do zhes bca' ba mdzad de /
T08TD4106.2E:106a-31: yul ni mnyan yod gang zag ni drug ste /
T08TD4106.2E:106a-32: nyon mongs pa ni 'dod zhe na /
T08TD4106.2E:106b-0: nyes pa ni dge slong ma'i don mthun dang 'thams nas gru @106b gcig tu 'jug pa'o //
T08TD4106.2E:106b-1: gnang ba'i gleng gzhi ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so //
T08TD4106.2E:106b-2: de'i tshe na khyim bdag gcig gis chu klung gnas can gyi phyi rol tha ba can gyi kun dga' ra bar dge 'dun gyi phyir gtsug lag khang byed du bcug nas /
T08TD4106.2E:106b-3: des gtsug lag khang de dbul ba'i phyir gnyi ga'i dge 'dun spyan drangs so //
T08TD4106.2E:106b-4: dge slong ma zhig dge ba'i phyogs la brtson par gyur pa des bsams pa /
T08TD4106.2E:106b-5: deng bdag gis bsod snyoms la rgyu ma dgos pas ji srid du gdugs tshod la nya bar ma gyur pa de srid kyi bar du dge ba'i phyogs la tron bya zhing /
T08TD4106.2E:106b-6: de'i 'og tu dus shes par byas te 'gro'o snyam nas des ji srid du gdugs tshod la nye bar ma gyur pa de srid kyi bar du dge ba'i phyogs la tron byas nas /
T08TD4106.2E:106b-7: de'i 'og tu dus shes par byas te chu klung gi 'gram du song ba dang /
T08TD4106.2E:106b-8: ji tsam na dge slong dag grur zhugs nas gru pas smras pa /
T08TD4106.2E:106b-9: 'phags ma grur zhugs shig / dge slong ma des smras pa /
T08TD4106.2E:106b-10: bzhin bzangs je song shig dang gru gzhan bkang ba na 'gro'o //
T08TD4106.2E:106b-11: gru pa des yang dang yang du 'ongs te smras pa /
T08TD4106.2E:106b-12: 'phags ma grur zhugs shig / des kyang smras pa /
T08TD4106.2E:106b-13: bzhin bzangs je song shig dang /
T08TD4106.2E:106b-15: gru pa de song nas chu klung gi phyi rol du gru phur pa la brtod de skye bo phal po che'i tshogs kyi nang du zhugs shing 'dug go //
T08TD4106.2E:106b-16: dge slong ma des yang dang yang du bos pa dang /
T08TD4106.2E:106b-17: gru pa des tshig kyang ma ster nas de de na sdod stong nas ji tsam na gdugs tshod yol nas de'i 'og tu dbyar khang du phyir log ste /
T08TD4106.2E:106b-18: de ji srid du lus las mdangs ma yal ba de srid kyi bar du dge ba'i phyogs la tron byas nas /
T08TD4106.2E:106b-19: gang gi tshe lus las mdangs yal ba de'i tshe na glos phab ste nyal ba dang /
T08TD4106.2E:106b-20: dge slong ma rnams lhags te de la smras pa /
T08TD4106.2E:106b-21: 'phags ma gal te zas gzhan gyi yin zhes te lto yang gzhan gyi yin snyam mam ci byas /
T08TD4106.2E:106b-22: ci tsam gyis glos phab ste nyal bar gyur pa de tsam gyis zas zos so //
T08TD4106.2E:107a-1: 'o na ci'i phyir glos phab ste nyal /
T08TD4106.2E:107a-2: des skabs de rgyas par dge slong ma rnams la brjod nas dge slong ma rnams kyis dge slong rnams la rgyas par brjod do //
T08TD4106.2E:107a-3: dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba dang /
T08TD4106.2E:107a-4: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
T08TD4106.2E:107a-5: dge slong dag de lta bas na thad kar pha rol du 'gro ba ma gtogs so //
T08TD4106.2E:107a-6: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bslab pa 'dod pa dang /
T08TD4106.2E:107a-7: bslab pa la gus pa dang /
T08TD4106.2E:107a-8: bslab pa la yo byad bsnyungs pa'i bsngags pa brjod nas /
T08TD4106.2E:107a-9: dge slong rnams la de dang mthun pa dang /
T08TD4106.2E:107a-11: de dang 'tsham pa'i chos dang ldan pa'i bka' mchid mdzad nas dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa /
T08TD4106.2E:107a-12: dge slong dag de lta bas na lnga ma ni bcas pa yin la 'di ni gnang ba yin te /
T08TD4106.2E:107a-13: nga'i nyan thos rnams kyis 'dul ba la bslab pa'i gzhi 'di ltar gdon par bya ste /
T08TD4106.2E:107a-14: yang dge slong gang dge slong ma'i don mthun dang lhan cig 'thams nas gru gcig tu 'jug cing gyen du 'gro 'am thur du 'gro na thad kar pha rol du 'gro ba ma gtogs te lhung byed do zhes gnang ba mdzad de /
T08TD4106.2E:107a-16: gang zag ni chos 'di pa'i dge slong dang /
T08TD4106.2E:107a-18: nyon mongs pa dang nyes pa ni med do //
T08TD4106.2E:107a-19: de la yang dge slong gang zhes bya ba ni drug sde 'am /
T08TD4106.2E:107a-20: gzhan yang de lta bu gang yin pa'o //
T08TD4106.2E:107a-21: dge slong ma'i don mthun dang lhan cig ces bya ba ni chos 'di pa'o //
T08TD4106.2E:107a-22: 'thams nas zhes bya ba ni brda byas nas so //
T08TD4106.2E:107a-23: gru gcig tu zhes bya ba ni shog ma gcig pa dang /
T08TD4106.2E:107a-26: 'jug cing zhes bya ba ni zhon cing ngo //
T08TD4106.2E:107a-27: gyen du 'gro 'am zhes bya ba ni rgyun las bzlog phyogs su 'gro na 'o //
T08TD4106.2E:107a-28: thur du 'gron zhes bya ba ni rgyun phyogs su 'gro na 'o //
T08TD4106.2E:107a-29: thad kar pha rol du 'gro ba ma gtogs te zhes bya ba ni thad kar pha rol du 'gro ba gzhag ste'o //
T08TD4106.2E:107a-30: ltung byed do zhes bya ba ni snga ma bzhin no //
T08TD4106.2E:107a-31: de la ltung ba ji ltar 'gyur zhe na /
T08TD4106.2E:107a-34: sbyor ba'i sbyor bas ltung ba rnam par gzhag pa dang /
T08TD4106.2E:107b-2: phyir bcos pa rnams kyis 'di'i mtshan nyid shes par bya'o //
T08TD4106.2E:107b-3: de la 'dir dngos gzhi'i ltung ba rnam par gzhag pa ni 'gram gnyis 'jigs pa dang bcas pa nyid ma gtogs par 'thams nas dge slong ma gcig dang yang cig car gru gcig gis lam las 'das zhing 'gro na thad kar pha rol du 'gro ba ma gtogs te rgyang grags re rer dge slong ma dang lhan cig grur 'jug pa'i ltung byed kyi dngos gzhir 'gyur ro //
T08TD4106.2E:107b-4: 'gram gnyis 'jigs pa med pa nyid la na smad pa med do //
T08TD4106.2E:107b-5: dge slong ma bsnyen par rdzogs pa can ma nyams pa gcig yan chad la na smad pa med do //
T08TD4106.2E:107b-6: sngar 'thams pa la na smad pa med do //
T08TD4106.2E:107b-7: gru tshugs sho gam gcig pa dang /
T08TD4106.2E:107b-9: gru btsas gcig pa'i gru tha dad pa la na smad pa med do //
T08TD4106.2E:107b-10: gyen du 'gro yang rung thur du 'gro yang rung ste rgyang grags gcig gi mtha' las 'das pa la na smad pa med do //
T08TD4106.2E:107b-11: nyin mtshan gyi cha la na smad pa med do //
T08TD4106.2E:107b-12: 'di'i byed pa po ni 'gram gnyis 'jigs pa med pa dang /
T08TD4106.2E:107b-13: dge slong ma'i 'gron pa dang 'thams pa'o //
T08TD4106.2E:107b-14: 'di la yan lag ldas dngos gzhi'i ltung bar 'gyur te /
T08TD4106.2E:107b-15: 'gram gnyis 'jigs pa med pa nyid dang /
T08TD4106.2E:107b-16: dge slong ma gcig yan chad kyi 'gron pa dang 'thams pa dang /
T08TD4106.2E:107b-18: rgyang grags gcig gi mtha' las 'das pa'o //
T08TD4106.2E:107b-19: de dag las yan lag ma tshang na ci rigs par na smad do //
T08TD4106.2E:107b-20: sbyor ba'i ltung ba ni nyes byas te /
T08TD4106.2E:107b-21: ji srid du dge slong ma dang lhan cig grur 'jug pa'i ltung byed kyi sbyor ba brtsams nas dngos gzhi la ma thug gi bar du nyes byas so //
T08TD4106.2E:107b-22: dngos gzhi la sbyor ba tha dad pa ji snyed brtsams pa re re la nyes byas re re'o //
T08TD4106.2E:107b-23: dge slong ma ma chags pa dang nyams pa la nyes byas so //
T08TD4106.2E:107b-24: mtshan mi mthun pa bsnyen par ma rdzogs pa la nyes byas so //
T08TD4106.2E:107b-25: rgyang grags kyi phyed du nyes byas so //
T08TD4106.2E:107b-26: sbyor ba'i sbyor ba'i ltung ba ni nyes byas phra mo ste /
T08TD4106.2E:107b-27: sbyor ba ji snyed pa la sbyor ba'i sbyor ba yang de snyed de /
T08TD4106.2E:107b-28: sbyor ba nyes byas kyi sbyor ba'i sbyor ba yang nyes byas te nyes byas phra mo'o //
T08TD4106.2E:107b-29: ltung ba med pa ni 'gram gnyis 'jigs pa dang bcas pa nyid la ltung ba med do //
T08TD4106.2E:107b-30: ma 'thams pa la ltung ba med do //
T08TD4106.2E:108a-0: gru tshugs sho gam tha dad pa @108a * //
T08TD4106.2E:108a-2: lag can tha dad pa dang /
T08TD4106.2E:108a-3: gru btsas tha dad pa la ltung ba med do //
T08TD4106.2E:108a-4: thad kar pha rol du 'gro ba la ltung ba med do //
T08TD4106.2E:108a-5: thad kar pha rol du 'gro ba de'i phyir zhugs pa na chu'i gzhung yo ba dang /
T08TD4106.2E:108a-6: chu klung gis gtib chad pa dang /
T08TD4106.2E:108a-7: dba' klong las gzur ba'i dbang dang ru skya dad gdos pa chag pa'i dbang dang ru skya 'dzin pa'i dbang gis rgyun las bzlog pa'i phyogs sam /
T08TD4106.2E:108a-8: rgyun phyogs kyi 'jug pa gzhan du song ba la nyes pa med do //
