T08TD4106.2E:124b-11: de 'dug gnas de na phyogs bzhi'i dge sbyong dang bram ze gang 'dug pa de la bsod snyoms kyi mkho ba stobs par byed de gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis mnyan yod du cho 'phrul chen po rnam par bstan te /
T08TD4106.2E:124b-12: gzhan mu stegs can dag tshar bcad cing /
T08TD4106.2E:124b-13: lha dang mi rnams kun du dga' bar mdzad pa dang /
T08TD4106.2E:124b-14: skye bo mdzangs pa dag gi snying dag rangs par mdzad pa de'i tshe na gzhan mu stegs can dag mtha' 'khob dag na brten cing gnas so //
T08TD4106.2E:124b-15: dus gzhan zhig na gcer bu pa drug cu ri brags der lhags nas khyim bdag des de dag la mkho ba stobs par byed pa de'i tshe na mnyan yod nas tshong pa dad pa can zhig zong thogs te ri brags der 'ongs pa de yang khyim bdag des der bos pa na tshong pa des 'di dag bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos dag yin gor ma chag gi song la blta'o snyam na /
T08TD4106.2E:124b-16: des der song ba dang ji tsam na gcer bu pa ngo tsha dang khrel bor ba sha stag yin bar mthong ngo //
T08TD4106.2E:124b-17: khyim bdag des tshong pa de la smras pa /
T08TD4106.2E:124b-18: grogs po sa bon bzang zhing zhing bzang ngam /
T08TD4106.2E:124b-20: grogs po sa bon ni bzang na zhing ni gcer bu pa ngo tsha dang khrel por ba sdig pa'i lta ba can dgon dung tsha sgo can tha chad sdig pa can gyi sa gzhi sha stag yin no //
T08TD4106.2E:125a-2: grogs po zhing bzang po gzhan 'ga' yang yod dam /
T08TD4106.2E:125a-5: bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos dag go //
T08TD4106.2E:125a-7: gal te de dag der byon na bdag gis de dag la bsod snyoms kyi mkho ba bstabs par bgyi'o //
T08TD4106.2E:125a-8: tshong pa des zong bsgyur te rin blangs nas mnyan yod du song ste /
T08TD4106.2E:125a-10: drug sde dag ri brags der dong nas khyim bdag des de dag la mkho ba bstabs so //
T08TD4106.2E:125a-11: gcer bu pa de dag gis gcig gzhis srung du bzhag nas gzhan dag gshed du dang ba'i tshe /
T08TD4106.2E:125a-12: drug sde dag gis gzhis srung de bskrad nas /
T08TD4106.2E:125a-13: de nas yun ring mo zhig tu za zhing 'dug 'dug nas /
T08TD4106.2E:125a-14: re zhig na khyim bdag de ri brags gzhan zhig tu bya ba zhig la song pa'i phyi nas /
T08TD4106.2E:125a-15: drug sde dag gis de'i chung ma zas 'drim pa la lus kyi skyon brjod cing 'phyas btags nas /
T08TD4106.2E:125a-16: khyim bdag bza' bran ma dad par gyur te /
T08TD4106.2E:125a-17: 'tsho ba dang gnas mal yang khad kyis phri ba na gcer bu pa gzhis srung bskrad pa des kyang rang gi dpung drug cu po dag sbran te /
T08TD4106.2E:125a-18: drug sde dag la gdol thabs kyis g-yul sprad nas drug sde dag gis rang rang gi kha mig dang khrims kyi rtsa ba tsam bsrungs te gcer bu pa drug cu po dag rgya lcag dag dang khu tshur dge dang /
T08TD4106.2E:125a-20: lcug mdag gis shin tu bcal zhing brims nas /
T08TD4106.2E:125a-21: de dag gis gcer bu pa dag rdeg bzhin du 'dug gnas kyi nang nas phyi rol du 'dzings te byung ba dang /
T08TD4106.2E:125a-22: bram ze dang khyim bdag dag gis de dag mthong nas smras pa /
T08TD4106.2E:125a-23: shes ldan dag ltos shig ltos shig dge sbyong g-yul 'gyed pas char 'bab par 'gyur ro zhes zer ro //
T08TD4106.2E:125a-24: drug sde dag gis smras pa /
T08TD4106.2E:125a-25: dga' bo nye dga' spyod yul tshig cing me mdag zhi bar ma gyur gyi tshur shog mnyan yod du 'dong ngo zhes de dag mnyan yong du dong ba na /
T08TD4106.2E:125a-26: lho phyogs nas 'jig rten rgyang pan pa'i rgol ba 'char ka zhes bya ba zhig mnyan yod du 'ongs pa tshe dang ldan pa sh'ari'i bus btul te /
T08TD4106.2E:125a-27: legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu byung zhing bsnyen par rdzogs par byas nas dgra bcom pa nyid kyi 'bras bu mngon sum du byas shing /
T08TD4106.2E:125b-0: de la brten nas skye bo phal po che'i tshogs 'bum phrag du mdag gis kyang 'phags pa'i 'bras bu thob par gyur pa'i tshe drug sde mnyan yod du lhags @125b nas /
T08TD4106.2E:125b-1: dge slong rnams kyis de dag la smras pa /
T08TD4106.2E:125b-2: tshe dang ldan pa dag 'ongs pa legs so //
T08TD4106.2E:125b-5: tshe dang ldan ba sh'a ri'i bus lho phyogs nas 'jig rten rgyang phan pa'i rgol pa bram ze kun du rgyu 'char ka zhes bya ba 'gyed 'dod cing 'gyed pa'i yo byad kyi phyir 'os mtshar bcad de g-yul las rnam par rgyal lo //
T08TD4106.2E:125b-6: drug sde dag gis smras pa /
T08TD4106.2E:125b-7: tshe dang ldan pa dag 'di ltar tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu tshogs can gnyis pa chos kyi dmag dpon chos kyi 'khor lo rjes su bskor bas rgyal ba gcig tshar bcad pa 'di do mtshar ci che /
T08TD4106.2E:125b-8: gal te tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bus tshar bcad par ma gyur na yang bcom ldan 'das slad na bzhugs pa de ngo mtshar mi che'i /
T08TD4106.2E:125b-9: kho bo cag mi drug gis gcer bu pa drug cu tshar bcad pa ngo mtshar che'o //
T08TD4106.2E:125b-10: rig pa'i gnas gang gis dbyug pa'i rig pas lus la chos bshad pas so //
T08TD4106.2E:125b-12: de'i tshe na ni 'tsho na da tsa 'tsho 'am shi gtol med do zhes zer nas dge slong don nyung du dag ci'i phyir dge slong dag yan lag gang gis ngo tshar bar bya ba'i yan lag de nyid kyis rlom par byed ces smod par byed /
T08TD4106.2E:125b-14: kha zer bar byed pa'i skabs de dge slod rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol to //
T08TD4106.2E:125b-15: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byung ba 'di dang /
T08TD4106.2E:125b-17: skabs 'di la dge slong gis dge 'dun bsdu ba mdzad de /
T08TD4106.2E:125b-18: drug sde dag la rmas nas /
T08TD4106.2E:125b-19: dge sbyong gi tshul ma yin pa /
T08TD4106.2E:125b-20: rjes su mthun pa ma yin pa /
T08TD4106.2E:125b-22: tshul dang mthun pa ma yin pa /
T08TD4106.2E:125b-23: de ni rab tu byung bas bya ba yin ni zhes rnam grangs du mar rnam par smad de /
T08TD4106.2E:125b-24: bslab pa bca' ba'i phan yon bcu yang dag par gzigs pas nga'i nyan thos rnams kyis 'dul ba la bslab pa'i gzhi 'di ltar gdon par bya ste /
T08TD4106.2E:125b-25: 'dug gnas gcig tu zhag lon pa'i dge lon pa'i dge slong gis bsod snyoms gcig bca' par bya'o //
T08TD4106.2E:125b-26: de las lhag par ba na ltung byed do zhes bca' ba mdzad de /
T08TD4106.2E:125b-28: gang zag ni drug sde nyon mongs pa ni 'dod zhen dang 'thab krol byed pa /
T08TD4106.2E:125b-29: nyes pa ni 'dug gnas gcig tu zhag lon pas bsod snyoms gcig las lhag par za ba'o //
T08TD4106.2E:126a-0: gnang pa'i gleng gzhi ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan @126a * //
T08TD4106.2E:126a-1: yod na rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so //
T08TD4106.2E:126a-2: de nas yang mnyan yod pa'i tshong ba de zong thogs te /
T08TD4106.2E:126a-3: ri brags de nyid du phyin nas de khyim bdag de'i tshod khang du zhugs pa dang /
T08TD4106.2E:126a-4: ri brags pa'i khyim bdag des yang gcer bu pa dag la zas brim par brtsams nas /
T08TD4106.2E:126a-5: des mnyan yod ba'i tshong pa de'i gan du mi mngags te grogs po sbyin gas dag la zas brim par byas tshur shog ces sbran pa dang /
T08TD4106.2E:126a-6: mnyan yod pa'i tshong pa de dad pa can yin pas des pas bsams pa /
T08TD4106.2E:126a-7: bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos dag yin gor ma chag gi song la blta'o snyam nas de der song ba dang /
T08TD4106.2E:126a-8: ji tsam na gcer bu ba ngo tsha dang khrel bor ba dag yin par mthong nas mngon sum du mi snyan par brjod pa ni sdug bsngal ba yin pas de cang mi smra bar 'dug go //
T08TD4106.2E:126a-9: gcer bu pa de dag zos te dong ba dang ri brags pa'i khyim bdag gis mnyan yod pa'i tshong pa de la smras pa /
T08TD4106.2E:126a-10: grogs po sa bon bzang zhing zhing bzang ngam /
T08TD4106.2E:126a-12: grogs po sa bon ni bzang na zhing ni gcer bu pa ngo tsha dang khrel bor ba sdig ba'i lta ba can dgon dung tsha sgo can tha chad sdig pa can gyi sa gzhi sha stag yin no //
T08TD4106.2E:126a-14: grogs po zhing bzang po gzhan 'ga' yod dam /
T08TD4106.2E:126a-16: yod de bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos dag go //
T08TD4106.2E:126a-18: grogs po de dag gi mi nga yang ma smos shig / des smras pa ji de dag 'dir byon par gyur tam lhags so //
T08TD4106.2E:126a-19: gang dag drug sde dag go //
T08TD4106.2E:126a-20: de dag gis re zhig ci byas /
T08TD4106.2E:126a-23: grogs po khyod kyis rgya mtsho chen po nas nor bu mching bu dag blangs so //
T08TD4106.2E:126a-25: bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos bzang po gzhan dag kyang yod dam /
T08TD4106.2E:126a-28: gal te khyod kyis tshe dang ldan par sh'a ri'i bu dang /
T08TD4106.2E:126a-29: mood gal gyi bu chen po dang /
T08TD4106.2E:126a-31: ma 'gags pa la sogs pa bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos chen po gzhan dag mthong bar gyur na khyod mngon par dad par 'gyur ba de lta du'i gnas yod do //
T08TD4106.2E:126a-33: gal te de dag 'dir byon par gyur na bdag gis de dag la bsod snyoms kyi mkho ba bstabs par bya'o //
T08TD4106.2E:126a-34: mnyan yod pa'i tshod pa des bsams pa /
T08TD4106.2E:126b-0: da ni @126b bdag song la bcom ldan 'das la gsol bar bya'o snyam nas /
T08TD4106.2E:126b-1: tshong pa des zong bsgyur te rin blangs nas mnyan yod du song ste /
T08TD4106.2E:126b-2: bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te gsol pa btsun pa ri brags che ge mo zhig na khyim bdag che ge mo zhig mchis pa des phyogs bzhi'i dge sbyong dang bram ze rnams kyis slad du 'dug gnas bgyid du stsal te /
T08TD4106.2E:126b-3: de de na gang gnas pa de la bsod snyoms kyi mkho ba stobs par bgyid cing /
T08TD4106.2E:126b-4: de bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos dag mthong bar 'tshal na /
T08TD4106.2E:126b-5: bcom ldan 'das kyis de la thugs brtse ba'i slad du dge slong dag cig bka' stsal na legs so //
T08TD4106.2E:126b-6: bcom ldan 'das kyis khyim bdag de la cang mi gsung bas gnang ngo //
T08TD4106.2E:126b-7: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong gang gis khyim bdag de 'khor dang bcas pa dang ri brags de na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs dag sus 'dul bar 'gyur snyam du dgongs na dge slong sh'a ri'i bus 'dul bar gzigs na /
T08TD4106.2E:126b-8: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu la bka' stsal pa /
T08TD4106.2E:126b-9: sh'a ri'i bu khyod kyis ri brags ga ge mo zhig na /
T08TD4106.2E:126b-10: khyim bdag che ge mo 'khor dang bcas pa dang /
T08TD4106.2E:126b-11: ri brags de na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs dag la soms shig / tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bus btsun pa bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' mnyan nas 'khor lnga brgya dang /
T08TD4106.2E:126b-12: ri brags de ga la ba de logs su ljongs rgyu zhing song nas /
T08TD4106.2E:126b-13: mthar gyis rgyu zhing 'gro ba na ri brags der phyin nas /
T08TD4106.2E:126b-14: khyim bdag de'i 'dug gnas su zhugs so //
T08TD4106.2E:126b-15: khyim bdag des de thos nas der song ste /
T08TD4106.2E:126b-16: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu'i rkang pa gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'chal te mtha' gcig tu 'dug go //
T08TD4106.2E:126b-17: mtha' gcig tu 'dug nas tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bus khyim bdag de la chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis yang dag par ston par byed /
T08TD4106.2E:126b-18: yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug par byed /
T08TD4106.2E:126b-19: yang dag par gzengs stong bar byed /
T08TD4106.2E:126b-20: yang dag par rab tu dga' bar byed do //
T08TD4106.2E:126b-21: rnam grangs du mar chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis yang dag par bstan /
T08TD4106.2E:126b-22: yang dag par 'dzin du bcug / yang dag par gzengs bstod //
T08TD4106.2E:126b-23: yang dag par rab tu dga' bar byas nas cang mi smra'o //
T08TD4106.2E:126b-24: de nas khyim bdag de stan las lngas te /
T08TD4106.2E:127a-0: bla gos phrag pa gcig tu byas nas tshe dang ldan pa sh'a @127a * //
T08TD4106.2E:127a-1: ri'i bu ga la de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so //
T08TD4106.2E:127a-2: btsun pa sh'a de'i bu sang bdag shi sdum par dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs cig tu gdugs tshod gsol bar ci gnang /
T08TD4106.2E:127a-3: tsho dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bus khyim bdag de la cang mi smra bas dang du blangs so //
T08TD4106.2E:127a-4: de nas khyim bdag nges de nyid kyi mtshan mo bca' ba dang bza' ba gtsang zhing bsod pa sta gon byas nas /
T08TD4106.2E:127a-5: nang par sngar langs te stan bshams nas /
T08TD4106.2E:127a-6: chu ra nor bu can bzhag ste /
T08TD4106.2E:127a-7: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu spyan 'dren gyis btsun pa sh'a ri'i bu gdugs tshod g-yar dgongs 'tshal na /
T08TD4106.2E:127a-8: btsun pa sh'a ri'i bus da de'i dus la bab par dgongs su gsol zhes bskul to //
T08TD4106.2E:127a-9: de nas tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu snga dro sham thabs bgos ltung bzed dang chos gos thogs te /
T08TD4106.2E:127a-10: dge slong gi tshogs kyis yongs su bskor cing /
T08TD4106.2E:127a-11: dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis mdun du bdar nas khyim bdag de'i khyim ga la ba der song ste phyin nas dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gung la gdan bshams pa nyid la 'dug go //
T08TD4106.2E:127a-12: de nas khyim bdag des tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun bde bar 'dug bar rig nas /
T08TD4106.2E:127a-13: bca' ba dang bza' ba gtang zhing bsod pas rang gi lag nas tshim par byed cing stobs par byed do //
T08TD4106.2E:127a-14: rnam grangs du mar bca' ba dang bza' ba gtsang zhing bsod pas rang gi lag nas tshim par byas shing bstabs te /
T08TD4106.2E:127a-15: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu zan zos shing lag pa bsnyal /
T08TD4106.2E:127a-16: ltung bzed bzhag par rig nas stan ches dma' ba zhig blangs te /
T08TD4106.2E:127a-17: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu'i mdun du chos mnyan pa'i phyir 'dug go //
T08TD4106.2E:127a-18: 'dug nas khyim bdag des tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so //
T08TD4106.2E:127a-19: btsun pa sh'a ri'i bu chos bstan du gsol /
T08TD4106.2E:127a-20: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bus smras pa /
T08TD4106.2E:127a-21: khyim bdag de'i phyir khyod kyis sa phyogs go skabs yangs par stan 'ding du chug la /
T08TD4106.2E:127a-22: ri brags 'dir skye bo phal po che'i tshogs la sang 'phags pa sh'a ri'i bu chos ston par 'gyur gyi /
T08TD4106.2E:127a-23: khyed cag las gang chos nyan bar 'dod pa de shog shig ces dril bsgrags pa byed du chug shig / de nas tsho dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bus yon bshad pa byas nas stan las langs te song ngo //
T08TD4106.2E:127b-0: khyim bdag de ri brags de gtso bor grags pa yin @127b bas des sa phyogs go skabs yangs par stan shom du bcug nas /
T08TD4106.2E:127b-1: ri brags der skye bo phal po che'i tshogs la sang 'phags pa sh'a ri'i bus chos ston par 'gyur gyis khyed cag las gang chos nyan bar 'dod pa de shog shig / khyed cag las gang gis der bden pa dag mthong bar ma gyur pa /
T08TD4106.2E:127b-2: des 'khor bar yun ring du 'khor bar bya dgos so zhes dril bsgrags pa byed du bcug go //
T08TD4106.2E:127b-3: de nas tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu de'i phyi de nyin par phyogs der song ste /
T08TD4106.2E:127b-4: dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gung la gdan bshams pa nyid la 'dug pa dang /
T08TD4106.2E:127b-5: srog chags 'bum phrag du ma dag kyang kha cig ni ltad mo skyes pa na /
T08TD4106.2E:127b-6: kha cig ni sngon gyi dge pa'i rtsa ba dag gis bskul ba na 'dus gyur nas /
T08TD4106.2E:127b-7: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bus la 'khor de'i bsam pa dang bag la nyal ba dang khams dang rang bzhin shes nas /
T08TD4106.2E:127b-8: 'di ltar khyim bdag de 'khor dang bcas pa dang /
T08TD4106.2E:127b-9: srog chags khri nyis stong gis bden pa dag mthong zhing kha cig gis ni rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas /
T08TD4106.2E:127b-10: kha cig gis ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas /
T08TD4106.2E:127b-11: kha cig gis ni phyir mi 'ong pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas /
T08TD4106.2E:127b-12: kha cig gis ni rab tu byung ste /
T08TD4106.2E:127b-13: nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs pas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas /
T08TD4106.2E:127b-14: kha cig gis ni nyan thos kyi byang chub tu sems bskyed /
T08TD4106.2E:127b-15: kha cig gis ni rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub tu sems bskyed /
T08TD4106.2E:127b-16: kha cig gis ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa de ltar chos bstan par byas te /
T08TD4106.2E:127b-17: 'khor de las phal cher sangs rgyas la gzhol ba dang /
T08TD4106.2E:127b-19: dge 'dun la bab par rnam par gzhag go //
T08TD4106.2E:127b-20: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bus lha cang yun rin du chos bstan pas gdugs tshod yol zhing rlung gis de'i rgyab na bar gyur nas /
T08TD4106.2E:127b-22: btsun pa sh'a ri'i bu de'i slad du bdag gi 'dug gnas su bzhugs shig dang /
T08TD4106.2E:127b-23: bdag gis khyod la bsod snyoms kyi mkho ba stabs par bgyi'o //
T08TD4106.2E:127b-24: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bus smras pa /
T08TD4106.2E:127b-25: khyim bdag khyod nyid la brten nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dul ba la nyan thos rnams kyis bslab pa'i gzhi bca' bar mdzad kyi 'gro'o //
T08TD4106.2E:128a-0: @128a * // de nas tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu na bzhin du zan bcad de /
T08TD4106.2E:128a-1: ri brags de nas mnyan yong ga la bde logs su rgyu zhing song ste /
T08TD4106.2E:128a-2: mthar gyis rgyu zhing 'gro ba na mnyan yod du phyin nas /
T08TD4106.2E:128a-3: dge slong rnams kyis tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu'i lhan cig gnas pa dang /
T08TD4106.2E:128a-4: nye gnas dag la dris pa /
T08TD4106.2E:128a-5: tshe dang ldan pa dag ji ltar bde bar ba rgyus sam /
T08TD4106.2E:128a-6: tshe dang ldan pa dag cung zhig bde bar yang brgyus /
T08TD4106.2E:128a-7: cung zhig sdug bsngal bar yang brgyus so //
T08TD4106.2E:128a-9: mkhan pos gdul ba'i bya ba 'di snyed cig mdzad pa gang yin pa de ni bde bar brgyus pa yin no //
T08TD4106.2E:128a-10: ci zhig sdug bsngal bar brgyus /
T08TD4106.2E:128a-11: mkhan po bsnyung bzhin du gdugs tshod bcad de ri brags de nas bzhud pa gang yin pa de ni sdug bsngal bar gnas pa yin no zhes zer ba'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /
T08TD4106.2E:128a-12: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
T08TD4106.2E:128a-14: na ba ma gtogs te dge slong gis pus 'khyud bcad bar rjes su gnang ngo //
T08TD4106.2E:128a-15: de nas bcom ldan 'das yis bslab pa 'dod pa dang /
T08TD4106.2E:128a-16: bslab pa la gus pa dang /
T08TD4106.2E:128a-17: bslab pa la yo byad bsnyungs pa'i bsngags ba brjod nas /
T08TD4106.2E:128a-18: dge slong rnams la de dang mthun pa dang /
T08TD4106.2E:128a-20: de dang 'tsham pa'i chos dang ldan pa'i bka' mched mdzad nas dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa /
T08TD4106.2E:128a-21: dge slong dag de lta bas na snga ma ni bcas pa yin la /
T08TD4106.2E:128a-23: nga'i nyan thos rnams kyis 'dul ba la bslab pa'i gzhi 'di ltar gdon par bya ste /
T08TD4106.2E:128a-24: 'dug gnas gcig tu zhag lon pa'i dge slong mi na pas bsod snyoms gcig bza' bar bya'o //
T08TD4106.2E:128a-25: de las lhag par za na ltung byed do zhes gnang ba mdzad de /
T08TD4106.2E:128a-27: gang zag ni tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu /
T08TD4106.2E:128a-28: nyon mongs pa dang nyes pa ni med do //
T08TD4106.2E:128a-29: de la 'dug gnas gcig tu zhag lon pa'i zhes bya ba ni mu stegs can gyi 'dug gnas su zhag lon pa'i 'o //
T08TD4106.2E:128a-30: dge slong zhes bya ba ni chos 'di pa'o //
T08TD4106.2E:128a-31: mi na bas zhes bya ba ni na ba ma gtogs pas so //
T08TD4106.2E:128a-32: bsod snyoms gcig bza' bar bya'o zhes bya ba ni zan lan cig go //
T08TD4106.2E:128a-33: de las lhag par za na zhes bya ba ni de las lan mang du za na'o //
T08TD4106.2E:128a-34: ltung byed de zhes bya ba ni lnga ma bzhin no //
T08TD4106.2E:128b-0: de la @128b ltung ba ji ltar 'gyur zhe na /
T08TD4106.2E:128b-3: sbyor ba'i sbyor bas ltung ba rnam bar gzhag pa dang /
T08TD4106.2E:128b-6: phyir bcos pa rnams kyis 'di'i mtshan nyid shes bar bya'o //
T08TD4106.2E:128b-7: de la 'dir dngos gzhi'i ltung ba rnam par gnag pa ni dge slong mi na bas chos 'di pa'i ma yin pa bdag po khyim pa dang bcas pa mu stegs can gyi 'dug gnas su zhag gcig lon pa la sbyin bdag gis ma bstabs par nyi ma gnyis pa'i bsod snyoms zos na 'dug gnas su za ba'i ltung byed kyi dngos gzhir 'gyur ro //
T08TD4106.2E:128b-8: dge slong mi na ba la na smad pa med do //
T08TD4106.2E:128b-9: 'dug gnas chos 'di pa'i ma yin pa la na smad pa med do //
T08TD4106.2E:128b-10: 'dug gnas de'i bdag po khyim pa dang bcas pa la na smad pa med do //
T08TD4106.2E:128b-11: 'dug gnas de mu stegs can gyi yin pa la na smad pa med do //
T08TD4106.2E:128b-12: der dge slong nyi ma dang po la bsod snyoms gcig za nas chag gcig lon pas nyi ma gnyis pa'i bsod snyoms zos pa la na smad pa med do //
T08TD4106.2E:128b-13: nyi ma gnyis pa'i bsod snyoms sbyin bdag gis ma bstabs pa la na smad pa med do //
T08TD4106.2E:128b-14: bza' pa lnga'i khong su gtogs pa gang yang rung ba la na smad pa med do //
T08TD4106.2E:128b-15: nyi ma gnyis pa de'i bsod snyoms sbyin bdag gis ma bstabs bar zos na zos pa de la dngos gzhi la na smad pa med do //
T08TD4106.2E:128b-16: 'di'i byed pa po ni dge slong mi na ba sbyin bdag gis ma bstabs pa la chos 'di pa'i ma yin pa mu stegs can gyi 'dug gnas bdag po khyim pa dang bcas pa byed pa po nyid yin no //
T08TD4106.2E:128b-17: 'di la yan lag drug gis dngos gzhi'i ltung bar 'gyur te /
T08TD4106.2E:128b-18: dge slong mi na ba dang /
T08TD4106.2E:128b-19: sbyin bdag gis ma bstabs pa dang /
T08TD4106.2E:128b-20: 'dug gnas chos 'di pa'i ma yin pa dang gzhan mu stegs can gyi yin pa dang /
T08TD4106.2E:128b-21: bdag po khyim pa dang bcas pa dang /
T08TD4106.2E:128b-22: dge slong des zan zos nas zhag gcig lon pa dang /
T08TD4106.2E:128b-23: nyi ma gnyis pa'i bsod snyoms zos pa'o //
T08TD4106.2E:128b-24: de dag las yan lag ma tshang na ci rigs par na smad do //
T08TD4106.2E:128b-25: sbyor ba'i ltung ba ni nyes byas te ji srid du 'dug gnas su za ba'i ltung byed kyi sbyor rab brtsams nas dngos gzhi la ma thug gi bar du nyes byas so //
T08TD4106.2E:128b-26: dngos gzhi la sbyor ba tha dad pa ji snyed brtsams pa re re la nyes byas re re'o //
T08TD4106.2E:129a-0: der nyi ma dang po la na zos pa nyi ma @129a * //
T08TD4106.2E:129a-1: gnyis pa'i bar du gnas pa nyi ba'i bsod snyoms ma zos pa la nyes byas so //
T08TD4106.2E:129a-2: 'dug gnas de'i bdag po med pa dang /
T08TD4106.2E:129a-3: bdag po rab tu byung ba dang /
T08TD4106.2E:129a-4: bdag po mu stegs can dang /
T08TD4106.2E:129a-5: bdag po nye du yin na nyes byas so //
T08TD4106.2E:129a-6: nyi ma gnyis pa la gzhan nas bsod snyoms blangs nas 'dug gnas der zos pa la nyes byas so //
T08TD4106.2E:129a-7: nyi ma gnyis pa la bza' bar bya ba las gzhan pa bca' ba dang btung ba dang /
T08TD4106.2E:129a-8: gzhib pa dang bldag pa dag zos pa la nyes byas so //
T08TD4106.2E:129a-9: bza' bar bya ba ni ba'i ba lnga'i khongs su gtogs pa'o //
T08TD4106.2E:129a-10: sbyor ba'i sbyor ba'i ltung ba ni nyes byas phra mo ste /
T08TD4106.2E:129a-11: sbyor ba ji snyed pa la sbyor ba yang de snyed de /
T08TD4106.2E:129a-12: sbyor ba nyes byas kyi sbyor ba'i sbyor ba la nyes byas te nyes byas phra mo'o //
T08TD4106.2E:129a-13: ltung ba med pa mi dge slong na ba la ltung ba med do //
T08TD4106.2E:129a-14: sbyin bdag gos bstabs pa la ltung ba med do //
T08TD4106.2E:129a-15: 'dug gnas chos 'di pa yin zhing gzhan mu stegs can gyi ma yin pa ltung ba med do //
T08TD4106.2E:129a-16: nyi ma dang po la gnas pa dang zos pa la ltung ba med do //
T08TD4106.2E:129a-20: tshor ba dag gis nyen pa la ltung ba med do //
T08TD4106.2E:129a-21: bslab par bya ba ni dge slong gis yul thams cad la gnas skabs thams cad du 'dug gnas su za ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ba rnam pa thams cad mi bsten par bslab bar bya'o //
T08TD4106.2E:129a-22: dge slong chos ston pas dus 'khyud bcang bar bya'o //
T08TD4106.2E:129a-23: phyir bcos pa ni snga ma bzhin no //
T08TD4106.2E:129a-24: 'dug gnas su za ba'i ltung byed de sum cu gnyis pa bshad zin to /
T08TD4106.2E:129a-26: // / lhung bzed do gsum tsam las lhag par len pa'i ltung byed kyi gleng gzhi ni byung ba dang bcas pa'i dbang gis rnam pa gnyis te phyung ba'i gleng ga ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so //
T08TD4106.2E:129a-27: byang phyogs nas tshong pa don mthun dag mnyan yod du lhags pa na drug sde dag gis thos nas smras pa /
T08TD4106.2E:129a-28: dga' bo nye dga' cag gis byang phyogs nas tshong pa don mthun dag mnyan yod du lhags zhes thos kyi gal te cung zad sgrub par nus kyang srid kyi 'dong ngo //
T08TD4106.2E:129a-29: gal te bsod snyoms zo shig ces zer na lta gang bas chog go zhes brjod par bya'o //
T08TD4106.2E:129b-0: gal te gos long shig ces zer na blang @129b bar bya'o zhes de dag 'dong ste /
T08TD4106.2E:129b-1: tshong pa de dag la chos bstan nas de dag dga' bas 'phags pa dag 'di nyid du bsod snyoms gsol cig ces smras pa dang /
T08TD4106.2E:129b-2: drug sde dag gis smras pa /
T08TD4106.2E:129b-3: bzhin bzangs dag lto gang bas chog go zhes zer zhing mi za bar yang dang yang du der 'ongs shing de skad smra'o //
T08TD4106.2E:129b-4: dus gzhan zhig na tshong pa de dag de na glang dag gi rtsva med nas /
T08TD4106.2E:129b-5: ri brags shig tu glang dag gzan du dong ba dang /
T08TD4106.2E:129b-6: drug sde dag gis phyi bzhin rmas te btsal nas /
T08TD4106.2E:129b-7: der yang dong ste de dag la chos bstan pa dang /
T08TD4106.2E:129b-8: de dag dga' bas 'phags pa dag 'di nyid du bsod snyoms gsol cig ces smras pa dang /
T08TD4106.2E:129b-9: drug sde dag gis smras pa /
T08TD4106.2E:129b-10: bzhin bzangs dag lto gang bas chog go //
T08TD4106.2E:129b-12: shes ldan dag 'phags pa dag yang dang yang du lto gang bas chog go zhes gsungs pa las na /
T08TD4106.2E:129b-13: 'di dag la na bza' mi mnga' gor ma chag gi /'di dag la na bza' dbul bar bya'o //
T08TD4106.2E:129b-14: de ltar bgyi'o zhes de dag gis drug sde dag la lab srin bu'i mdog lta pu re re bskon to //
T08TD4106.2E:129b-15: de nas drug sde dag gis smras pa /
T08TD4106.2E:129b-16: drug sde bzangs dag khyed cag yang dang yang su bsod snyoms zo shig ces zer na /
T08TD4106.2E:129b-17: bsod snyoms ji lta bu sbyin pa ltas 'on cig ces drug sde dag las gcig gis thab kyi sgyed bu'i steng du gzugs pa'i snod chen po lta bu ltung bzed tshad las 'das pa che ba thab snod lta bu bzed nas /
T08TD4106.2E:129b-18: 'dir ldugs shig ces smras pa dang /
T08TD4106.2E:129b-19: tsho pa de dag gis bsams pa /
T08TD4106.2E:129b-21: 'di bkang bas 'di dag thams cad kyi lto khengs pa'i bsod snyoms 'byung bar 'gyur ro snyam nas de dag gis lam brgyags las snod de bkang ste phul lo //
T08TD4106.2E:129b-22: drug sde dag gis kyang de bzhin du mthar gyi re re nas thab snod lta bu re re bzed pa dang ji tsam na tshong pa de dag gis lam brgyags las thabs snod lta bu'i snod drug bkang ste phul ba dang /
T08TD4106.2E:129b-23: de dag gis lam brgyags thams cad zad par gyur nas /
T08TD4106.2E:129b-25: 'phags pa dag bdag cag gis 'dir shul brgyags nyung shas shig 'tshal te mchis pa de dag thams cad bas kyi bdag cag gis mi 'di la k'ar sh'a pa na dag bskur te /
T08TD4106.2E:130a-0: thabs cig mnyan yod du gtang gi @130a * //
T08TD4106.2E:130a-1: 'phags pa dag gis bdag cag gi shul brgyags dag 'jol te /
T08TD4106.2E:130a-2: stsol ba bstsel ba dang bcas te gtong du gsol /
T08TD4106.2E:130a-3: bzhin bzangs dag de ltar bya'o zhes drug se dag gis tshong pa dag gi mi k'ar sh'a dang bcas pa mnyan yod du gtsug lag khang du khrid nas /
T08TD4106.2E:130a-4: mi de drug sde dag spyi dang re re'i las sha stag la bkol bkol nas ji tsam na nyi ma yol bar gyur pa dang /
T08TD4106.2E:130a-5: de'i 'og tu btang ste smras pa /
T08TD4106.2E:130a-6: da khyod rang gis lam brgyags nyos te song shig mi dar rang gis lam brgyags dag nyos te 'phags pa dang /
T08TD4106.2E:130a-7: mnyan yod kyi then kor thabs bor son pa na chom rkun pa dag gis bcom nas /
T08TD4106.2E:130a-8: de gcig pu grogs kyi nang na song ngo //
T08TD4106.2E:130a-14: cho ma rkun pa dag gis bcom mo //
T08TD4106.2E:130a-16: 'phags pa dag gis khyod kyi bsel ba ma btang ngam /
T08TD4106.2E:130a-18: shes ldan dag bsel ba lta btang re skan gyi /
T08TD4106.2E:130a-19: don gyis na de dag nyid kyis bcom mo //
T08TD4106.2E:130a-22: des skabs de rgyas par brjod pa dang /
T08TD4106.2E:130a-23: de dag sh'a kya'i bu'i dge sbyang rnams kyi dge sbyong gi tshul ni tshig go //
T08TD4106.2E:130a-24: bram de'i tshul ni tshig ste /
T08TD4106.2E:130a-25: 'di ltar phan bar bya'o zhes zer nas gnod pa kho na byed do zhe smos par byed /
T08TD4106.2E:130a-28: 'di ni re zhig phyung ba yin te /
T08TD4106.2E:130a-29: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das re zhig 'dul ba la nyan thos rnams kyi bslab pa'i gzi 'cha' bar ni mi mdzad do //
T08TD4106.2E:130a-30: bcas pa'i gleng gzhi ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyas byed kyi tshal mgon med zas spyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so //
T08TD4106.2E:130a-31: mnyan yod na khyim bdag cig 'dug pa des rigs mnyam pa las chung ma blangs nas de de dang lhan cig rtse bar byed /
T08TD4106.2E:130a-34: dga' mgur spyod par byed do //
T08TD4106.2E:130a-35: de la bu mo g-yas zhar ma cig byung nas /
T08TD4106.2E:130a-36: de bsrengs shing bskyed de chen mor gyur ti /
T08TD4106.2E:130a-37: bu mo de'i na zla gzhan thams cad bag mar btang na /
T08TD4106.2E:130a-38: bu mo de g-yas zhar ma yin pa'i phyir slong ba 'ga' 'ang ma 'ongs so //
T08TD4106.2E:130b-0: mnyan yod na khyim bdag gzhan zhig 'dug ba des rigs mnyam pa @130b las chung ma blangs nas /
T08TD4106.2E:130b-1: de'i chud ma de rang gi las dag gis dus la bab po //
T08TD4106.2E:130b-2: des chung ma gnyis pa dang gsum pa nas bdun pa'i bar du blangs pa dang /
T08TD4106.2E:130b-3: de dag kyang de bzhin du dus la bab po //
T08TD4106.2E:130b-4: khyim bdag de yang skur ba btab par gyur ba'i las dag gis chung ma gsod pa chung ma gsod pa zhes bya ba'i ning du gyur te /
T08TD4106.2E:130b-5: des yang gzhan gyi bu mo dang yugs sa mo yang cad bslangs na sus kyang ma ster nas /
T08TD4106.2E:130b-6: de rang nyid so na ma nyed cing 'dug go //
T08TD4106.2E:130b-7: de'i chung po grogs po zhig gis smras pa /
T08TD4106.2E:130b-8: gal te de lta na g-yas zhar mo slongs shig ces zer nas /
T08TD4106.2E:130b-9: des g-yas zhar ma'i pha ma dag las g-yas zhar ma bslangs te /
T08TD4106.2E:130b-10: bag mar blangs pa'i dus btab po //
T08TD4106.2E:130b-11: de'i chung po grogs de yang 'gyod pa skyes te bdag gis grogs po la g-yas zhar ma slongs shig ces bskul ba de ni ma legs pa zhig byas te /
T08TD4106.2E:130b-12: de mtshan dan pa yin pas des grogs po bsad par gyur na mi rung gi de 'dor du bcug la bdag gi srid mo yugs sa mo zhig yod pa sbyin no snyam nas /
T08TD4106.2E:130b-13: des de la de skad smras pa dang /
T08TD4106.2E:130b-15: grogs po da de bzhin dor bar mi nus te /
T08TD4106.2E:130b-16: 'on kyang 'di la thabs kyi rnam pa zhig bya'o //
T08TD4106.2E:130b-17: g-yas zhar ma'i ma des kyang bag rdzongs sta gon bya bar brtsams so //
T08TD4106.2E:130b-18: de drug sde dag gi sbyin bdag yin pas /
T08TD4106.2E:130b-19: drug sde dag snga dro sham thabs bgos lhung bzed dang chos gos thogs te /
T08TD4106.2E:130b-20: mnyan yod du bsod snyoms la zhugs nas mthar gyis bsod snyoms la rgyu ba na khyim der zhugs pa dang /
T08TD4106.2E:130b-21: ji tsam na g-yas zhar ma brdzang ba dang /
T08TD4106.2E:130b-22: gnyen ston gyi khur ba dag sreg pa mthong nas de dag gis smras pa /
T08TD4106.2E:130b-23: sring mo dus ston la bab du nye 'am ci /
T08TD4106.2E:130b-25: 'phags pa khyod kyi lcam mo bag mar mchi ba la thug nas de'i bag rdzongs sta gon bgyi'o //
T08TD4106.2E:130b-26: drug sde dag gis smras pa /
T08TD4106.2E:130b-27: sring mo kho bo cag gis cung zad mi 'thob bam /
T08TD4106.2E:130b-28: 'phags pa dag khyed cag la su zhig gis dbul 'tshal /
T08TD4106.2E:130b-29: 'di nyed khyed kyi lags so zhe des bag rkyong ste de dag gi lhung bzed thams cad khur ba dag gis bkang nas /
T08TD4106.2E:130b-30: drug sde dag gis de'i kha zas thams cad bsdus te dong ngo //
T08TD4106.2E:131a-0: de nas g-yas zhar ma'i mas chung ma gsod @131a * //
T08TD4106.2E:131a-1: pa la bu bdag cag gis kha zas dag sta gon byas par gyur pa gang yin pa de sbyin gnas dag gis bzhes kyi da nye du dag gi phyir kha zam sta gon byed kyi bar du sdod cig ces smras pa dang /
T08TD4106.2E:131a-2: chung ma gsod pas smras pa /
T08TD4106.2E:131a-3: kho bo mi sdod de gal te nyi ma de nyid la bag mar rdzong zhing sbyin na ni bag mar blang ngo //
T08TD4106.2E:131a-4: gal te mi sbyin na kho bo chung ma gzhan len gyi /
T08TD4106.2E:131a-5: khyod kyi bu mo dor bar bya'o zhes zer nas g-yas zhar ma'i pha mas dus su ma brdzangs pa'i skabs su chung ma gsod pas g-yas zhar mo mi blang bar byas pa na /
T08TD4106.2E:131a-6: g-yas zhar ma'i phas chung ma gsod pa bzung ste /
T08TD4106.2E:131a-7: rgyal po'i pho brang du'o dod bos nas shags la bkug pa dang /
T08TD4106.2E:131a-8: chung ma gsod pas g-yas zhar ma'i pha pham par byas so //
T08TD4106.2E:131a-9: g-yas zhar ma'i ma de bdag gi bu mo ma lam mo zhes ngu zhing 'dug pa dang /
T08TD4106.2E:131a-10: de'i ngos kyi khyim tshes dag sh'a kya'i bu'i dge sbyong rnams kyi dge sbyong gi tshul ni tshig go //
T08TD4106.2E:131a-11: bram ze'i tshul ni tshig ste /
T08TD4106.2E:131a-12: 'di ltar bu mo sbyin zin pa'i bar chad byed do zhes smod par byed /
T08TD4106.2E:131a-14: kha zer bar byed pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol to //
T08TD4106.2E:131a-15: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byung ba 'di dang /
T08TD4106.2E:131a-16: gleng gzhi 'di dang skabs 'di la dge slong gi dge 'dun bsdu ba mdzad de /
T08TD4106.2E:131a-17: drug sde dag la rmas nas /
T08TD4106.2E:131a-18: dge sbyong gi tshul ma yin pa /
T08TD4106.2E:131a-19: rjes su mthun pa ma yin pa /
T08TD4106.2E:131a-21: tshul dang mthun pa ma yin pa /
T08TD4106.2E:131a-22: de ni rab tu byung bas bya ba ma yin no zhes rnam grangs du mar rnam par smad de /
T08TD4106.2E:131a-23: bslab pa bca' ba'i phan yon bcu yang dag par gzigs pas nga'i nyan thos rnams kyis 'dul ba la bslab pa'i gzhi'i di ltar gdon par bya ste /
T08TD4106.2E:131a-24: dge slong rab tu mang po dag khyim rnams su dong ba las /
T08TD4106.2E:131a-25: gal te de dag las bram ze dang khyim bdag dad pa can dag gis phye dag dang khur ba dag dus kyis stobs par gyur la /
T08TD4106.2E:131a-26: 'dod na dge slong de dag gis lhung bzed gang ba gnyis sam gsum blang bar bya'o //
T08TD4106.2E:131a-27: de las lhag par len na ltung byed do //
T08TD4106.2E:131a-28: ltung bzed gang ba gnyis sam gsum blangs nas phyi rol kun dga' ra bar dong la dge slong 'khod pa rnams la'ang bgo bsha' bya /
T08TD4106.2E:131b-0: bdag @131b cag kyang bza' bar bya ste /
T08TD4106.2E:131b-1: de la de ni cho ga yin no zhes bca' ba mdzad de /
T08TD4106.2E:131b-5: nye pa ni sbyin pa dag khyim pas yongs su ma spangs pa ji bder ma byas pa'i kha zas bstabs pa la lhung bzed 'bring tshang gsum /
T08TD4106.2E:131b-7: de la dge slong zhes bya ba ni drug sde dag go //
T08TD4106.2E:131b-8: rab tu mang po dag ces bya ba ni gnyis las lhag pa ni rab tu mang po dag go //
T08TD4106.2E:131b-9: khyim rnams su zhes bya ba ni bram ze dang khyim bdag dag gi khyim rnams su'o //
T08TD4106.2E:131b-10: dong ba las zhes bya ba ni song ba las so //
T08TD4106.2E:131b-11: gal te de dag la zhes bya ba ni dge slong de dag la'o //
T08TD4106.2E:131b-12: bram ze dang khyim bdag dad pa can dag gis zhes bya ba la /
T08TD4106.2E:131b-13: dad pa can zhes bya ba ni sangs rgyas la mngon par dad pa dang /
T08TD4106.2E:131b-14: chos dang dge 'dun la mngon par dad pa dang /
T08TD4106.2E:131b-15: sangs rgyas la skyabs su song ba dang /
T08TD4106.2E:131b-16: chos dang dge 'dun la skyabs su song ba dag go //
T08TD4106.2E:131b-17: phye dag ces bya ba ni phye dad 'dag gu dag go //
T08TD4106.2E:131b-18: khur ba dag ces bya ba ni bag chos dag go //
T08TD4106.2E:131b-19: dus kyis stobs par gyur la zhes bya ba ni yang dang yang du stobs par gyur la'o //
T08TD4106.2E:131b-20: 'dod na zhes bya ba ni gal te don du gnyer na'o //
T08TD4106.2E:131b-21: dge slong de dag gis zhes bya ba ni dge slong gang yin pa dag gis so //
T08TD4106.2E:131b-22: lhung bzed gang ba gnyis sam gsum bslad bar bya'o zhes bya ba la lhung bzed ni gsum ste /
T08TD4106.2E:131b-26: de la chen po ni ga 'bras thug po che drus pa skam po ma ga dh'a'i bre'u chung do btsos pa sran tshod dang bcas tshod ma dang bcas pa blugs na kha'i mtha'i cha kho nas mthe bo'o lto gang gis mi reg ba'o //
T08TD4106.2E:131b-27: 'bring ni bre'u chung phyed dang do btsos pa de lta bu'o //
T08TD4106.2E:131b-28: chung du ni bre'u chung gang btsos pa de lta bu'o //
T08TD4106.2E:131b-29: ma ga dh'a'i bre'u chung gang la ni 'bras thug po che drus pa skam po ma ga dh'a'i srang bcu drug ste /
T08TD4106.2E:131b-30: ma ga dh'a'i srang gcig la bod kyi srang gnyis yod do //
T08TD4106.2E:131b-31: 'bras thug po che drus pa skam po ma ga dh'a'i bre'u chung gang la bod kyi srad ni sum cu rtsa gnyis yod do //
T08TD4106.2E:131b-32: phul tshad du brtsis na ni bdun phul do dang khyor gang yod do //
T08TD4106.2E:132a-0: ma ga dh'a'i srang gcig la bre'u chung phyed dang do la ni bod kyi bdun phul phyed dang bzhi @132a * //
T08TD4106.2E:132a-2: ma ga dh'a'i bre'u chung do la ni bod kyi bdun phul bzhi dang khyor do yod do //
T08TD4106.2E:132a-3: 'bras drus pa skam po ni chan du btsos nas sum 'gyur du brtsi'o //
T08TD4106.2E:132a-4: de ltar na lhung bzed chen po ni 'bras thug po che drus pa skam po bod kyi bdun phul bzhi dang khyor do btsos pa'i chan bre do de'i rkyen gyi tshod ma dang bcas pa blugs na ma theb sor gcig gis ma gang ba'o //
T08TD4106.2E:132a-5: lhung bzed 'bring ni 'bras thug po che drus pa skam po bod kyi bdun phul phyed dang bzhi btsos pa'i chan bre phed dang do de'i rkyen gyi tshod ma dang bcas pa blugs na mtheb sor gcig gis ma gang ba'o //
T08TD4106.2E:132a-6: lhung bzed chung du ni 'bras thug po che drus pa skam po bod kyi bdun phul do dang khyer gang tsos pa'i chan bre gang de'i rkyen gyi tshod ma dang bcas pa blugs na mtheb sor gcig gis ma gang ba'o //
T08TD4106.2E:132a-7: lhung bzed kyi kha'i cha'i mtha' zhes bya ba ni kha'i zur gang du chus rngub pa'o //
T08TD4106.2E:132a-8: mthe po'i lto gang zhes bya ba ni mtheb sor gcig ste /
T08TD4106.2E:132a-9: mthe bo'i tshigs dang po'i zur ya gcig nas lto rol du dkris te zur ya gcig la thug pa'o //
T08TD4106.2E:132a-10: 'dir lhung bzed gang ba gnyis sam gsum blang bar bya'o zhes gnang ba ni gsum man chad ji tsam 'dod pa blang bar bya'o //
T08TD4106.2E:132a-11: ltung ba rnam par gzhag pa la ni lhung bzed 'bring po'i tshad dang sbyar te /
T08TD4106.2E:132a-12: lhung bzed 'bring po'i tshad kyi 'bras chan bre phyed dang do la ni 'bras thug po che drus pa skam po ma ga dh'a'i bre'u chung phyed dang do yod do //
T08TD4106.2E:132a-13: lhung bzed 'bring po gsum gyi tshad kyi 'bras chan bre phyed dang lnga la ni 'bras thug po che drus pa skam po ma ga dh'a'i bre'u chud phed dang lda yod do //
T08TD4106.2E:132a-14: de man chad ci 'dod pa blang bar bya'i /
T08TD4106.2E:132a-15: de las lhag par len na ltung byed du 'gyur to /
T08TD4106.2E:132a-16: 'dir gzhung ni dge slong gis ji tsam du bre'u chung phyed dang lnga las lhag pa'i bsod snyoms len na thams cad du ltung byed do zhes gsungs pa yin to //
T08TD4106.2E:132a-17: de ni 'bras skam po'i tshad las dgongs te gsungs pa yin no //
T08TD4106.2E:132a-18: de la chan du btsos na sum 'gyur du brtsi bas /
T08TD4106.2E:132a-19: 'bras drus pa skam po bre'u chung phyed dang lnga la 'bras chan bre'u chung phyed dang bcu bzhi yod do //
T08TD4106.2E:132b-0: yul chos su brtsi na 'bras drus pa skam po bre'u chung phed dang lnga la bod kyi bre phye dang @132b do yod do //
T08TD4106.2E:132b-1: de'i chan ni sum 'gyur te bre phed dang lnga yod do //
T08TD4106.2E:132b-2: de ltar na lhung bzed 'bring po gsum la 'bras skam ni bre phed dang do //
T08TD4106.2E:132b-3: 'bras chan ni bre phed dang lnga yod do //
T08TD4106.2E:132b-4: 'bras chan bre phed dang lnga de'i rkyen gyi byan dang tshod ma dang bcas pa man chad blang bar bya'i //
T08TD4106.2E:132b-5: de las lhag na ltung byed du 'gyur ro //
T08TD4106.2E:132b-6: phye dang khur ba la sogs pa bza' ba dang bca' ba'i bsod snyoms gzhan dag la yang blang ba dang dgag pa'i tshad ni 'bras chan bre phed dang lnga /
T08TD4106.2E:132b-7: de'i rkyen gyi bya na dang tshod ma dang bcas pa 'dis ci rigs par bsgre zhing brtsi'o //
T08TD4106.2E:132b-8: dge slong ma rnams kyi lhung bzed chen po ni dge slong rnams kyi lhung bzed chung du dang tshad gcig ste /
T08TD4106.2E:132b-9: 'bring dang chung du yang de bzhin du na smad de /
T08TD4106.2E:132b-10: chung tshad ni 'grangs pa tsam shong ba yin no //
T08TD4106.2E:132b-11: de las lhag par len na zhes bya ba ni ltung bzed 'bring po gsum gyi tshad 'bras chan bre phed dang lnga de'i rkyen gyi bya na dang tshod ma dang bcas pa de las lhag par len na'o //
T08TD4106.2E:132b-12: phye dang khur ba la sogs pa bza' ba dang bca' ba'i bsod snyoms gzhan dag la yang tshad 'dis ci rigs par bsgre zhing brtsis pa las lhag par len na'o //
T08TD4106.2E:132b-13: ltung byed do zhes bya ba ni snga ma bzhin no //
T08TD4106.2E:132b-14: lhung bzed gang ba gnyis sam gsum blangs nas phyi rol kun dga' ra bar dong la dge slong 'khod pa rnams la yang bgo bsha' bya zhes bya ba ni blang bar bya ba 'bras thug po che drus pa skam po ma ga dh'a'i bre'u chung phyed dang lnga btsos pa'i chan bod kyi bre phyed dang lnga de'i rkyen gyi bya na dang tshod ma dang bcas pa tsam ste /
T08TD4106.2E:132b-15: gal te bdag nyid grogs dang bcas pas bza' ba las lhag cing mang ba nyid yin na /
T08TD4106.2E:132b-16: khyim gyi phyi rol gtsug lag khang du dong la de na dge slong gang dag 'khod pa rnams la yang sbyin par bya'o //
T08TD4106.2E:132b-17: bdag cag kyang bza' bar bya ste zhes bya ba ni blang bar bya ba la gal te mang ba nyid yin na dge slong dag la yang bgo bsha' bya /
T08TD4106.2E:132b-19: gal te mang ba nyid ma yin na dge slong dag la bgo bsha' bya ba gdon mi za bar bya ba ma yin te /
T08TD4106.2E:132b-20: bdag cag bza' bar bya ba kho na yin no //
T08TD4106.2E:132b-21: de la de ni cho ga yin no zhes bya ba ni bslab pa'i gzhi bca' ba mdzad pa de la ni nges pa yin pa'o //
T08TD4106.2E:132b-22: de la ltung ba ji ltar 'gyur zhe na /
T08TD4106.2E:133a-3: sbyor ba'i sbyor bas ltung ba rnam par gzhag pa dang /
T08TD4106.2E:133a-5: bslab par bya ba dad phyi bcos pa rnams kyis 'di'i mtshan nyid shes par bya'o //
T08TD4106.2E:133a-6: de la 'dir dngos gzhi'i ltung ba rnam par gzhag pa ni dge slong gcig gam gnyis sam /
T08TD4106.2E:133a-7: rab tu mang po yang rung bdag khyim rnams su dong ba la /
T08TD4106.2E:133a-8: sbyin bdag khyim pa stobs pa'i bsod snyoms yongs su ma spags pa ci bder ma byas pa lhung bzed 'bring po gsum gyi tshad 'bras thug po che drus pa skam po ma ga dh'a'i bre'u chung phyed dang lda la bod kyi bre phyed dang do yod pa btsos pa'i chan bre phed dang lnga /
T08TD4106.2E:133a-9: de'i rkyen gyi bya na dang tshod ma dang bcas pa tsam las lhag pa mnos te zos na lhung bzed do gsum tsam las lhag par len pa'i ltung byed kyi dngos gzhir 'gyur ro //
T08TD4106.2E:133a-10: ltung bzed do gsum tsam las lhag par len pa'i ltung byed 'di ni dge slong gzhan dag tha mal par rang rang gi bsod snyoms lhung bzed gcig gis khyim bdun tshun chang du bsod snyoms rung ba lto 'grangs tsam len du gnang ba las mtshan nyid gzhan ma yin no //
T08TD4106.2E:133a-11: de'i phyir dge slong gcig gam gnyis sam rab tu mang po yang rud ba dag la na smad pa med do //
T08TD4106.2E:133a-12: bram ze dang khyim bdag gi khyim gang yang rung ba dag tu 'dod pa lan smad pa med do //
T08TD4106.2E:133a-13: sbyin bdag mi'i 'gro bar gtogs pa khyim pa skyes pa 'am bud med gang yang rung ba la na smad pa med do //
T08TD4106.2E:133a-14: stobs pa la na smad pa med do //
T08TD4106.2E:133a-15: bsod snyoms rung ba bza' ba dang bca' ba lnga'i khongs su gtogs pa gang yang rung ba la na smad pa med do //
T08TD4106.2E:133a-16: lhung bzed 'di snyed cig bzhes shig ces tshad yongs sum spags pa la na smad pa med do //
T08TD4106.2E:133a-17: sbyin bdag gis ci dgyes ba mdzod cig ces ci bder ma byas pa la na smad pa med do //
T08TD4106.2E:133a-18: khyim pa stobs pa'i bsod snyoms pa la na smad pa med do //
T08TD4106.2E:133a-19: lhung bzed 'bring po gsum gyi tshad 'bras thug po che drus pa skam po yul ma ga dh'a'i bre'u chung phed dang lnga la bod kyi bre phyed dang do yod pa btsos pa'i chan bre phed dang lnga /
T08TD4106.2E:133a-20: de'i rkyen gyi bya na dang tshod ma dang bcas pa las lhag pa dang /
T08TD4106.2E:133b-0: phyed dang khur ba la sogs pa bza' ba dang bca' ba'i bsod snyoms gzhan dag la yang tshad 'dis ci rigs @133b par bsgreng zhing brtsis pa de tsam las lhag pa la na smad pa med do //
T08TD4106.2E:133b-1: khyim nas mnos te khyer ba la na smad pa med / sos te mgul du mid pa la na smad pa med do //
T08TD4106.2E:133b-2: 'di'i byed pa po ni sbyin bdag khyim pa stobs pa'i bsod snyoms yongs su ma spags pa ci bder ma byas pa /
T08TD4106.2E:133b-3: dge slong gis lhung bzed 'bring po gsum gyi tshad las lhag pa mnos te za ba'o //
T08TD4106.2E:133b-4: dge slong gi lhung bzed ni gsum ste /
T08TD4106.2E:133b-7: de la chen po ni gang du 'bras thug po che drus pa skam po ma ga dh'a'i bre'u chung do bcos pa sran tshod dang bcas tshod ma dang bcas pa blugs na kha'i cha'i mtha' kho na nas mthe bo'i lto gang ges mi reg pa'o //
T08TD4106.2E:133b-8: 'bring ni bre'u chung phyed dang do btsos pa de lta bu'o //
T08TD4106.2E:133b-9: chung du ni bre'u chung gang btsos pa de lta bu'o //
T08TD4106.2E:133b-10: ma ga dh'a'i bre'u chung gang la ni 'bras thug po che drus pa skam po ma ga dh'a'i srang bcu drug ste /
T08TD4106.2E:133b-11: ma ga dh'a'i srang gcig la bod kyi srang gnyis yod do//
T08TD4106.2E:133b-12: 'bras thug po che drus pa skam po ma ga dh'a'i bre'u chung gang la bos kyi srang ni sum cu rtsa gnyis yod do //
T08TD4106.2E:133b-13: phul tshad du brtsis na ni bdun phul do dang khyor gang yod do //
T08TD4106.2E:133b-14: ma ga dh'a'i bre'u chung phyed dang do la ni bod kyi bdun phul phyed dang bzhi yod do //
T08TD4106.2E:133b-15: ma ga dh'a'i bre'u chung phed dang do la ni bod kyi bdun phul bzhi dang khyor do yod do //
T08TD4106.2E:133b-16: 'bras drus bskam po chan du btsos na sum 'gyur du brtsi'o //
T08TD4106.2E:133b-17: de lta na lhung bzed chen po ni 'bras thug po che drus bskam po bod kyi bdun phul bzhi dang khyor do btsos pa'i chan bre do //
T08TD4106.2E:133b-18: de'i rkyen gyi tshod ma dang bcas pa blugs na mtheb sor gcig gis ma gang ba'o //
T08TD4106.2E:133b-19: lhung bzed 'bring ni 'bras thug po che dus pa skam po bod kyi bdun phul phyed dang bzhi btsos pa'i chan bre phyed dang do //
T08TD4106.2E:133b-20: de'i rkyen gyi tshod ma dang bcas pa blugs na mtheb sor gcig gis ma gang ba'o //
T08TD4106.2E:133b-21: lhung bzed chung ngu ni 'bras thug po che drus pa skam pa bod kyi bdun phul do dang khyor gang btsos pa'i chan bre gang dang de'i rkyen gyi tshod ma dang bcas pa blugs na mtheb sor gcig gis ma gang ba'o //
T08TD4106.2E:133b-22: 'dir ltung ba'i byed pa po ni lhung bzed 'breng po'i tshad dang sbyar te /
T08TD4106.2E:133b-23: dge slong gcig gam gnyis sam rab tu mang po ji snyed yod kyang rung ste /
T08TD4106.2E:134a-0: grogs kyi skal ba dang yang bcas par lhung bzed 'brid po gsum gyi tshad las lhag par mnos @134a * //
T08TD4106.2E:134a-2: 'di la yan lag lngas dngos gzhi'i ltung bar 'gyur te /
T08TD4106.2E:134a-3: sbyin bdag mi'i 'gro bar gtogs pa khyim ba skyes pa 'am bud med gang yang rud pa dang /
T08TD4106.2E:134a-4: bstabs pa'i bsod snyoms yongs su spags ba ci bder ma byas pa nyid dang /
T08TD4106.2E:134a-5: lhung bzed 'bring po gsum gyi tshad las lhag pa nyid dang /
T08TD4106.2E:134a-6: khyim nas mnos te khyer ba dang zos pa'o //
T08TD4106.2E:134a-7: de dag las yan lag ma tshang na ci rigs par na smad do //
T08TD4106.2E:134a-8: sbyor ba'i ltung ba ni nyes byas te /
T08TD4106.2E:134a-9: ji srid du lhung bzed do gsum tsam las lhag par len pa'i ltung byed kyi sbyor ba brtsams nas dngos gzhi la mthug gi bar du nyes byas so //
T08TD4106.2E:134a-10: dngos gzhi la sbyor ba tha dad pa ji snyed brtsams pa re re la nyes byas re re'o //
T08TD4106.2E:134a-11: sbyin bdag mi'i 'gro bar gtogs pa za ma dang ma ning dang mtshan gnyis pa la nyes byas so //
T08TD4106.2E:134a-12: chos 'di pa dang phyi rol pa'i rab tu byung ba la nyes byas so //
T08TD4106.2E:134a-13: mi ma yin pa'i 'gro ba la nyes byas so //
T08TD4106.2E:134a-14: dud 'gro la la nyes byas na smad do //
T08TD4106.2E:134a-15: mi stobs pa len pa la nyes byas so //
T08TD4106.2E:134a-16: bsod snyoms mnos pa de las lhag par nod na sbyor ba'i tshon nyes byas so //
T08TD4106.2E:134a-17: gzhan nod du bcug pa la nyes byas so //
T08TD4106.2E:134a-18: zas rung ba ma yin pa la nyes byas so //
T08TD4106.2E:134a-19: ma zos kyi bar du sbyor ba la nyes byas so //
T08TD4106.2E:134a-20: sbyor ba'i sbyor ba'i ltung ba ni nyes byas phra mo ste /
T08TD4106.2E:134a-21: sbyor ba ji snyed pa la sbyor ba'i sbyor ba yang de snyed de /
T08TD4106.2E:134a-22: sbyor ba nyes byas kyi sbyor ba'i sbyor ba yang nyes byas te nyes byas phra mo'o //
T08TD4106.2E:134a-23: ltung ba med pa ni gal te yongs su spags te stobs la chos dang ldan pa'i dgos pa yod na lhung bzed brgya blangs kyang nyes pa med do //
T08TD4106.2E:134a-24: ci dgar gyis shig ces ci bder byas pa la nyes pa med do //
T08TD4106.2E:134a-25: tshad las ma lhag pa la nyes pa med do //
T08TD4106.2E:134a-26: de nyid du 'dug ste ji snyed zos kyang ltung ba med do //
T08TD4106.2E:134a-27: 'bras la sogs pa rngo btags pa dang g-yos kyi las sum byas pa mnos te za ba la skabs 'di'i ltung ba med do //
T08TD4106.2E:134a-28: las dang po pa dang smyos pa dang /
T08TD4106.2E:134a-30: tshor bdag gis nyen pa la ltung ba med do //
T08TD4106.2E:134b-0: bslab par bya ba ni dge slong gis yul thams cad la gnas skabs thams cad du lhung bzed do gsum tsham las lhag par len pa'i ltung byed du 'gyur ba rnam pa thams cad mi bsten par bslab par bya'o @134b mi stobs par blang bar mi bya'o //
T08TD4106.2E:134b-1: blang bar bya ba gal te mang ba nyid na dge slong dag la bgo bsha' bya'o //
T08TD4106.2E:134b-2: thab kyi sgyed po'i steng du gzugs pa'i snod chen pa lta bu'i lhung bzed tshad las 'das par che ba thab snod lta bu bcang bar mi bya'o //
T08TD4106.2E:134b-3: phyir bcos pa ni snga ma bzhin no //
T08TD4106.2E:134b-4: lhung bzed do gsum las lhag par len pa'i ltung byed de sum cu gsum pa bshad zin to /
T08TD4106.2E:134b-6: // / so sor thar pa'i mdo rgya cher 'grel pa 'dul ba kun las btus pa /
T08TD4106.2E:134b-7: bam po nyi shu bdun pa /
T08TD4106.2E:134b-8: stan gcig pa'i zas kyi ltung byed kyi gleng gzhi ni bcas pa dar gnang ba'i dbang gis rnam pa gnyis te /
T08TD4106.2E:134b-9: bcas pa'i gleng gzhi ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' rab na bzhugs so //
T08TD4106.2E:134b-10: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal ba /
T08TD4106.2E:134b-11: dge slong dag nga ni stan gcig pa'i zas za ste /
T08TD4106.2E:134b-12: nga ltan gcig pa'i zas za ba ni snying las chud dur 'tsho zhing gnod pa nyung ba dang /
T08TD4106.2E:134b-13: nyam nga ba chung ba dang /
T08TD4106.2E:134b-15: 'tsho ba dang stobs dang ldan pa dang /
T08TD4106.2E:134b-16: bde ba dang kha na ma tho ba med pa dang /
T08TD4106.2E:134b-17: bde ba la reg par gnas par tshor ro //
T08TD4106.2E:134b-18: dge slong dag khyed kyang tshur sheg la stan gcig pa'i zas zo shig dang /
T08TD4106.2E:134b-19: khyod kyang stan gcig pa'i zas za ba na snying las chung dur 'tsho zhing /
T08TD4106.2E:134b-21: nyam nga ba chung ba dang /
T08TD4106.2E:134b-23: 'tsho ba dang stobs dang ldan pa dang /
T08TD4106.2E:134b-24: bde ba dang kha na mtho ba med pa dang /
T08TD4106.2E:134b-25: bde ba la reg par gnas par tshor bar 'gyur ro //
T08TD4106.2E:134b-26: zas ma spangs pas ji tsam gyis chog pa bza' bar bya zhing zas brtsams pas slob dpon dang mkhan po dang bla ma dang bla ma lta bu mthong na yang ldang bar mi bya'o //
T08TD4106.2E:134b-27: bca' ba lnga po rtsa ba dang /
T08TD4106.2E:134b-31: 'bras bu dag gis ni spangs par mi 'gyur la /
T08TD4106.2E:134b-32: bza' ba lnga po 'bras chan dang /
T08TD4106.2E:134b-36: 'dag gu dag gis ni spangs par 'gyur ro //
T08TD4106.2E:134b-37: rgyu lnga po zas yod pa dang /
T08TD4106.2E:134b-38: zas stobs pa yod pa dang /
T08TD4106.2E:134b-39: zas brtsams pa yod pa dang /
T08TD4106.2E:134b-40: zas spangs pa yod pa dang /
T08TD4106.2E:134b-41: spyod lam las nyams pa dag gis ni spangs pa brjod par bya la /
T08TD4106.2E:134b-42: rgyu lnga po zas med pa dang /
T08TD4106.2E:135a-2: zas brtsams pa med pa dang /
T08TD4106.2E:135a-3: zas spangs pa med pa dang /
T08TD4106.2E:135a-4: spyod lam las ma nyams pa dag gis ni ma spangs par brjod par bya'o //
T08TD4106.2E:135a-5: gzhan yang tshig lhag ma med pa lnga po thong shig ces bya ba dang /
T08TD4106.2E:135a-6: gzhan la byin cig ces bya ba dang /
T08TD4106.2E:135a-7: song shig ces bya ba dang /
T08TD4106.2E:135a-8: zos zin to zhes bya ba dang /
T08TD4106.2E:135a-9: chog go zhes bya ba dag gis ni spangs par brjod par bya la /
T08TD4106.2E:135a-10: tshig lhag ma dang bcas pa lnga po re zhig thod shig ces bya ba dang /
T08TD4106.2E:135a-11: re zhig gzhan la byin cig ces bya ba dang /
T08TD4106.2E:135a-12: re zhig song shig ces bya ba dang /
T08TD4106.2E:135a-13: re zhig zos zin to zhes bya ba dang /
T08TD4106.2E:135a-14: re zhig chog go zhes bya ba dag gis ni ma spangs par brjod par rig par bya'o //
T08TD4106.2E:135a-15: bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong dag gis spangs pa bza' bar mi bya'o zhes bka' stsal nas /
T08TD4106.2E:135a-16: drug sde dag spangs pas kyang za bar byed /
T08TD4106.2E:135a-17: ma spangs pas kyang za bar byed nas /
T08TD4106.2E:135a-18: dge slong don nyung du dag bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong gis spangs pa bza' bar mi bya'o zhes bka' stsal na /
T08TD4106.2E:135a-19: ci'i phyir dge slong dag spangs pas kyang za bar byed /
T08TD4106.2E:135a-20: ma spangs pas kyang za bar byed ces smod par byed /
T08TD4106.2E:135a-22: kha zer bar byed pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol to //
T08TD4106.2E:135a-23: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byung ba 'di dang /
T08TD4106.2E:135a-25: skabs 'di la dge slong gi dge 'dun bsdu ba mdzad de /
T08TD4106.2E:135a-26: drug sde dag la rmas nas /
T08TD4106.2E:135a-27: dge sbyong gi tshul ma yin pa /
T08TD4106.2E:135a-28: rjes su mthun pa ma yin pa /
T08TD4106.2E:135a-30: tshul dang mthun pa ma yin pa de ni rab tu byung bas bya ba ma yin no zhes rnam grangs du mar rnam par smad nas /
T08TD4106.2E:135a-31: bslab pa bca' ba'i phan yon bcu yang dag par gzigs pas nga'i nyan thos rnams kyis 'dul ba la bslab pa'i gzhi 'di ltar gdon par bya ste /
T08TD4106.2E:135a-32: yang dge slong gang zas zos zin cing spangs pa las bca' ba'am bza' ba 'cha' 'am za na ltung byed do zhes bca' ba mdzad de /
T08TD4106.2E:135a-35: nyon mongs pa ni bslab pa la g+yel ba dang bka' la mgus pa dang /
T08TD4106.2E:135a-36: nyes pa ni zas spangs pas za bar byed pa'o //
T08TD4106.2E:135b-0: gnang ba'i gleng gzhi ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med @135b zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so //
T08TD4106.2E:135b-1: khyim bdag gis sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun khyim gzhan du gdugs tshod la spyan drangs nas dge slong nad pa rab tu mang po dag gi nad ga+yog rab tu mang po dag yod pa de dag gis bdag nyid kyis zos nas nad pa rnams kyi lto khengs pa'i bsod snyoms dag mnos pa dang /
T08TD4106.2E:135b-2: dge slong nad pa rnams kyis za bar mi nus shing /
T08TD4106.2E:135b-3: dge slong nad ga+yog dag gis kyang bdag cag gis spangs so zhes za bar mi byed /
T08TD4106.2E:135b-4: kun dga' ra ba pa dang /
T08TD4106.2E:135b-5: dge tshul dag kyang med nas /
T08TD4106.2E:135b-6: de dag gis kun dga' ra ba'i nang du zas kyi phung po chen po rnam par gzhag pa dang /
T08TD4106.2E:135b-7: der bya rog dag za ba na /
T08TD4106.2E:135b-8: bya rog gi sgra 'byin pa chen po byung bar gyur to //
T08TD4106.2E:135b-9: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mkhyen bzhin du rmed pa mdzad pas /
T08TD4106.2E:135b-10: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa /
T08TD4106.2E:135b-11: kun dga' po kun dga' ra ba'i nang na bya rog sgra 'byin pa chen po byung bar gyur ba 'di ci las gyur /
T08TD4106.2E:135b-12: tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos skabs de rgyas par gsol to //
T08TD4106.2E:135b-13: de nas bcom ldan 'das 'di snyam du dgongs te /
T08TD4106.2E:135b-14: ngas dge slong rnams bde ba la reg par gnas par bya ba'i phyir dang /
T08TD4106.2E:135b-15: sbyin pa po rnams kyi sbyin par bya ba'i chos yongs su longs spyod par bya ba'i phyir lhag bor gnang bar bya'o snyam du dgongs nas dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa /
T08TD4106.2E:135b-16: dge slong dag de lta bas na lhag bor byas te bza' bar rjes su gnang ngo //
T08TD4106.2E:135b-17: bcom ldan 'das kyis lhag bor byas te bza' bar rjes su gnang ngo zhes bka' stsal nas /
T08TD4106.2E:135b-18: dge slong rnams kyis lhag bor ji ltar bya ba mi shes nas /
T08TD4106.2E:135b-19: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba /
T08TD4106.2E:135b-20: dge slong zas zos zin nas spangs te yongs su rdzogs shing mthar thug par byas pa gang yang rung ba zhig gis bca' ba 'am bza' ba rnyed cing za bar 'dod na dge slong des lag pa gnyis bsnyal te byin len byas la /
T08TD4106.2E:135b-21: dge slong zas zos zin cing ma spangs la spyod lam las ma nyams pa gang yin pa 'am /
T08TD4106.2E:135b-22: dge slong zas zos zin cing spangs la spyod lam las ma nyams pa gang yin pa de'i bdun du tsog pur 'dug ste /
T08TD4106.2E:136a-0: @136a * // tshe dang ldan pa dgongs su gsol /
T08TD4106.2E:136a-1: bdag dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'tshal ma 'tshal lags shing spangs te yongs su rdzogs shing /
T08TD4106.2E:136a-2: mthar thug par bgyis pa las bca' ba dang bza' ba rnyed cing 'tshal bar 'tshal na /
T08TD4106.2E:136a-3: lhag por bgyis te bdag la stsal du gsol /
T08TD4106.2E:136a-4: lhag bor byed pa'i dge slong gis zas zos zin cing ma spangs la spyod lam las ma nyams pa gang yin pa de ni bdag nyid kyis kham gnyis sam gsum zos nas /
T08TD4106.2E:136a-5: khyed kyir gyur gyis bzhud cig ces brjod pas lhag bor bya'o //
T08TD4106.2E:136a-6: dge slong zas zos zin cing spangs la spyod lam las ma nyams pa gang yin pa des ni bza' bar mi bya bar lag par byin nas khyod kyir gyur gyis bzhud cig ces brjod pas lhag bor bya'o //
T08TD4106.2E:136a-7: gal te za na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro //
T08TD4106.2E:136a-8: rgyu ldas lhag bor ma byas par brjod par bya ste lnga gang zhe na /
T08TD4106.2E:136a-9: mtshams kyi phyi rol du dang /
T08TD4106.2E:136a-13: spyod lam las nyams par byed du 'jug pa'o //
T08TD4106.2E:136a-14: rgyu ldas lhag bor byas par brjod par bya ste /
T08TD4106.2E:136a-16: mtshams kyi phyi rol ma yin pa dang /
T08TD4106.2E:136a-18: rgyab ma yin pa nas dang /
T08TD4106.2E:136a-19: glo ma yin pa nas dang /
T08TD4106.2E:136a-20: spyod lam las ma nyams par byed du 'jug pa'o //
T08TD4106.2E:136a-21: gzhan yang rgyu lngas ni lhag bor ma byas par brjod par bya ste /
T08TD4106.2E:136a-23: mtshams kyi phyi rol du dang /
T08TD4106.2E:136a-27: spyod lam las nyams par byed du 'jug pa'o //
T08TD4106.2E:136a-28: rgyu lngas ni lhag bor bya bar brjod bar bya ste /
T08TD4106.2E:136a-30: mtshams kyi phyi rol ma yin pa dang /
T08TD4106.2E:136a-32: lhung bzed kyi gzhi ma yin pa dang /
T08TD4106.2E:136a-33: thu bar ma yin pa dang /
T08TD4106.2E:136a-34: spyod lam las ma nyams par byed du 'jug pa'i dge slong gis lhag bor byas pa mang bo dag gis bza' bar bya ste /
T08TD4106.2E:136a-36: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bslab par bya bar 'dod pa dang /
T08TD4106.2E:136a-37: bslab pa la gus pa dang /
T08TD4106.2E:136a-38: bslab pa la yo byad bsnyungs pa'i bsngags pa brjod nas dge slong rnams la de dang mthun pa dang /
T08TD4106.2E:136b-0: de dag @136b dang 'tsham pa'i chos dang ldan pa'i bka' mchid mdzad nas dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa /
T08TD4106.2E:136b-1: dge slong dag de lta bas na snga ma ni bcas pa yin la 'di ni gnang ba yin te /
T08TD4106.2E:136b-2: nga'i nyan thos rnams kyis 'dul ba la bslab pa'i gzhi 'di ltar gdon par bya ste /
T08TD4106.2E:136b-3: yang dge slong gang zas zos zin cing spangs pa las lhag bor ma byas par bca' ba'am /
T08TD4106.2E:136b-4: bza' ba 'cha' ba 'am za na ltung byed do zhes gnang ba mdzad do //
T08TD4106.2E:136b-6: gang zag ni dge slong nang g-yog rab tu mang po dag / nyon mongs pa dang nyes pa ni med do //
T08TD4106.2E:136b-7: de la yang dge slong gang zhes bya ba ni drug sde 'am gzhan yang de lta bu gang yin pa'o //
T08TD4106.2E:136b-8: zas zos zin cing spangs pa las zhes bya ba ni yongs su rdzogs shing mthar thug par byas pa las so //
T08TD4106.2E:136b-9: lhag bor ma byas par zhes bya ba ni lhag mar ma byas shing ma bor yongs su ma btang bar ro //
T08TD4106.2E:136b-10: bca' ba 'am bza' ba zhes bya ba ni bca' ba lnga po dang bza' ba lnga po dag go //
T08TD4106.2E:136b-11: 'cha' 'am za na zhes bya ba ni mgul du mid na'o //
T08TD4106.2E:136b-12: ltung byed do zhes bya ba ni snga ma bzhin no //
T08TD4106.2E:136b-13: de la ltung ba ji ltar 'gyur zhe na /
T08TD4106.2E:136b-14: 'dir yang dngos gzhi dang sbyor ba dang /
T08TD4106.2E:136b-15: sbyor ba'i sbyor bas ltung ba rnam par gzhag pa dang /
T08TD4106.2E:136b-18: phyir bcos pa rnams kyis 'di'i mtshan nyid shes par bya'o //
T08TD4106.2E:136b-19: de la 'dir dngos gzhi'i ltung ba rnam par gzhag pa ni dge slong zas spangs pa nyid dang /
T08TD4106.2E:136b-20: lhag bor ma byas pa nyid kyi dus su rung ba'i zas gang yang rung ba zos na stan gcig pa'i zas kyi ltung byed kyi dngos gzhir 'gyur ro //
T08TD4106.2E:136b-21: dge slong zas spangs pa nyid dang /
T08TD4106.2E:136b-22: lhag bor ma byas pa nyid kyis dus su rung ba'i zas gang yang rung ba zos na 'dir dngos gzhir gsungs pa la /
T08TD4106.2E:136b-23: zas spangs pa nyid ni gang yin /
T08TD4106.2E:136b-24: lhag bor ni gang yin par brjod par bya zhe na /
T08TD4106.2E:136b-25: zas spangs pa nyid ces bya ba ni dge slong zas brtsams pas 'dug pa'i gnas btang ba ste /
T08TD4106.2E:136b-26: de yang rgyu lnga bo zas yod pa dang /
T08TD4106.2E:136b-27: zas stobs pa yod pa dang /
T08TD4106.2E:136b-28: zas brtsams pa yod pa dang /
T08TD4106.2E:136b-29: zas spangs pa yod pa dang /
T08TD4106.2E:136b-30: spyod lam las nyams pa dag gis ni zas brtsams pas 'dug pa'i gnas gtong par 'gyur ro //
T08TD4106.2E:137a-2: bca' ba lnga dang bza' lnga'i zas brtsams shing tha na lan tshva tsam yan chad bza' bar bya ba gang yang rung ba cung zad cig phyin len byas te zas brtsams pa dang /
T08TD4106.2E:137a-4: zas stobs pa yod pa dang /
T08TD4106.2E:137a-5: zas brtsams pa yod pas bca' ba lnga dang thug pa dang skyo ma ma gtogs pa bza' ba lnga'i zas rung ba dang mi rung ba dang ma 'dres pa'i byin len stobs pa tho 'tshams pa ma yin pa /
T08TD4106.2E:137a-6: dge slong byin len byed pa rang gi zas 'thob ba'i phyogs na 'greng ba la tshig lhag ma med pa lnga po thong shig ces bya ba dang /
T08TD4106.2E:137a-7: gzhan la byin cig ces bya ba dang /
T08TD4106.2E:137a-8: song shig ces bya ba dang /
T08TD4106.2E:137a-9: zos zin to zhes bya ba dang /
T08TD4106.2E:137a-10: chog go zhes bya ba dag las gang yang rung bas byin len stobs pa de spangs pa byas nas zas brtsams pa'i phyogs gang du sngar 'dug par gyur pa'i gnas btang ste /
T08TD4106.2E:137a-11: zas spangs pa yod pa dang /
T08TD4106.2E:137a-12: spyod lam las nyams par gyur pa ni zas spangs pa nyid yin no //
T08TD4106.2E:137a-13: 'di la rgyu lngas ni zas brtsams pas 'dug pa'i gnas gong bar mi 'gyur te /
T08TD4106.2E:137a-15: zas stobs pa med pa dang /
T08TD4106.2E:137a-16: zas brtsams pa med pa dang /
T08TD4106.2E:137a-17: zas spangs pa med pa dang /
T08TD4106.2E:137a-18: spyod lam las ma nyams pa dag gis so //
T08TD4106.2E:137a-19: tshig lhag ma dang bcas pa lngas ni byin len stobs pa spangs par mi 'gyur te /
T08TD4106.2E:137a-20: re zhig thong shig ces bya ba dang /
T08TD4106.2E:137a-21: re zhig gzhan la byin cig ces bya ba dang /
T08TD4106.2E:137a-22: re zhig song shig ces bya ba dang /
T08TD4106.2E:137a-23: re zhig zos zin to zhes bya ba dang /
T08TD4106.2E:137a-24: re zhig chog go zhes bya ba dag gis so //
T08TD4106.2E:137a-26: thug pa dang skyo ma btang bas ni zas spangs par mi 'gyur te /
T08TD4106.2E:137a-27: bca' ba lnga ni rtsa ba dang /
T08TD4106.2E:137a-32: thug pa ni gang du kha gzar btsugs na kha gzar gyen du 'greng du mi btub pa nyid man chad kyi thug pa dag ni thug pa nyid yin no //
T08TD4106.2E:137a-33: skyo ma ni skyo ma gang gi steng du sor mo lnga gzhag pa'i rjes mi mngon pa nyid man chad kyi skyo ma dag ni skyo ma nyid yin no //
T08TD4106.2E:137a-34: byin len stobs pa tho 'tshams pa btang bas kyang zas spangs par mi 'gyur te /
T08TD4106.2E:137b-0: byin len stobs pa tho 'tshams pa ni @137b gal te 'ga' zhig tho 'tshams pa'i bsam pas dge slong la byin len stobs par byed pa ste /
T08TD4106.2E:137b-1: de ni byin len stobs pa nyid ma yin pas dge slong gis kyang de shes nas de la tshig lhag ma med pa lnga po thong shig ces bya ba dang /
T08TD4106.2E:137b-2: gzhan la byin cig ces bya ba dang /
T08TD4106.2E:137b-3: song shig ces bya ba dang /
T08TD4106.2E:137b-4: zos zin te zhes bya ba dang /
T08TD4106.2E:137b-5: chog go zhes bya ba dag las gang smras kyang des zas spangs par mi 'gyur ro //
T08TD4106.2E:137b-6: bza' ba lnga dang zas mi rung ba dang ma 'dres pa btang bas ni zas spangs par 'gyur ro //
T08TD4106.2E:137b-7: bza' ba lnga ni 'bras chan dang /
T08TD4106.2E:137b-12: zas mi rung ba dang ma 'dres pa ni de dag nyid byin len ma byas pa dang /
T08TD4106.2E:137b-13: nang du zhag lon pa dang /
T08TD4106.2E:137b-14: nang du bcos pa dang dge slong gis btsos pa dang /
T08TD4106.2E:137b-17: mi sha la sogs pa dang ma dres pa'o //
T08TD4106.2E:137b-18: byin len stobs pa tho 'tshams pa ma yin pa btang bas kyang zas spangs par 'gyur te /
T08TD4106.2E:137b-19: byin len stobs pa tho 'tshams pa ma yin pa de dge slong ma dang /
T08TD4106.2E:137b-25: gzhan yang rung bar byed pa byin len stobs par gnang ba tho 'tshams pa'i bsam pa med pa zas 'thob pa'i phyogs na 'dren pa'o //
T08TD4106.2E:137b-26: lhag por ma byas pa nyid ces bya ba la lhag por ji ltar bya zhe na /
T08TD4106.2E:137b-27: dge slong zas zos zin cing spangs te /
T08TD4106.2E:137b-28: yongs su rdzogs shing mthar thug par byas pa gang yang rung ba zhig gis bca' ba 'am bza' ba rnyed cing bza' bar dod na dge slong des lag pa gnyis bsnyal te byin len byas la /
T08TD4106.2E:137b-29: dge slong zas zos zin cing ma spangs la /
T08TD4106.2E:137b-30: spyod lam las ma nyams pa gang yin ba'am dge slong zas zos zin cing spangs la spyod lam las ma nyams pa gang yin pa de'i mdun du tsog pur 'dug ste skad ces brjod par bya'o //
T08TD4106.2E:137b-31: cho dang ldan pa dgongs su gsol //
T08TD4106.2E:137b-32: bdag dge slong ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'tshal ma 'tshal lags shing /
T08TD4106.2E:137b-33: spangs te yongs su rdzogs shing mthar thug par bgyis pa la bca' ba dang bza' ba rnyed cing 'tshal bar 'tshal na lhag bor bgyis te bdag la stsal du gsol //
T08TD4106.2E:138a-1: sam gsum zos nas 'di skad ces khyod kyir gyur gyi bzhud cig ces brjod par bya'o //
T08TD4106.2E:138a-2: slob dpon kha cig na re khyod kyir gyur gyi ci bder gsol cig ces brjod par bya'o zhes kyang zer ro //
T08TD4106.2E:138a-3: de la dge slong zas zos zin cing ma spangs la spyod lam las ma nyams pa gang yin pa des ni bdag nyid kyis kham gnyis sam gsum zos nas de ltar lhag bor bya'o //
T08TD4106.2E:138a-4: dge slong zas zos zin cing spangs la spyod lam las nyams pa gang yin pa des ni bza' bar mi bya bar des lag par byin nas de ltar lhag bor bya'o //
T08TD4106.2E:138a-5: za na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro //
T08TD4106.2E:138a-6: dge slong gang gis bdag gis deng 'di las zas gzhan mi bza'o zhes de ltar brtag par byas te zas spangs pa dang /
T08TD4106.2E:138a-7: de ltar brtag par ma byas par spyod lam las nyams pa tsam gyis zas spangs pa byas bas kyang lhag bor byed du gzhug tu rung ngo //
T08TD4106.2E:138a-8: dus su rung ba ma yin ba dang /
T08TD4106.2E:138a-9: de dang 'dres pa la ni mi bya ba nyid do //
T08TD4106.2E:138a-10: rgyu lngas lhag bor ma byas par brjod par bya ste /
T08TD4106.2E:138a-11: mtshams kyi phyi rol du dang /
T08TD4106.2E:138a-15: spyod lam las nyams par byed du 'jug pas so //
T08TD4106.2E:138a-16: de las zlog pa lngas ni lhag bor byas par brjod par bya'o //
T08TD4106.2E:138a-17: gzhan yang rgyu lngas ni lhag bor ma byas par brjod par bya ste /
T08TD4106.2E:138a-18: mtshams kyi phyi rol du dang /
T08TD4106.2E:138a-22: spyod lam las nyams par byed du 'jug pas so //
T08TD4106.2E:138a-23: de las bzlog pa lngas ni lhag bor byas par brjod par bya'o //
T08TD4106.2E:138a-24: lhag bor zhes bya ba ni lhag mar byas shing bor ba ste /
T08TD4106.2E:138a-25: lhag bor byed pa'i dge slong gis zos pa'i lhag ma bor ba ni lhag bor zhes bya'o //
T08TD4106.2E:138a-26: gcig gis lhag bor byas pa mang po dag gis kyang bzar rung nga //
T08TD4106.2E:138a-27: lhag bor byas pa'i rnam pa ji skad bstan pa de ltar ma byas pa ni lhag bor ma byas pa nyid do //
T08TD4106.2E:138a-28: de ltar dge slong zas spangs pa nyid dang lhag bor ma byas pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid bstan nas /
T08TD4106.2E:138a-29: da ni ltung ba rnam par gzhag pa'i mtshan nyid bstan par bya ste /
T08TD4106.2E:138a-30: dge slong zas spangs pa nyid lan smad pa med do //
T08TD4106.2E:138a-31: lhag bor ma byas pa nyid la na smad pa med do //
T08TD4106.2E:138a-32: spangs pa nyid dang lhag bor ma byas pa nyid kyang yin la /
T08TD4106.2E:138b-0: de dag @138b tu 'du shes pa nyid dang yid gnyis za ba nyid la na smad pa med do //
T08TD4106.2E:138b-1: zas dus su rung ba bza' ba lnga dang bza' ba lnga'i khongs su gtogs pa gang yang rung ba la na smad pa med do //
T08TD4106.2E:138b-2: zos shing mgul du mid pa la na smad pa med do //
T08TD4106.2E:138b-3: 'dir stan gcig pa'i zas kyi ltung byed ni bcas pa dang gnang ba'i dbang gis rnam par gzhag pa yin pas /
T08TD4106.2E:138b-4: dge slong zas spangs pa nyid kyis lhag bor ma byas par dus su rung ba'i zas gang yang rung ba zos na stan gcig pa'i zas kyi ltung byed du 'gyur la /
T08TD4106.2E:138b-5: lhag bor byas te zos pa la ni ltung ba med par ston to //
T08TD4106.2E:138b-6: stan gcig pa'i sbyangs pa'i yon tan yang dag par blangs pa'i dge slong 'di yang dag par blangs pa las byung ba'i yi dam khyad par can yin pas des ni spangs pa nyid yin yang rung /
T08TD4106.2E:138b-7: spangs pa nyid ma yin yang rung ste /
T08TD4106.2E:138b-8: lan cig stan gcig gi steng du byin len byas te zos zin phan chad phyis byin len byas kyang rung ma byas kyang rung /
T08TD4106.2E:138b-9: lhag bor byas kyang rung ma byas kyang rung ba'i bza' ba dang bca' ba dag bza' bar mi bya ste /
T08TD4106.2E:138b-10: zos na yi dam ral bar 'gyur ro //
T08TD4106.2E:138b-11: 'di'i byed pa po ni zas spangs pa nyid dang lhag bor ma byas pa nyid dag la 'du shes gtso cher byed pa po nyid yin no //
T08TD4106.2E:138b-12: 'di la yan lag lngas dngos gzhi'i ltung bar 'gyur te /
T08TD4106.2E:138b-14: lhag bor ma byas pa nyid dang /
T08TD4106.2E:138b-16: dus su rung ba'i zas dang zos pa'o //
T08TD4106.2E:138b-17: de dag las yan lag ma tshang na ci rigs par na smad do //
T08TD4106.2E:138b-18: sbyor ba'i ltung ba ni nyes byas te ji sring du stan gcig pa'i zas kyi ltung byed kyi sbyor ba brtsams nas dngos gzhi la ma thug gi bar du nyes byas so //
T08TD4106.2E:138b-19: dngos gzhi la sbyor ba tha dang pa ji snyed brtsams pa re re la nyes byas re re'o //
T08TD4106.2E:138b-20: zas spangs pa nyid ma yin pa dang /
T08TD4106.2E:138b-21: lhag bor byas pa nyid ma yin pa la spangs pa nyid dang /
T08TD4106.2E:138b-22: lhag bor byas pa nyid du 'du shes pa dang yid gnyis za ba la nyes byas so //
T08TD4106.2E:138b-23: zas brtsams pas sdang ba la nyes byas so //
T08TD4106.2E:138b-24: lhag bor byed pa zas zos zin cing spangs pa spyod la ma las ma nyams pas lhag bor byas pa'i zas las kham gcig gam gnyis za na nyes byas so //
T08TD4106.2E:138b-25: sbyor ba'i sbyor ba'i ltung ba ni nyes byas phra mo ste /
T08TD4106.2E:139a-0: sbyor ba ji snyed pa la sbyor ba'i sbyor ba yang de @139a * //
T08TD4106.2E:139a-2: sbyor ba nyes byas kyi sbyor ba'i sbyor ba yang snyes byas te nyes byas phra mo'o /
T08TD4106.2E:139a-3: ltung ba med pa ni zas ma spangs pa nyid la ltung ba med do //
T08TD4106.2E:139a-4: lhag bor byas pa nyid la ltung ba med do //
T08TD4106.2E:139a-5: der 'di shes pa nyid la ltung ba med do //
T08TD4106.2E:139a-6: dus su rung ba'i zas ma yin pa thun tshod du rung ba dang /
T08TD4106.2E:139a-8: 'tsho ba'i bar du bcang ba dang /
T08TD4106.2E:139a-9: dus kun tu rung ba la ltung ba med do //
T08TD4106.2E:139a-10: ma zos pa la ltung ba med do //
T08TD4106.2E:139a-14: tshor ba dag gis nyen la ltung ba med do //
T08TD4106.2E:139a-15: bslab par bya ba ni dge slong gis yul thams cad la gnas skabs thams cad du stan gcig pa'i zas kyi ltung byed du 'gyur ba rnam pa thams cad mi bsten par bslab par bya'o //
T08TD4106.2E:139a-16: stan gcig pa'i zas bza' bar bslab par bya'o //
T08TD4106.2E:139a-17: zas ma spangs pas ji tsam gyis chog pa bza' bar bya'o //
T08TD4106.2E:139a-19: bca' ba lnga dang bza' ba lnga'i zas brtsams shing tha na lan tshva tsam yan chang bza' bar bya ba gang rung ba cung zad cig byin len byas te zas brtsams pas ldang bar mi bya'o //
T08TD4106.2E:139a-20: dge slong zas zos zin cing spangs te yongs su rdzogs su rdzogs shing mthar thug par byas pa gang yang rung ba zhig gis bca' ba'am bza' ba rnyed cing za bar 'dod na /
T08TD4106.2E:139a-21: des lhag bor byed du bcug ste bza' bar bya'o //
T08TD4106.2E:139a-22: phyir ba ces pa ni snga ma bzhin no //
T08TD4106.2E:139a-23: stan gcig pa'i zas kyi ltung byed des sum cu bzhi pa bshad zid to /
T08TD4106.2E:139a-25: // / spangs pa la stobs pa'i ltung byed kyi gleng bzhi ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun 'da' ra ba na bzhugs so //
T08TD4106.2E:139a-26: mnyan yod na khyim bdag cig 'dug pa des rigs mnyam pa las chung ma blangs na de de dang lhan cig rtse bar byed dga' bar byed dga' mgur spyod par byed do //
T08TD4106.2E:139a-27: de rgas pa'i gnas skabs su nye du zad pa dang /
T08TD4106.2E:139a-29: longs spyod zad par gyur nas des chung ma la smras pa /
T08TD4106.2E:139a-30: bzang mo kho bo rgas pa'i gnas skabs su nor bsgrub mi nus kyi rab tu 'byung du 'gro'o //
T08TD4106.2E:139a-31: rje'i sras de bzhin mdzod cig / de rgyal byed kyi tshal du song ste /
T08TD4106.2E:139a-32: de dge slong zhig la rab tu 'byung bar gsol pa dang /
T08TD4106.2E:139b-0: des mkhan po spong ba la dgon pa @139b na bsam gtan byed pa zhig yod ba'i gan du khrid de /
T08TD4106.2E:139b-1: legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu byung zheng bsnyen par rdzogs par byas nas /
T08TD4106.2E:139b-2: de dge slong de la gtad de gtang ngo //
T08TD4106.2E:139b-3: dge slong des rgan zhugs de klog pa dang /
T08TD4106.2E:139b-4: slob tu 'jug pa na rgan zhugs de brjed ngas pas yang dang yang du ltung ba 'byin nas des de mdun du tsog pur 'dug tu bcug ste ltung ba 'chags su 'jug par byed do /
T08TD4106.2E:139b-6: bdag slob dpon 'dis rtag tu mdun du tsog pur 'dug tu bcug ste ltung ba 'chags su 'dzud pas bdag gis kyang 'di mdun tsog pur 'dug tu bcug ste ltung ba 'chags su gzhug pa'i thabs ci yod snyam mo //
T08TD4106.2E:139b-7: khyim bdag gcig gis sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun khyim gzhan du gdugs tshod la spyan drangs nas sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun gshegs te bcom ldan 'das kyis gdugs tshod gsol nas khyim bdag de la chos bstan par brtsams so //
T08TD4106.2E:139b-8: dge slong des rgan zhugs de khrid de sbyin bdag gi khyim du song ba dang /
T08TD4106.2E:139b-9: sbyin bdag gis de gnyis la zas bstabs nas de gnyis kyis kho bo cag zas zos zin to zhes spangs pa dang /
T08TD4106.2E:139b-11: bsnoms te bzhud la lhag bor mdzod cig / de gnyis kyis byin len byas te dong nas /
T08TD4106.2E:139b-12: rgyal byed kyi tshal du phyin pa dang /
T08TD4106.2E:139b-13: dge slong de ni chu 'chag / rgan zhugs de ni lhag bor byed du bcug na /
T08TD4106.2E:139b-14: rgan zhugs kyis rnag gi skal ba ni lhag bor byas la /
T08TD4106.2E:139b-15: dge slong de'i skal ba ni lhag bor ma byas so zhes zer te zar bcug nas de'i 'og tu khyod kyis lhag bor ma byas ba'i bca' ba dang bza' ba zos kyi ltung ba shogs shig ces byas pa dang /
T08TD4106.2E:139b-17: rgan zhugs kho bos ltung ba mi 'chags kyi 'di ltar khyod nyid ltung ba dang bcas par 'gyur ba gang yin pa de lta bu'i gnas yod par 'gyur ro zhes des dge slong rnams la skabs de brjod pa dang /
T08TD4106.2E:140a-0: dge slong don nyung du dag ci'i phyir dge slong dag shes bzhin du dag slong zas zos zin cing spangs pa la skabs tshol zhing ci nas kyang dge slong 'di nyes pa 'byung bar bya'o snyam pa de nyid rkyen du byas nas tshe dang ldan pa 'di 'cho shig 'di zo zhig ces lhag bor ma byas pa'i bca' ba dang bza' ba dus kyis stobs @140a * //
T08TD4106.2E:140a-1: bar byed ces smod par byed /
T08TD4106.2E:140a-3: kha zer bar byed ba'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol to //
T08TD4106.2E:140a-4: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byung ba 'di dang /
T08TD4106.2E:140a-6: skabs 'di la dge slong gi dge 'dun bsdu ba mdzad de /
T08TD4106.2E:140a-7: rgan zhugs de la rmas nas /
T08TD4106.2E:140a-8: dge sbyong gi tshul ma yin pa /
T08TD4106.2E:140a-9: rjes su mthun pa ma yin pa /
T08TD4106.2E:140a-11: tshul dang mthun pa ma yin pa /
T08TD4106.2E:140a-12: de ni rab tu byung bas bya ba ma yin no zhes rnam grangs du mar rnam par smad de /
T08TD4106.2E:140a-13: bslab pa bca' ba'i phan yon bcu yang dag par gzigs pas nga'i nyan thos rnams kyis 'dul ba la bslab pa'i gzhi 'di ltar gdon par bya ste /
T08TD4106.2E:140a-14: yang dge slong gang shes bzhin du dge slong zas zos zin cing spangs pa la skabs tshol zhing ci nas kyang dge slong 'di nyes pa 'byung bar bya'o snyam pa de nyid rkyen du byas nas tshe dang ldan pa 'di 'cho shig 'di zo shig ces lhag bor ma byas pa'i bca' ba dang bza' ba dus kyis stobs par byed na ltung byed do zhes bca' ba mdzad de /
T08TD4106.2E:140a-16: gang zag ni dge slong rgan zhugs /
T08TD4106.2E:140a-17: nyon mongs pa ni nyes rtsom /
T08TD4106.2E:140a-18: nyes pa ni shes bzhin du dge slong zas zos zin cing spangs pa la lhag bor ma byas pa'i bca' ba dang /
T08TD4106.2E:140a-19: bza' ba dus kyis stobs pa'o //
T08TD4106.2E:140a-20: de la yang dge slong gang zhes bya ni chos 'di pa'o //
T08TD4106.2E:140a-21: shes bzhin du zhes bya ba ni de rang nyid kyi rig pa'am gzhan dag gis brjod pas so //
T08TD4106.2E:140a-22: dge slong zhes bya ba ni chos 'di pa'o //
T08TD4106.2E:140a-23: zas zos zin cing spangs pa la zhes bya ba ni yongs su rdzogs shing mthar thug par byas pa la go skabs tshol zhing zhes bya ba ni kla na ka tshol zhing ngo /
T08TD4106.2E:140a-24: ci nas kyang dge slong 'di nyes pa 'byung bar bya'o /
T08TD4106.2E:140a-25: snyam pa dang zhes bya ba ni ci nas kyang dge slong 'di ltung ba dang bcas par byas par 'gyur ro snyam pa'o //
T08TD4106.2E:140a-26: de nyid rkyen du byas nas zhes bya ba ni gzhan ma yin pa'o //
T08TD4106.2E:140a-27: tshe dang ldan pa 'di 'cho shig 'di zo shig ces bya ba ni bca' ba dang bza' ba'o //
T08TD4106.2E:140a-28: lhag bor ma byas pa'i zhes bya ba ni lhag mar ma byas shing ma bor yongs su ma btang ba'i'o //
T08TD4106.2E:140a-29: bca' ba dang bza' ba zhes bya ba ni bca' ba lnga po dang bza' ba lnga bo dag go //
T08TD4106.2E:140a-30: dus kyis stobs na zhes bya ba ni yang dang yang du stobs na'o //
T08TD4106.2E:140b-0: ltung byed do zhes bya ba ni @140b snga ma bzhin no //
T08TD4106.2E:140b-1: de la ltung ba ji ltar 'gyur zhe na /
T08TD4106.2E:140b-4: sbyor ba'i sbyor bas ltung ba rnam par gzhag pa dang /
T08TD4106.2E:140b-7: phyir bcos pa rnams kyis 'di'i mtshan nyid shes pa bya'o //
T08TD4106.2E:140b-8: de la 'dir dngos gzhi'i ltung ba rnam par gzhag pa ni dge slong shes bzhin du dge slong zas zos zin cing spangs pa lhag bor ma byas pa'i zas rung ba dus kyis stobs na spangs pa la stobs pa'i ltung byed kyi dngos gzhir 'gyur ro //
T08TD4106.2E:140b-9: dge slong yang zas zos zin cing spangs pa nyid yin la /
T08TD4106.2E:140b-10: ltung ba 'byin pa pos kyang der 'du shes pa dang /
T08TD4106.2E:140b-11: yid gnyis za ba la na smad pa med do //
T08TD4106.2E:140b-12: dge slong nyid la na smad pa med do //
T08TD4106.2E:140b-13: lhag bor ma byas pa nyid la na smad pa med do //
T08TD4106.2E:140b-14: zas rung ba bza' ba lnga dang bca' ba lnga'i khongs su gtogs pa gang yang rung ba la na smad pa med do //
T08TD4106.2E:140b-15: dus kyis stobs pa la na smad pa med do //
T08TD4106.2E:140b-16: dag gi rnam par rig byed kyis stobs pa la na smad pa med do //
T08TD4106.2E:140b-17: pha rol pos dang du blangs kyang rung ma blangs kyang rung ba la na smad pa med do //
T08TD4106.2E:140b-18: 'di'i byed pa po ni zas spangs pa nyid dang /
T08TD4106.2E:140b-19: lhag bor ma byas ba nyid dag la 'du shes gtso cher byed ba po nyid yin no //
T08TD4106.2E:140b-20: 'di la yan lag lngas dngos gzhi'i ltung bar 'gyur te /
T08TD4106.2E:140b-21: dge slong zas spangs pa nyid dang /
T08TD4106.2E:140b-22: lhag bor ma byas pa nyid dang /
T08TD4106.2E:140b-24: dus su rung ba'i zas dang stobs pa'o //
T08TD4106.2E:140b-25: de dag las yan lag ma tshang na ci rigs par na smad do //
T08TD4106.2E:140b-26: sbyor ba'i ltung ba ni nyes byas te /
T08TD4106.2E:140b-27: ji srid du spangs pa la stobs pa'i ltung byed kyi sbyor ba brtsams nas dngos gzhi la ma thug gi bar du nyes byas so //
