T08TD4106.2E:172b-21: gnas gzhan mthong ba'i spyod yul gyi mtha' tshun chad kyi bza' tha dad pa ma yin pa nyid la na smad pa med do //
T08TD4106.2E:173a-0: khyim pa'i skyes pa dang bud med nyal po byed @173a * //
T08TD4106.2E:173a-1: par shom pa'i gnas de dge slong de nyid kyi gnas yin la de na ltung ba med pas /
T08TD4106.2E:173a-2: dge slong de'i gnas las gzhan pa skyes pa dang bud med de gnyi ga'am gang yang rung ba cig gi gnas gzhan nyid yin na de la ltung ba'i dngos gzhir rnam par gzhag go //
T08TD4106.2E:173a-3: gal te gnas de dge slong gi yin la dge slong gis khyim pa la g-yar por byin zhing dge slong der 'dug pa la yang ltung ba'i dngos gzhir rnam par gzhag go //
T08TD4106.2E:173a-4: dgon pa la yang gal te khyim pa snga na 'dug pa yin la dge slong phyis 'ongs te 'dug pa la yang ltung ba'i dngos gzhir rnam par gzhag go //
T08TD4106.2E:173a-5: gnas de dge slong mngon sum du brang pas 'dug pa'i gnas kyi khongs kyang mthong ba'i spyod yul gyi mtha' phan chad ni gnas tha dad pa yin pas de la ltung ba med pas mthong ba'i spyod yul gyi mtha' tshun chad kyi gnas gcig tu brnag pas 'dug pa la ltung ba'i dngos gzhir rnam par gzhag go //
T08TD4106.2E:173a-6: mthong ba'i spyod yul gyi mtha' tshun chad kyi gnas de yang gal te khyim gzhan gyi sgo'i byang gtad khyams la sogs pas chod pa na dge slong 'dug pa'i gnas de'i bdag po dang sprod par byed pa gnyis bza' tha dad pa nyid yin na de la ltung ba med pas bza' tha dad pa ma yin pa nyid kyi gnas la ltung ba'i dngos gzhir rnam par gzhag go //
T08TD4106.2E:173a-7: mdzod ni khyams kyi bdag nyid kyi khang khyim dang gnas gcig pa nyid yin no //
T08TD4106.2E:173a-8: mi gzhan med pa nyid kyis sprad du rung ba nyid la na smad pa med de /
T08TD4106.2E:173a-9: gal te gnas de na dge slong de ma gtogs pa mi gzhan yod na de la ltung ba med pas gal te gnas de na dge slong ma gtogs pa mi gzhan med pa nyid kyis skyes pa dang bud med de gnyis 'khrig pa sprad du rung ba nyid yin la /
T08TD4106.2E:173a-10: de'i tshe dge slong de yang mngon sum du brnag pas der 'dug pa la ltung ba'i dngos gzhir rnam par gzhag go //
T08TD4106.2E:173a-11: 'khrig pa spyod pa la zhugs pa'am phyogs pa la na smad pa med do //
T08TD4106.2E:173a-12: skyes pa dang bud med de gnyis 'khrig pa sprod pa ma yin pa'i don gzhan la zhugs pa'i gnas der dge slong mngon sum du brnag pas 'dug pa la ltung ba med pas de gnyis mi tshangs par spyod pa gnyis kyis gnyis sprod pa nyid la dngos su zhugs pa'am sprad pa rtsom pa'i phyir phyogs pa'i gnas der dge slong mngon sum du brnag pas 'dug pa la ltung ba'i dngos gzhir rnam par gzhag go //
T08TD4106.2E:173b-0: skyes pa dang bud med de gnyis kyang 'khrig pa spyod pa la zhugs pa'am @173b phyogs pa nyid yin la /
T08TD4106.2E:173b-1: dge slong gis kyang der 'du shes pa dang /
T08TD4106.2E:173b-2: yid gnyis za ba la na smad pa med do //
T08TD4106.2E:173b-3: mngon sum du brnag pas 'dug pa la na smad pa med de /
T08TD4106.2E:173b-4: ma bsgribs par mngon sum du brnag pas rkub tshos bzhag ste 'dug pa la ltung ba'i dngos gzhir rnam par gzhag go //
T08TD4106.2E:173b-5: 'di'i byed pa po ni khyim pa'i skyes pa dang /
T08TD4106.2E:173b-6: bud med dge slong rang gi gnas las gzhan pa nyid dang /
T08TD4106.2E:173b-7: mig zhan med pa nyid kyis sprad du rung ba nyid ni 'khrig pa spyod pa la zhugs pa'am /
T08TD4106.2E:173b-8: phyogs pa la 'du shes gtso cher byed pa po nyid yin no //
T08TD4106.2E:173b-9: 'di la yan lag bdun gyis dngos gzhi'i ltung bar 'gyur te /
T08TD4106.2E:173b-10: dge slong 'jigs pa'i dbang dang gnas gzhan la sems gtod pa ma yin pa nyid dang /
T08TD4106.2E:173b-11: khyim pa'i skyes pa dang bud med nyid dang /
T08TD4106.2E:173b-12: gnas gzhan mthong ba'i spyod yul gyi mtha' tshun chad kyi bza' tha dad pa ma yin pa nyid dang /
T08TD4106.2E:173b-13: mi gzhan med pa nyid kyis sprad du rung ba nyid dang /
T08TD4106.2E:173b-14: 'khrig pa spyod pa la zhugs pa'am phyogs pa nyid dang /
T08TD4106.2E:173b-16: mngon sum du brnag pas 'dug pa'o //
T08TD4106.2E:173b-17: de dag las yan lag ma tshang na ci rigs par na smad do //
T08TD4106.2E:173b-18: sbyor ba'i ltung ba ni nyes byas te /
T08TD4106.2E:173b-19: ji srid du nyal po byed par shom pa'i khyim na 'dug pa'i ltung byed kyi sbyor ba brtsams nas dngos gzhi la ma thug gi bar du nyes byas so //
T08TD4106.2E:173b-20: dngos gzhi la sbyor ba tha dad pa ji snyed brtsams pa re re la nyes byas re re'o //
T08TD4106.2E:173b-21: dge slong der mngon sum du brnag pas 'dug pa'i lta ba dang nyan pa sprod par byed pa gnyis kyi gnas las gzhan ba'i gnas la sems gtod pa la nyes byas so //
T08TD4106.2E:173b-22: skyes pa dang bud med gnyi ga mu stegs can gyi dge sbyong ngam /
T08TD4106.2E:173b-23: sbyor zla gcig mu stegs can gyi dge sbyong ngam /
T08TD4106.2E:173b-24: gal te khyim pa nyid yin yang gnyi ga skyes pa'am /
T08TD4106.2E:173b-25: sbyor zla gcig pa za ma dang /
T08TD4106.2E:173b-27: mtshan gnyis pa yin na nyes byas so //
T08TD4106.2E:173b-28: khyim pa'i skyes ba dang bud med nyal po byed par shom pa'i gnas de dge slong dang /
T08TD4106.2E:173b-30: mu stegs can gyi dge sbyong ngam /
T08TD4106.2E:173b-32: za ma dang ma ning dang /
T08TD4106.2E:173b-34: thun mong ba nyid la nyes byas so //
T08TD4106.2E:173b-35: de gnyis 'khrig pa sprod pa la zhugs pa 'am phyogs pa nyid ma yin pa la der 'du shes pa dang /
T08TD4106.2E:173b-36: yid gnyis za ba la nyes byas so //
T08TD4106.2E:174a-0: dben par brnag pas 'dug pa la @174a * //
T08TD4106.2E:174a-2: sbyor ba'i sbyor ba'i ltung ba ni nyes byas phra mo ste /
T08TD4106.2E:174a-3: sbyor ba ji snyed pa la sbyor ba'i sbyor ba yang de snyed de /
T08TD4106.2E:174a-4: sbyor ba nyes byas kyi sbyor ba'i sbyor ba yang nyes byas te /
T08TD4106.2E:174a-6: ltung ba med pa ni dge slong gal te glang po che la sogs pas 'jigs pa'i dbang gis der 'dug pa la ltung ba med do //
T08TD4106.2E:174a-7: gnas de dge slong nyid kyi yin na ltung ba med do //
T08TD4106.2E:174a-8: gal te khyim pa'i gnas de khyim bdag gis dge slog la g-yar por byin zhing /
T08TD4106.2E:174a-9: de na dge slong 'dug pa yin na yang /
T08TD4106.2E:174a-10: de'i tshe ltung ba med do //
T08TD4106.2E:174a-11: dgon pa la yang gal te dge slong snga na gnas pa yin na /
T08TD4106.2E:174a-12: de la yang ltung ba med do //
T08TD4106.2E:174a-13: mthong ba'i spyod yul gyi mtha' phan chad kyi gnas la ltung ba med do //
T08TD4106.2E:174a-14: bza' tha dad pa'i gnas la ltung ba med do //
T08TD4106.2E:174a-15: mi gzhan yod na ltung ba med do //
T08TD4106.2E:174a-16: 'khrig pa sprod pa ma yin pa'i don la ltung ba med do //
T08TD4106.2E:174a-17: der 'du shes pa med pa la ltung ba med do //
T08TD4106.2E:174a-21: tshor ba dag gis nyen pa la ltung ba med do //
T08TD4106.2E:174a-22: bslab par bya ba ni dge slong gis yul thams cad la gnas skabs thams cad du nyal po byed par shom pa'i khyim na 'dug pa'i ltung byed du 'gyur ba rnam pa thams cad mi bsten par bslab par bya'o //
T08TD4106.2E:174a-23: 'dod chags kyi kun du spyod pa spang bar bya'o //
T08TD4106.2E:174a-24: phyir bcos pa ni snga ma bzhin no //
T08TD4106.2E:174a-25: nyal po byed par shom pa'i khyim na 'dug pa'i ltung byed de bzhi bcu gnyis pa bshad zin to /
T08TD4106.2E:174a-27: // / nyal po byed par shom pa'i khyim na 'greng ba'i ltung byed kyi gleng gzhi ni /
T08TD4106.2E:174a-28: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so //
T08TD4106.2E:174a-29: tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas bsam pa'i nor bu'i rig pa shes te /
T08TD4106.2E:174a-30: de snga dro sham thabs bgos /
T08TD4106.2E:174a-31: lhung bzed dang chos gos thogs te /
T08TD4106.2E:174a-32: mnyan yod du bsod snyoms la zhugs so //
T08TD4106.2E:174a-33: mnyan yod na spos 'tshong gi khye'u chung ma blangs nas ring po ma lon pa zhig 'dug ste /
T08TD4106.2E:174a-35: bdag chung ma dang lhan cig dga' dgur spyod du 'gro'o snyam pa'i tshul bzhin ma yin pa yid la byed pa skyes nas /
T08TD4106.2E:174a-36: des zong phyir bsdu bar brtsams pa dang /
T08TD4106.2E:174a-37: tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas de'i bsam pa shes nas /
T08TD4106.2E:174a-38: bdag song la lta'o snyam nas /
T08TD4106.2E:174a-39: de dang por de'i khyim du song ste /
T08TD4106.2E:174b-0: sgo glegs kyi rgyab na mgo sri @174b zhing 'greng ngo //
T08TD4106.2E:174b-1: de'i 'og tu spos 'tshong gi khye'u de 'ongs nas /
T08TD4106.2E:174b-3: gnas khang du zhugs pa dang /
T08TD4106.2E:174b-4: bu mo des 'char ka dben pa na 'greng ba mthong nas /
T08TD4106.2E:174b-6: rje'i sras 'phags pa 'char ka sgo glegs kyi rgyab na 'greng ngo //
T08TD4106.2E:174b-8: 'phags pa 'char ka gtsug lag khang na bsam gtan dang /
T08TD4106.2E:174b-10: ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par 'jug pa'i bde ba dag nyams su myong zhing 'greng ngo zhes des chung ma la dga' mgur spyad nas /
T08TD4106.2E:174b-11: gang gi tshe kun nas dkris pa dang bral bar gyur pa de'i tshe na /
T08TD4106.2E:174b-13: des sh'akya'i bu'i dge sbyong rnams kyi /
T08TD4106.2E:174b-14: dge sbyong gi tshul ni tshig go //
T08TD4106.2E:174b-15: bram ze'i tshul ni tshig ste /
T08TD4106.2E:174b-16: 'di ltar rang gi chung ma la yang dbang med do zhes smod par byed /
T08TD4106.2E:174b-19: dge slong don nyung du dag ci'i phyir dge slong dag shes bzhin du nyal po byed par shom pa'i khyim du dben pa skyabs yod par 'greng bar byed ces smod par byed /
T08TD4106.2E:174b-21: kha zer bar byed pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol to //
T08TD4106.2E:174b-22: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byung ba 'di dang /
T08TD4106.2E:174b-24: skabs 'di la dge slong gi dge 'dun bsdu ba mdzad de /
T08TD4106.2E:174b-26: dge sbyong gi tshul ma yin pa /
T08TD4106.2E:174b-27: rjes su mthun pa ma yin pa /
T08TD4106.2E:174b-29: tshul dang mthun pa ma yin pa /
T08TD4106.2E:174b-30: de ni rab tu byung bas bya ba ma yin no zhes rnam grangs du mar rnam par smad de /
T08TD4106.2E:174b-31: bslab pa bca' ba'i phan yon bcu yang dag par gzigs pas nga'i nyan thos rnams kyis 'dul ba la bslab pa'i gzhi 'di ltar gdon par bya ste /
T08TD4106.2E:174b-32: yang dge slong gang shes bzhin du nyal po byed par shom pa'i khyim du dben pa skyabs yod par 'greng na ltung byed do zhes bca' ba mdzad de /
T08TD4106.2E:174b-34: gang zag ni 'char ka / nyon mongs pa ni 'dod chags kyi kun tu sbyor ba /
T08TD4106.2E:174b-35: nyes pa ni shes bzhin du nyal po byed par shom pa'i khyim du dben pa skyabs yod par 'greng ba'o //
T08TD4106.2E:174b-36: de ba yang dge slong gang zhes bya ba ni 'char ka'am gzhan yang de lta bu gang yin pa'o //
T08TD4106.2E:174b-37: shes bzhin du zhes bya ba ni de rang nyid kyis rig par gyur pa'am /
T08TD4106.2E:174b-38: gzhan dag gis brjod pas so //
T08TD4106.2E:175a-0: nyal po byed par shom pa'i zhes bya ba ni bud med ni skyes pa'i nyal po bya ba @175a * //
T08TD4106.2E:175a-2: skyes pa ni bud med kyi nyal po byed pa yin no //
T08TD4106.2E:175a-3: khyim du zhes bya ba ni bram ze dang khyim bdag gi khyim du'o //
T08TD4106.2E:175a-4: dben pa zhes bya ba ni gang na bud med dang skyes pa dang ma ning gzhan 'ga' yang med pa'o //
T08TD4106.2E:175a-5: skyabs yod par zhes bya ba ni lngas bskyabs pa ste /
T08TD4106.2E:175a-11: 'greng na zhes bya ba ni 'dom gang gi nang du 'greng na'o //
T08TD4106.2E:175a-12: ltung byed do zhes bya ba ni snga ma bzhin no //
T08TD4106.2E:175a-13: sngar nyal po byed par shom pa'i khyim na 'dug pa'i ltung byed bstan pa dang /
T08TD4106.2E:175a-14: 'dir nyal po byed par shom pa'i khyim na 'greng ba'i ltung byed bstan pa de gnyis kyi spyi'i mtshan nyid ni 'dra'o //
T08TD4106.2E:175a-15: bye brag tu na snga ma ni mngon sum du brnag pas 'dug pa'i yul la rnam par gzhag go //
T08TD4106.2E:175a-16: 'di ni dben pa skyabs yod par brnag pas 'greng ba'i yul la rnam par gzhag go //
T08TD4106.2E:175a-17: de la ltung ba ji ltar 'gyur zhe na /
T08TD4106.2E:175a-20: sbyor ba'i sbyor bas ltung ba rnam par gzhag pa dang /
T08TD4106.2E:175a-23: phyir bcos pa rnams kyis 'di'i mtshan nyid shes par bya ste //
T08TD4106.2E:175a-24: de la 'dir dngos gzhi'i ltung ba rnam par gzhag pa ni dge slong 'jigs pa'i dbang dang gnas gzhan la sems gtod pa ma yin pas khyim pa'i skyes pa dang bud med gnas gzhan mthong ba'i spyod yul gyi mtha' tshun chad kyi bza' tha dad pa ma yin pa nyid dang /
T08TD4106.2E:175a-25: mi gzhan med pa nyid kyis sprad du rung ba nyid na 'khrig pa sprod pa la zhugs pa'am phyogs par shes bzhin du dben pa skyabs yod par brnag pas 'greng zhing sprod par byed pa tshor bya gnyis dang /
T08TD4106.2E:175a-26: ltung ba 'byin pa tshor byed nyid kyis sor na nyal po byed par shom pa'i khyim na 'greng ba'i ltung byed kyi dngos gzhir 'gyur ro //
T08TD4106.2E:175a-28: gnas gzhan la sems gtod pa ma yin pa la na smad pa med do //
T08TD4106.2E:175a-29: dge slong gal te glang po che la sogs pas 'jigs pa'i dbang gis der dben pa skyabs yod par brnag pas 'greng ba la ltung ba med la /
T08TD4106.2E:175a-30: der dben pa skyabs yod par brnag pas 'greng ba'i dge slong gis lta ba dang /
T08TD4106.2E:175b-0: nyan pa sprod par byed pa gnyis kyi gnas las gzhan pa'i @175b gnas la sems gtod pa ni nyes byas kyi byed pa po nyid yin pas de gnyis la ltung ba'i dngos gzhir rnam par mi gzhag pas dge slong 'jigs pa'i dbang dang gnas gzhan la sems gtod pa ma yin pa la ltung ba 'di rnam par gzhag go //
T08TD4106.2E:175b-1: khyim ba'i skyes pa dang bud med la na smad pa med do //
T08TD4106.2E:175b-2: gal te gnyi ga'am sbyor zla gcig mu stegs can gyi dge sbyong la sogs pa khyim pa nyid ma yin na de'i tshe nyes byas kyi byed pa po nyid yin la /
T08TD4106.2E:175b-3: gal te khyim pa nyid yin yang gnyi ga skyes pa'am sbyor zla gcig za ma dang ma ning dang mtshan gnyis pa yin na yang de'i tshe nyes byas kyi byed pa po nyid yin pas de la ltung ba'i dngos gzhir rnam par mi gzhag pas khyim pa'i skyes pa dang bud med nyid la ltung ba 'di rnam par gzhag go //
T08TD4106.2E:175b-4: gnas gzhan mthong ba'i spyod yul gyi mtha' tshun chad kyi bza' tha dad pa ma yin pa nyid la na smad pa med do //
T08TD4106.2E:175b-5: khyim pa'i skyes pa dang bud med nyal po byed par shom pa'i gnas de dge slong de nyid kyi gnas yin na de la ltung ba med pas dge slong de'i gnas las gzhan pa skyes pa dang bud med de gnyi ga'am gang yang rung ba cig gnas gzhan nyid yin na de la ltung ba'i dngos gzhir rnam par gzhag go //
T08TD4106.2E:175b-6: gal te gnas de dge slong gi yin la /
T08TD4106.2E:175b-7: dge slong gis khyim pa la g-yar por byin zhing dge slong der 'dug pa la ltung ba'i dngos gzhir rnam par gzhag go //
T08TD4106.2E:175b-8: dgon pa la yang khyim pa snga na 'dug pa yin la dge slong phyis 'ongs te 'dug pa la yang ltung ba'i dngos gzhir rnam par gzhag go //
T08TD4106.2E:175b-9: gnas de dge slong dben pa skyabs yod par brnag pas 'greng ba'i gnas kyi khongs kyang mthong ba'i spyod yul gyi mtha' phan chad ni gnas tha dad pa yin pas de la ltung ba med pas mthong ba'i spyod yul gyi mtha' tshun chad kyi gnas gcig tu brnag pas 'greng ba la ltung ba'i dngos gzhir rnam par gzhag go //
T08TD4106.2E:175b-10: mthong ba'i spyod yul gyi mtha' tshun chad kyi gnas de yang gal te khyim gzhan gyi sgo'i byang gtad khyams la sogs pas ma chod pa na dge slong 'greng ba'i gnas de'i bdag po dang sprod par byed pa gnyis bza' tha dad pa nyid yin na de la ltung ba med pas bza' tha dad pa ma yin pa nyid kyi gnas la ltung ba'i dngos gzhir rnam par gzhag go //
T08TD4106.2E:176a-0: mdzod ni khyams kyi bdag nyid kyi khang @176a * //
T08TD4106.2E:176a-1: khyim dang gnas gcig pa nyid yin no //
T08TD4106.2E:176a-2: mi gzhan med pa nyid kyis sprad du rung ba nyid la na smad pa med do //
T08TD4106.2E:176a-3: gal te gnas de na dge slong de ma gtogs par mi gzhan yod na de la ltung ba med pas /
T08TD4106.2E:176a-4: gal te gnas de na dge slong de ma gtogs pa mi gzhan med pa nyid kyis skyes pa dang bud med de gnyis 'khrig pa sprad du rung ba nyid yin la /
T08TD4106.2E:176a-5: de'i tshe dge slong de yang dben pa skyabs yod par brnag pas der 'greng ba la ltung ba'i dngos gzhir rnam par gzhag go //
T08TD4106.2E:176a-6: 'khrig pa sprod pa la zhugs pa'am phyogs pa la na smad pa med de /
T08TD4106.2E:176a-7: skyes pa dang bud med de gnyis 'khrig pa sprod pa ma yin pa'i don gzhan la zhugs pa'i gnas der dge slong dben pa skyabs yod par brnag pas 'greng ba la ltung ba med pas /
T08TD4106.2E:176a-8: de gnyis mi tshangs par spyod pa gnyis kyis gnyis sprod pa nyid la dngos su zhugs pa'am sprad pa rtsom pa'i phyir phyogs pa'i gnas der dge slong dben pa skyabs yod par brnag pas 'greng ba la ltung ba'i dngos gzhir rnam par gzhag go //
T08TD4106.2E:176a-9: skyes pa dang bud med de gnyis kyang 'khrig pa sprod pa la zhugs pa'am phyogs pa nyid yin la dge slong gis kyang der 'du shes pa dang yid gnyis za ba la na smad pa med do //
T08TD4106.2E:176a-10: dben pa skyabs yod par brnag pas 'greng ba la na smad pa med de /
T08TD4106.2E:176a-15: mtshan mos bskyabs par brnag pas 'greng ba la ltung ba'i dngos gzhir rnam par gzhag go //
T08TD4106.2E:176a-16: sprod pa byed pa tshor bya gnyis dang ltung ba 'byin pa tshor byed nyid kyis tshor ba la na smad pa med do //
T08TD4106.2E:176a-17: 'di'i byed pa po ni khyim pa'i skyes pa dang bud med dge slong rang gi gnas las gzhan pa nyid dang /
T08TD4106.2E:176a-18: mi gzhan med pa nyid kyis sprad du rung ba nyid na 'khrig pa spyod pa la zhugs pa'am phyogs pa la 'du shes gtso cher byed pa po nyid yin no //
T08TD4106.2E:176a-19: 'di la yan lag brgyad kyis dngos gzhi'i ltung bar 'gyur te /
T08TD4106.2E:176a-20: dge slong 'jigs pa'i dbang dang gnas gzhan la sems gtod pa ma yin pa nyid dang /
T08TD4106.2E:176a-23: gnas gzhan mthong ba'i spyod yul gyi mtha' tshun chad kyi bza' tha dad pa ma yin pa nyid dang /
T08TD4106.2E:176b-0: mi gzhan med pa nyid kyis sprad du rung ba @176b nyid dang /
T08TD4106.2E:176b-1: 'khrig pa spyod pa la zhugs pa'am /
T08TD4106.2E:176b-4: dben pa skyabs yod par brnag pas 'greng ba nyid dang /
T08TD4106.2E:176b-5: sprod par byed pa tshor bya gnyis dang /
T08TD4106.2E:176b-6: ltung ba 'byin pa po tshor byed nyid kyis tshor ba'o //
T08TD4106.2E:176b-7: de dag las yan lag ma tshang na ci rigs par na smad do //
T08TD4106.2E:176b-8: sbyor ba'i ltung ba ni nyes byas te /
T08TD4106.2E:176b-9: ji srid du nyal po byed par shom pa'i khyim na 'greng ba'i ltung byed kyi sbyor ba brtsams nas dngos gzhi la ma thug gi bar du nyes byas so //
T08TD4106.2E:176b-10: dngos gzhi la sbyor ba tha dad pa ji snyed brtsams pa re re la nyes byas re re'o //
T08TD4106.2E:176b-11: dge slong de dben pa skyabs yod par brnag pas 'greng ba'i lta ba dang nyan pa dang nyan pa sprod par byed pa gnyis las gzhan pa'i gnas la sems gtod pa la nyes byas so //
T08TD4106.2E:176b-12: skyes pa dang bud med gnyis su mu stegs can gyi dge sbyong ngam /
T08TD4106.2E:176b-13: sbyor zla gcig mu stegs can gyi dge sbyong ngam /
T08TD4106.2E:176b-14: gal te khyim pa nyid yin yang gnyi ga skyes pa'am /
T08TD4106.2E:176b-15: sbyor zla gcig za ma dang ma ning dang mtshan gnyis pa yin na nyes byas so //
T08TD4106.2E:176b-16: khyim pa'i skyes pa dang bud med nyal po byed par shom pa'i gnas de dge slong dang khyim pa'i thun mong ngam /
T08TD4106.2E:176b-17: mu stegs can gyi dge sbyong dang /
T08TD4106.2E:176b-19: za ma dang ma ning dang mtshan gnyis pa dag dang thun mong nyid la nyes byas so //
T08TD4106.2E:176b-20: de gnyis 'khrig pa spyod pa la zhugs pa'am phyogs pa nyid ma yin pa la der 'du shes pa dang yid gnyis za ba la nyes byas so //
T08TD4106.2E:176b-21: sprod par byed pa tshor bya gnyis dang /
T08TD4106.2E:176b-22: ltung ba 'byin pa tshor byed nyid kyis ma tshor ba la nyes byas so //
T08TD4106.2E:176b-23: mngon sum du brnag pas 'greng ba la nyes byas so //
T08TD4106.2E:176b-24: sbyor ba'i sbyor ba'i ltung ba ni nyes byas phra mo ste /
T08TD4106.2E:176b-25: sbyor ba ji snyed pa la sbyor ba'i sbyor ba yang de snyed de /
T08TD4106.2E:176b-26: sbyor ba nyes byas kyi sbyor ba'i sbyor ba yang nyes byas te nyes byas phra mo'o //
T08TD4106.2E:176b-27: ltung ba med pa ni dge slong gal te glang po che la sogs pas 'jigs pa'i dbang gis der 'greng ba la ltung ba med do //
T08TD4106.2E:176b-28: gnas de dge slong nyid kyi yin na ltung ba med do //
T08TD4106.2E:176b-29: gal te khyim pa'i gnas de khyim bdag gis dge slong la g-yar por byin zhing de na dge slong 'dug pa yin na yang de'i tshe na ltung ba med do //
T08TD4106.2E:176b-30: dgon pa la yang gal te dge slong snga na gnas pa yin na de la yang ltung ba med do //
T08TD4106.2E:177a-0: mthong ba'i spyod yul gyi mtha' @177a * //
T08TD4106.2E:177a-1: phan chad kyi gnas la ltung ba med do //
T08TD4106.2E:177a-2: bzang tha dad pa'i gnas la ltung ba med do //
T08TD4106.2E:177a-3: mi gzhan yod na ltung ba med do /
T08TD4106.2E:177a-4: 'khrig pa sprod pa ma yin pa'i don la ltung ba med do //
T08TD4106.2E:177a-5: der 'du shes pa med pa la ltung ba med do //
T08TD4106.2E:177a-9: tshor ba dag gis nyen pa la ltung ba med do //
T08TD4106.2E:177a-10: bslab par bya ba ni dge slong gis yul thams cad la gnas skabs thams cad du nyal po byed par shom pa'i khyim na 'greng ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ba rnam pa thams cad mi bsten par bslab par bya'o //
T08TD4106.2E:177a-11: 'dod chags kyis kun tu spyod pa spang bar bya'o //
T08TD4106.2E:177a-12: phyir bcos pa ni snga ma bzhin no //
T08TD4106.2E:177a-13: nyal po byed par shom pa'i khyim na 'greng ba'i ltung byed de bzhi bcu gsum pa bshad zin to /
T08TD4106.2E:177a-15: // / gcer bu pa la sbyin pa'i ltung byed kyi gleng gzhi ni byung ba dang bcas pa'i dbang gis rnam pa gnyis te /
T08TD4106.2E:177a-16: byung ba'i gleng gzhi ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na 'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan da ka'i gnas na bzhugs so //
T08TD4106.2E:177a-17: de nas rgyal po'i khab pa'i tshong pa rab tu mang po dag bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te mtha' gcig tu 'khod do //
T08TD4106.2E:177a-18: mtha' gcig tu 'khod nas bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab pa'i tshong pa rab tu mang po dag la chos dang ldan pa'i bka' mchid kyis yang dag par ston par mdzad /
T08TD4106.2E:177a-19: yang dag par rab tu 'dzin du 'jug par mdzad /
T08TD4106.2E:177a-20: yang dag par gzengs stod par mdzad /
T08TD4106.2E:177a-21: yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad do //
T08TD4106.2E:177a-22: rnam grangs du mar chos dang ldan pa'i bka' mchid kyis yang dag par bstan /
T08TD4106.2E:177a-23: yang dag par 'dzin du bcug / yang dag par gzengs bstod /
T08TD4106.2E:177a-24: yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad nas cad mi gsung ngo //
T08TD4106.2E:177a-25: de nas rgyal po'i khab pa'i tshong pa rab tu mang po de dag tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo gal ba der song ste smras pa /
T08TD4106.2E:177a-26: btsun pa kun dga' bo bcom ldan 'das dbyar gnas par zhal gyis bzhes nas gang du gshegs par 'gyur /
T08TD4106.2E:177b-0: shes ldan dag sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus shig / bcun pa kun dga' bo sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ni bsnyen par dka' ba bzod par dka' ba lags pas bdag cag gis @177b sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhu ba'i rngo mi thogs so //
T08TD4106.2E:177b-1: btsun pa kun dga' bos mtshan ma'am bka' mchid kyis bcom ldan 'das dbyar gnas par zhal gyis bzhes nas phyogs gang du gshegs pa ji ltar mkhyen shes ldan dag / bcom ldan 'das dbyar gnas par zhal gyis bzhes nas phyogs gang du gshegs par bzhed pa'i phyogs de logs su zhal gzigs shing bzhugs la /
T08TD4106.2E:177b-2: de dag gi bsngags pa yang brjod par mdzad de /
T08TD4106.2E:177b-3: da ltar bcom ldan 'das kos lar zhal gzigs shing bzhugs la /
T08TD4106.2E:177b-4: mnyan yod du yod pa'i mi dag gis bsngags pa yang brjod par mdzad do //
T08TD4106.2E:177b-5: de nas tshod pa de dag gi tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la phyag 'tshal te dong nas mnyan yod du 'dong ba'i zong sta gon du byas so //
T08TD4106.2E:177b-6: de nas bcom 'das dbyar gnas par zhal gyis bzhes te dbyar zla gsum po dag 'das nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa /
T08TD4106.2E:177b-7: kun dga' bo song la dge slong dag la de bzhin gshegs pa ko sa la dag tu ljongs rgyur gshegs na khyed las gang de bzhin gshegs pa dang thabs cig ko sa la dag tu ljongs rgyur 'gro bar spro ba des chos gos kyi las gyis shig ces bsgo shig / tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos dge slong rnams la de skad bsgo ba rgyal po'i khab pa'i tshong pa de dag gis thos nas de dag bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas gsal pa /
T08TD4106.2E:177b-8: bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang bcas pas rgyal po'i khab nas mnyan yod kyi bar ji tsam bar bdag cag las na bza' dang bsod snyoms dang gnas mal dang bsnyung ba'i rkyen dang sman gyi yo byad dag bzhed par ci gnang /
T08TD4106.2E:177b-9: bcom ldan 'das kyis de dag la cang mi gsung bas gnang ngo //
T08TD4106.2E:177b-10: de nas rgyal po'i khab pa'i tshong pa rab tu mang po de dag gis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la de bzhin gshegs pa'i dgongs mal ci tsam pa dris nas 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po'i dgongs mal bzhin du rgyang grags bcur gshegs pa thos nas /
T08TD4106.2E:178a-0: de dag gis rgyang grags bcu bcur bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang bcas pa'i tshogs dag bshams nas bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang bcas pa @178a * //
T08TD4106.2E:178a-1: mnyan yod ga la ba de logs su ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs so //
T08TD4106.2E:178a-2: tshong pa de dag dang mu stegs gcer bu pa zhig dang lhan cig 'gro ba de phongs pa'i dus la bab cing bkres pas nyam thag par gyur nas /
T08TD4106.2E:178a-3: de dge slong rnams kyi gan du song ste smras pa /
T08TD4106.2E:178a-4: khyed cag gi ston pa ni bzang po la mos pa yin te /
T08TD4106.2E:178a-5: de gser gyi thong gshol gyis zhing rmos pa des khyed cag la zas ro brgya pa dang /
T08TD4106.2E:178a-7: khang pa brtsegs pa lnga brgya pa yang rjes su gnang bas khyed cag re zhig tshe 'di nyid la yang bde ba la reg par gnas la /
T08TD4106.2E:178a-8: tshe 'di nas shi 'phos pa rnams kyang lha rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur ro //
T08TD4106.2E:178a-9: kho bo cag gi ston pa ni ngan pa la mos pa yin te /
T08TD4106.2E:178a-10: de til gyi tshigs ma'i gshol gyis zhing rmo bas des kho bo cag la gcer bu dang sgre byi dang sprong zan dang /
T08TD4106.2E:178a-11: yul rgyu ba dang sa la nyal ba las gzhan rjes su ma gnang bas kho bo cag ni re zhig tshe 'di nyid la yang sdug bsngal la reg par gnas shing /
T08TD4106.2E:178a-12: 'di nas shi 'phos pa rnams kyang sems can dmyal ba rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'gyur ro //
T08TD4106.2E:178a-13: dge slong rnams kyis bsams pa /
T08TD4106.2E:178a-14: gcer bu pa shes pa can 'di dad par gyur to snyam nas de dag gis de la smras pa /
T08TD4106.2E:178a-15: shes pa can ji ltar 'tsho dka' bas so //
T08TD4106.2E:178a-16: dge slong rnams kyi lhung bzed kyi lhag ma 'dod dam /
T08TD4106.2E:178a-18: gal te dge slong rnams kyi lhung bzed kyi lhag ma ma zos na ltogs te 'chi bar 'gyur ro snyam nas des smras pa /
T08TD4106.2E:178a-20: dge slong rnams kyis smras pa /
T08TD4106.2E:178a-21: shes pa can dge slong dag zan za ba'i mig lam du 'dug cig dang /
T08TD4106.2E:178a-22: khyod la lhung bzed kyi lhag ma sbyin par 'gyur ro //
T08TD4106.2E:178a-23: de der 'dug pa dang dge slong rnams kyis de la lhung bzed kyi lhag ma byin nas de'i slong phor khur bas byur bur byas so //
T08TD4106.2E:178a-24: de slong phor khur bas byur bur byas pa thogs te /
T08TD4106.2E:178a-25: phyir byung ba de ded dpon gyis mthong nas smras pa /
T08TD4106.2E:178a-26: gcer bu pa khyod la khur ba sus byin des smras pa /
T08TD4106.2E:178a-27: khyod kyi yon gnas ni dge slong de dag yin la /
T08TD4106.2E:178a-28: de dag gi yon gnas ni kho bo yin la /
T08TD4106.2E:178a-29: kho bo la de dag gis phul lo /
T08TD4106.2E:178a-30: ded dpon gyis spyos te btang ba dang /
T08TD4106.2E:178b-0: lam de nas 'gron pa don mthun tshur 'ong ba dag cig gi zla la gcer bu pa zhig 'ong ba des de @178b mthong nas smras pa /
T08TD4106.2E:178b-1: shes pa can nyod pa nyod dam /
T08TD4106.2E:178b-4: khyim bdag sgre byi 'di dag kho bo la stobs par byed do //
T08TD4106.2E:178b-6: gcer bu pa khyod ni byas pa mi shes pa yin te /
T08TD4106.2E:178b-7: 'di dag khyod kyi khyim bdag sgre byi dag yin nam /
T08TD4106.2E:178b-8: de dag las ni lnga brgya pa'i tshogs dag yongs su mya ngan las 'das par snang gi khyod kyis shes pa can ni gcig 'ga' yang yongs su mya ngan las 'das par mthong ngam zhes spyos te tshigs su bcad pa dag smras pa /
T08TD4106.2E:178b-9: ngan pa ci'i phyir sa la 'bying mi byed //
T08TD4106.2E:178b-10: ci'i phyir lce yang tshal pa brgyar mi 'gas //
T08TD4106.2E:178b-11: khyod kyi lus la ci phyir gsang ba dag / rdo rje'i ser ba mdung thung mda' mi 'phen //
T08TD4106.2E:178b-12: ji ltar seng ge'i ltag ma za ba'i wa //
T08TD4106.2E:178b-13: seng ge nyid la gsod pa 'dod pa ltar //
T08TD4106.2E:178b-14: de bzhin khyod kyang stobs bcu'i khyor zas za //
T08TD4106.2E:178b-15: stobs bcu nyid la smod byed ma 'phags pa //
T08TD4106.2E:178b-16: gang du gang la nyes par bsten byas na //
T08TD4106.2E:178b-18: de ni nges par mdza' bshes dgra rnams la //
T08TD4106.2E:178b-19: mnyam mdzad blo ldan thams cad mkhyen pa yin //
T08TD4106.2E:178b-20: mi rnams gang dag byas pa mi shes pa //
T08TD4106.2E:178b-21: de dag khyim pas shin tu ngan par bsam //
T08TD4106.2E:178b-22: khyi yang mi la byas pa shes snang na //
T08TD4106.2E:178b-23: sprul 'dra'i mi dag dug ni gtong bar byed /
T08TD4106.2E:178b-24: 'di ni re zhig byung ba yin te /
T08TD4106.2E:178b-25: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das re zhig 'dul ba la nyan thos rnams kyi bslab pa'i gzhi 'cha' bar ni mi mdzad do //
T08TD4106.2E:178b-26: bcas pa'i gleng gzhi ni bcom ldan 'das ko sa la dag tu ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs pa na mnyan yod du byon to //
T08TD4106.2E:178b-27: mnyan yod na skyed mos tshal zhig na yugs sa mo lnga brgya tsam dog pa 'khal zhing 'khod pa de dag gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis gzugs brgyan cing gsal ba la sogs pa mthong ngo //
T08TD4106.2E:178b-28: mthong nas kyang 'di lta ste dge ba'i rtsa ba bsags pa'i rgyu las byung ba'i sems can gyis dang por sangs rgyas mthong ba na sems nyams bde ba skyed par byed pa de ltar ni lo bcu gnyis su zhi gnas kyi sems go mas par byas pa dang /
T08TD4106.2E:178b-29: dbul pos gter mthong ba dang /
T08TD4106.2E:178b-30: bud med bu thob pa dang /
T08TD4106.2E:179a-0: rgyal srid la mngon par dga' ba rgyal srid la dbang bskur ba yang sems nyams bde ba @179a * //
T08TD4106.2E:179a-2: de dag bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te mtha' gcig tu 'khod do //
T08TD4106.2E:179a-3: mtha' gcig tu 'khod nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de dag gi bsam pa dang /
T08TD4106.2E:179a-5: khams dang rang bzhin thugs su chud nas ci nas kyang de dag gis 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i ri'i rtse mo nyi shu mtho ba ye shes kyi rdo rjes bcom ste rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du byas par gyur pa de ltar chos bstan pa mdzad pas de dag gis rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob po //
T08TD4106.2E:179a-6: de dag gis bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang bcas pa sang bdag gi gdugs tshod gsol bar ci gnang zhes spyan drangs nas gnang ba dang /
T08TD4106.2E:179a-7: k'ara sh'a pa na dag khyer te tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo'i gan du song nas smras pa /
T08TD4106.2E:179a-8: btsun pa kun dga' bo bdag cag la snod spyad dang mi blas dang gnas mal gyi 'byor pa ma mchis kyi /
T08TD4106.2E:179a-9: khyed kyis k'ara sh'a pa na 'di dag gis zhal zas sta gon bgyid du gsol cig dang /
T08TD4106.2E:179a-10: bdag cag mchis te brim par bgyi'o //
T08TD4106.2E:179a-11: tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin la khyim bdag khyod kyis 'di dag dang bdag nyid kyis k'ara sh'a pa na gzhan dag bsres te zhal zas bsod pa sta gon gyis la 'dir skur cig ces smras so //
T08TD4106.2E:179a-12: des de ltar byas nas rgyal byed kyi tshal du bskur ro //
T08TD4106.2E:179a-13: tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos rigs kyi bu mo de dag la zhal zas lta gon byas kyi tshur gshegs la sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun la brims shig ces spring ba dang /
T08TD4106.2E:179a-14: de dag lhags te smras pa /
T08TD4106.2E:179a-15: btsun pa kun dga' bo khyod bdag cag gi dge ba'i bshes gnyen lags kyi tshur spyon khyed kyis kyang brim du gsol /
T08TD4106.2E:179a-16: tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos brims par brtsams pa dang der gcer bu ma rgan gzhon gnyis shig 'ongs te de gnyis kyis khyim bdag mo de dag la zas bslangs pa na de dag gis smras pa /
T08TD4106.2E:179a-17: zas 'di ni rgyal bu 'di'i yin no //
T08TD4106.2E:179a-18: gcer bu ma de gnyis kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bslangs pa dang /
T08TD4106.2E:179a-19: tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos ma bsams par brims pa na rgan mo la ni khur ba gcig byin /
T08TD4106.2E:179b-0: gzhon nu ma la ni khur ba gnyis byin @179b nas /
T08TD4106.2E:179b-2: gzhon nu ma khyod rgyal bu 'dis khyod don du gnyer gyi sta gon gyis shig ces zer nas dge slong don nyung du dag ci'i phyir dge slong dag gcer bu pa dang /
T08TD4106.2E:179b-3: gcer bu ma kun du rgyu dang /
T08TD4106.2E:179b-4: kun du rgyu mo la rang gi lag nas bca' ba dang bza' ba sbyor bar byed ces smod par byed /
T08TD4106.2E:179b-6: kha zer bar byed pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol to //
T08TD4106.2E:179b-7: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byung ba'i 'di dang /
T08TD4106.2E:179b-9: skabs 'di la dge slong gi dge 'dun bsdu ba mdzad de /
T08TD4106.2E:179b-10: tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la rmas nas /
T08TD4106.2E:179b-13: ma brtags par spyod pa rnam par smad de /
T08TD4106.2E:179b-16: brtags te spyod pa'i bsngags pa brjod nas bslab pa bca' ba'i phan yon bcu yang dag par gzigs pas nga'i nyan thos rnams kyis 'dul ba la bslab pa'i gzhi 'di ltar gdon par bya ste /
T08TD4106.2E:179b-17: yang dge slong gang gcer bu pa'am /
T08TD4106.2E:179b-18: gcer bu ma kun du rgyu'am /
T08TD4106.2E:179b-19: kun du rgyu mo la rang gi lag nas bca' ba dang bza' ba sbyin na ltung byed do zhes bca' ba mdzad de /
T08TD4106.2E:179b-21: gang zag ni tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo /
T08TD4106.2E:179b-22: nyon mongs pa ni ma brtags par spyod pa /
T08TD4106.2E:179b-23: nyes pa ni gcer bu pa la rang gi lag nas zas sbyin pa'o //
T08TD4106.2E:179b-24: de la yang dge slong gang zhes bya ba ni chos 'di pa'o //
T08TD4106.2E:179b-25: gcer bu pa'am gcer bu ma kun du rgyu'am kun du rgyu mo la zhes bya ba ni rtags 'di pa dang rab tu byung ba 'di med pa la bya'o //
T08TD4106.2E:179b-26: rang gi lag nas zhes bya ba ni lag pas lag par ro //
T08TD4106.2E:179b-27: bca' ba dang bza' ba zhes bya ba ni bca' ba lnga po dang bza' ba lnga po dag go //
T08TD4106.2E:179b-28: sbyin na zhes bya ba ni bsam mi dgos par ro //
T08TD4106.2E:179b-29: ltung byed do zhes bya ba ni snga ma bzhin no //
T08TD4106.2E:179b-30: de la ltung ba ji ltar 'gyur zhe na /
T08TD4106.2E:179b-31: 'dir yang dngos gzhi dang sbyor ba dang /
T08TD4106.2E:179b-32: sbyor ba'i sbyor bas ltung ba rnam par gzhag pa dang /
T08TD4106.2E:179b-35: phyir bcos pa rnams kyis 'di'i mtshan nyid shes par bya'o //
T08TD4106.2E:179b-36: de la 'dir dngos gzhi'i ltung ba rnam par gzhag pa ni dge slong gis gzhan mu stegs can gyi rab tu byung ba gcer bu pa pho yang rung mo yang rung ba rtags 'di dang /
T08TD4106.2E:180a-0: rab tu byung ba 'di med par nye du dang @180a * //
T08TD4106.2E:180a-1: rab tu byung ba la ltos pa dang nad pa dang /
T08TD4106.2E:180a-2: sdig pa can gyi lta ba'i rnam pa dang 'bral ba nyid ma gtogs pa la rang gi lag nas bca' ba dang /
T08TD4106.2E:180a-3: bza' ba rang dang de la rung ba dag de'i lus sam lus dang 'brel par sbyin na gcer bu la sbyin pa'i ltung byed kyi dngos gzhir 'gyur ro //
T08TD4106.2E:180a-4: gzhan mu stegs can gyi rab tu byung ba gcer bu pho yang rung mo yang rung brtags 'di dang rab tu byung ba 'di med pa la na smad pa med do //
T08TD4106.2E:180a-5: nye du dang rab tu byung ba la ltos pa dang /
T08TD4106.2E:180a-6: nad pa dang sdig pa can gyi lta ba'i rnam pa dang dbral ba nyid ma gtogs pa la na smad pa med do //
T08TD4106.2E:180a-7: rang gis sbyin pa la na smad pa med do //
T08TD4106.2E:180a-8: zas bca' ba lnga dang bza' ba lnga'i khongs su gtogs pa rang dang de la rung ba de dag la na smad pa med do //
T08TD4106.2E:180a-9: de'i lus sam lus dang 'brel par sbyin pa la na smad pa med do //
T08TD4106.2E:180a-10: 'di'i byed pa po ni gzhan mu stegs can gyi rab tu byung ba dang rang gis sbyin pa dang zas dus su rung ba dag go //
T08TD4106.2E:180a-11: 'di la yan lag lngas dngos gzhi'i ltung bar 'gyur te /
T08TD4106.2E:180a-12: gzhan mu stegs can gyi rab tu byung ba gcer bu pho yang rung mo yang rung ba rtags 'di dang rab tu byung ba 'di med pa nye du dang rab tu byung ba la ltos pa dang /
T08TD4106.2E:180a-14: sdig pa can gyi lta ba'i rnam pa dang dbral ba nyid ma gtogs pa dang rang gis sbyin pa dang /
T08TD4106.2E:180a-16: gnyi ga la rung ba nyid dang /
T08TD4106.2E:180a-17: de'i lus dang lus 'brel par sbyin pa'o //
T08TD4106.2E:180a-18: de dag las yan lag ma tshang na ci rigs par na smad do //
T08TD4106.2E:180a-19: sbyor ba'i ltung ba ni nyes byas te /
T08TD4106.2E:180a-20: ci srid du gcer bu pa la sbyin pa'i ltung byed kyi sbyor ba brtsams nas dngos gzhi la ma thug gi bar du nyes byas so //
T08TD4106.2E:180a-21: dngos gzhi la sbyor ba tha dad pa ji snyed brtsams pa re re la nyes byas re re'o //
T08TD4106.2E:180a-22: zas bca' ba lnga dang bza' ba lnga ma yin pa la nyes byas so //
T08TD4106.2E:180a-23: rang dang de la mi rung ba'i zas la nyes byas so //
T08TD4106.2E:180a-24: gzhan sbyin du 'jug pa la nyes byas so //
T08TD4106.2E:180a-25: rang gi zhal ta byas pa la nyes byas so //
T08TD4106.2E:180a-26: lus sam de dang 'brel pa las gzhan pa'i phyogs su bgo bsha' byed pa'i tshul gyis 'jog pa la nyes byas so //
T08TD4106.2E:180a-27: gcer bu pa las gzhan pa'i mu stegs can dag la nyes byas so //
T08TD4106.2E:180a-28: sbyor ba'i sbyor ba'i ltung ba ni nyes byas phra mo ste /
T08TD4106.2E:180a-29: sbyor ba ji snyed pa la sbyor ba'i sbyor ba yang de snyed de /
T08TD4106.2E:180b-0: sbyor ba nyes byas kyi @180b sbyor ba'i sbyor ba yang nyes byas te /
T08TD4106.2E:180b-2: ltung ba med pa ni rtags 'di dang rab tu byung ba 'di yod pa la ltung ba med do //
T08TD4106.2E:180b-3: nye du dang rab tu byung ba la ltos pa dang /
T08TD4106.2E:180b-4: nad pa dang sdig pa can gyi lta ba'i rnam pa dang /
T08TD4106.2E:180b-5: dbral bar 'dod pa la ltung ba med do //
T08TD4106.2E:180b-6: zas dum bur byas nas sbyin na sbyin du 'jug pa la ltung ba med do //
T08TD4106.2E:180b-7: gzhan pa'i blos gdol ba bzhin du gzhan 'jog pa la ltung ba med do //
T08TD4106.2E:180b-11: tshor ba dag gis nyen pa la ltung ba med do //
T08TD4106.2E:180b-12: bslab par bya ba ni dge slong gis yul thams cad la gnas skabs thams cad du gcer bu la sbyin pa'i ltung byed du 'gyur ba rnam pa thams cad mi bsten par bslab par bya'o //
T08TD4106.2E:180b-13: mi brtson pa dang mi sbyor ba dang ma brtags par spyod pa spang bar bya'o //
T08TD4106.2E:180b-14: phyir bcos pa ni snga ma bzhin no //
T08TD4106.2E:180b-15: gcer bu pa la sbyin pa'i ltung byed de /
T08TD4106.2E:180b-16: bzhi bcu bzhi pa bshad zin to /
T08TD4106.2E:180b-18: // / dmag la lta ba'i ltung byed kyi gleng gzhi ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so //
T08TD4106.2E:180b-19: ko sa la 'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis ri brags pa zhig log nas der ru pa gcig btang ba dang /
T08TD4106.2E:180b-20: bcom zhing rab tu bcom ste phyir 'ongs so //
T08TD4106.2E:180b-23: de yang bcom zhing rab tu bcom ste phyir 'ongs te /
T08TD4106.2E:180b-24: ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis nga'i g-yul na mtshon gyis 'tsho ba gang dag 'khod pa de dag thams cad 'dong bar bya'o zhes dril bsgrags pa byed du bcug ste /
T08TD4106.2E:180b-25: rgyal po dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa dang bcas te 'phags pa dang /
T08TD4106.2E:180b-26: drug sde dag gis smras pa /
T08TD4106.2E:180b-27: dga' bo nye dga' gsum po che'i dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi ba ci 'dra ba bltas 'dong ngo zhes de dag lam kar dong ste 'khod pa dang /
T08TD4106.2E:180b-28: ci tsam na ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyi dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa dag 'ongs nas drug ste dag gis de dag la smras pa /
T08TD4106.2E:180b-30: 'phags pa dag ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis ri brags pa zhig log pa de 'bebs su mchi'o //
T08TD4106.2E:180b-31: drug sde dag gis smras pa /
T08TD4106.2E:180b-32: bkren pa dag dpung gi tshogs 'di lta bu dag gis ri brags pa phebs par 'gyur ram /
T08TD4106.2E:180b-33: khyed kyi glang po che 'di dag ni phag 'dra la /
T08TD4106.2E:180b-34: ri brags pa'i glang po che dag ni ri bo brtsegs pa 'dra'o //
T08TD4106.2E:181a-0: khyod kyi rta 'di dag ni bon @181a * //
T08TD4106.2E:181a-2: ri brags pa'i rta dag ni glang po che'i phru gu 'dra'o //
T08TD4106.2E:181a-3: khyed kyi shing rta 'di dag ni shing rta zhig pa 'dra la /
T08TD4106.2E:181a-4: ri brags pa'i shing rta dag ni gzhal med khang 'dra'o //
T08TD4106.2E:181a-5: khyed kyi mi 'di dag ni rtsva mi 'dra la /
T08TD4106.2E:181a-6: ri brags pa'i mi dag ni gnod sbyin gdug pa dang 'dra bas khyed cag phar 'gro ba yod kyang phyir ldog pa med kyi /
T08TD4106.2E:181a-7: phyir deng la pha ma dag la til gyi chu byin la gzod der shig / de dag mtha' gcig tu dong ste sems khong du chud cing 'khod do //
T08TD4106.2E:181a-8: ci tsam na ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal 'ongs nas des smras pa /
T08TD4106.2E:181a-9: khyed cag ci'i phyir mi 'dong bar mtha' gcig tu dong ste sems khong du chud cing 'khod /
T08TD4106.2E:181a-11: lha bdag cag rgyal bar gal 'gyur 'di ltar dge sbyong mgo reg ras yug chen glegs pa 'tshal ba 'di dag mi mchi dgu mchi'o //
T08TD4106.2E:181a-12: gang dag 'phags pa drug sde dag go //
T08TD4106.2E:181a-13: shes ldan dag de dag ni dge sbyong hral po dag yin pas /
T08TD4106.2E:181a-15: khyed la ci gnod deng shig / ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis bsams pa /
T08TD4106.2E:181a-16: 'di dag yang dang yang du bdag la tho 'tshams par 'gyur ro snyam du rig nas /
T08TD4106.2E:181a-17: bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar mi zhig las 'phrin gyis bsnyun gsol te /
T08TD4106.2E:181a-18: btsun pa 'phags pa 'di dag dmag chas pa la ltar mchi na /
T08TD4106.2E:181a-19: kye ma bcom ldan 'das kyis thugs brtse ba'i slad du gang gi 'phags pa dag dmag chas pa la ltar mchi bar mi 'gyur bar dran par bgyi ba cung zhig bca' ba mdzad na legs so zhes gsol to //
T08TD4106.2E:181a-20: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byung ba 'di dang /
T08TD4106.2E:181a-22: skabs 'di la dge slong gi dge 'dun bsdu ba mdzad de /
T08TD4106.2E:181a-23: drug sde dag la rmas nas /
T08TD4106.2E:181a-24: dge sbyong gi tshul ma yin pa /
T08TD4106.2E:181a-25: rjes su mthun pa ma yin pa /
T08TD4106.2E:181a-27: tshul dang mthun pa ma yin pa de ni rab tu byung bas bya ba ma yin no zhes rnam grangs du mar rnam par smad de /
T08TD4106.2E:181a-28: bslab pa bca' ba'i phan yon bcu yang dag par gzigs pas nga'i nyan thos rnams kyis 'dul ba la bslab pa'i gzhi 'di ltar gdon par bya ste /
T08TD4106.2E:181a-29: yang dge slong gang dmag chas pa la ltar 'gro na ltung byed do zhes bca' ba mdzad de /
T08TD4106.2E:181a-32: nyon mongs pa ni ma dul ba /
T08TD4106.2E:181a-33: nyes pa ni dmag chas pa la ltar 'gro ba'o //
T08TD4106.2E:181b-0: de la yang dge slong gang zhes @181b bya ba ni /
T08TD4106.2E:181b-1: drug sde 'am gzhan yang de lta bu gang yin pa'o //
T08TD4106.2E:181b-2: dmag ces bya ba ni dmag yan lag gcig pa yang yod /
T08TD4106.2E:181b-3: yan lag gnyis pa yang yod /
T08TD4106.2E:181b-4: yan lag gsum pa yang yod /
T08TD4106.2E:181b-5: yan lag bzhi pa yang yod do //
T08TD4106.2E:181b-6: dmag yan lag gcig pa gang zhe na /
T08TD4106.2E:181b-8: dmag yan lag gnyis pa gang zhe na /
T08TD4106.2E:181b-11: dmag yan lag gsum pa gang zhe na /
T08TD4106.2E:181b-15: dmag yan lag bzhi pa gang zhe na /
T08TD4106.2E:181b-19: dpung bu chung gi tshogs so //
T08TD4106.2E:181b-20: chas par zhes bya ba ni g-yul 'gyed pa la mngon par dga' ba'o //
T08TD4106.2E:181b-21: ltar 'gro na zhes bya ba ni ltad mo ltar 'gro na'o //
T08TD4106.2E:181b-22: ltung byed do zhes bya ba ni snga ma bzhin no //
T08TD4106.2E:181b-23: de la ltung ba ji ltar 'gyur zhe na /
T08TD4106.2E:181b-26: sbyor ba'i sbyor bas ltung ba rnam par gzhag pa dang /
T08TD4106.2E:181b-29: phyir bcos pa rnams kyis 'di'i mtshan nyid shes par bya'o //
T08TD4106.2E:181b-30: de la 'dir dngos gzhi'i ltung ba rnam par gzhag pa ni dge slong rgyal po dang /
T08TD4106.2E:181b-31: btsun mo dang gzhon nu dang /
T08TD4106.2E:181b-32: zhad blon dang khrom gyi ru sna dang grong rdal gyi mi dang ljongs kyi mis bkug pa dang bar chad byung ba'i dbang nyid ma gtogs pas g-yul la mngon par dga' ba'i dmag la lta ba'i don nyid kyis 'phags pa'i nye 'khor gyi mtha' las 'das te mthong na dmag la lta ba'i ltung byed kyi dngos gzhir 'gyur ro //
T08TD4106.2E:181b-33: dge slong rgyal po dang btsun mo dang gzhon nu ma dang zhang blon dang /
T08TD4106.2E:181b-34: khrom gyi ru sna dang grong rdal gyi mi dang ljongs kyi mis dmag gi nang du rang dbang med par bkug pa nyid ma gtogs pa la na smad pa med do //
T08TD4106.2E:181b-36: srog gi bar chad la sogs pa gang yang rung ba 'ga' zhig nye bar gyur pa'i dbang gis der mi 'gror mi rung ba'i bar chad byung ba'i dbang nyid ma gtogs pa la na smad pa med do //
T08TD4106.2E:181b-37: g-yul la mngon par dga' ba'i dmag la lta ba'i don nyid kyis mthong ba la na smad pa med do //
T08TD4106.2E:181b-38: gnas gang nas 'phags pa'i nye 'khor gyi mtha' las 'das te mthong ba la na smad pa med do //
T08TD4106.2E:182a-0: 'dir yang nye 'khor ni sngar chos gos kyi mtshams kyi nye 'khor @182a * //
T08TD4106.2E:182a-1: bstan pa dag nyid yin par rig par bya'o //
T08TD4106.2E:182a-2: 'di'i byed pa po ni g-yul la mngon par dga' ba'i dmag la lta ba'i don nyid kyis 'phags pa'i nye 'khor gyi mtha' las 'das te mthong ba'o //
T08TD4106.2E:182a-3: 'di la yan lag lngas dngos gzhi'i ltung bar 'gyur te /
T08TD4106.2E:182a-4: dge slong rgyal po dang btsun mo dang gzhon nu dang zhang blon dang khrom kyi ru sna dang grong rdal gyi mi dang ljongs kyi mis bkug pa dang /
T08TD4106.2E:182a-5: bar chad byung ba'i dbang nyid ma gtogs pa dang /
T08TD4106.2E:182a-6: g-yul la mngon par dga' ba'i dmag nyid dang /
T08TD4106.2E:182a-8: 'phags pa'i nye 'khor gyi mtha' las 'das pa dang mthong ba'o //
T08TD4106.2E:182a-9: de dag las yan lag ma tshang na ci rigs par na smad do //
T08TD4106.2E:182a-10: sbyor ba'i ltung ba ni nyes byas te ci srid du dmag la lta ba'i ltung byed kyi sbyor ba brtsams nas dngos gzhi la ma thug gi bar du nyes byas so //
T08TD4106.2E:182a-11: dngos gzhi la sbyor ba tha dad pa ji snyed brtsams pa re re la nyes byas re re'o //
T08TD4106.2E:182a-12: lta ba'i phyir 'gro na ji srid du mig gis ma mthong gi bar du nyes byas so //
T08TD4106.2E:182a-13: nye 'khor gyi mtha' las ma 'das par bzhin bsgyur ba tsam gyis mthong ba la nyes byas so //
T08TD4106.2E:182a-14: sbyor ba'i sbyor ba'i ltung ba ni nyes byas phra mo ste /
T08TD4106.2E:182a-15: sbyor ba ji snyed pa la sbyor ba'i sbyor ba yang de snyed de /
T08TD4106.2E:182a-16: sbyor ba nyes byas kyi sbyor ba'i sbyor ba yang nyes byas te nyes byas phra mo'o //
T08TD4106.2E:182a-17: ltung ba med pa ni dge slong rgyal po dang btsun mo dang gzhon nu dang zhang blon dang khrom gyi ru sna dang grong rdal gyi mi dang /
T08TD4106.2E:182a-18: ljongs kyi mis rang dbang med par bkug pa la ltung ba med do //
T08TD4106.2E:182a-19: bar chad byung ba'i dbang nyid kyis song ste mthong ba la ltung ba med do //
T08TD4106.2E:182a-20: g-yul la mngon par dga' ba'i dmag nyid ma yin pa la ltung ba med do //
T08TD4106.2E:182a-21: lta ba'i don nyid ma yin pa la gyi na mthong ste mi lta ba la ltung ba med do //
T08TD4106.2E:182a-25: tshor ba dag gis nyen pa la ltung ba med do //
T08TD4106.2E:182a-26: bslab par bya ba ni dge slong gis yul thams cad la gnas skabs thams cad du dmag la lta ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ba rnam pa thams cad mi bsten par bslab par bya'o //
T08TD4106.2E:182a-27: dge sbyong gi tshul ma yin pa mi bya'o //
T08TD4106.2E:182a-28: phyir bcos pa ni snga ma bzhin no //
T08TD4106.2E:182a-29: dmag la lta ba'i ltung byed de bzhi bcu lnga pa bshad zin to /
T08TD4106.2E:182a-31: // / so sor thar pa'i mdo rgya cher 'grel pa 'dul ba kun las btus pa /
T08TD4106.2E:182b-0: bam po sum @182b cu gcig pa /
T08TD4106.2E:182b-1: dmag gi nang na gnas pa'i ltung byed kyi gleng gzhi ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so //
T08TD4106.2E:182b-2: ri brags pa de de lta na yang mi phebs nas rgyal pos de nyid du phru ma btab ste 'dug pa dang /
T08TD4106.2E:182b-3: blon po rnams kyis smras pa /
T08TD4106.2E:182b-4: lha khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin ni bsod nams kyi rnam par smin pa can dbang che bar grags pa lags pas gal te mchis par gyur na de'i mthus ri brags pa 'di phebs par 'gyur ba gang lags pa de lta bu'i gnas mchis par 'gyur gda'o //
T08TD4106.2E:182b-5: rgyal pos khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin la khyim bdag mthong bar 'dod do zhes yi ge spring ba dang /
T08TD4106.2E:182b-6: khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin der 'ongs so //
T08TD4106.2E:182b-7: de lta na yang ri brags pa de ma phebs nas /
T08TD4106.2E:182b-8: ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin la smras pa /
T08TD4106.2E:182b-9: khyim bdag khye'u dag mi dran nam /
T08TD4106.2E:182b-10: lha khye'u dag ni mi dran te 'di ltar 'phags pa dag mthong bar 'tshal lo //
T08TD4106.2E:182b-11: ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis dge 'dun la 'phags pa dag mthong bar 'tshal lo zhes yi ge spring ba dang /
T08TD4106.2E:182b-12: dge skos kyis dge 'dun gyi dbus su yi ge klags te /
T08TD4106.2E:182b-13: gang der 'gro bar spro ba des tshul shing long shig ces tshul shing brims pa dang /
T08TD4106.2E:182b-14: dge slong gnas brtan dag gis smras pa /
T08TD4106.2E:182b-15: kho bo cag ni rgan po sbyor mi bzod pa ngag yin pas der 'gro bar mi nus so //
T08TD4106.2E:182b-16: dge slong gsar bu gsar bu dag gis smras pa /
T08TD4106.2E:182b-17: der chos bstan par bya dgos na bdag cag ni thos pa nyung ba yin pas chos bstan par mi nus na /
T08TD4106.2E:182b-19: ci bdag cag kyang der 'gro bar mi nus so //
T08TD4106.2E:182b-20: drug sde dag gis smras pa /
T08TD4106.2E:182b-21: dga' bo nye dga' ji srid du bcom ldan 'das bzhugs shing bdag cag gson pa de srid du bstan pa gnas la /
T08TD4106.2E:182b-22: bcom ldan 'das yongs su mya ngan las 'das shing bdag cag dus la bab na bstan pa nub par brjod par bya ste /
T08TD4106.2E:182b-23: ji srid du bdag cag gson pa de srid du bstan pa la gces pa bskyed par byas /
T08TD4106.2E:182b-24: tshul shing blang ngo zhes de dag gis tshul shing blangs te der dong nas /
T08TD4106.2E:182b-25: rgyal po la chos bstan pas rgyal po mngon par dad par byas so //
T08TD4106.2E:183a-0: btsun mo dang gzhon nu dag dang zhang blon dang khrom gyi ru sna dag la @183a * //
T08TD4106.2E:183a-1: yang chos bstan pas skye bo phal po che'i tshogs mngon par dad par byas so //
T08TD4106.2E:183a-2: ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis blon po rnams la smras pa /
T08TD4106.2E:183a-3: ri brags pa bskor du 'dong ngo zhes de dag la 'phags pa dang drug sde dag gis smras pa /
T08TD4106.2E:183a-4: dga' bo nye dga' bdag cag gis yun ji srid du gzhan gyi spyod lam gyis gnas par bya /
T08TD4106.2E:183a-5: rang gi spyod lam gyis gnas par bya'o //
T08TD4106.2E:183a-6: gsus po che'i dmag ci 'dra ba de 'drar 'dong ngo zhes de dag lam kar dong ste 'khod pa dang ci tsam na dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa 'ongs nas de dag gis smras pa /
T08TD4106.2E:183a-7: 'phags pa dag shul phye shig shul phye shig ci bya /
T08TD4106.2E:183a-8: dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa mchi'o //
T08TD4106.2E:183a-9: bkren pa dag 'di 'dra ba dag glang po che yin nam phag dang 'dra'o zhes de dag gis mche ba dag nas bzung ste mtha' gcig tu bor ro //
T08TD4106.2E:183a-10: 'di 'dra ba dag rta yin nam bong bu dag 'dra'o zhes de dag gis de dag gi mjug ma dag nas bzung ste mtha' gcig tu bor ro //
T08TD4106.2E:183a-11: 'di 'dra ba dag shing rta yin nam shing rta zhig pa dag 'dra'o zhes de dag gis de dag srog shing dag nas bzung ste mtha' gcig tu bor ro //
T08TD4106.2E:183a-12: 'di 'dra ba zhig mi yin nam rtsva mi dag 'dra'o zhes de dag gis de dag gi gnya' ba dag nas bzung ste mtha' gcig tu bor nas de dag sems khong du chud cing 'khod do //
T08TD4106.2E:183a-13: ci tsam na ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal 'ongs nas des smras pa /
T08TD4106.2E:183a-14: shes ldan dag ci'i phyir khyed cag mi 'dong bar sems khong du chud cing 'khod /
T08TD4106.2E:183a-15: lha dag bdag cag rgyal bar ga la 'gyur /
T08TD4106.2E:183a-16: 'di ltar dge sbyong mgo reg ras yug chen glegs pa 'tshal ba 'di dag mi mchi dgu mchi'o //
T08TD4106.2E:183a-17: gang dag 'phags pa drug sde dag go //
T08TD4106.2E:183a-18: shes ldan dag de dag ni dge sbyong hral po dag yin pas de dag gis smras pa /
T08TD4106.2E:183a-19: khyed la ci gnod deng shig / ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis bsams pa /
T08TD4106.2E:183a-20: 'di dag yang dang yang du bdag la tho 'tshams par 'gyur ro snyam du rig nas /
T08TD4106.2E:183a-21: bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar mi zhig la 'phrin gyis bsnyun gsol te /
T08TD4106.2E:183a-22: btsun pa 'phags pa 'di dag dmag chas pa la ltar mchis nas shin tu yun ring por dmag gi nang na gnas na /
T08TD4106.2E:183b-0: kye ma bcom ldan 'das kyis thugs brtse ba'i slad du gang gis 'phags pa dag dmag chas pa la ltar mchis nas shin tu yun ring por dmag gi nang na gnas par mi 'gyur bar @183b bcom ldan 'das kyis 'phags pa rnams la dran par bgyi ba chung zhig bca' ba mdzad na legs so zhes gsol to //
T08TD4106.2E:183b-1: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byung ba 'di dang /
T08TD4106.2E:183b-3: skabs 'di la dge slong gi dge 'dun bsdu ba mdzad de /
T08TD4106.2E:183b-4: drug sde dag la rmas nas /
T08TD4106.2E:183b-5: dge sbyong gi tshul ma yin pa /
T08TD4106.2E:183b-6: rjes su mthun pa ma yin pa /
T08TD4106.2E:183b-8: tshul dang mthun pa ma yin pa de ni rab tu byung bas bya ba ma yin no zhes rnam grangs du mar rnam par smad de /
T08TD4106.2E:183b-9: bslab pa bca' ba'i phan yon bcu yang dag par gzigs pas nga'i nyan thos rnams kyis 'dul ba la bslab pa'i gzhi 'di ltar gdon par bya ste /
T08TD4106.2E:183b-10: yang dge slong gang dmag chas pa la ltar 'gro ba de lta bu'i rkyen zhig byung na /
T08TD4106.2E:183b-11: de dge slong des dmag de'i nang du zhag gnyis tshun chad gnas par bya'o //
T08TD4106.2E:183b-12: de las lhag par gnas na ltung byed do zhes bca' ba mdzad de /
T08TD4106.2E:183b-15: nyon mongs pa ni ma dul ba /
T08TD4106.2E:183b-16: nyes ba ni shin tu yun ring por dmag gi nang na gnas pa'o //
T08TD4106.2E:183b-17: de la yang dge slong gang zhes bya ba ni drug sde'am gzhan yang de lta bu gang yin pa'o //
T08TD4106.2E:183b-19: dmag ni yan lag gcig pa yang yod la /
T08TD4106.2E:183b-20: yan lag gnyis pa yang yod /
T08TD4106.2E:183b-21: yan lag gsum pa yang yod /
T08TD4106.2E:183b-22: yan lag bzhi pa yang yod do //
T08TD4106.2E:183b-23: dmag yan lag gcig pa gang zhe na /
T08TD4106.2E:183b-25: dmag yan lag gnyis pa gang zhe na /
T08TD4106.2E:183b-28: dmag yan lag gsum pa gang zhe na /
T08TD4106.2E:183b-32: dmag yan lag bzhi ba gang zhe na /
T08TD4106.2E:183b-36: dpung bu chung gi tshogs so //
T08TD4106.2E:183b-37: chas pa la zhes bya ba ni g-yul 'gyed par mngon par dga' ba la'o //
T08TD4106.2E:183b-38: ltar 'gro ba zhes bya ba ni rgyu gang gis so //
T08TD4106.2E:183b-39: de lta bu'i rkyen zhig byung na zhes bya ba ni rgyal po dang btsun mo dang gzhon nu dang zhang blon dang /
T08TD4106.2E:183b-41: grong rdal gyi mi dang ljongs kyi mis bkug na'o //
T08TD4106.2E:183b-42: dge slong des zhes bya ba ni dge slong gang yin pa des so //
T08TD4106.2E:183b-43: dmag de'i nang du zhes bya ba ni dmag chas pa de'i nang du'o //
T08TD4106.2E:183b-44: zhag gnyis tshun chad gnas par bya'o zhes bya ba ni zhag gnyis kyi mtha' tshun chad gnas par bya'o //
T08TD4106.2E:184a-0: de las lhag par gnas na zhes bya ba ni de @184a * //
T08TD4106.2E:184a-2: ltung byed do zhes bya ba ni snga ma bzhin no //
T08TD4106.2E:184a-3: de la ltung ba ji ltar 'gyur zhe na /
T08TD4106.2E:184a-6: sbyor ba'i sbyor bas ltung ba rnam par gzhag pa dang /
T08TD4106.2E:184a-9: phyir bcos pa rnams kyis 'di'i mtshan nyid shes par bya'o //
T08TD4106.2E:184a-10: de la 'dir dngos gzhi'i ltung ba rnam par gzhag pa ni dge slong rgyal po dang btsun mo dang /
T08TD4106.2E:184a-11: gzhon nu dang zhang blon dang /
T08TD4106.2E:184a-12: khrom gyi ru sna dang grong rdal gyi mi dang ljongs kyi mis bkug pa dang /
T08TD4106.2E:184a-13: bar chad kyi dbang nyid byung na g-yul la mngon par dga' ba'i dmag de'i nang du nyin mtshan gnyis las lhag par nyin mtshan gsum pa'i skya rengs dang po shar bar gnas sam /
T08TD4106.2E:184a-14: rgyal po la sogs pas bkug pa dang /
T08TD4106.2E:184a-15: bar chad kyi dbang de dag med par lta ba'i don nyid kyis g-yul la mngon par dga' ba'i dmag de'i nang du nyin mtshan gsum pa'i snga ma nyin mtshan gcig dang gnyis kyi mthar gnas na yang dmag gi nang na gnas pa'i ltung byed kyi dngos gzhir 'gyur ro //
T08TD4106.2E:184a-16: dge slong rgyal po dang btsun mo dang gzhon nu dang zhang blon dang /
T08TD4106.2E:184a-17: khrom gyi ru sna dang grong rdal gyi mi dang ljongs kyi mis bkug pa dang bar chad kyi dbang nyid yod du zin yang g-yul la mngon par dga' ba'i dmag de'i nang du nyin mtshan gsum pa'i skya rengs dang po shar ba la na smad pa med do //
T08TD4106.2E:184a-18: rgyal po la sogs pas bkug pa dang bar chad kyi dbang de dag med par lta ba'i don nyid kyis g-yul la mngon par dga' ba'i dmag de'i nang du nyin mtshan gsum pa'i snga ma nyin mtshan gcig dang gnyis kyi mthar gnas pa la yang dngos gzhi re rer 'gyur ba la na smad pa med do //
T08TD4106.2E:184a-19: 'di'i byed pa po ni rgyal po la sogs pas bkug pa dang /
T08TD4106.2E:184a-20: bar chad kyi dbang de dag yod na g-yul la mngon par dga' ba'i dmag gi nang du skya rengs gsum pa shar ba dang /
T08TD4106.2E:184a-21: de dag med par der zhag gcig dang gnyis kyi skya rengs shar ba'o //
T08TD4106.2E:184a-22: 'di la yan lag lngas dngos gzhi'i ltung bar 'gyur te /
T08TD4106.2E:184a-23: dag slong rgyal po la sogs pas bkug pa dang /
T08TD4106.2E:184a-24: bar chad kyi dbang gis dgos pa yod pa dang /
T08TD4106.2E:184a-25: g-yul la mngon par dga' ba'i dmag nyid dang /
T08TD4106.2E:184a-26: der skya rengs gsum bshar ba dang /
T08TD4106.2E:184a-27: dgos pa de dag med par der zhag gcig gi skya rengs shar ba dang /
T08TD4106.2E:184b-0: dgos pa @184b de dag med par der zhag gnyis pa'i skya rengs shar ba'o //
T08TD4106.2E:184b-1: de dag las yan lag ma tshang na ci rigs par na smad do //
T08TD4106.2E:184b-2: sbyor ba'i ltung ba ni nyes byas te ci srid du dmag gi nang na gnas pa'i ltung byed kyi sbyor ba brtsams nas dngos gzhi la ma thug gi bar du nyes byas so //
T08TD4106.2E:184b-3: dngos gzhi la sbyor ba tha dad pa ji snyed brtsams pa re re la nyes byas re re'o //
T08TD4106.2E:184b-4: rgyal po la sogs pas bkug pa dang bar chad kyi dbang de dag yod na nyin mtshan gnyis pa las 'das pa phan chad gsum pa'i skya rengs 'char ka tshun chad du nyes byas so //
T08TD4106.2E:184b-5: de dag med par nyin mtshan gcig dang gnyis kyi skya rengs 'char ka tshun chad du yang nyes byas so //
T08TD4106.2E:184b-6: sbyor ba'i sbyor ba'i ltung ba ni nyes byas phra mo ste /
T08TD4106.2E:184b-7: sbyor ba ji snyed pa la sbyor ba'i sbyor ba yang de snyed de /
T08TD4106.2E:184b-8: sbyor ba nyes byas kyi sbyor ba'i sbyor ba yang nyes byas te nyes byas phra mo'o //
T08TD4106.2E:184b-9: ltung ba med pa ni rgyal po la sogs pas bkug pa dang /
T08TD4106.2E:184b-10: bar chad kyi dbang gis dgos pa yod na zhag gnyis pa'i skya rengs dang po shar gyi bar du der gnas pa la ltung ba med do //
T08TD4106.2E:184b-14: tshor ba dag gis nyen pa la ltung ba med do //
T08TD4106.2E:184b-15: bslab par bya ba ni dge slong gis yul thams cad la gnas skabs thams cad du dmag gi nang na gnas pa'i ltung byed du 'gyur ba rnam pa thams cad mi bsten par bslab par bya'o //
T08TD4106.2E:184b-16: phyir bcos pa ni snga ma bzhin no //
T08TD4106.2E:184b-17: dmag gi nang na gnas pa'i ltung byed de bzhi bcu drug pa bshad zin to /
T08TD4106.2E:184b-19: // / dpung gi yan lag nyams su myong bar byed pa'i ltung byed kyi gleng gzhi ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra nga na bzhugs so //
T08TD4106.2E:184b-20: ri brags pa de de lta na yang ma phebs nas ko sa'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin la smras pa /
T08TD4106.2E:184b-21: khyim bdag khye'u mi dran nam /
T08TD4106.2E:184b-22: lha khye'u dag ni mi dran te /
T08TD4106.2E:184b-23: 'di ltar 'phags pa dag mthong bar 'tshal lo //
T08TD4106.2E:184b-24: ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis dge 'dun la 'phags pa dag mthong bar 'tshal lo zhes yi ge spring ba dang /
T08TD4106.2E:184b-25: dge skos kyis dge 'dun gyi mdun du yi ge klags te /
T08TD4106.2E:184b-26: gang der 'gro bar spro ba des tshul shing long shig ces tshul shing brims pa dang /
T08TD4106.2E:184b-27: dge slong gnas brtan gnas brtan dag gis smras pa /
T08TD4106.2E:185a-0: kho bo cag ni rgan po sbyor mi bzod pa dag yin pas @185a * //
T08TD4106.2E:185a-2: dge slong gsar bu gsar bu dag gis smras pa /
T08TD4106.2E:185a-3: der chos bstan par bya dgos na /
T08TD4106.2E:185a-4: bdag cag ni thos pa nyung ba yin pas chos bstan par ni mi nus na /
T08TD4106.2E:185a-5: der chu brim par bya ba'am ci bdag cag der 'gro mi nus so //
T08TD4106.2E:185a-6: drug sde dag gis smras pa /
T08TD4106.2E:185a-7: dga' bo nye dga' ji srid du bcom ldan 'das bzhugs shing bdag cag gson pa de srid du bstan pa gnas la /
T08TD4106.2E:185a-8: bcom ldan 'das yongs su mya ngan las 'das shing bdag cag dus la bab na bstan pa nub par brjod par bya ste /
T08TD4106.2E:185a-9: ci srid du bdag cag gson pa de srid du bstan pa la gces pa bskyed par byas tshul shing blang ngo zhes de dag gis tshul shing blangs te der dod nas rgyal po la chos bsten pas /
T08TD4106.2E:185a-10: rgyal po mngon par dad par byas so //
T08TD4106.2E:185a-11: btsun mo dang gzhon nu dang /
T08TD4106.2E:185a-12: zhang blon dang khrom gyi ru sna dag la yang chos bstan pas skye bo phal po che'i tshogs mngon par dad par byas so //
T08TD4106.2E:185a-13: ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis blon po rnams la smras pa /
T08TD4106.2E:185a-14: ded la g-yul shoms shig dang ri brags pa bskor bar bya'o //
T08TD4106.2E:185a-15: de dag gis g-yul bsham par brtsams pa dang /
T08TD4106.2E:185a-16: drug sde dag gis smras pa /
T08TD4106.2E:185a-17: dga' bo nye dga' bdag cag gis yun ji srid du gzhan gyi spyod lam gyis gnas par byas /
T08TD4106.2E:185a-18: rang gi spyod lam gyis gnas par byas /
T08TD4106.2E:185a-19: gsus po che'i rgyal mtshan gyi mchog dang dpung gi mchog dang g-yul bkod cing bshams pa'i dmag la lta ba nyams su myong bar byas 'dong ngo zhes de dag g-yul shom pa'i nang du dong ste dris pa /
T08TD4106.2E:185a-22: 'phags pa dag bkod pa shom mo //
T08TD4106.2E:185a-23: drug sde dag gis smras pa /
T08TD4106.2E:185a-24: bkren pa dag glang po che bcos ma 'di lta bu dag phyogs 'dir 'jog gam /
T08TD4106.2E:185a-25: 'di dag sol cig ces de dag gis mchi ba dag nas bzung ste mtha' gcig tu bor ro //
T08TD4106.2E:185a-26: rta theng po 'di lta bu dag phyogs 'dir 'jog gam 'di sol cig ces de dag gis mjug ma dag nas bzung ste mtha' gcig tu bor ro //
T08TD4106.2E:185a-27: shing rta zhig pa 'di lta bu 'di dag phyogs 'dir 'jog gam /
T08TD4106.2E:185a-28: 'di sol cig ces dag gis de dag gi srog shing dag nas bzung ste mtha' gcig tu bor ro /
T08TD4106.2E:185a-29: mi zhar ba 'di lta bu dag phyogs 'dir 'jog gam /
T08TD4106.2E:185a-30: 'di sol cig cas de dag gis de dag gi gnya' ba nas bzung ste mtha' gcig tu bor ro //
T08TD4106.2E:185a-31: drug sde dag de'i mdun logs su ri brags pa dang /
T08TD4106.2E:185b-0: thag mi @185b ring bar 'khod de glag tshor gyi sgra phyung ba dang /
T08TD4106.2E:185b-2: ri brags pa dag rdzong nas rlugs te byung ngo snyam du rig nas skrag cing sngangs te 'bros par brtsams pa dang /
T08TD4106.2E:185b-3: drug sde dag myur ba myur bar dong ste /
T08TD4106.2E:185b-4: khrom gyi ru sna'i mdun du 'khod de smras pa / shes ldan dag ci'i phyir 'bros /
T08TD4106.2E:185b-5: de dag gis smras pa 'phags pa dag ri brags pa dag rdzong nas rlugs te byung ngo //
T08TD4106.2E:185b-6: drug sde dag gis smras pa /
T08TD4106.2E:185b-7: bkren pa dag de ni kho bo cag gis ku re cung zhig byas pa yin te /
T08TD4106.2E:185b-8: gal te ri brags pa dag gis khyed cag de ltar bred ngas par shes shing rig par gyur na nang par snga ba kho nar yang khyed cag gnya' ba dag nas btags te ri brags shig tu khrid par 'gyur gyi /
T08TD4106.2E:185b-9: ma 'jigs par phyir log shig / de dag phyogs gcig tu dong ste sems khong du chud cing 'khod do //
T08TD4106.2E:185b-10: ci tsam na ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal 'ongs nas des smras pa /
T08TD4106.2E:185b-11: shes ldan dag khyed kyis da dung yang g-yul gyi bkod pa ma bshams sam /
T08TD4106.2E:185b-13: lha bdag cag rgyal bar ga la 'gyur /
T08TD4106.2E:185b-14: 'di ltar dge sbyor mgo reg ras yug chen glegs pa 'tshal ba 'di dag mchis nas bdag cag la tho 'tshams shing mi mchi dgu mchi'o //
T08TD4106.2E:185b-15: gang dag 'phags pa drug sde dag go //
T08TD4106.2E:185b-16: shes ldan dag de dag ni dge sbyong hral po dag yin pas de dag gis smras pa khyed la ci gnod /
T08TD4106.2E:185b-17: deng la g-yul gyi bkod pa shoms shig / ko sa la'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis bsams pa /
T08TD4106.2E:185b-18: 'di dag yang dang yang du bdag la tho 'tshams par 'gyur ro snyam du rig nas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar mi zhig las 'phrin gyis bsnyun gsol te / btsun pa 'phags pa 'di dag shin tu yun ring por dmag gi nang na gnas pa'i tshe na yang bshams pa 'khrug tu mchi zhing rgyal mtshan gyi mchog dang dpung gi mchog dang g-yul bshams pa'i dmag la lta ba nyams su myong bar bgyid na kye ma bcom ldan 'das kyis thugs brtse ba'i slad du gang gis 'phags pa dag shin tu yun ring por dmag gi nang na gnas pa'i tshe yang bshams pa 'khrug tu mi mchi zhing /
T08TD4106.2E:185b-21: g-yul bshams pa'i dmag la lta ba nyams su myong bar bgyid par mi 'gyur bar bcom ldan 'das kyis 'phags pa rnams la dran par bgyi ba cung zhig bca' ba mdzad na legs so zhes gsol to //
T08TD4106.2E:186a-3: skabs 'di la dge slong gi dge 'dun bsdu ba mdzad de /
T08TD4106.2E:186a-4: drug sde dag la rmas nas /
T08TD4106.2E:186a-5: dge sbyong gi tshul ma yin pa /
T08TD4106.2E:186a-6: rjes su mthun pa ma yin pa /
T08TD4106.2E:186a-8: tshul dang mthun pa ma yin pa de ni rab tu byung bas bya ba ma yin no zhes rnam grangs du mar rnam par smad de /
T08TD4106.2E:186a-9: bslab pa bca' ba'i phan yon bcu yang dag par gzigs pas nga'i nyan thos rnams kyis 'dul ba la bslab pa'i gzhi 'di ltar gdon par bya ste /
T08TD4106.2E:186a-10: dge slong zhag gnyis dmag de'i nang na gnas pa'i tshe yang gal te bshams pa 'khrug tu 'gro'am /
T08TD4106.2E:186a-13: g-yul bshams pa'i dmag la lta ba nyams su myong bar byed na ltung byed do zhes bca' ba mdzad de /
T08TD4106.2E:186a-16: nyon mongs pa ni ma dul ba /
T08TD4106.2E:186a-17: nyes pa ni zhag gnyis dmag de'i nang na gnas pa'i tshe yang dpung gi yan lag bzhi nyams su myong bar byed pa'o //
T08TD4106.2E:186a-18: de la dge slong zhes bya ba ni drug sde'am gzhan yang de lta bu gang yin pa'o //
T08TD4106.2E:186a-19: zhag gnyis zhes bya ba ni zhag gnyis tshun chad do //
T08TD4106.2E:186a-21: dmag ni yan lag gcig pa yang yod /
T08TD4106.2E:186a-22: yan lag gnyis pa yang yod /
T08TD4106.2E:186a-23: yan lag gsum pa yang yod /
T08TD4106.2E:186a-24: yan lag bzhi pa yang yod do //
T08TD4106.2E:186a-25: dmag yan lag gcig pa gang zhe na /
T08TD4106.2E:186a-27: dmag yan lag gnyis pa gang zhe na /
T08TD4106.2E:186a-30: dmag yan lag gsum pa gang zhe na /
T08TD4106.2E:186a-34: dmag yan lag bzhi pa gang zhe na /
T08TD4106.2E:186a-38: dpung bu chung gi tshogs so //
T08TD4106.2E:186a-39: de'i nang na gnas pa'i tshe yang zhes bya ba ni 'dug pa'i tshe yang ngo //
T08TD4106.2E:186a-40: gal te bshams pa 'khrug tu 'gro 'am zhes bya ba ni g-yul la chas pa 'khrug tu 'gro ba'o //
T08TD4106.2E:186a-41: rgyal mtshan gyi mchog ces bya ba ni rgyal mtshan rnam pa bzhi ste /
T08TD4106.2E:186a-42: khyu mchog gi rgyal mtshan dang /
T08TD4106.2E:186a-43: chu srin gyi rgyal mtshan dang /
T08TD4106.2E:186a-46: dpung gi mchog ces bya ba ni dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa ste /
T08TD4106.2E:186a-50: dpung bu chung gi tshogs so //
T08TD4106.2E:186b-0: g-yul bshams pa'i @186b dmag la lta ba nyams su myong bar byed na zhes bya ba ni bshams pa ni rnam pa bzhi ste /
T08TD4106.2E:186b-2: shing rta'i dbyibs lta bu dang zla gam gyi dbyibs lta bu dang /
T08TD4106.2E:186b-3: nam mkha' lding gi dbyibs lta bu'o //
T08TD4106.2E:186b-4: ltung byed do zhes bya ba ni snga ma bzhin no //
T08TD4106.2E:186b-5: de la ltung ba ji ltar 'gyur zhe na /
T08TD4106.2E:186b-8: sbyor ba'i sbyor bas ltung ba rnam par gzhag pa dang /
T08TD4106.2E:186b-11: phyir bcos pa rnams kyis 'di'i mtshan nyid shes par bya'o //
T08TD4106.2E:186b-12: de la 'dir dngos gzhi'i ltung ba rnam par gzhag pa ni dge slong bar chad kyi dbang gis 'gro ba ma yin pas dpung gi yan lag sdud pa'am /
T08TD4106.2E:186b-13: so so ba sta gon byas pa rnams kyi dngos kyi reg pa dang /
T08TD4106.2E:186b-15: lta ba'i phyir 'phags shing nye 'khor gyi mtha' las 'das te /
T08TD4106.2E:186b-16: mthong ba lta bu nyams su myong na dpung gi yan lag nyams su myong bar byed pa'i ltung byed kyi dngos gzhir 'gyur ro //
T08TD4106.2E:186b-17: dge slong bar chad brgyad dang /
T08TD4106.2E:186b-18: gnod pa nye bar zhi bar bya ba'i don du 'gro ba la sogs pa ma yin pa la na smad pa med do //
T08TD4106.2E:186b-19: g-yul la mngon par dga' ba'i dmag gi dpung gi yan lag glang po che dang /
T08TD4106.2E:186b-21: shing rta dang dpung bu chung dag la na smad pa med do //
T08TD4106.2E:186b-22: dpung gi yan lag de dag bsdus pa 'am /
T08TD4106.2E:186b-23: so so ba lan smad pa med do //
T08TD4106.2E:186b-24: bsdus pa zhes bya ba ni rgyal mtshan gyi mchog dang /
T08TD4106.2E:186b-25: dpung gi mchog bsdus pa ste /
T08TD4106.2E:186b-26: rgyal mtshan gyi mchog ni rnam pa bzhi ste /
T08TD4106.2E:186b-27: khyu mchog gi rgyal mtshan dang /
T08TD4106.2E:186b-28: chu srin gyi rgyal mtshan dang /
T08TD4106.2E:186b-31: dpung gi mchog ces bya ba ni dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa ste /
T08TD4106.2E:186b-35: dpung bu chung gi tshogs so //
T08TD4106.2E:186b-36: so so ba zhes bya ba ni g-yul bkod cing bshams pa'i dmag so so ba ste /
T08TD4106.2E:186b-37: g-yul bkod cing bshams pa ni rnam pa bzhi ste /
T08TD4106.2E:186b-39: shing rta'i dbyibs lta bu dang /
T08TD4106.2E:186b-40: zla gam gyi rnam pa lta bu dang /
T08TD4106.2E:186b-41: nam mkha' lding gi 'dab ma lta bu'o //
T08TD4106.2E:186b-42: de la 'bru'i kha lta bu zhes bya ba ni mdun du yang ru dngar /
T08TD4106.2E:186b-43: rgyab tu yang ru dang ra la /
T08TD4106.2E:186b-45: shing rta'i dbyibs lta bu zhes bya ba ni mdun du yang ru dngar /
T08TD4106.2E:187a-0: zla gam gyi rnam pa lta bu zhes bya ba ni mdun @187a * //
T08TD4106.2E:187a-5: nam mkha' lding gi 'dab ma lta bu zhes bya ba ni rgyab tu yang ru dngar /
T08TD4106.2E:187a-8: dpung gi yan lag bsdus pa'am /
T08TD4106.2E:187a-9: so so ba de dag sta gon byas ba rnams kyi dngos la na smad pa med do //
T08TD4106.2E:187a-10: sta gon byas pa zhes bya ba ni glang po che la sogs pa go bskon pa dang /
T08TD4106.2E:187a-14: mda' mde'u can bstar ba dang /
T08TD4106.2E:187a-15: ral gri phyung ba nyid la sogs pa yin par rig par bya'o //
T08TD4106.2E:187a-16: sta gon byas pa rnams kyi dngos zhes bya ba gang zhe na /
T08TD4106.2E:187a-17: reg pa dang bshams pa dkrugs pa dang /
T08TD4106.2E:187a-18: lta ba'i phyir 'phags shing nye 'khor gyi mtha' las 'das te mthong ba lta bu ni dngos dag yin no //
T08TD4106.2E:187a-19: dngos de dag la ltung ba'i dngos gzhi la na smad pa med do //
T08TD4106.2E:187a-20: reg pa zhes bya ba ni glang po che la sogs pa sta gon byas pa rnams la reg pa ste /
T08TD4106.2E:187a-21: dpung gi yan lag la reg pa 'di rin po cher smos pa la reg pa'i ltung byed las yul gzhan yin par reg par bya'o //
T08TD4106.2E:187a-22: bshams pa dkrugs pa zhes bya ba ni glang po che la sogs pa gnas nas bskyod pa'o //
T08TD4106.2E:187a-23: lta ba'i phyir 'phags shing nye 'khor gyi mtha' las 'das te mthong ba zhes bya ba ni dge slong gis dpung gi yan lag dag lta ba'i phyir gnas nas 'phags shing nye 'khor gyi mtha' las 'das te dpung gi yan lag dag mthong ba gang yin pa'o //
T08TD4106.2E:187a-24: lta ba ni dngos dag yin no zhes bya ba ni reg pa dag dang bshams pa dkrugs pa dang blta ba'i phyir 'phags shing nye 'khor gyi mtha' las 'das te mthong ba zhes bya ba rnam pa gsum po de lta bu'i dngos gzhi'i kha na ma tho ba'i rgyur gyur pa'i dngos dag yin pa'o //
T08TD4106.2E:187a-25: de lta bu nyams su myong ba la na smad pa med do //
T08TD4106.2E:187a-26: nyams su myong ba la sbyor ba'i nyes byas su na smad pa'i phyir ro //
T08TD4106.2E:187a-27: 'di'i byed pa po ni dge slong bar chad kyi dbang gis 'gro ba ma yin pa la dpung gi yan lag bsdus pa 'am /
T08TD4106.2E:187a-28: so so ba sta gon byas pa rnams kyi dngos byed pa po nyid yin no //
T08TD4106.2E:187a-29: 'di la yan lag lngas dngos gzhi'i ltung bar 'gyur te /
T08TD4106.2E:187a-30: dge slong bar chad kyi dbang gis 'gro ba ma yin pa dang /
T08TD4106.2E:187a-31: dpung gi yan lag bzhi po rnams dang bsdus pa 'am /
T08TD4106.2E:187a-32: so so ba gang yang rung ba dang /
T08TD4106.2E:187a-33: sta gon byas pa rnams kyi dngos la reg pa dang /
T08TD4106.2E:187b-0: @187b lta ba'i phyir 'phags shing nye 'khor gyi mtha' las 'das te mthong ba lta bu gang yang rung ba dang de dag nyams su myong ba'o //
T08TD4106.2E:187b-1: dge slong de dag las yan lag ma tshang na ci rigs par na smad do //
T08TD4106.2E:187b-2: sbyor ba'i ltung ba ni nyes byas te ci srid du dpung gi yan lag nyams su myong bar byed pa'i ltung byed kyi sbyor ba brtsams nas dngos gzhi la mthug gi bar du nyes byas so //
T08TD4106.2E:187b-3: dngos gzhi la sbyor ba tha dad pa ji snyed pa brtsams pa re re la nyes byas re re'o //
T08TD4106.2E:187b-4: dpung ma chas pa nyid la nyes byas so /
T08TD4106.2E:187b-5: nyams su ma myong ba'i sbyor ba la nyes byas so //
T08TD4106.2E:187b-6: sbyor ba'i sbyor ba'i ltung ba ni nyes byas phra mo ste /
T08TD4106.2E:187b-7: sbyor ba ci snyed pa la sbyor ba'i sbyor ba yang de snyed de /
T08TD4106.2E:187b-8: sbyor ba nyes byas kyi sbyor ba'i sbyor ba yang nyes byas te nyes byas phra mo'o //
T08TD4106.2E:187b-9: ltung ba med pa ni dge slong bar chad kyi dbang gis 'gro ba la ltung ba mad do //
T08TD4106.2E:187b-13: tshor ba dag gis nyen ba la ltung ba med do //
T08TD4106.2E:187b-14: bslab par bya ba ni dge slong gis yul thams cad la gnas skabs thams cad du dpung gi yan lag nyams su myong bar byed pa'i ltung byed du 'gyur ba rnam pa thams cad mi bsten bar bslab par bya'o //
T08TD4106.2E:187b-21: bud med 'thab pa la sogs pa bya ba dang /
T08TD4106.2E:187b-24: phyir bcos pa ni snga ma bzhin no //
T08TD4106.2E:187b-25: dpung gi yan lag nyams su myong bar byed pa'i ltung byed de bzhi bcu bdun pa bshad zin to /
T08TD4106.2E:187b-27: // / brdeg pa'i ltung byed kyi gleng gzhi ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so //
T08TD4106.2E:187b-28: gang gi tshe tshe dang ldan pa mood gal gyi bu chen pos nye ba 'khor la sogs pa sar ba skyes pa gzhon nu bcu bdun sde'i chogs dag rab tu phyung zhing bsnyen par rdzogs par byas pa de'i tshe na /
T08TD4106.2E:187b-29: de dag drug sde dag la rten par byed /
T08TD4106.2E:187b-33: bcu bdun sde dag tshur sheg /'di dang 'di gyis shig / de dag gis smras pa /
T08TD4106.2E:187b-34: ci khyed kho bo cag gi slob dpon nam mkhan po yin mi byed do //
T08TD4106.2E:187b-35: des glen pha dag khyed gzhan ci zhig byed ces de dag las gcig brdegs pa dang /
T08TD4106.2E:187b-36: de dag thams cad kyis bdag cag brdegs so //
T08TD4106.2E:188a-0: bdag cag brdegs so zhes phyi rgan du @188a * //
T08TD4106.2E:188a-2: dge slong rnams kyis smras pa /
T08TD4106.2E:188a-3: tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka ci'i phyir gzhon nu dag la rdeg par byed /
T08TD4106.2E:188a-5: tshe dang ldan pa dag kho bos gcig brdegs pa dang thams cad sa la 'gyel te du'o //
T08TD4106.2E:188a-6: dge slong rnams kyis bcu bdun sde dag la smras pa /
T08TD4106.2E:188a-7: tshe dang ldan pa dag khyed cag las gcig brdegs na ci'i phyir thams cad sa la 'gyel te ngu /
T08TD4106.2E:188a-9: gal te ma dus na thams cad la brdeg par 'gyur ro zhes zer nas /
T08TD4106.2E:188a-10: dge slong don nyung du dag ci'i phyir dge slong dag khros 'khrugs rngam par gyur te yi ma rangs nas dge slong la rdeg par byed ces smod bar byed /
T08TD4106.2E:188a-12: kha zer bar byed pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol to //
T08TD4106.2E:188a-13: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byung ba 'di dang /
T08TD4106.2E:188a-15: skabs 'di la dge slong gi dge 'dun bsdu ba mdzad de /
T08TD4106.2E:188a-17: dge sbyong gi tshul ma yin pa /
T08TD4106.2E:188a-18: rjes su mthun pa ma yin pa /
T08TD4106.2E:188a-20: tshul dang mthun pa ma yin pa de ni rab tu byung bas bya ba ma yin no zhes rnam grangs du mar rnam par smad de /
T08TD4106.2E:188a-21: bslab pa bca' ba'i phan yon bcu yang dag par gzigs pas nga'i nyan thos rnams kyis 'dul ba la bslab pa'i gzhi 'di ltar gdon par bya ste /
T08TD4106.2E:188a-22: yang dge slong gang khros 'khrugs rngam par gyur te /
T08TD4106.2E:188a-23: yi ma rangs nas dge slong la rdeg na ltung byed do zhes bca' ba mdzad de /
T08TD4106.2E:188a-25: gang zag ni 'char ka / nyon mongs pa ni zhe sdang gi kun du sbyor ba /
T08TD4106.2E:188a-26: nyes pa ni dge slong la brdeg pa'o //
T08TD4106.2E:188a-27: de la yang dge slong gang zhes bya ba ni 'char ka 'am /
T08TD4106.2E:188a-28: gzhan yang de lta bu gang yin pa'o //
T08TD4106.2E:188a-29: khros 'khrugs rngam par gyur te yi ma rangs nas zhes bya ba ni khros shing 'khrugs pa'i zil gyis mnan nas so //
T08TD4106.2E:188a-30: dge slong la zhes bya ba ni chos 'di pa la'o //
T08TD4106.2E:188a-31: rdeg na zhes bya ba ni rdeg par byed na'o //
T08TD4106.2E:188a-32: ltung byed do zhes bya ba ni snga ma bzhin no //
T08TD4106.2E:188a-33: de la ltung ba ji ltar 'gyur zhe na /
T08TD4106.2E:188a-36: sbyor ba'i sbyor bas ltung ba rnam par gzhag pa dang /
T08TD4106.2E:188a-39: phyir bcos pa rnams kyis 'di'i mtshan nyid shes par bya'o //
T08TD4106.2E:188b-0: de la 'dir dngos gzhi'i ltung ba rnam par gzhag pa ni dge slong @188b gis rnyog pa can gyi sems nyid kyis dge slong pha rol la lus sam des 'phangs pa 'am /
T08TD4106.2E:188b-1: de dang 'brel ba dang gang yang rung ba na tha na rkang pa'i mthe bo 'am yungs kar ram rtsva dag gis brdegs na reg pa tsam gyis brdeg spyad re re la rdeg pa'i ltung byed kyi dngos gzhir 'gyur ro //
T08TD4106.2E:188b-2: rnyog pa can gyi sems khros 'khrugs rngam par gyur te /
T08TD4106.2E:188b-3: yi ma rangs pa gang yang rung ba la na smad pa med do //
T08TD4106.2E:188b-4: dge slong pha rol po brdeg par bya ba chos 'di pa bsnyen par rdzogs pa can ma nyams pa mtshan dang lta ba mthun pa gang yang rung ba la na smad pa med do //
T08TD4106.2E:188b-5: lus sam des 'phangs pa 'am de dang 'brel pa dag gang yang rung ba la na smad pa med do //
T08TD4106.2E:188b-6: lus zhes bya ba ni nang gi zin pa ste /
T08TD4106.2E:188b-7: sor mo gcig gam gnyis sam gsum dang bzhi dang lnga'am /
T08TD4106.2E:188b-8: khu tshur dang gru mo dang phrag pa dang mgo dang glo dang rgyab dang rked pa dang brla dang pus mo dang rje dar la sogs pas so //
T08TD4106.2E:188b-9: des 'phangs pa zhes bya ba ni phyi rol du 'phangs pa ste /
T08TD4106.2E:188b-12: mda' phyed lcags las byas pa dang /
T08TD4106.2E:188b-14: mde'u be'u so lta bu dang /
T08TD4106.2E:188b-16: mde'u ka ra bi ra'i 'dab ma lta bu dang /
T08TD4106.2E:188b-19: rdo rje rtse gcig pa dang /
T08TD4106.2E:188b-22: rgya shug gi tshi gu la sogs pas so //
T08TD4106.2E:188b-23: de dang 'brel pa zhes bya ba ni de gnyi ga dang ldan pa ste /
T08TD4106.2E:188b-26: ral gri so gcig pa dang /
T08TD4106.2E:188b-27: ral gri so gnyis pa dang /
T08TD4106.2E:188b-31: rtsva'i nyag ma la sogs pas so //
T08TD4106.2E:188b-32: de gsum gyi mtha' bstan pa'i phyir tha na rkang pa'i mthe bong dang yungs kar ram rtsva dag gis brdegs na zhes bya ba smras te /
T08TD4106.2E:188b-33: nang gi zin pa tha na rkang pa'i mthe bo 'am /
T08TD4106.2E:188b-34: phyi rol du 'phangs pa yungs kar ram /
T08TD4106.2E:188b-35: phyi rol du 'phangs pa yungs kar ram /
T08TD4106.2E:188b-36: de gnyis ga dang ldan pa tha na rtsva dag gis brdegs pa 'am /
T08TD4106.2E:188b-37: de bas kyang ches chung ba'i dngos pos brdegs na yang ltung ba la na smad pa med do //
T08TD4106.2E:188b-38: ci brdegs pa'i 'og tu gang gi tshe snad cing skrangs par gyur pa de'i tshe na dngos gzhir 'gyur ro //
T08TD4106.2E:188b-39: 'on te rdeg pa'i tshe nyid na zhe na /
T08TD4106.2E:188b-40: de'i phyir reg pa tsam gyis zhes bya ba smras te /
T08TD4106.2E:188b-41: de dag gis lus la sogs pa la reg pa tsam la na smad pa med do //
T08TD4106.2E:188b-42: ci brdeg spyad mang po yin na yang ltung byed gcig tu 'gyur ram zhe na /
