T08TD4106.2E:189a-1: de'i phyir brdeg spyad re re la zhes bya ba smas te /
T08TD4106.2E:189a-2: brdeg spyad re re la ltung byed re rer 'gyur te /
T08TD4106.2E:189a-3: sor mo re re la ltung byed re re dang /
T08TD4106.2E:189a-4: yungs kar 'bru re re la ltung byed re re dang /
T08TD4106.2E:189a-5: rtsva nya ga re re la ltung byed re rer 'gyur ba la lta bu la na smad pa med do //
T08TD4106.2E:189a-6: 'di'i byed pa po ni pha rol po brdeg par bya ba dge slong nyid dang /
T08TD4106.2E:189a-7: brdeg spyad gang yang rung ba ci snyed pa'o //
T08TD4106.2E:189a-8: 'di la yan lag lngas dngos gzhi'i ltung bar 'gyur te /
T08TD4106.2E:189a-9: rnyog pa can gyi sems nyid dang /
T08TD4106.2E:189a-10: pha rol po brdeg par bya ba dge slong nyid dang /
T08TD4106.2E:189a-11: brdeg pa lus sam des 'phangs pa 'am de dang 'brel par gang yang rung ba dang brdeg spyad tha na rkang pa'i mthe bong ngam yungs kar ram /
T08TD4106.2E:189a-12: rtsva bas chung ba gang yang rung ba dang tha na lus la reg pa dang /
T08TD4106.2E:189a-13: de dag las yan lag ma tshad na ci rigs bar na smad do //
T08TD4106.2E:189a-14: sbyor ba'i ltung ba ni nyes byas te ci srid du brdeg pa'i ltung byed kyi sbyor ba brtsams nas dngos gzhi la ma thug gi bar du nyes byas so //
T08TD4106.2E:189a-15: dngos gzhi la sbyor ba tha dad pa ji snyed brtsams pa re re la yang nyes byas re re'o //
T08TD4106.2E:189a-16: rnyog pa can gyi sems kyis khros 'khrugs rngam par gyur te yi ma rangs pa nyid med pa la nyes byas so //
T08TD4106.2E:189a-17: pha rol po brdeg par bya ba dge slong nyams pa dang /
T08TD4106.2E:189a-18: ma chags pa la nyes byas so //
T08TD4106.2E:189a-19: dge slong ma dang chos 'di pa'i rab tu byung ba pho mo bsnyen par ma rdzogs pa la nyes byas so //
T08TD4106.2E:189a-20: pha rol po'i rab tu byung ba dang khyim pa mi'i 'gro ba pa la nyes byas so //
T08TD4106.2E:189a-21: mi ma yin pa'i 'gro ba dang dud 'gro la nyes byas na smad do //
T08TD4106.2E:189a-22: ma phog na nyes byas so //
T08TD4106.2E:189a-23: rang la brdegs na nyes byas so //
T08TD4106.2E:189a-24: ka ba dang rtsig pa dang sa dang shing ljon pa dang /
T08TD4106.2E:189a-25: gzhan la brdegs na nyes byas so //
T08TD4106.2E:189a-26: sbyor ba'i sbyor ba'i ltung ba ni nyes byas phra mo ste sbyor ba ji snyed pa la sbyor ba'i sbyor ba yang de snyed de /
T08TD4106.2E:189a-27: sbyor ba nyes byas kyi sbyor ba'i sbyor ba yang nyes byas te nyes byas phra mo'o //
T08TD4106.2E:189a-28: ltung ba med ba ni brnangs pa dang thal lcag gi rig sngags sgrub bar byed pa la ltung ba med do //
T08TD4106.2E:189a-29: dgos pa'i dbang gis shing gshegs pa dang sa brdung ba la sogs pa la ltung ba med do //
T08TD4106.2E:189a-33: tshor ba dag gis nyen pa la ltung ba med do //
T08TD4106.2E:189b-0: bslab par bya ba ni dge slong gis yul thams cad la gnas skabs thams cad du brdeg pa'i ltung byed du 'gyur @189b ba rnam pa thams cad mi bsten par bslab par bya'o //
T08TD4106.2E:189b-1: brdeg par bya ba gzhan yin la gzhan la brdeg par mi bya'o //
T08TD4106.2E:189b-2: ka ba la brdeg par mi bya'o //
T08TD4106.2E:189b-3: rtsig pa dang shing ljon pa dang sgo glegs la sogs pa gzhan la yang brdeg par mi bya'o //
T08TD4106.2E:189b-4: byir bcos pa ni snga ma bzhin no //
T08TD4106.2E:189b-5: brdeg pa'i ltung byed de bzhi bcu brgyad pa bshad zin to ;
T08TD4106.2E:189b-7: // / gzas pa'i ltung byad kyi gleng gzhi ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so //
T08TD4106.2E:189b-8: gang gi tshe tshe dang ldan pa mood gal gyi bu chen pos nye ba 'khor la sogs pa sar pa skyes phran gzhon nu bcu bdun sde'i tshogs dag rab tu phyung zhing bsnyen par rdzogs par byas pa de'i tshe na /
T08TD4106.2E:189b-9: de dag drug sde dag la rten par byed /
T08TD4106.2E:189b-13: bcu bdun sde dag tshur sheg /'di dang 'di gyis shig / de dag gis smras pa /
T08TD4106.2E:189b-14: ci khyed kho bo cag gi slob dpon yin nam mkhan po yin /
T08TD4106.2E:189b-16: des glen pa dag khyed gzhan ci zhig byed ces de dag las gcig la brdeg par gzas pa dang /
T08TD4106.2E:189b-17: de dag thams cad kyis bdag cag la brdeg par gzas so //
T08TD4106.2E:189b-18: bdag cag la brdeg par gzas so zhes phyi rgan du 'gyel te du bar brtsams so //
T08TD4106.2E:189b-19: dge slong rnams kyis smras pa /
T08TD4106.2E:189b-20: tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka ci'i phyir gzhon nu dag la brdeg par gzas /
T08TD4106.2E:189b-21: 'char kas smras pa tshe dang ldan pa dag kho bos gcig la brdeg par gzas pa dang /
T08TD4106.2E:189b-22: thams cad sa la 'gyel te du'o //
T08TD4106.2E:189b-23: dge slong rnams kyis bcu bdun sde dag la smras pa /
T08TD4106.2E:189b-24: tshe dang ldan pa khyed cag las gcig la brdeg par gzas na ci'i phyir thams cad sa la 'gyel te ngu /
T08TD4106.2E:189b-26: gal te ma dus na gang cis brdeg gtol med do zhes zer nas dge slong don nyung du dag ci'i phyir dge slong dag khros 'khrugs rngam par gyur te yi ma rangs nas dge slong la brdeg par gzas par byed ces smod par byed /
T08TD4106.2E:189b-28: kha zer bar byed pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol to //
T08TD4106.2E:189b-29: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byung ba 'di dang /
T08TD4106.2E:189b-31: skabs 'di la dge slong gi dge 'dun bsdu ba mdzad de /
T08TD4106.2E:189b-33: dge sbyong gi tshul ma yin pa /
T08TD4106.2E:190a-3: tshul dang mthun pa ma yin pa de ni rab tu byung bas bya ba ma yin no zhes rnam grangs du mar rnam par smad de /
T08TD4106.2E:190a-4: bslab pa bca' ba'i phan yon bcu yang dag par gzigs pas nga'i nyan thos rnams kyis 'dul ba la bslab pa'i gzhi 'di ltar gdon par bya ste /
T08TD4106.2E:190a-5: yang dge slong gang khros 'khrugs rngam par gyur te yi ma rangs nas dge slong la brdeg par gzas na tha na thal mos kyang rung ste ltung byed do zhes bca' ba mdzad de /
T08TD4106.2E:190a-7: gang zag ni 'char ka / nyon mongs pa ni zhe sdang gi kun du sbyor ba /
T08TD4106.2E:190a-8: nyes pa ni dge slong la brdeg par gzas pa'o //
T08TD4106.2E:190a-9: de la yang dag slong gang zhes bya ba ni 'char ka 'am gzhan yang de lta bu gang yin pa'o //
T08TD4106.2E:190a-10: khros 'khrugs rngam par gyur te yi ma rangs nas zhes bya ba ni khros shing khro ba'i zil gyis non nas so //
T08TD4106.2E:190a-11: dge slong la zhes bya ba ni chos 'di pa la'o //
T08TD4106.2E:190a-12: brdeg par gzas na zhes bya ba ni brdeg par bshams na'o //
T08TD4106.2E:190a-13: tha na thal mos kyang ste zhes bya ba ni tha na thal lcag tsam gzas kyang rung ste'o //
T08TD4106.2E:190a-14: ltung byed do zhes bya ba ni snga ma bzhin no //
T08TD4106.2E:190a-15: de la ltung ba ci ltar 'gyur zhe na /
T08TD4106.2E:190a-18: sbyor ba'i sbyor bas ltung ba rnam par gzhag pa dang /
T08TD4106.2E:190a-21: phyir bcos pa rnams kyis 'di'i mtshan nyid shes par bya'o //
T08TD4106.2E:190a-22: sngar brdegs pa'i ltung byed bstan pa dang /
T08TD4106.2E:190a-23: 'dir gzas pa'i ltung byed bstan pa de gnyis kyi spyi'i mtshan nyid ni 'dra'o //
T08TD4106.2E:190a-24: bye brag tu snga ma ni brdeg pa'i yul la rnam par gzhag go //
T08TD4106.2E:190a-25: 'di ni brdeg par gzas pa'i yul la rnam par gzhag go //
T08TD4106.2E:190a-26: de la 'dir dngos gzhi'i ltung ba rnam par gzhag pa ni dge slong gis rnyog pa can gyi sems nyid kyis dge slong pha rol la lus sam des 'phangs pa 'am de dang 'brel ba dag gang yang rung ba tha na rkang pa'i mthe bo'am yungs kar ram /
T08TD4106.2E:190a-27: rtsva dag gis brdeg par gzas na gzas pa tsam gyis rdzas re re la gzas pa'i ltung byed kyi dngos gzhir 'gyur ro //
T08TD4106.2E:190a-28: rnyag pa can gyi sems khros 'khrugs rngam par gyur te /
T08TD4106.2E:190a-29: yi ma rang ba gang yang rung ba la na smad pa med do //
T08TD4106.2E:190a-30: dge slong pha rol pos brdeg par gzas pa chos 'di pa bsnyen par rdzogs pa ma nyams pa mtshan dang lta ba mthun pa gang yang rung ba la na smad pa med do //
T08TD4106.2E:190b-1: de dang 'brel pa dag gang yang rung ba la na smad pa med do //
T08TD4106.2E:190b-2: lus zhes bya ba ni nang gi zin pa ste sor mo gcig gam gnyis sam /
T08TD4106.2E:190b-14: des 'phangs pa zhes bya ba ni phyi rol du 'phangs pa ste /
T08TD4106.2E:190b-16: mnga' phyed lcags las byas pa dang /
T08TD4106.2E:190b-18: mde'u be'u'i so lta bu dang /
T08TD4106.2E:190b-20: mde'u ka ra bi ra'i 'dab ma lta bu dang /
T08TD4106.2E:190b-23: rdo rje rtse gcig pa dang /
T08TD4106.2E:190b-24: mnga' bo che dang mtshon rtse gcig pa dang /
T08TD4106.2E:190b-25: rgya shug gi tshi gu la sogs pa'o //
T08TD4106.2E:190b-26: de dang 'brel pa zhes bya ba ni de gnyi ga dang ldan bas te ral gri dang /
T08TD4106.2E:190b-28: ral gri so gcig pa dang /
T08TD4106.2E:190b-29: gral gri so gnyis pa dang /
T08TD4106.2E:190b-35: thag pa'i chun po la sogs pas so //
T08TD4106.2E:190b-36: de gsum gyi mtha' bstan pa'i phyir /
T08TD4106.2E:190b-37: tha na rkang pa'i mthe bo 'am yungs kar ram /
T08TD4106.2E:190b-38: rtsva dag gis brdeg par gzas na zhes bya ba smras te /
T08TD4106.2E:190b-39: nang gi zin pa tha na rkang pa'i mthe bo 'am /
T08TD4106.2E:190b-40: phyi rol du 'phangs pa than yungs kar ram /
T08TD4106.2E:190b-41: de gnyi ga dang ldan pa tha na rtsva dag gis brdeg par gzas sam /
T08TD4106.2E:190b-42: de bas kyang ches chung pa'i dngos pos brdeg par gzas na yang ltung ba la smad pa med do //
T08TD4106.2E:190b-43: ci brdeg par gzas pa'i 'og tu gang gi tshe bsnun cing phog par gyur pa de'i tshe na dngos gzhir ro //
T08TD4106.2E:190b-44: 'on te brdeg par gzas pa'i tshe nyid na zhe na /
T08TD4106.2E:190b-45: de'i phyir gzas pa tsam gyis zhes bya ba smras te /
T08TD4106.2E:190b-46: de dag gis lus la sogs pa la brdeg par gzas pa tsam la na smad pa med do //
T08TD4106.2E:190b-47: ci gzas pa'i spyad mang po nyid yin na yang ltung byed gcig tu 'gyur ram zhe na /
T08TD4106.2E:190b-49: de'i phyir rdzas re re la zhes bya ba smos te /
T08TD4106.2E:190b-50: gzas par bya ba'i rdzas re re la ltung byed re rer 'gyur te /
T08TD4106.2E:190b-51: sor mo re re la ltung byed re re dang /
T08TD4106.2E:190b-52: yungs kar 'bru re re la ltung byed ra re dang /
T08TD4106.2E:190b-53: rtsva nyag ma re re la ltung byed re re 'gyur pa lta bu la na smad pa med do //
T08TD4106.2E:190b-54: 'di'i byed pa po ni pha rol po brdeg par gzas pa dge slong nyid dang /
T08TD4106.2E:190b-55: gzas pa'i rdzas gang yang rung ba ji snyed pa'o //
T08TD4106.2E:190b-56: 'di la yan lag lngas dngos gzhi'i ltung bar 'gyur te //
T08TD4106.2E:190b-57: rnyog pa can gyi sems nyid dang /
T08TD4106.2E:191a-1: po brdeg par gzas pa'i dge slong nyid dang /
T08TD4106.2E:191a-2: gzas pa lus sam des 'phangs pa 'am /
T08TD4106.2E:191a-3: de dang 'brel pa gang yang rung ba dang /
T08TD4106.2E:191a-4: gzas pa'i rdzas tha na rkang pa'i mthe bo 'am /
T08TD4106.2E:191a-5: yungs kar ram rtsva bas chung ba gang yang rung ba dang /
T08TD4106.2E:191a-7: de dag las yan lag mtshang na ci rigs par na smad do //
T08TD4106.2E:191a-8: sbyor ba'i ltung ba ni nyes byas te ji srid du gzas pa'i ltung byed kyi sbyor ba brtsams nas dngos gzhi la ma thug gi bar du nyes byas so //
T08TD4106.2E:191a-9: dngos gzhi la sbyor ba tha dad pa ji snyed brtsams pa re re la nyes byas re re'o //
T08TD4106.2E:191a-10: rnyog pa can gyi sems khros 'khrugs rngam par gyur te /
T08TD4106.2E:191a-11: yi ma rangs pa nyid med pa la nyes byas so //
T08TD4106.2E:191a-12: pha rol pos brdeg par gzas pa dge slong nyams pa dang /
T08TD4106.2E:191a-13: ma chags pa la nyes byas so //
T08TD4106.2E:191a-14: dge slong ma dang chos 'di pa'i rab tu byung ba pho mos bsnyen par ma rdzogs pa la nyes byas so //
T08TD4106.2E:191a-15: phyi rol pa'i rab tu byung ba dang khyim pa mi'i 'gro ba pa la nyes byas so //
T08TD4106.2E:191a-16: mi ma yin pa'i 'gro ba dang /
T08TD4106.2E:191a-17: dud 'gro la nyes byas na smad do //
T08TD4106.2E:191a-18: rang la brdeg par gzas na nyes byas so //
T08TD4106.2E:191a-19: ka ba dang rtsig pa dang sa dang shing ljon pa dang gzhan la yang brdeg par gzas na nyes byas so //
T08TD4106.2E:191a-20: sbyor ba'i sbyor ba'i ltung ba ni nyes byas phra mo ste /
T08TD4106.2E:191a-21: sbyor ba ci snyed pa la sbyor ba'i sbyor ba yang de snyed de /
T08TD4106.2E:191a-22: sbyor ba nyes byas kyi sbyor ba'i sbyor ba yang nyes byas te nyes byas phra mo'o //
T08TD4106.2E:191a-23: ltung ba med pa ni brnangs pa bsal ba dang /
T08TD4106.2E:191a-24: thal lcag gi rig sngags sgrub par gzas pa la ltung ba med do //
T08TD4106.2E:191a-25: dgos pa'i dbang gis shing gshegs pa dang sa brdung ba la sogs par gzas pa la ltung ba med do //
T08TD4106.2E:191a-29: tshor ba dag gis nyen pa la ltung ba med do //
T08TD4106.2E:191a-30: bslab par bya ba ni dge slong gis yul thams cad la gnas skabs thams cad du gzas pa'i ltung byed du 'gyur ba rnam pa thams cad mi bsten par bslab par bya'o //
T08TD4106.2E:191a-31: brdeg par gzas pa gzhan yin la //
T08TD4106.2E:191a-32: gzhan dang gzhan la brdeg par gzas par mi bya'o //
T08TD4106.2E:191a-33: ka ba la brdeg par gzas par mi bya'o //
T08TD4106.2E:191a-34: rtsig pa dang sa dang shing ljon pa dang /
T08TD4106.2E:191a-35: sgo glegs la sogs pa gzhan la yang brdeg par gzas par mi bya'o //
T08TD4106.2E:191a-36: phyir bcos pa ni snga ma bzhin no //
T08TD4106.2E:191a-37: gzas pa'i ltung byed de bzhi bcu dgu pa bshad zin to /
T08TD4106.2E:191b-0: // / @191b gnas ngan len 'chab ba'i ltung byed kyi gleng gzhi ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so //
T08TD4106.2E:191b-1: dga' bo la lhan cig gnas pa'i dge slong chos zhes bya ba ngo tsha shes pa /
T08TD4106.2E:191b-4: bslab pa 'dod pa zhig yod pa des ci srid du de gnas ngan len de kun du spyod par mi shes pa de srid du de dang lhan cig gnas so //
T08TD4106.2E:191b-5: gang gi tshe des de gnas ngan len kun du spyod par shes pa de'i tshe na de rang bzhin du gnas pa'i dge slong rnams dang lhan cig gnas par brtsams te /
T08TD4106.2E:191b-6: bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' lung gis dus gsum du rkang pa la phyag 'tshal du 'gro ba 'ba' zhig byed do //
T08TD4106.2E:191b-7: de dga' bo'i gan du song ste /
T08TD4106.2E:191b-8: mkhan po gdugs la spyod du mchi'o zhes zhus pa dang /
T08TD4106.2E:191b-9: nye dgas de thos nas smras pa /
T08TD4106.2E:191b-10: bu chos kho bo'i stan yang khyer la song shig / des de'i stan khyer te nyin mo spyod du song nas des de'i stan de shing ljon pa zhig gi drung du gzhag ste dben pa'i phyogs su 'dug nas yid la byed pa bskyed par brtsams pa dang /
T08TD4106.2E:191b-11: de'i 'og tu nye dga' 'ongs nas chos kyis smras pa /
T08TD4106.2E:191b-12: slob dpon gdan shing ljon pa'i drung du gzhag gi der bzhud la bzhugs shig / nye dga' der song nas mgo g-yogs te 'dug pa dang /
T08TD4106.2E:191b-13: der des mos pa ma rnyed nas stan las langs te phyogs bzhir rnam par blta bar brtsams pa dang /
T08TD4106.2E:191b-14: ci tsam na bu mo zhig rgyal byed kyi tshal gyi rib ma 'dral ba mthong nas /
T08TD4106.2E:191b-15: nye dga' song ste smras pa /
T08TD4106.2E:191b-16: bu mo khyod ci'i phyir rgyal byed kyi tshal gyi rib ma 'dral bar byed /
T08TD4106.2E:191b-17: bu mo des 'dzum phyung ba dang /
T08TD4106.2E:191b-18: nye dgas de'i yan lag dang nyid lag dag nas mnams te 'o byas nas /
T08TD4106.2E:191b-19: des chos kyi gan du song ste dris pa /
T08TD4106.2E:191b-20: bu chos khyod kyis cung zad mthong ngam /
T08TD4106.2E:191b-21: slob dpon gzhug 'jug pa 'ba' zhig ma gtogs pa gzhan thams cad mthong ngo //
T08TD4106.2E:191b-22: bu chos su la yang ma zer cig / slob dpon ji srid du rang bzhin du gnas pa'i dge slong ma mthong ba de srid kyi bar du su la yang mi mchi'o //
T08TD4106.2E:191b-24: kho bo khyod kyi mkhan po'i gnas ngan len gyi ltung ba 'chab par byed na khyod kho bo'i 'chab par mi byed dam /
T08TD4106.2E:192a-0: sleb dpon khyod 'chab par mdzad kyang bdag gis 'chab par mi bgyid do zhes zer ba'i skabs de @192a * //
T08TD4106.2E:192a-1: dge slong rnams la brjod pa dang /
T08TD4106.2E:192a-2: dge slong don nyung du dag ci'i phyir dge slong dag shes bzhin du dge slong gi gnas ngan len gyi ltung ba 'chab par byed ces smod par byed /
T08TD4106.2E:192a-4: bzer bar byed pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol to //
T08TD4106.2E:192a-5: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byung ba 'di dang /
T08TD4106.2E:192a-7: skabs 'di la dge slong gi dge 'dun bsdu ba mdzad de /
T08TD4106.2E:192a-9: dge sbyong gi tshul ma yin pa /
T08TD4106.2E:192a-10: rjes su mthun pa ma yin pa /
T08TD4106.2E:192a-12: tshul dang mthun pa ma yin pa de ni rab tu byung bas bya ba ma yin no zhes rnam grangs du mar rnam par smad de /
T08TD4106.2E:192a-13: bslab pa bca' ba'i phan yon bcu yang dag par gzigs pas nga'i nyan thos rnams kyis 'dul ba la bslab pa'i gzhi 'di ltar gdon par bya ste /
T08TD4106.2E:192a-14: yang dge slong gang shes bzhin du dge slong gi gnas ngan len gyi ltung ba 'chab na ltung byed do zhes bca' ba mdzad de /
T08TD4106.2E:192a-17: nyon mongs pa ni nyes pa brtsams pa /
T08TD4106.2E:192a-18: nyes pa ni shes bzhin du dge slong gi gnas ngan len 'chab pa'o //
T08TD4106.2E:192a-19: de la yang dge slong gang zhes bya ba ni sh'akya'i bu nye dga' 'am gzhan yang de lta bu gang yin pa'o //
T08TD4106.2E:192a-20: shes bzhin du zhes bya ba ni de rang nyid kyis rig par 'gyur ba'am gzhan dag gis brjod pa'o //
T08TD4106.2E:192a-21: dge slong gis zhes bya ba ni chos 'di pa'o //
T08TD4106.2E:192a-22: gnas ngan len gyi ltung byed ces bya ba ni gnas ngan len gnyis te /
T08TD4106.2E:192a-23: pham par 'gyur ba kun nas slong ba dang /
T08TD4106.2E:192a-24: dge 'dun lhag ma kun nas slong ba'o //
T08TD4106.2E:192a-25: ci'i phyir de dag gnas ngan len ces bya zhe na /
T08TD4106.2E:192a-27: kun nas slong ba las so //
T08TD4106.2E:192a-28: 'chab na zhes bya ba ni mkhyud na'o //
T08TD4106.2E:192a-29: ltung byed do zhes bya ba ni snga ma bzhin no //
T08TD4106.2E:192a-30: de la ltung ba ji ltar 'gyur zhe na /
T08TD4106.2E:192a-33: sbyor ba'i sbyor bas ltung ba rnam par gzhag pa dang /
T08TD4106.2E:192a-36: phyir bcos pa rnams kyis 'di'i mtshan nyid shes par bya'o //
T08TD4106.2E:192a-37: de la 'dir dngos gzhi'i ltung ba rnam par gzhag pa ni dge slong gis shes bzhin du dge slong gi pham par 'gyur ba dang /
T08TD4106.2E:192a-38: dge 'dun lhag ma'i ltung ba 'chab na bde ba la mi reg pa dang /
T08TD4106.2E:192a-40: tshangs par spyod pa'i bar chad dang /
T08TD4106.2E:192b-0: dge @192b 'dun 'khrug tu dogs pa'i dbang nyid ma gtogs pa nyin mtshan gcig gi skya rengs dang po shar ba'i mthar gnas ngan len 'chab pa'i ltung byed kyi dngos gzhir 'gyur ro //
T08TD4106.2E:192b-1: dge slong gis pha rol po pham par 'gyur ba 'am /
T08TD4106.2E:192b-2: dge 'dun lhag ma'i ltung ba byung ba nyid la der 'du shes pa dang /
T08TD4106.2E:192b-3: yid gnyis za bzhin du 'chab pa la na smad pa med do //
T08TD4106.2E:192b-4: bdag la de ma bcabs pa'i gzhi 'dis bde ba la mi reg pa'i dbang nyid dang /
T08TD4106.2E:192b-5: dge sbyong gi tshul gyi bar chad kyi dbang nyid dang tshangs par spyod pa'i bar chad kyi dbang nyid dang /
T08TD4106.2E:192b-6: dge 'dun 'khrug tu dogs pa'i dbang nyid ma gtogs par dge slong gi pham par 'gyur ba dang /
T08TD4106.2E:192b-7: dge 'dun lhag ma'i ltung ba 'chab pa la na smad pa med do //
T08TD4106.2E:192b-8: de dag gi dbang gis bcabs pa la ni ltung ba med pa'i phyir ro //
T08TD4106.2E:192b-9: de la bde ba la mi reg pa'i dbang nyid ces bya ba ni gal te de ma bcabs pa'i gzhi des bdag nyid la srog gi bar chad la sogs pa'i sdug bsngal 'byung bar 'gyur ba'o //
T08TD4106.2E:192b-10: dge sbyong gi tshul gyi bar chad kyi dbang nyid ces bya ba ni gal te de ma bcabs pa'i gzhi des bdag la 'phags pa'i lam gyi bar chad 'byung bar 'gyur ba'o //
T08TD4106.2E:192b-11: tshangs par spyod pa'i bar chad kyi dbang nyid ces bya ba ni gal te de ma bcabs pa'i gzhi des de dag la tshangs par spyod pa'i bar chad 'byung bar 'gyur ba'o //
T08TD4106.2E:192b-12: dge 'dun 'khrug tu dogs pa'i dbang nyid ces bya ba ni gal te de ma bcabs pa'i gzhi des dge 'dun dbye ba dang /
T08TD4106.2E:192b-16: nyin mtshan gcig gi skya rengs dang po shar ba'i mthar 'chab pa la na smad pa med do //
T08TD4106.2E:192b-17: de yang gang zag gi gzhi 'khor dang bcas pa'i skabs nas de'i mod la mthol bar bya ba'i gang zag dge slong bsnyen par rdzogs pa rang bzhin du gnas pa lta ba dang mtshan mthun pa mtshams kyi nang na gnas pa yod bzhin du 'chab pa'i sems bskyed de /
T08TD4106.2E:192b-18: ci srid du skya rengs shar ba'i bar du mi mthol ba la dngos gzhir rnam par gzhag go //
T08TD4106.2E:192b-19: de'i mod la gang la mthol bar bya ba'i gang zag de lta bu med na skya rengs ma shar gyi bar du 'chab pa'i nyes pa med do //
T08TD4106.2E:193a-0: ji srid du gang la mthol bar bya ba'i gang zag ma rnyed pa de srid du skya rengs shar kyang ma mthol ba @193a * //
T08TD4106.2E:193a-1: la 'chab pa'i nyes pa med do //
T08TD4106.2E:193a-2: gang la mthol bar bya ba'i gang zag med na ji srid du gang la mthol bar bya ba'i gang zag ma rnyed pa de srid du mthol ba'i sems med pa la 'chab pa'i nyes pa med do //
T08TD4106.2E:193a-3: gang la mthol bar bya ba'i gang zag yod du zin kyang rkyen 'ga' zhig gis bdag nyid 'gro ba'i skabs med dam /
T08TD4106.2E:193a-4: bdag nyid gnas de nas gzhan du song bar gyur na de'i bar du mthol ba'i sems med pa la 'chab pa'i nyes pa med do //
T08TD4106.2E:193a-5: gang la mthol bar bya ba'i gang zag yod du zin kyang ltung ba yod pa de 'di snyam du gal te de'i gan du song ba ma brjod na 'chab pa'i nyes par 'gyur du dogs pas de'i dbang gis der mi 'gro 'am gzhan du song bas brjod par ma byas pa la yang 'chab ba'i nyes pa med do //
T08TD4106.2E:193a-6: rkyen cis kyang ma bskal ba'i bar de'i gan du mi 'gro ba dang /
T08TD4106.2E:193a-7: skya rengs kyi mdun rol du mi mthol ba dang /
T08TD4106.2E:193a-8: 'chab pa'i sems bskyed pa dag ni nyes byas su 'gyur la skya rengs dang po shar ba'i mthar ni dngos gzhir 'gyur ro zhes gsungs pa 'am bye brag gzhan dag kyang skabs 'dir shes par bya'o //
T08TD4106.2E:193a-9: 'di'i byed pa po ni dge slong gzhan gyi pham par 'gyur ba dang /
T08TD4106.2E:193a-10: dge 'dun lhag ma'i ltung ba byung ba nyid la 'du shes gtso cher byed pa po nyid yin no //
T08TD4106.2E:193a-11: 'di la yan ldas las dngos gzhi'i ltung bar 'gyur te /
T08TD4106.2E:193a-12: dge slong gzhan gyi pham par 'gyur ba 'am dge 'dun lhag ma kun nas slong ba'i gnas ngan len byung ba nyid dang /
T08TD4106.2E:193a-15: bdag la gzhi des bde ba la mi reg pa dang /
T08TD4106.2E:193a-16: dge sbyong gi tshul dang tshangs par spyod pa'i bar chad dang /
T08TD4106.2E:193a-17: dge 'dun 'khrug tu dogs pa'i dbang nyid ma gtogs pa dang /
T08TD4106.2E:193a-18: nyin mtshan gyi mthar thug pa'o //
T08TD4106.2E:193a-19: de dag las yan lag ma tshang na ci rigs par na smad do //
T08TD4106.2E:193a-20: sbyor ba'i ltung ba ni nyes byas te /
T08TD4106.2E:193a-21: ji srid du gnas ngan len 'chab pa'i ltung byed kyi sbyor ba brtsams nas dngos gzhi la ma thug gi bar du nyes byas so ;
T08TD4106.2E:193a-22: / dngos gzhi la sbyor ba tha dad pa ji snyed brtsams pa re re la nyes byas re re'o //
T08TD4106.2E:193a-23: skya rengs ma shar gyi snga rol du nyes byas so //
T08TD4106.2E:193a-25: dge 'dun lhag ma'i gnas ngan len gyi ltung ba de gnyis ma gtogs pa'i ltung ba gzhan 'chab pa la ni sbyor ba dang /
T08TD4106.2E:193b-0: dngos gzhi gnyis ka @193b la nyes byas so //
T08TD4106.2E:193b-1: dge slong la gnas ngan len ma byung bar der 'du shes pa dang /
T08TD4106.2E:193b-2: yid gnyis za ba la nyes byas so //
T08TD4106.2E:193b-3: sbyor ba'i skyor ba'i ltung ba ni nyes byas phra mo ste /
T08TD4106.2E:193b-4: sbyor ba ji snyed pa la sbyor ba'i sbyor ba yang de snyed de /
T08TD4106.2E:193b-5: sbyor ba nyes byas kyi sbyor ba'i sbyor ba yang nyes byas te nyes byas phra mo'o //
T08TD4106.2E:193b-6: ltung ba med pa ni bde ba la mi reg pa dang dge sbyong gi tshul dang /
T08TD4106.2E:193b-7: tshangs par spyod pa'i bar chad dang /
T08TD4106.2E:193b-8: dge 'dun 'khrug tu dogs pa'i dbang nyid kyis 'chab pa la ltung ba med do //
T08TD4106.2E:193b-9: gang la mthol bar bya ba'i gang zag dge slong bsnyen par rdzogs pa rang bzhin du gnas pa lta ba dang mtshan mthun pa mtshams kyi nang na 'dug pa ma rnyed kyi bar du ltung ba med do //
T08TD4106.2E:193b-13: tshor ba dag gis nyen pa la ltung ba med do //
T08TD4106.2E:193b-14: bslab par bya ba ni dge slong gis yul thams cad la gnas skabs thams cad du gnas ngan len 'chab pa'i ltung byed du 'gyur ba rnam pa thams cad mi bsten par bslab par bya'o //
T08TD4106.2E:193b-15: phyir bcos pa ni snga ma bzhin no //
T08TD4106.2E:193b-16: gnas ngan len 'chab pa'i ltung byed de lnga bcu pa bshad zin to /
T08TD4106.2E:193b-18: // / so sor thar pa'i mdo rgya cher 'grel pa 'dul ba kun las btus pa /
T08TD4106.2E:193b-19: bam po sum cu gnyis pa /
T08TD4106.2E:193b-21: bde dang me dang 'dun pa dang //
T08TD4106.2E:193b-22: bsnyen par ma rdzogs chos dang smra //
T08TD4106.2E:193b-23: dge tshul kha dog bsgyur ba dang //
T08TD4106.2E:193b-24: rin po che dang tsha ba'i dus //
T08TD4106.2E:193b-25: zhes bya ba ni bcu pa drug pa yin te /
T08TD4106.2E:193b-26: sdom la zhes bya ba'i tshig gi don dang dgos pa ni snga ma bzhin no //
T08TD4106.2E:193b-27: bcu pa drug pa 'dis kyang ltung byed kyi chos bcu bstan te /
T08TD4106.2E:193b-31: bsnyen par ma rdzogs pa dang lhan cig nyal ba dang /
T08TD4106.2E:193b-32: lta ba'i rnam pa mi gtong ba dang /
T08TD4106.2E:193b-33: spangs pa'i rjes su phyogs pa dang /
T08TD4106.2E:193b-35: kha ma bsgyur ba'i gos gyon pa dang /
T08TD4106.2E:193b-36: langs pa'i gzhir gtogs pa dang khrus byed pa'i ltung byed do //
T08TD4106.2E:193b-37: de la zan gcod du 'jug pa'i ltung byed kyi gleng gzhi ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so //
T08TD4106.2E:193b-38: dga' bo la lhan cig gnas pa dge slong chos zhes bya ba ngo tsha shes pa /
T08TD4106.2E:194a-1: bslab pa 'dod pa zhig yod pa des ji srid de gnas ngan len kun du spyod par mi shes pa de srid du de dang lhan cig gnas so //
T08TD4106.2E:194a-2: gang gi tshe des de gnas ngan len kun du spyod par shes pa de'i tshe na rang bzhin du gnas pa'i dge slong rnams dang lhan cig gnas par brtsams te /
T08TD4106.2E:194a-3: bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' lung gis dus gsum du rkang pa la phyag 'tshal du 'gro ba 'ba' zhig byed do //
T08TD4106.2E:194a-4: nye dgas dga' bo la smras pa /
T08TD4106.2E:194a-5: slob dpon chos 'di kho bo sangs rgyas la sogs ba dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi mdun du mtho btsams pa la ltos kho bos kyang 'di la nges par gnod pa cung zhig bya'o //
T08TD4106.2E:194a-7: dge slong chos 'di ni ngo tsha shes pa 'gyod pa dang ldan pa /
T08TD4106.2E:194a-9: bslab pa 'dod pa yin pas khyod kyis 'di la gnod pa ci zhig byar yod /
T08TD4106.2E:194a-10: nges par 'di'i zan gcad par bya'o //
T08TD4106.2E:194a-12: khyim bdag cig gis dga' bo dang nye dga' gnyis zan la mgron du bos pa dang /
T08TD4106.2E:194a-14: deng chos 'di pa'i zan gcad par bya'o snyam nas /
T08TD4106.2E:194a-15: chos kyis dga' bo'i gan du bsod snyoms la 'gro bar zhur 'ongs pa'i tshe dga' bos chos la smras pa /
T08TD4106.2E:194a-16: chos kho bo cag deng khyim bdag cig gis zan la mgron du bos kyis tshur gshegs la de nyid du zan zo shig / des smras pa /
T08TD4106.2E:194a-17: lhung bzed dang chu tshags blangs te mchi'o //
T08TD4106.2E:194a-19: der lhung bzed dang chu tshags kyis ci bya /
T08TD4106.2E:194a-20: der snod bkrus pa dag dang /
T08TD4106.2E:194a-21: chu btsags pa dag 'thob kyis tshur shog 'dong ngo //
T08TD4106.2E:194a-22: de de gnyis dang lhan cig mnyan yod du zhugs pa dang /
T08TD4106.2E:194a-23: de gnyis sngon du song ste /
T08TD4106.2E:194a-25: nye dga' khyim bdag de'i khyim du song ste zan zos nas phyir 'ongs so //
T08TD4106.2E:194a-26: de'i 'og tu yang dga' bo yang khyim bdag de'i khyim du song ste zan za zhing 'dug go //
T08TD4106.2E:194a-27: chos kyis nye dga' la smras pa /
T08TD4106.2E:194a-28: slob dpon gdugs tshod la bab kyi bzhud do //
T08TD4106.2E:194a-30: der thams cad sta gon byas zin pas der song ste bza' ba las gzhan ba'i bya ba ci yang med kyi gdugs tshod kyi kha kho nar 'dong ngo //
T08TD4106.2E:194a-31: chos langs te rkang pa gnyis kyis grib tshod gzhal bar brtsams pa dang /
T08TD4106.2E:194b-0: glen pa @194b khyod kho bo cag gis bslab pa la cung zad yid mi ches sam /
T08TD4106.2E:194b-1: ci khyod kyi snying lam na kho bo cag dus ma yin par za bar 'gyur snyam mam /
T08TD4106.2E:194b-2: kho bo khyod dang lhan cig tu smra 'am 'dug pa bde ba ma yin gyi /
T08TD4106.2E:194b-3: 'di ltar kho bo cag gcig pu kho na smra 'am 'dug na bdes khyod song shig / chos kyis bsams pa /
T08TD4106.2E:194b-4: gal te bdag gis lhung bzed dang chu tshags khyer te 'ongs par gyur na bdag bsod snyoms la rgyu bar 'gyur na /
T08TD4106.2E:194b-5: da ni ci byar yang med do snyam nas de gtsug lag khang du song ste ci srid du de'i lus las mdangs ma yal ba de srid du dge ba'i phyogs la tron byas nas /
T08TD4106.2E:194b-6: gang gi tshe de'i lus las mdangs yal ba de'i tshe na glos phab ste nyal ba dang /
T08TD4106.2E:194b-7: dge slong rnams kyis de la smras pa /
T08TD4106.2E:194b-8: tshe dang ldan pa chos gal te zan gzhan gyi yin zhes te lto yang gzhan gyi yin nam /
T08TD4106.2E:194b-9: ji na ci tsam gyis dge ba'i phyogs la tron byed kyang mi nus pa de tsam gyi zan zos so //
T08TD4106.2E:194b-13: des skabs de rgyas par brjod pa dang /
T08TD4106.2E:194b-14: dge slong don nyung du dag ci'i phyir dge slong dag ched du bsams te dge slong gi zan gcod du 'jug ces smod par byed /
T08TD4106.2E:194b-16: kha zer bar byed pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol to //
T08TD4106.2E:194b-17: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byung ba 'di dang gleng gzhi 'di dang skabs 'di la dge slong gi dge 'dun bsdu ba mdzad de /
T08TD4106.2E:194b-19: dge sbyong gi tshul ma yin pa /
T08TD4106.2E:194b-20: rjes su mthun pa ma yin pa /
T08TD4106.2E:194b-22: tshul dang mthun pa ma yin pa de ni rab tu byung bas bya ba ma yin no zhes rnam grangs du mar rnam par smad de /
T08TD4106.2E:194b-23: bslab pa bca' ba'i phan yon bcu yang dag par gzigs pas nga'i nyan thos rnams kyis 'dul ba la bslab pa'i gzhi 'di ltar gdon par bya ste /
T08TD4106.2E:194b-24: yang dge slong gang klan ka tshol zhing ci nas kyang dge slong 'di la klan ka btsal bar 'gyur ro snyam pa de nyid rkyen du byas te /
T08TD4106.2E:194b-25: dge slong dag la 'di skad ces tshe dang ldan pa tshur shog khyim dag tu 'dod dang //
T08TD4106.2E:195a-0: der khyed la bca' ba dang bza' ba bsod pa ci tsam 'dod pa sbyin du gzhug go zhes smras nas des de la sbyin du ma bcug @195a * //
T08TD4106.2E:195a-1: par de'i 'og tu 'di skad ces tshe dang ldan pa kho bo khyod dang lhan cig smra'am 'dug pa bde ba ma yin gyi /
T08TD4106.2E:195a-2: 'di ltar kho bo gcig pu kho na smra'am 'dug na bdes khyod song shig ces zer na ltung byed do zhes bca' ba mdzad de /
T08TD4106.2E:195a-5: nyon mongs pa ni zhe dku /
T08TD4106.2E:195a-6: nyes pa ni ched du bsams te dge slong gi zan gcod du 'jud pa'o //
T08TD4106.2E:195a-7: de la yang dge slong gang zhes bya ba ni sh'akya'i bu nye dga' 'am /
T08TD4106.2E:195a-8: gzhan yang de lta bu gang yin pa'o //
T08TD4106.2E:195a-9: klan ka tshol zhing ci nas kyang dge slong 'di la klan ka btsal bar 'gyur ro snyam pa zhes bya ba ni ji nas kyang dge slong 'di zan gcod du 'jug par 'gyur ro snyam pa'o //
T08TD4106.2E:195a-10: de nyid rkyen du byas te zhes bya ba ni gzhan ma yin pa'o //
T08TD4106.2E:195a-11: dge slong la zhes bya ba ni chos 'di pa'o //
T08TD4106.2E:195a-12: 'di skad ces bya ba ni 'di skad ces smras nas so //
T08TD4106.2E:195a-13: tshe dang ldan pa tshur shog khyim dag tu 'dod dang zhes bya ba ni bram ze dang khyim bdag gi khyim dag tu'o //
T08TD4106.2E:195a-14: der khyod la bca' ba dang bza' ba bsod pa zhes bya ba ni bca' ba lnga po dang /
T08TD4106.2E:195a-15: bza' ba lnga po dag go //
T08TD4106.2E:195a-16: ci tsam 'dod pa sbyin du gzhug go zhes smras nas zhes bya ba ni ji tsam gyis chog pa'o //
T08TD4106.2E:195a-17: des de la sbyin du ma bcug par de'i 'og tu 'di skad ces tshe dang ldan pa kho bo khyod dang lhan cig smra 'am 'dug pa bde ba ma yin gyi /
T08TD4106.2E:195a-18: 'di ltar kho bo gcig pu kho na smra 'am 'dug na bdes khyod song shig ces zer na zhes bya ba ni de skad ces zer na'o //
T08TD4106.2E:195a-19: ltung byed do zhes bya ba ni sems can dmyal ba dang /
T08TD4106.2E:195a-23: log par ltung ba dag tu sreg par byed /
T08TD4106.2E:195a-26: gzhan yang ji srid du ltung ba de ma bshags shing so sor ma bshags na dge ba'i chos rnams la sgrib par byed pa ste /
T08TD4106.2E:195a-27: des na ltung byed do zhes gsungs so //
T08TD4106.2E:195a-28: de la ltung ba ji ltar 'gyur zhe na /
T08TD4106.2E:195a-31: sbyor ba'i sbyor bas ltung ba rnam par gzhag pa dang /
T08TD4106.2E:195b-0: phyir bcos pa rnams kyis 'di'i @195b mtshan nyid shes par bya'o //
T08TD4106.2E:195b-1: de la 'dir dngos gzhi'i ltung ba rnam par gzhag pa ni dge slong dag dge slong pha rol po'i nang kyi gnyen po'i don nyid ma gtogs par ched du bsams te khyim pa sbyin pa po tshig gis bsgo bas zan gcod du bcug na zan gcod du 'jug pa'i ltung byed kyi dngos gzhir 'gyur ro //
T08TD4106.2E:195b-2: dge slong pha rol po'i nad kyi gnyen po'i don du zan gcod du 'jug pa ma gtogs pa la na smad pa med do //
T08TD4106.2E:195b-3: klan ka'i bsam pas ched du bsams pa la na smad pa med do //
T08TD4106.2E:195b-4: sbyin bdag khyim pa yin pa la na smad pa med do //
T08TD4106.2E:195b-5: tshig gis bsgo bas zan gcod du bcug pa lan smad pa med do //
T08TD4106.2E:195b-6: zan gcod par bya ba dge slong nyid yin pa la na smad pa med do //
T08TD4106.2E:195b-7: 'di'i byed pa po ni zan gcod par bya ba dge slong nyid dang /
T08TD4106.2E:195b-8: sbyin bdag khyim pa dang zas nyid do /
T08TD4106.2E:195b-9: 'di la yan lag lngas dngos gzhi'i ltung bar 'gyur te /
T08TD4106.2E:195b-11: zan gcod par bya ba dge slong nyid dang /
T08TD4106.2E:195b-12: nad kyi gnyen po'i don nyid ma gtogs pa dang /
T08TD4106.2E:195b-13: sbyin pa po khyim pa nyid dang /
T08TD4106.2E:195b-14: tshig gis bsgo bas zan gcod du bcug pa'o //
T08TD4106.2E:195b-15: de dag las yan lag ma tshang na ci rigs par na smad do //
T08TD4106.2E:195b-16: sbyor ba'i ltung ba ni nyes byas te /
T08TD4106.2E:195b-17: ji srid du zan gcod du 'jug pa'i ltung byed kyi sbyor ba brtsams nas dngos gzhi la ma thug gi bar du nyes byas so //
T08TD4106.2E:195b-18: dngos gzhi la sbyor ba tha dad pa ji snyed brtsams pa re re la nyes byas re re'o //
T08TD4106.2E:195b-19: ched du ma bsams par gya tshom du zan gcod du 'jug pa la nyes byas so //
T08TD4106.2E:195b-20: zan gcod par bya ba dge slong nyid ma yin pa la nyes byas so //
T08TD4106.2E:195b-21: sbyin pa po khyim pa nyid ma yin pa mu stegs can gyi khyim la sogs pa dag la nyes byas so //
T08TD4106.2E:195b-22: tshig gis bsgo ba ma yin pa spring yig dang /
T08TD4106.2E:195b-27: zur gyis gcod du bcug pa la nyes byas so //
T08TD4106.2E:195b-28: zas bca' ba lnga dang bza' ba lnga'i khongs su gtogs pa las gzhan pa la nyes byas so //
T08TD4106.2E:195b-29: sbyor ba'i sbyor ba'i ltung ba ni nyes byas phra mo ste /
T08TD4106.2E:195b-30: sbyor ba ji snyed pa la sbyor ba'i sbyor ba yang de snyed de /
T08TD4106.2E:196a-1: kyi sbyor ba'i sbyor ba yang nyes byas te nyes byas phra mo'o //
T08TD4106.2E:196a-2: ltung ba med pa ni nad kyi gnyen po'i don nyid kyis zan gcod du 'jug pa la nyes pa med do //
T08TD4106.2E:196a-6: tshor ba dag gis nyen pa la ltung ba med do //
T08TD4106.2E:196a-7: bslab par bya ba ni dge slong gis yul thams cad la gnas skabs thams cad du zan gcod du 'jug pa'i ltung byed du 'gyur ba rnam pa thams cad mi bsten par bslab par bya'o //
T08TD4106.2E:196a-8: zhe dku dang klan ka btsal bar mi bya'o //
T08TD4106.2E:196a-9: phyir bcos pa ni snga ma bzhin no //
T08TD4106.2E:196a-10: zan gcod du 'jug pa'i ltung byed de lnga bcu gcig pa bshad zin to /
T08TD4106.2E:196a-12: // / me la reg pa'i ltung byed kyi gleng gzhi ni byung ba dang /
T08TD4106.2E:196a-14: gnang ba'i dbang gis rnam pa gsum ste /
T08TD4106.2E:196a-15: byung ba'i gleng gzhi ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' rab na bzhugs so //
T08TD4106.2E:196a-16: de nas mnyan yod pa'i tshong pa rab tu mang po dag bcom ldan 'das gal der song ste phyin nas /
T08TD4106.2E:196a-17: bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te mtha' gcig tu 'khod do //
T08TD4106.2E:196a-18: mtha' gcig tu 'khod nas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod pa'i tshong pa rab tu mang po dag la chos dang ldan pa'i bka' mchid kyis yang dag par ston par mdzad /
T08TD4106.2E:196a-19: yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug par mdzad /
T08TD4106.2E:196a-20: yang dag par gzengs stod par mdzad /
T08TD4106.2E:196a-21: yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad do //
T08TD4106.2E:196a-22: rnam grangs du mar chos dang ldan pa'i bka' mchid kyis yang dag par bstan /
T08TD4106.2E:196a-23: yang dag par 'dzin du bcug / yang dag par gzengs bstod /
T08TD4106.2E:196a-24: yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad nas cang mi gsung ngo //
T08TD4106.2E:196a-25: de nas mnyan yod pa'i tshong pa rab tu mang po dag gis bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa la mngon par dga' ba dang rjes su yi rang ba byas nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo ga la ba der song ste phyag 'tshal nas smras pa /
T08TD4106.2E:196b-0: btsun pa kun dga' bo bcom ldan 'das dbyar gnas @196b par zhal gyis bzhes nas gang du gshegs par 'gyur /
T08TD4106.2E:196b-1: shes ldan dag sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus shig / btsun pa kun dga' bo bcom ldan 'das ni bsnyen par dka' ba dang bzod par dka' ba lags pas bdag cag gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhu ba'i rdo mi thogs so //
T08TD4106.2E:196b-2: btsun pa kun dga' bos mtshan ma 'am bka' mchid kyis bcom ldan 'das dbyar gnas par zhal gyis bzhes nas phyogs gang du gshegs par 'gyur ba ji ltar mkhyen /
T08TD4106.2E:196b-3: shes ldan dag bcom ldan 'das dbyar gnas par zhal gyis bzhes nas phyogs gang du gshegs par bzhed pa'i phyogs de logs su zhal gzigs shing bzhugs la de dag gi bsngags pa yang brjod par mdzad do //
T08TD4106.2E:196b-4: da ltar ni bcom ldan 'das ma ga dh'ara gzigs shing bzhugs la /
T08TD4106.2E:196b-5: rgyal po'i khab pa'i mi dag gi bsngags pa yang brjod par mdzad do //
T08TD4106.2E:196b-6: de nas mnyan yod pa'i tshong pa rab tu mang po de dag gis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la mngon par dga' ba dang rjes su yi rang ba byas nas phyag 'tshal te mngon du dong nas rgyal po'i khab tu 'dong ba'i zong sta gon byas so //
T08TD4106.2E:196b-7: de nas bcom ldan 'das dbyar gnas par zhal gyis bzhes te dbyar gyi zla ba gsum po de dag 'das nas /
T08TD4106.2E:196b-8: bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa /
T08TD4106.2E:196b-9: kun dga' bo song la dge slong rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa ma ga dh'a dag tu ljongs rgyur gshegs kyis khyed cag las gang de bzhin gshegs pa dang thabs cig tu ma ga dh'a dag tu ljongs rgyur 'gro bar spro ba des chos gos kyi las gyis shig ces bsgo shig / tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos dge slong rnams la de skad ces bsgo ba mnyan yod pa'i tshong pa rab tu mang po de dag gis thos nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste phyin nas /
T08TD4106.2E:196b-10: bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te /
T08TD4106.2E:196b-12: bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang bcas pas mnyan yod nas rgyal po'i khab kyi bar du ji tsam par bdag cag las na bza' dang bsod snyoms dang /
T08TD4106.2E:197a-0: gnas mal dang bsnyung ba'i rkyen dang @197a * //
T08TD4106.2E:197a-1: sman gyi yo byad dag bzhes par ci gnang /
T08TD4106.2E:197a-2: bcom ldan 'das kyis de dag la cang mi gsung bas gnang ngo //
T08TD4106.2E:197a-3: de nas mnyan yod pa'i tshong pa rab tu mang po de dag tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo ga la ba der dong ste phyag 'tshal nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i dgongs mal ji tsam pa dris nas /
T08TD4106.2E:197a-4: 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po'i dgongs mal bzhin du rgyang grags bcu bcur gshegs pa mthong nas /
T08TD4106.2E:197a-5: de dag gis rgyang grags bcu bcur bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang bcas pa'i tshogs dag bshams so //
T08TD4106.2E:197a-6: de nas bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi 'khor dang bcas pa rgyal po'i kha ba ga la ba de logs su ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs so /
T08TD4106.2E:197a-7: tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo tshong pa don mthun gyi mdun du song ba dang /
T08TD4106.2E:197a-8: ji tsam na lam kha brag mthong nas des bcom ldan 'das ma gshegs kyi bar du der bsdad do //
T08TD4106.2E:197a-9: bcom ldan 'das gshegs nas bka' stsal pa /
T08TD4106.2E:197a-10: kun dga' bo khyod ci sdod /
T08TD4106.2E:197a-11: btsun pa 'di ni shul kha brag lags te /
T08TD4106.2E:197a-12: shul 'di ni drang la seng ge'i 'jigs pa dang bcas pa lags /
T08TD4106.2E:197a-13: shul 'di ni 'khyog la bde ba lags na /
T08TD4106.2E:197a-14: shul gang nas mchi bar bgyi /
T08TD4106.2E:197a-15: kun dga' bo lam drang po nas song shig dang /
T08TD4106.2E:197a-16: de bzhin gshegs pa ni seng ge'i 'jigs pa dang bral ba yin no //
T08TD4106.2E:197a-17: de nas bcom ldan 'das shul drang po nas gshegs par brtsams nas ji tsam na lam de na ri brags shig yod pa der byon pa dang /
T08TD4106.2E:197a-18: ri brags de nas byis pa khye'u gnyis shig lam kar 'ongs te rtse zhing 'dug go //
T08TD4106.2E:197a-19: de na gcig gi lag na ni rda pa ta ha thogs so //
T08TD4106.2E:197a-20: cig shos kyi lag na ni gzhu thogs so //
T08TD4106.2E:197a-21: de gnyis kyis bcom ldan 'das mthong nas phyag 'tshal te 'di skad ces gsol to //
T08TD4106.2E:197a-22: bcom ldan 'das tshur gshegs su gsol /
T08TD4106.2E:197a-23: bcom ldan 'das byon pa legs so //
T08TD4106.2E:197a-24: bcom ldan 'das 'jigs pa dang bcas pa'i shul du gar gshegs //
T08TD4106.2E:197a-25: 'on kyang bcom ldan 'das mi bsnyengs su gsol /
T08TD4106.2E:197a-26: bdag cag gnyis gyis bcom ldan 'das kyi bsel bgyi'o //
T08TD4106.2E:197b-0: de nas dad pa skyes pa gcig gis ni rda pa ta @197b ha brdungs /
T08TD4106.2E:197b-1: dad pa skyes pa cig shos kyis ni gzhu bdungs te de gnyis kyis bcom ldan 'das kyi mdun du 'gro bar brtsams pa dang /
T08TD4106.2E:197b-2: bcom ldan 'das 'di snyam du dgongs te khye'u 'di gnyis kyis dge ba'i rtsa ba dag bskyed do snyam du rig nas bcom ldan 'das kyis khye'u de gnyis la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
T08TD4106.2E:197b-3: khye'u gnyis phyir log shig / de bzhin gshegs pa ni seng ge'i 'jigs pa dang bral ba yin no //
T08TD4106.2E:197b-4: de gnyis kyis bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas song ba dang /
T08TD4106.2E:197b-6: zhal gyi sgo nas 'od zer bkye nas ngan song dang mtho ris dang /
T08TD4106.2E:197b-7: stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad khyab par mdzad de /
T08TD4106.2E:197b-8: 'od zer de dag gis bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te bcom ldan 'das kyi mdzod spur nub po //
T08TD4106.2E:197b-9: de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos zhus nas bcom ldan 'das kyis khye'u de gnyis dge ba'i rtsa ba de dang legs par spyad pa des bskal pa bcu gsum du log par ltung bar 'gro bar mi 'gyur zhing lha dang mi rnams su mtshams sbyor zhing 'khod nas /
T08TD4106.2E:197b-13: lus tha ma thob pa na /
T08TD4106.2E:197b-15: dge ba'i rtsa ba de nyid dang /
T08TD4106.2E:197b-16: legs par spyad pa de nyid kyis rab tu byung nas rang byang chub mngon du byed par 'gyur te /
T08TD4106.2E:197b-17: gcig ni rang sangs rgyas rda sgra zhes bya bar 'gyur /
T08TD4106.2E:197b-18: cig shos ni rang sangs rgyas 'jigs sbyin zhes bya bar 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan to //
T08TD4106.2E:197b-19: de nas bcom ldan 'das grong med pa'i dgon pa'i gnas shig tu mtshan mo gnas par zhal gyis bzhes so //
T08TD4106.2E:197b-20: bcom ldan 'das kyis shing ljon pa yang rgan rims kyis bsko bar bya'o zhes bka' stsal pas /
T08TD4106.2E:197b-21: drug sde dag gis shing ljon pa khong stong zhig thob nas /
T08TD4106.2E:197b-22: de dag grang ba dag gis shing ljon shing pa khong stong de la me btang ba dang /
T08TD4106.2E:197b-23: shing ljon pa khong stong de la sbrul dug myur du khyab par byed pa zhig gnas pa de du bas dkrugs nas steng gi yal ga la 'dzegs te 'phyang zhing 'dug go //
T08TD4106.2E:198a-0: drug sde dag gis de mthong nas @198a * //
T08TD4106.2E:198a-1: byung ngo byung ngo zhes smras pa dang /
T08TD4106.2E:198a-2: tshong pa don mthun dag gis de thos nas bsams pa /
T08TD4106.2E:198a-3: seng ge byung ngo snyam nas de dag skrag ste phyogs bzhir byer ro //
T08TD4106.2E:198a-4: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa /
T08TD4106.2E:198a-5: kun dga' bo ci'i phyir tshong pa don mthun 'di dag phyogs bzhir byer /
T08TD4106.2E:198a-6: tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos skabs de rgyas par gsol ba dang /
T08TD4106.2E:198a-7: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
T08TD4106.2E:198a-8: kun dga' bo song la tshong pa don mthun dag la de bzhin gshegs pa ni seng ge'i 'jigs pa dang bral ba yin gyi phyir log shig ces bsgo shig / tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos de dag la de skad bsgo nas phyir log par gyur to //
T08TD4106.2E:198a-9: drug sde dag gis tshong pa don mthun gyi tshogs skrag par byas te /
T08TD4106.2E:198a-10: phyogs bzhir byer ba bcom ldan 'das kyis dbugs phyung bar gyur pa'i skabs de las bcom ldan 'das kyis sngon ri bong drug cig mtshe'u 'gram na shing bil ba'i tshal gse ba na 'dug pa na shing bil pa zhig mtshe'u'i nang du rdib pa'i sgra cal zhes zer ba ri bong drug gis thos nas de dag 'bros par brtsams pa /
T08TD4106.2E:198a-11: wa dang sbre dang ri dags dang phag dang /
T08TD4106.2E:198a-12: ma he dang bse dang glang po che dang dom dang dred dang gung dang /
T08TD4106.2E:198a-14: ser ge dag gis brgyud mar thos nas de dag kyang 'bros par brtsams pa na /
T08TD4106.2E:198a-15: ri bong drug dang nye ba zhig na seng ge ral pa can cod pan lta bu dang ldan pa zhig 'dug pa des phyir log cing dbyugs phyung ste /
T08TD4106.2E:198a-16: ri bong drug ni drug sde dag yin la /
T08TD4106.2E:198a-17: wa la sogs pa ri dags kyi tshogs chen po skrag ste byer ba dag ni tshong pa dag yin no //
T08TD4106.2E:198a-18: seng ge ral pa can cod pa na lta bu dang ldan pa dag gis ri dvags kyi tshogs chen po skrag pa phyogs bzhir byer ba dag dbugs phyung bar gyur pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa nyid lags pa'i bka' mchid kyang stsal to //
T08TD4106.2E:198a-19: de ni re zhig byung ba yin te /
T08TD4106.2E:198a-20: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das re zhig 'dul ba la nyan thos rnams kyis bslab pa'i gzhi 'cha' bar ni mi mdzad do //
T08TD4106.2E:198a-21: bcas pa'i gleng gzhi ni de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa /
T08TD4106.2E:198b-0: kun dga' bo @198b song la dge slong dang tshong pa rnams la khyed cag las gang yang don mthun gyi mdun du ma 'gro shig / de bzhin gshegs pa nyid don mthun gyi mdun du gshegs so zhes bsgo shig / tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos de skad bsgo nas de bzhin gshegs pa nyid don mthun gyi mdun du gshegs pa dang /
T08TD4106.2E:198b-1: ci tsam na seng ge ral pa can cod pan lta bu dang ldan pa rngam ste bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dong zhing byung ba dang /
T08TD4106.2E:198b-2: bcom ldan 'das kyis phyag g-yas pa'i mthil du seng ge ral pa can cod pan lta bu dang ldan pa lnga sprul pa mdzad nas /
T08TD4106.2E:198b-3: des de dag gi dri tshor nas skrag ste 'bros par brtsams pa dang /
T08TD4106.2E:198b-4: bcom ldan 'das kyis phyogs bzhir me sprul pa mdzad do //
T08TD4106.2E:198b-5: seng ge nges phyogs bzhir 'bar rab tu 'bar te me lce gcig tu gyur cing 'bar bar mthong ngo //
T08TD4106.2E:198b-6: bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs kyi drung 'ba' zhig na zhi bar mthong nas /
T08TD4106.2E:198b-7: des bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la gtugs pa dang /
T08TD4106.2E:198b-8: bcom ldan 'das kyi phyag 'khor lo dang /
T08TD4106.2E:198b-10: g-yung drung dang dra bas 'brel pa bsod nams brgya phrag du ma las 'khrungs pa 'jigs pa rnams dbugs 'byin par mdzad pas mgo la byugs te bka' stsal pa /
T08TD4106.2E:198b-11: bzhin bzangs khyod sngon gyi nyes par spyad pa dang ldan pas dud 'gro'i skye gnas su skyes te /
T08TD4106.2E:198b-12: khyod da ltar drag shul can lag pa dmar ba /
T08TD4106.2E:198b-13: bsnun pa dang rab tu bsnun pa la zhugs pa gzhan gyi srog 'phrog pa /
T08TD4106.2E:198b-14: gzhan gyi srog gcod du 'jug na gzhan gyi srog gcod pas 'tsho bar byed pa yin pas khyod 'di nas shi 'phos pa'i 'gro ba ni cir 'gyur /
T08TD4106.2E:198b-17: bzhin bzangs 'di ltar 'du byed thams cad ni mi rtag pa'o //
T08TD4106.2E:198b-18: chos thams cad ni bdag med pa'o //
T08TD4106.2E:198b-19: mya ngan las 'das pa ni zhi ba'o zhes tshig gsum gyis chos bstan nas /
T08TD4106.2E:198b-20: bzhin bzangs khyod ngal sems mngon par dad par gyis shig dang des dud 'gro'i skye gnas su 'dod chags dang bral bar 'gyur ro zhes bka' stsal to //
T08TD4106.2E:198b-21: dge slong dag seng ge de la reg par byed pa na de sgra 'byin to //
T08TD4106.2E:199a-1: dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa /
T08TD4106.2E:199a-2: dge slong dag khyod seng ge la ma reg shig de ci'i phyir zhe na /
T08TD4106.2E:199a-3: dge slong dag seng ge ni bzod par dka' ba dag dang bsnyen par dka' ba yin pa'i phyir ro //
T08TD4106.2E:199a-4: dge slong dag de lta bas na dge slong gis seng ge la reg par mi bya'o //
T08TD4106.2E:199a-5: dge slong seng ge la reg par byed na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro //
T08TD4106.2E:199a-6: de nas ri dags kyi rgyal po seng ge des rang gi zan bcad par byas te /
T08TD4106.2E:199a-7: bcom ldan 'das la sems mngon par dad par byas nas dus la bab pa dang /
T08TD4106.2E:199a-8: rgyal chen bzhi'i lha rnams kyi nang du skyes te /
T08TD4106.2E:199a-9: bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'ongs nas /
T08TD4106.2E:199a-10: bcom ldan 'das kyis sngon seng ge lha'i bu'i bsam pa dang /
T08TD4106.2E:199a-13: rang bzhin thugs su chud nas des rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob par mdzad do //
T08TD4106.2E:199a-14: bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i sngon byung ba'i tshul yang rgya cher bka' stsal to //
T08TD4106.2E:199a-15: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis ma ga dh'a dag tu ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs pa na rgyal po'i khab tu byon nas /
T08TD4106.2E:199a-16: rgyal po'i khab na 'od ma'i tshal ka lan da ka'i gnas na bzhugs so //
T08TD4106.2E:199a-17: de'i tshe na drug sde dag mes gzhan la gtong bas rtse bar byed cing zla ba yang byed /
T08TD4106.2E:199a-19: mgal me'i 'khor lo yang byed nas /
T08TD4106.2E:199a-20: gzhan mu stegs can dag shes ldan dag sh'akya'i bu'i dge sbyong 'di dag ni mes gzhan la gtong bas rtse bar byed cing zla ba yang byed /
T08TD4106.2E:199a-21: nyi ma yang byed mgal me'i 'khor lo yang byed /
T08TD4106.2E:199a-22: byis pa khye'u dag kyang de ltar byed na /
T08TD4106.2E:199a-23: shes ldan dag byis pa khye'u dag dang /
T08TD4106.2E:199a-24: sh'akya'i bu'i dge sbyong 'di dag la bye brag ni ci yod bsam pa ni ci yod /
T08TD4106.2E:199a-25: tha dad du bya ba ni ci yod /
T08TD4106.2E:199a-26: su zhig dge sbyong mgo reg 'di dag la bsod snyoms sbyin pa dang /
T08TD4106.2E:199a-27: bya bar sems zhes smod par byed /
T08TD4106.2E:199a-29: kha zer bar byed pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol to //
T08TD4106.2E:199a-30: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byung ba 'di dang gleng gzhi 'di dang /
T08TD4106.2E:199a-31: skabs 'di la dge slong gi dge 'dun bsdu ba mdzad de /
T08TD4106.2E:199a-32: drug sde dag la rmas nas /
T08TD4106.2E:199a-33: dge sbyong gi tshul ma yin pa /
T08TD4106.2E:199a-34: rjes su mthun pa ma yin pa /
T08TD4106.2E:199b-1: tshul dang mthun pa ma yin pa /
T08TD4106.2E:199b-2: de ni rab tu byung bas bya ba ma yin no zhes rnam grangs du mar rnam par smad de /
T08TD4106.2E:199b-3: bslab pa bca' ba'i phan yon bcu yang dag par gzigs pas nga'i nyan thos rnams kyis 'dul ba la bslab pa'i gzhi 'di ltar gdon par bya ste /
T08TD4106.2E:199b-4: yang dge slong gang me la reg gam reg tu 'jug na ltung byed do zhes bca' ba mdzad de //
T08TD4106.2E:199b-7: nyon mongs pa ni 'dran gtor la dga' ba /
T08TD4106.2E:199b-8: nyes pa ni min bar bdag nyid kyi phyir me la reg par byed ba'o //
T08TD4106.2E:199b-9: gnang ba'i gleng gzhi ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis yang dge slong gang me la reg gam reg tu 'jug na ltung byed do zhes 'dul ba la nyan thos rnams kyis bslab pa'i gzhi de ltar bca' ba mdzad nas /
T08TD4106.2E:199b-10: dge slong dag phyin chad de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbu skra dang sen mo'i mchod rten dag la bdug spos kyang gsol bar mi byed /
T08TD4106.2E:199b-11: mar me yang sbor bar mi byed /
T08TD4106.2E:199b-12: slob dpon dang mkhan po dag la chu dron 'bul bar mi byed /
T08TD4106.2E:199b-13: lhung bzed kyi las kyang mi byed /
T08TD4106.2E:199b-14: tshon gyi las kyang mi byed do //
T08TD4106.2E:199b-15: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mkhyen bzhin du rmed par mdzad pa yin pas /
T08TD4106.2E:199b-16: bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la rmas pa dang /
T08TD4106.2E:199b-17: tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos skabs de rgyas par gsol to //
T08TD4106.2E:199b-18: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
T08TD4106.2E:199b-19: kun dga' bo de lta bas na dus byin gyis brlab par bya ste /
T08TD4106.2E:199b-25: tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa rnams kyis chos dang ldan pa'i bya ba'i don nyid kyis dus byin gyis brlab par bya'o //
T08TD4106.2E:199b-26: dge slong dag lhung bzed kyi las dang tshon gyi las dag byed pa na yang dang yang du brjed nas me la reg nas de dag 'gyod pa skyes pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /
T08TD4106.2E:199b-27: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
T08TD4106.2E:199b-28: dus yun ring du byin gyis brlab par bya'o //
T08TD4106.2E:199b-29: dge slong cig na zhing rlung nad can du gyur nas des sman pa'i gan du song nas dris pa /
T08TD4106.2E:200a-0: bzhin bzangs kho bo la sman ston cig /'phags pa zhugs bsten cig / bzhin bzangs @200a * //
T08TD4106.2E:200a-1: bcom ldan 'das kyis bslab pa'i gzhi bca' ba mdzad //
T08TD4106.2E:200a-2: 'phags pa khyod kyi ston pa thugs rje can lags pas 'di ltar de nyid rkyen du mdzad nas rjes su gnang bar 'gyur ba gang lags pa de lta bu'i gnas mchis par 'gyur ro zhes zer ba'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /
T08TD4106.2E:200a-3: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
T08TD4106.2E:200a-4: de lta bas na na ba'i dus ma gtogs so //
T08TD4106.2E:200a-5: de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis bslab pa 'dod pa dang /
T08TD4106.2E:200a-6: bslab pa la gus pa dang /
T08TD4106.2E:200a-7: bslab pa la yo byad bsnyungs pa'i bsngags pa brjod nas /
T08TD4106.2E:200a-8: dge slong rnams la de dang mthun pa dang /
T08TD4106.2E:200a-10: de dang 'tsham pa'i chos dang ldan pa'i bka' mchid mdzad nas /
T08TD4106.2E:200a-11: dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa /
T08TD4106.2E:200a-12: dge slong dag de lta bas na snga ma ni bcas pa yin la /
T08TD4106.2E:200a-14: nga'i nyan thos rnams kyis 'dul ba la bslab pa'i gzhi 'di ltar gdon par bya ste /
T08TD4106.2E:200a-15: yang dge slong gang min bar bdag nyid kyi phyir me la reg gam reg tu 'jug na ltung byed do zhes gnang ba mdzad de /
T08TD4106.2E:200a-17: gang zag ni chos 'di pa'i dge slong rab tu mang po dang nad pa /
T08TD4106.2E:200a-20: de la yang dge slong gang zhes bya ba ni drug sde'am gzhan yang de lta bu gang yin pa'o //
T08TD4106.2E:200a-21: min bar zhes bya ba ni na ba bzhag ste'o //
T08TD4106.2E:200a-22: bdag nyid kyi phyir zhes bya ba ni bdag nyid kyi ched du'o //
T08TD4106.2E:200a-23: me la reg gam zhes bya ba ni bdag nyid kyis so //
T08TD4106.2E:200a-24: reg tu 'jug na zhes bya ba ni gzhan no //
T08TD4106.2E:200a-25: ltung byed do zhes bya ba ni snga ma bzhin no //
T08TD4106.2E:200a-26: de la ltung ba ji ltar 'gyur zhe na /
T08TD4106.2E:200a-29: sbyor ba'i sbyor bas ltung ba rnam par gzhag pa dang /
T08TD4106.2E:200a-32: phyir bcos pa rnams kyis 'di'i mtshan nyid shes par bya'o //
T08TD4106.2E:200a-33: de la 'dir yang dngos gzhi'i ltung ba rnam par gzhag pa ni dge slong gis mes rtse ba nyid kyis gzhan la gtong bas zla ba dang nyi ma dang mgal me'i 'khor lo la sogs pa byed pa dang /
T08TD4106.2E:200b-0: tshangs pa @200b mtshungs par spyod pa rnams kyis chos dang ldan par bya ba'i don nyid dang /
T08TD4106.2E:200b-1: lhung bzed dang tshon gyi las la brtag pa lta bus dus byin gyis ma brlabs pa'i dge slong na ba'i dbang nyid du gnas pa ma yin pas spangs ba dang /
T08TD4106.2E:200b-4: ma reg pa'i bud shing bskul ba dang /
T08TD4106.2E:200b-5: me dang bcas pa 'dren pa dang /
T08TD4106.2E:200b-10: me lcer bud shing 'jud pa dang /
T08TD4106.2E:200b-11: 'byin pa rang ngam bsgo bas byed na me la reg pa'i ltung byed kyi dngos gzhir 'gyur ro //
T08TD4106.2E:200b-12: dge slong mas rtse ba nyid la na smad pa med do //
T08TD4106.2E:200b-13: mes rtse ba nyid ces bya ba de rnam pa gang gis yin zhe na /
T08TD4106.2E:200b-14: de'i phyir gzhan la gtong bas zla ba dang nyi ma dang mgal me'i 'khor lo la sogs pa byed pa zhes bya ba smras te /
T08TD4106.2E:200b-15: gzhan la gtong pas zhes bya ba ni byis pas bud shing mes spar te gcig gi lag nas gcig gi lag tu gzhan la thong shig gzhan la thong shig ces gzhan la gtong bar byed pa'i rtsed mo gang la yod pa de lta bus so //
T08TD4106.2E:200b-16: des zla ba lta bur byed pa dang /
T08TD4106.2E:200b-17: nyi ma lta bur byed pa dang /
T08TD4106.2E:200b-18: mgal me'i 'khor lo la sogs pa byed pas rtse ba yin te /
T08TD4106.2E:200b-19: de dag la na smad pa med do //
T08TD4106.2E:200b-20: me nyid kyis rtse ba la na smad pa med do //
T08TD4106.2E:200b-21: ci rtse ba 'ba' zhig la ltung ba 'dir 'gyur ram zhe na /
T08TD4106.2E:200b-22: de 'ba' zhig tu ma zad de /
T08TD4106.2E:200b-23: dus phyin gyis ma brlabs pa dang /
T08TD4106.2E:200b-24: dge slong na ba'i dbang nyid du gnas pa ma yin pas me la rang ngam bsgo bas reg par byed pa dag la yang na smad pa med do //
T08TD4106.2E:200b-25: dus byin gyis ma brlabs pa ji lta bu zhe na /
T08TD4106.2E:200b-29: tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa rnams kyis chos dang ldan pa'i don nyid dang lhung bzed dang /
T08TD4106.2E:200b-30: tshon gyi las la brtag pa lta bus dus byin gyis ma brlabs pa zhes bya ba smras te /
T08TD4106.2E:200b-34: tshangs pa mtshungs bar spyod pa rnams kyis chos dang ldan pa'i bya ba'i don nyid ces bya ba ni sangs rgyas dang /
T08TD4106.2E:200b-36: de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten dang /
T08TD4106.2E:201a-1: par spyod pa rnams la bdug spos dang /
T08TD4106.2E:201a-3: chu dron la sogs pa 'bul ba ste /
T08TD4106.2E:201a-4: de dag gi don nyid du dus byin gyis brlab pa ni dgos pa de dang /
T08TD4106.2E:201a-5: de dag gi don du 'di ltar bya'o zhes sems kyis mngon par 'du bya zhing lta ba yin no //
T08TD4106.2E:201a-6: lhung bzed dang tshon gyi las zhes smos pas ni rang gi lhung bzed dang chos gos kyi las bstan te /
T08TD4106.2E:201a-7: de dag gi don nyid du dus byin gyis brlab pa yang lhung bzed kyi las bya'o zhe 'am /
T08TD4106.2E:201a-8: tshon gyi las bya'o zhes yid kyis brtag pa gang yin pa de ni dus byin gyis brlabs pa yin no //
T08TD4106.2E:201a-9: de lta bus dus byin gyis brlabs pa la ltung ba med pas de lta bus dus byin gyis ma brlabs pa la na smad pa med do //
T08TD4106.2E:201a-10: dge slong na ba'i dbang nyid du gnas pa la ltung ba med pas dge slong na ba'i dbang nyid du gnas pa ma yin pa la na smad pa med do //
T08TD4106.2E:201a-11: me la rang ngam bsgo bas reg par byed pa ji lta bu zhe na /
T08TD4106.2E:201a-15: ma reg pa'i bud shing bskul ba dang /
T08TD4106.2E:201a-16: me dang bcas pa 'dren pa dang /
T08TD4106.2E:201a-21: me lcer bud shing 'jug pa dang /
T08TD4106.2E:201a-23: sgo bar byed na zhes bya ba smras te /
T08TD4106.2E:201a-24: dus byin gyis brlabs pa'i dge slong na ba'i dbang nyid du gnas pa ma yin pa rang ngam bsgo bas me spar ram /
T08TD4106.2E:201a-26: mes reg pa'i bud shing bskul tam /
T08TD4106.2E:201a-27: mes ma reg pa'i bud shing bskul tam /
T08TD4106.2E:201a-28: me dang bcas pa'i bud shing 'dren tam bskul tam /
T08TD4106.2E:201a-31: me lce'i nang du bud shing 'dzud dam 'byin na thams cad la na smad pa med do //
T08TD4106.2E:201a-32: rang gis reg gam gzhan la bsgo bas reg tu bcug pa la na smad pa med do /
T08TD4106.2E:201a-33: 'di'i byed pa po ni me mar mur dang me lce ma gtogs pa'i me nyid dang /
T08TD4106.2E:201a-35: dus byin gyis ma brlabs pa dang /
T08TD4106.2E:201a-36: na ba'i dbang nyid du gnas pa ma yin no //
T08TD4106.2E:201a-37: 'di la yan lag lngas dngos gzhi'i ltung bar 'gyur te /
T08TD4106.2E:201a-40: dus phyin gyis ma brlabs pa dang /
T08TD4106.2E:201b-0: na ba'i dbang nyid du gnas pa ma yin pa dang rang ngam bsgo @201b bas reg pa'o //
T08TD4106.2E:201b-1: de dag las yan lag ma chang na ci rigs par na smad do //
T08TD4106.2E:201b-2: sbyor ba'i ltung ba ni nyes byas te /
T08TD4106.2E:201b-3: ji srid du me la reg pa'i ltung byed kyi sbyor ba brtsams nas dngos gzhi la ma thug gi bar du nyes byas so //
T08TD4106.2E:201b-4: dngos gzhi la sbyor ba tha dad pa ji snyed brtsams pa re re la nyes byas re re'o //
T08TD4106.2E:201b-5: me mar mur ni phyed shi ba nyid yin pas de la reg gam /
T08TD4106.2E:201b-6: reg tu bcug na nyes byas so //
T08TD4106.2E:201b-7: me lce dag kyang de bzhin no //
T08TD4106.2E:201b-8: skra dang spu dang rus pa dang /
T08TD4106.2E:201b-14: mon sran sde'u dang mon sran gre'u dang til dang 'bru mar dang sbrang rtsi dang mar dag ni bud shing gi phyed nyid yin pas /
T08TD4106.2E:201b-15: de dag rang ngam bsgo bas mer bcug pa dang byung ba ni nyes byas so //
T08TD4106.2E:201b-16: de dag kyang dpe tsam du zad de /
T08TD4106.2E:201b-17: ras bal dang bal la sogs pa yang bsdu'o //
T08TD4106.2E:201b-18: 'bar ba'i chos can yang de dang 'dra'o //
T08TD4106.2E:201b-19: gzhan gyi bya ba gzhan la byin gyis rlob pa ni phyed byin gyis brlabs pa yin pas dge slong gis dus byin gyis ma brlabs par mkhan po la sogs pa'i bya bas me la reg pa dang mkhan po la sogs pa gzhan gyi bya ba slob dpon la sogs pa gzhan gyis byin gyis rlob pa dang /
T08TD4106.2E:201b-20: log par byin gyis rlob pa thams cad kyang nyes byas so //
T08TD4106.2E:201b-21: sbyor ba'i sbyor ba'i ltung ba ni nyes byas phra mo ste /
T08TD4106.2E:201b-22: sbyor ba ji snyed pa la sbyor ba'i sbyor ba yang de snyed de /
T08TD4106.2E:201b-23: sbyor ba nyes byas kyi sbyor ba'i sbyar ba yang nyes byas te nyes byas phra mo'o //
T08TD4106.2E:201b-24: ltung ba med pa ni dge slong dus byin gyis brlabs pa dang na ba'i dbang nyid du gnas pa la ltung ba med do //
T08TD4106.2E:201b-28: chor bdag gis nyen pa la ltung ba med do //
T08TD4106.2E:201b-29: bslab par bya ba ni dge slong gis yul thams cad la gnas skabs thams cad du me la reg pa'i ltung byed du 'gyur ba rnam pa thams cad mi bsten par bslab par bya'o //
T08TD4106.2E:201b-30: seng ge la reg par mi bya'o //
T08TD4106.2E:201b-34: tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa rnams kyis chos dang ldan pa'i bya ba'i don nyid dang /
T08TD4106.2E:202a-0: lhung bzed dang tshon gyi las la brtag pa lta bus dus @202a * //
T08TD4106.2E:202a-2: dus yun ring du byin gyis brlab par bya'o //
T08TD4106.2E:202a-3: phyir bcos pa ni snga ma bzhin no //
T08TD4106.2E:202a-4: me la reg pa'i ltung byed de lnga bcu gnyis ba bshad zin to /
T08TD4106.2E:202a-6: // /'dun pa phyir bsgyur ba'i ltung byed kyi gleng gzhi ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so //
T08TD4106.2E:202a-7: gang gi tshe tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs pas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas pa dang /
T08TD4106.2E:202a-8: tshe dang ldan pa 'dun pa ni koo sh'a ma b'ir song ste yid dal du 'dug pa dang /
T08TD4106.2E:202a-9: 'gro mgyogs dang nab so gnyis ni dus la bab pa dang /
T08TD4106.2E:202a-10: dga' bo dang nye dga' gnyis ni dge 'dun gyi nang na gnas pa de'i tshe na bcu bdun sde ngag gdug pa dang pha rol gnon par gyur cing /
T08TD4106.2E:202a-13: ma mo 'dzin pa yang yin pas de dag gis smras pa /
T08TD4106.2E:202a-14: tshe dang ldan pa dag bdag cag yun ring po nas drug sde dag gis mtho btsams te /
T08TD4106.2E:202a-15: ji ltar dga' bo dang nye dga' gnyis kyis mtho btsams pa ltar yang gzhan dag gis mtho ma btsams la /
T08TD4106.2E:202a-16: ji ltar nye dgas mtho btsams pa ltar yang dga' bos mtho ma btsams kyi tshur shag / de gnas nas dbyung ba'i las bya'o //
T08TD4106.2E:202a-17: de nas gcig gis smras pa /
T08TD4106.2E:202a-18: phu nu bo dag de'i phu nu bo dga' bo rtsod pa la mkhas pas bdag cag gis nye dga' gnas nas dbyung ba'i las bya bar mi nus so //
T08TD4106.2E:202a-19: de brel ba bskyed par bya'o zhes de dag dga' bo'i gan du song ste smras pa /
T08TD4106.2E:202a-21: tshe dang ldan pa dag aa rog gya /
T08TD4106.2E:202a-22: gnas brtan gyi chos gos dag dri ma can du gyur to //
T08TD4106.2E:202a-23: bu dag kho bo rgas par gyur pas dge slong lhan cig gnas pa dang nye gnas dag gis kyang rgas pa'i phyir brnyas te phyin chad chos gos kyi las byed du mi btub po //
T08TD4106.2E:202a-24: bdag cag gis gnas brtan gyi chos gos dag bkru bar bgyi /
T08TD4106.2E:202a-25: chos gos dag tshur stsol cig ces bcu bdun sde dag gis dga' bo rnyang rnying dag bskon te /
T08TD4106.2E:202b-0: de'i chos gos thams cad @202b blangs nas 'gyur byed kyi tshal der gnas mal bshams nas gand'i brdungs te dga' bo'i gan du song ste smras pa /
T08TD4106.2E:202b-1: gnas brtan dge 'dun gyi bya ba cung zhig mchis te gand'i brdungs kyi tshur spyon /
T08TD4106.2E:202b-3: bu dag kho bo 'di 'dra ba'i gnas skabs kyis dge 'dun gyi nang du ci ltar 'gro bar bya /
T08TD4106.2E:202b-4: dge 'dun gyi bya ba chos dang ldan pa la 'dun pa 'bul lo //
T08TD4106.2E:202b-5: de nas dge 'dun thams cad 'dug cing mthun par 'gyur ba na dge slong gleng ba po rgan pa'i mtha' logs su 'dug ste nye dga' la smras pa /
T08TD4106.2E:202b-6: btsun pa nye dga' khyod kyis bcu bdun sde dag gi lto dral te /
T08TD4106.2E:202b-7: rgyu ma dag gis rgyal byed kyi tshal bskor bar bya'o zhes bya ba de lta bu'i tshig smras pa gang yin pa de dran nam /
T08TD4106.2E:202b-8: tshe dang ldan pa dag rma sogs pa dag dral te ci bya /
T08TD4106.2E:202b-9: de ni 'das pa'i don yin no //
T08TD4106.2E:202b-11: bcom ldan 'das kyis 'das pa'i dus kho na las brtsams te 'dul ba la nyan thos rnams kyi bslab pa'i gzhi bca' ba mdzad do zhes de dag gis nye dga' la gya tshom du nan gyis gnas nas dbyung ba'i las byas so //
T08TD4106.2E:202b-12: nye dga' gnas nas dbyung ba'i las byas nas phu bo dga' bo'i gan du song ste du bar brtsams pa dang dga' bos smras pa /
T08TD4106.2E:202b-15: lhung bzed nag po can dag gis kho bo gnas nas dbyung ba'i las byas so //
T08TD4106.2E:202b-17: gang dag gis kho bo'i nu bo gnas nas dbyung ba'i las byas pa de dag grong dang grong khyer dang ljongs dang khams gsum nas gnas nas phyung bar gyur cig kho bos bdag gi nu bo gnas nas dbyung ba'i las byed par ma shes kyi /
T08TD4106.2E:202b-18: dge slong 'dun pa phyir byin cig / khyod la 'dun pa mi sbyin no zhes zer nas /
T08TD4106.2E:202b-19: dge slong don nyung du dag ci'i phyir dge slong dag dge 'dun gyi bya ba chos dang ldan pa la dge slong la 'dun pa phul nas de'i 'og tu khros 'khrugs rngam par gyur te yi ma rangs nas spang ba'i chos su byed cing /
T08TD4106.2E:203a-0: 'di skad ces dge slong 'dun pa phyir byin cig / khyod la mi sbyin no zhes zer @203a * //
T08TD4106.2E:203a-3: kha zer bar byed pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol to //
T08TD4106.2E:203a-4: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byung ba 'di dang /
T08TD4106.2E:203a-6: skabs 'di la dge slong gi dge 'dun bsdu ba mdzad de /
T08TD4106.2E:203a-7: dga' bo la rmas nas dge sbyong gi tshul ma yin pa /
T08TD4106.2E:203a-8: rjes su mthun pa ma yin pa /
T08TD4106.2E:203a-10: tshul dang mthun pa ma yin pa /
T08TD4106.2E:203a-11: de ni rab tu byung bas bya ba ma yin no zhes rnam grangs du mar rnam par smad da /
T08TD4106.2E:203a-12: bslab pa bca' ba'i phan yon bcu yang dag par gzigs pas nga'i nyan thos rnams kyis 'dul ba la bslab pa'i gzhi 'di ltar gdon par bya ste /
T08TD4106.2E:203a-13: yang dge slong gang dge 'dun gyi bya ba chos dang ldan pa la dge slong la 'dun pa phul nas /
T08TD4106.2E:203a-14: de'i 'og tu khros 'khrugs rngam par gyur te yi ma rangs nas spong ba'i chos su byed cing 'di skad ces dge slong 'dun pa phyir byin cig / khyod la mi sbyin no zhes zer na ltung byed do zhes bca' ba mdzad de //
T08TD4106.2E:203a-17: nyon mongs pa ni spong ba'i chos su byed pa /
T08TD4106.2E:203a-18: nyes pa ni 'du na pa phyir bsgyur ba'o //
T08TD4106.2E:203a-19: de la yang dge slong gang zhes bya ba ni sh'akya'i bu dga' bo'am gzhan yang de lta bu gang yin pa'o //
T08TD4106.2E:203a-20: dge 'dun gyi zhas bya ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyan thos kyi dge 'dun gyi'o //
T08TD4106.2E:203a-21: bya ba chos dang ldan pa zhes bya ba ni las chos dang ldan pa la'o //
T08TD4106.2E:203a-22: dge slong la zhes bya ba ni chos 'di pa la'o //
T08TD4106.2E:203a-23: 'dun pa phul nas zhes bya ba ni 'dun pa byin nas so //
T08TD4106.2E:203a-24: de'i 'og tu zhes bya ba ni dus gzhan na'o //
T08TD4106.2E:203a-25: khros 'khrugs rngam par gyur te yi ma rangs nas zhes bya ba ni khros shing khro ba'i zil gyis non nas so //
T08TD4106.2E:203a-26: spod pa'i chos su byed cing zhes bya ba ni smyon pa'i chos su byed cing ngo //
T08TD4106.2E:203a-27: 'di skad ces zhes bya ba ni 'di skad ces zer na'o //
T08TD4106.2E:203a-28: dge slong 'dun pa phyir byin cig / khyod la mi spyin no zhes zer na zhes bya ba ni de skad ces zer na'o //
T08TD4106.2E:203a-29: ltung byed do zhes bya ba ni snga ma bzhin no //
T08TD4106.2E:203a-30: de la ltung ba ji ltar 'gyur zhe na /
T08TD4106.2E:203b-2: sbyor ba'i sbyor bas ltung ba rnam par gzhag pa dang /
T08TD4106.2E:203b-5: phyir bcos pa rnams kyis 'di'i mtshan nyid shes par bya'o //
T08TD4106.2E:203b-6: de la 'dir dngos gzhi'i ltung ba rnam par gzhag pa ni /
T08TD4106.2E:203b-7: dge slong gi las brgya rtsa gcig gi nang nas nan thur gyi las lnga dang /
T08TD4106.2E:203b-8: gang zag bcu gnyis bsko ba dang grangs su gzhug pa bzhi la sogs pa de lta bu dge slong gi don gyi ched kyi las dge 'dun gyi chos bzhin du byas pa la 'dun pa phul ba phyir bsgyur ba'i phyir dge slong 'dun pa phyir byin cig ;
T08TD4106.2E:203b-9: khyod la mi sbyin no zhes smras na 'dun pa phyir bsgyur ba'i ltung byed kyi dngos gzhir 'gyur ro //
T08TD4106.2E:203b-10: las brgya rtsa gcig gi nang nas bsdigs pa dang /
T08TD4106.2E:203b-14: mi mthong bas gnas nas dbyung ba dang /
T08TD4106.2E:203b-15: phyir mi 'chos pa rnams gnas nas dbyung ba dang /
T08TD4106.2E:203b-16: sdig pa can gyi lta ba'i rnam pa mi gtong bas gnas nas dbyung ba'i nan thur lnga dang /
T08TD4106.2E:203b-23: gos kyi rnyed pa sped pa dang /
T08TD4106.2E:203b-24: gos kyi rnyed pa 'gyed pa dang /
T08TD4106.2E:203b-25: dbyar gyi gos ras chen sped pa dang /
T08TD4106.2E:203b-26: dbyar gyi gos ras chen 'gyed pa dang /
T08TD4106.2E:203b-31: gnas mal byi bo 'bogs pa dang /
T08TD4106.2E:203b-34: bang rim gyi zhal ta ba dang /
T08TD4106.2E:203b-37: lag gi bla la sogs pa gang zag las bsko ba dang /
T08TD4106.2E:203b-40: bsgo ba rna la gzon pa dang /
T08TD4106.2E:203b-41: cang mi smra bas rnal gzon pa'i grangs su gzhug pa la sogs pa dge slong gdon gyi ched kyi las gsol ba dang /
T08TD4106.2E:203b-43: dgag dbye la sogs pa gang yang rung ba la na smad pa med do //
T08TD4106.2E:203b-44: las de dag dge 'dun gyi chos bzhin du byas pa la na smad pa med do //
T08TD4106.2E:204a-0: de dag la dge slong rang @204a * //
T08TD4106.2E:204a-1: gi 'dun pa phul ba la na smad pa med do //
T08TD4106.2E:204a-2: de'i phyir bsgyur ba ni phyir smras pa la na smad pa med do //
T08TD4106.2E:204a-3: 'di'i byed pa po ni dge slong gi don gyi ched kyi las byas pa las 'dun pa phul ba'o //
T08TD4106.2E:204a-4: 'di la yan lag ldas dngos gzhi'i ltung bar 'gyur te /
T08TD4106.2E:204a-5: dge slong gi don gyi ched dang las dang de la 'dun pa phul ba dang dge 'dun gyi chos bzhin du byas pa dang /
T08TD4106.2E:204a-6: de phyir bsgyur ba'i phyir smras pa'o //
T08TD4106.2E:204a-7: de dag las yan lag ma tshang na ci rigs par na smad do //
T08TD4106.2E:204a-8: sbyor ba'i ltung ba ni nyes byas te ji srid du 'dun pa phyir bsgyur ba'i ltung byed kyi sbyor ba brtsams nas dngos gzhi la ma thug gi bar du nyes byas so //
T08TD4106.2E:204a-9: dngos gzhi la sbyor ba tha dad pa ji snyed brtsams pa re re la nyes byas re re'o //
T08TD4106.2E:204a-10: dge slong gi don gyi ched ma yin pa'i las gzhan la nyes byas so //
T08TD4106.2E:204a-11: las brgya rtsa gcig gi khongs su gtogs pa ma yin pa'i las gzhan la nyes byas so //
T08TD4106.2E:204a-12: sbyor ba'i sbyor ba'i ltung ba ni nyes byas phra mo ste /
T08TD4106.2E:204a-13: sbyor ba ji snyed pa la sbyor ba'i sbyor ba yang de snyed do //
T08TD4106.2E:204a-14: sbyor ba nyes byas kyi sbyor ba'i sbyor ba yang nyes byas te /
T08TD4106.2E:204a-16: ltung ba med pa ni 'dun pa ma phul ba la ltung ba med do //
T08TD4106.2E:204a-17: dge 'dun gyi las chos bzhin ma byas pa la ltung ba med do //
T08TD4106.2E:204a-18: phyir bsgyur ba'i phyir ma smras pa la ltung ba med do //
T08TD4106.2E:204a-22: tshor ba dag gis nyen pa la ltung ba med do //
T08TD4106.2E:204a-23: bslab par bya ba ni dge slong gis yul thams cad la gnas skabs thams cad du 'dun pa phyir bsgyur ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ba rnam pa thams cad mi bsten par bslab par bya'o //
T08TD4106.2E:204a-26: phyir bcos pa ni snga ma bzhin no //
T08TD4106.2E:204a-27: 'dun pa phyir bsgyur ba'i ltung byed de lnga bcu gsum pa bshad zin to /
T08TD4106.2E:204a-30: // / so sor thar pa'i mdo rgya cher 'grel pa 'dul ba kun las btus pa /
T08TD4106.2E:204a-31: bam po sum cu gsum pa /
T08TD4106.2E:204a-32: bsnyen par ma rdzogs pa dang lhan cig nyal ba'i ltung byed kyi gleng gzhi ni byung ba dang gnang ba dang /
T08TD4106.2E:204a-33: bcas pa'i dbang gis rnam pa gsum ste /
T08TD4106.2E:204b-0: byung ba'i gleng gzhi ni sangs rgyas @204b bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra na bzhugs so //
T08TD4106.2E:204b-1: bram ze dang khyim bdag dad pa can dag gtsug lag khang du lhags nas dge slong rnams la smras pa /
T08TD4106.2E:204b-2: 'phags pa dag chos bstan du gsol /
T08TD4106.2E:204b-3: dge slong rnams kyis smras pa ;
T08TD4106.2E:204b-4: bzhin bzangs dag bcom ldan 'das kyis ma gnang ngo zhes zer ba'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /
T08TD4106.2E:204b-5: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
T08TD4106.2E:204b-6: de lta bas na dge slong rnams kyis kyang chos bstan par bya bar gnang ngo //
T08TD4106.2E:204b-7: dge slong rnams nyin mo chos ston par byed do /
T08TD4106.2E:204b-8: de ni khyim pa gang dag bsod nams kyi 'bras bus 'tsho ba de dag ni nyin mo chos mnyan nas mtshan mo rtsol ba'i 'bras bus 'tsho ba rnams la shes ldan dag 'phags pa dag chos snyan pa snyan pa ston par mdzad cing sbrang rtsi byed pa'i sbrang bu bzhin du chos sbrang rtsi lta bur ston cig / stobs par mdzad do zhes rjod par byed do //
T08TD4106.2E:204b-9: gang dag rtsol ba'i 'bras bus 'tsho ba de dag ni de la smod cing gal te bdag cag gis nyin mo las dag ma byas na ltogs te 'chi bar 'gyur bas /
T08TD4106.2E:204b-10: 'phags pa dag khyod la mtshan mo chos ston par 'gyur na bdag cag gis kyang mnyan par bya'o zhes zer ba'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba dang /
T08TD4106.2E:204b-11: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
T08TD4106.2E:204b-12: mtshan mo chos bstan par bya'o //
T08TD4106.2E:204b-13: dge slong rnams mtshan thog thag tu chos ston par byed cing ngal bar gyur nas /
T08TD4106.2E:204b-14: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
T08TD4106.2E:204b-15: nam phyed kyi bar du chos bstan par bya'o //
T08TD4106.2E:204b-16: de lta na yang ngal bar gyur nas /
T08TD4106.2E:204b-17: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
T08TD4106.2E:204b-18: tshes brgyad dang tshes bcu bzhi la chos bstan par bya'o //
T08TD4106.2E:204b-19: dge slong rnams kyis tshes brgyad dang /
T08TD4106.2E:204b-20: tshes bcu bzhi'i nam phyed kyi bar du chos bsten pa dang /
T08TD4106.2E:204b-21: dge slong bsod snyoms pa zhig chos nyan du 'ongs pa de'i tshe mtshan mo mtha' gcig tu song nas skyil mo krung bcas te 'dug go //
T08TD4106.2E:205a-0: de ltar lhags pa'i khyim pa de dag kyang de nyid du nyal nas @205a * //
T08TD4106.2E:205a-1: khang skyong gis mar me gsad par brtsams pa dang /
T08TD4106.2E:205a-3: 'phags pa zhugs mar ma dgums shig dang bdag cag gis 'bru mar dbul lo //
T08TD4106.2E:205a-4: khang skyong gis mar me gsos te song ngo //
T08TD4106.2E:205a-5: de nas dge slong rgan zhugs brjed ngas pa zhig nyal ba de'i rmi lam na sngon gyi rnying ba dang lhan cig nyal ba rmis nas /
T08TD4106.2E:205a-6: des ci dang ci dag cig brdol bar brtsams pa khyim pa de dag gis thos nas 'di su yin zhes mar me'i 'od la bltas na /
T08TD4106.2E:205a-7: ji tsam na rgan zhugs de phyi rgan du nyal zhing ci dang ci dag brdol ba mthong nas de dag gis smras pa /
T08TD4106.2E:205a-8: shes ldan dag rgan po rnams kyi gnas skabs kyang re zhig 'di 'dra na /
T08TD4106.2E:205a-9: rab tu byung ba gzhon nu dag gi gnas skabs ji lta bur gyur zhes ma dad pa go bar byed do //
T08TD4106.2E:205a-10: dge slong bsod snyoms pa des nang bar sngar langs te dgon pa'i gnas su song ba dang /
T08TD4106.2E:205a-11: dge slong spong ba pa dag gis smras pa /
T08TD4106.2E:205a-12: tshe dang ldan pa ji ltar tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa dag gis chos snyan pa snyan pa dag ston cing skye bo phal po che'i tshogs mngon par dad par byas sam /
T08TD4106.2E:205a-14: tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa rnams kyis ni de ltar byas so //
T08TD4106.2E:205a-15: rgan zhugs cig gis ni skye bo phal po che'i tshogs mngon par ma dad par byas so //
T08TD4106.2E:205a-16: ji ltar gyur pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams la brjod nas /
T08TD4106.2E:205a-17: dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la rgyas par gsol to //
T08TD4106.2E:205a-18: de nas bcom ldan 'das 'di snyam du dgongs te /
T08TD4106.2E:205a-19: nyes dmigs gang cung zad ci byung bar gyur pa de ni dge slong rnams bsnyen par ma rdzogs pa dang lhan cig nyal bar byed pa dang /
T08TD4106.2E:205a-20: snang ba la nyal bar byed pa las gyur to snyam nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
T08TD4106.2E:205a-21: de lta bas na dge slong gang zag bsnyen par ma rdzogs pa dang /
T08TD4106.2E:205a-22: lhan cig nyal bar mi bya zhing /
T08TD4106.2E:205a-23: snang ba la yang nyal bar mi bya'o //
T08TD4106.2E:205a-24: nyal bar byed na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro //
T08TD4106.2E:205a-26: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das re zhig 'dul ba la nyan thos rnams kyi bslab pa'i gzhi bca' bar ni mi mdzad do //
T08TD4106.2E:205b-0: gnang @205b ba'i gleng gzhi ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so //
T08TD4106.2E:205b-1: de nas tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu la dge tshul sgra gcan zin dang skul byed ces bya ba gnyis yod de /
T08TD4106.2E:205b-2: tshe dang ldan pa sgra gcan zin nyin mo spyod du song ba'i gtsug lag khang du dge slong glor bur du 'ongs pa zhig gi gtsug lag khang bskos nas de mi dga' ba dang /
T08TD4106.2E:205b-3: tshe dang ldan pa skul byed kyis sgra gcan zin la smras pa /
T08TD4106.2E:205b-4: tshe dang ldan pa sgra gcan zin mi dgar ma byed par gang yang rung bar nyol cig / tshe dang ldan pa sgra gcan zin de'i nub mo bcom ldan 'das kyi snam phyis bram ze dang khyim bdag dad pa can dag gis spos kyi byug pas bskus pa der song ste zhabs rten la mgo bo bzhag ste nyal lo //
T08TD4106.2E:205b-5: de'i tshe mtshan mo sprin kha dog lnga pa 'dus nas des char 'bab par brtsams pa dang /
T08TD4106.2E:205b-6: snom phyis pa de dang ha cang thag mi ring ba na sbrul dug myur du khyab par byed pa'i gtso bo zhig gi tshang 'dug pa de char bab pa'i chus gang nas sprul dug myur du khyab par byed pa'i gtso bo de bcom ldan 'das kyi snam phyis pa ga la ba der 'phags so //
T08TD4106.2E:205b-7: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni bsnyel ba mi mnga' ba'i chos nyid can yin pas /
T08TD4106.2E:205b-9: gal te sbrul dug myur du khyab par byed pa'i gtso bo des sgra gcan zin rnyed par gyur na ming gi lhag ma tsam las par byed par 'gyur te /
T08TD4106.2E:205b-10: des sh'akya nga rgyal can dag gal te gzhon nu sgra gcan zin bzang po rab tu byung bar ma gyur na rgyal po dngos brtsan par 'gyur ba zhig na /
T08TD4106.2E:205b-11: de rab tu byung nas mgon med pa'i bya bas dus la bab po zhes ma dad pa go bar byed par 'gyur bar thugs su chud nas glang po che'i sna 'dra ba'i phyag brkyang ste sgra gcan zin blangs nas nyid kyi gzims mal du bsnyal te gzhag go //
T08TD4106.2E:205b-12: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams gang zag bsnyen par ma rdzogs pa dang lhan cig gnas gcig na gzims par 'gyur ba ni gnas ma yin zhing skabs med pas /
T08TD4106.2E:206a-1: dgung la 'chag pa dang bzhugs pa gnyis kyis shas cher mtshan mo 'da' bar mdzad do //
T08TD4106.2E:206a-2: dge slong gnas brtan gnas brtan dag nad par sngar langs te /
T08TD4106.2E:206a-3: bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal du 'ongs pa na /
T08TD4106.2E:206a-4: tshe dang ldan pa skul byed kyis se gol gyi sgras tshe dang ldan pa sgra gcan zin bslang ngo //
T08TD4106.2E:206a-5: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa /
T08TD4106.2E:206a-6: dge slong dag dge tshul 'di dag la ni ma yang med /
T08TD4106.2E:206a-8: byams pa dang mdza' bshes kyi tshogs gzhan yang med /
