T08TD4106.2E:260b-7: bcom ldan 'das kyi gsung rab la rab tu byung ba dge slong ngam dge slong ma dang /
T08TD4106.2E:260b-10: dge tshul ma gang yang rung ba lan smad pa med do //
T08TD4106.2E:260b-11: de dag dbang pa'i lhung bzed dang /
T08TD4106.2E:260b-15: ska rags la sogs pa dag sbyong gi 'tsho ba'i yo byad gang yang rung ba la na smad pa med do //
T08TD4106.2E:260b-16: de dag tshad dang ldan pa dang rung ba la na smad pa med do //
T08TD4106.2E:260b-17: rang gis sbed dam gzhan sbed du bcug pa la na smad pa med do //
T08TD4106.2E:260b-18: phan par 'dod pa'i bsam pa ma gtogs pa la na smad pa med do //
T08TD4106.2E:260b-19: 'di'i byed pa po ni mtho btsams pa'i bsam pa dang /
T08TD4106.2E:260b-20: rab tu byung ba 'di pa gang yang rung ba'i yo byad gang yang rung ba'o //
T08TD4106.2E:260b-21: 'di la yan lag lngas dngos gzhi'i ltung bar 'gyur te /
T08TD4106.2E:260b-23: rab tu byung ba 'di pa dang /
T08TD4106.2E:260b-24: yo byad gang yang rung ba dang /
T08TD4106.2E:260b-25: sbed dam sbed du 'jug pa dang /
T08TD4106.2E:260b-26: phan par 'dod pa ma gtogs pa'o //
T08TD4106.2E:260b-27: de dag las yan lag ma tshang na ci rigs par na smad do //
T08TD4106.2E:260b-28: sbyor ba'i ltung ba ni nyes byas te /
T08TD4106.2E:260b-29: ji srid du sbed pa'i ltung byed kyi sbyor ba brtsams nas dngos gzhi lam thug gi bar du nyes byas so //
T08TD4106.2E:260b-30: dngos gzhi la sbyor ba tha dad pa ji snyed brtsams pa re re la nyes byas re re'o //
T08TD4106.2E:260b-31: rab tu byung ba 'di pa ma yin pa'i mi dang /
T08TD4106.2E:260b-32: 'gro ba gzhan du gtogs pa gang yang rung ba la nyes byas so //
T08TD4106.2E:260b-33: tshad dang ldan pa ma yin pa dang rung ba ma yin pa la nyes byas so //
T08TD4106.2E:260b-34: sbyor ba'i sbyor ba'i ltung ba ni nyes byas phra mo ste /
T08TD4106.2E:260b-35: sbyor ba ji snyed pa la sbyor ba'i sbyor ba yang de snyed de /
T08TD4106.2E:260b-36: sbyor ba nyes byas kyi sbyor ba'i sbyor ba yang nyes byas te nyes byas phra mo'o //
T08TD4106.2E:260b-37: ltung ba med pa ni phan par 'dod bas sbed dam sbed du 'jud pa la ltung ba med do //
T08TD4106.2E:261a-3: tshor ba dag gis nyen pa la ltung ba med do //
T08TD4106.2E:261a-4: bslab par bya ba ni dge slong gis yul thams cad la gnas skabs thams cad la gnas skabs thams cad du sbed pa'i ltung byed du 'gyur ba rnam pa thams cad mi bsten par bslab par bya'o /
T08TD4106.2E:261a-5: phan par 'dod pa'i bsam pas rang dang gzhan gyi yo byad sped dam sbed du gzhug par bya'o //
T08TD4106.2E:261a-6: dang por rang gi sba bar bya'o //
T08TD4106.2E:261a-7: de nas nus na gzhan gyi sba bar bya'o //
T08TD4106.2E:261a-8: phyir bcos pa ni snga ma bzhin no //
T08TD4106.2E:261a-9: sbed pa'i ltung byed de drug cu bdun pa bshad zin to /
T08TD4106.2E:261a-11: // / byin pas nye bar 'tsho ba'i ltung byed kyi gleng gzhi ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' rab na bzhugs so //
T08TD4106.2E:261a-12: gang gi tshe tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas ni nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs pas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byas /
T08TD4106.2E:261a-13: tshe dang ldan pa 'dun pa ni koo sh'amb'ir song ste snying las chung ngur 'dug / gro mgyogs dang nab so gnyis ni dus la ba ba /
T08TD4106.2E:261a-14: dga' bo dang nye dga' gnyis ni dge 'dun gyi nang na la 'khod pa de'i tshe na tshe dang ldan pa nye dga' rgas par gyur nas de la lhan cig gnas pa dang /
T08TD4106.2E:261a-15: nye gnas dag nye dga' la mi nyan pas de'i chos gos dag dri ma can du gyur kyang des 'khru ba dang /
T08TD4106.2E:261a-16: kha bsgyur bar mi nus nas de la blo byung ba thabs zhig bya'o snyam nas des chos gos de dag lhan cig gnas pa dang /
T08TD4106.2E:261a-17: nye gnas dag la bu dag kho bo rgas pas 'di dag khyed kyi yin no zhes la la la snam sbyar byin /
T08TD4106.2E:261a-18: la la la bla gos byin /
T08TD4106.2E:261a-19: la la la mthong gos byin no //
T08TD4106.2E:261a-20: de dag gis rang gi sred pas chos gos de dag legs par bkrus shing legs par kha bsgyur bar byas so //
T08TD4106.2E:261a-21: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa /
T08TD4106.2E:261a-22: kun dga' bo song la dge slong rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa ko sa la dag tu ljongs rgyu rgyur gshegs kyi khyed cag las gang de bzhin gshegs pa dang thabs cig ko sa la dag tu ljongs rgyur 'gro bar spro ba des chos gos kyi las gyis shig ces bsgo shig / tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos de skad bsgo ba na dge slong de dag gis chos gos de dag nye dga' la gtams te dong ngo //
T08TD4106.2E:261b-0: nye dgas @261b de dag spyad nas phyir gtur bur bcug go //
T08TD4106.2E:261b-1: ci tsam na dge slong de dag phyir 'ongs nas khyim bdag gis sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun glo bur du gshegs pa'i gshegs ston la spyan drangs pa'i tshe de dag gis chos gos de dag phyir blangs pa dang nye dgas spyad par mthong nas gzhag ste chos gos rnying pa dag gis zhugs so //
T08TD4106.2E:261b-2: dge slong rnams kyis de dag la smras pa /
T08TD4106.2E:261b-3: tshe dang ldan pa dag khyed cag gis chos gos dag cig gtams te gzhag na ci'i phyir lam gyi chos gos dag gyon te 'ongs /
T08TD4106.2E:261b-6: 'o na ci'i phyir de dag mi byon ;
T08TD4106.2E:261b-7: de dag gis skabs de rgyas par brjod pa dang /
T08TD4106.2E:261b-8: dge slong don nyung du dag ci'i phyir dge slong dag dge slong la chos gos byin nas de'i 'og tu dge med par spyod dpar byed ces smod par byed /
T08TD4106.2E:261b-10: kha zer bar byed pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol to //
T08TD4106.2E:261b-11: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byung ba 'di dang /
T08TD4106.2E:261b-13: skabs 'di la dge slong gi dge 'dun bsdu ba mdzad de nye dga' la rmas nas /
T08TD4106.2E:261b-14: dge sbyong gi tshul ma yin pa /
T08TD4106.2E:261b-15: rjes su mthun pa ma yin pa /
T08TD4106.2E:261b-17: tshul dang mthun pa ma yin pa de ni rab tu byung bas bya ba ma yin no zhes rnam grangs du mar rnam par smad de /
T08TD4106.2E:261b-18: bslab ba bca' ba'i phan yon bcu yang dag par gzigs pas nga'i nyan thos rnams kyis 'dul ba la bslab pa'i gzhi 'di ltar gdon par bya ste /
T08TD4106.2E:261b-19: yang dge slong gang dge slong la gos sbyin nas de'i 'og tu gdeng med par spyod na ltung byed do zhes bca' ba mdzad de /
T08TD4106.2E:261b-22: nyon mongs pa ni thug thub /
T08TD4106.2E:261b-23: nyes ba ni dge slong la gos sbyin pa gdeng med par spyod pa'o //
T08TD4106.2E:261b-24: de la yang dge slong gang zhes bya ba ni sha' kya'i bu nye dga' 'am gzhan yang de lta bu gang yin pa'o //
T08TD4106.2E:261b-25: dge slong la zhes bya ba ni chos 'di pa la'o //
T08TD4106.2E:261b-26: gos zhes bya ba ni snam sbyar dang bla gos dang mthang gos gsum las gang yang rung ba'o //
T08TD4106.2E:261b-27: byin nas zhes bya ba ni blang ba med par byin nas so //
T08TD4106.2E:261b-28: de'i 'og tu zhes bya ba ni dus gzhan nas so //
T08TD4106.2E:261b-29: gdeng med par zhes bya ba ni ma bslangs par ro //
T08TD4106.2E:262a-0: spyod na ni zhes bya ba @262a * //
T08TD4106.2E:262a-2: ltung byed do zhes bya ba ni snga ma bzhin no //
T08TD4106.2E:262a-3: de la ltung ba ji ltar 'gyur zhe na /
T08TD4106.2E:262a-6: sbyor ba'i sbyor bas ltung ba rnam par gzhag pa dang /
T08TD4106.2E:262a-9: phyir bcos pa rnams kyis 'di'i mtshan nyid shes par bya'o //
T08TD4106.2E:262a-10: de la 'dir dngos gzhi'i ltung ba rnam par gzhag pa ni dge slong gis dge slong la gos snam sbyar dang /
T08TD4106.2E:262a-11: bla gos dang mthang gos las gang yang rung ba gzhan la byin nas de'i 'og tu des gnang ba'i gdeng med par gzhi des de dga' bar mi 'gyur bar spyod na byin bas nye bar 'tsho ba'i ltung byed kyi dngos gzhir 'gyur ro //
T08TD4106.2E:262a-12: chos 'di pa'i dge slong gang yang rung ba la na smad pa med do //
T08TD4106.2E:262a-15: mthang gos gsum las gang yang rung ba la na smad pa med do //
T08TD4106.2E:262a-16: phyir blang ba med par byin pa la rang gi blos nye bar 'tsho ba la na smad pa med do //
T08TD4106.2E:262a-17: pha rol pos gnang ba'i gdeng med pa la na smad pa med do //
T08TD4106.2E:262a-18: gzhi des pha rol po dga' bar mi 'gyur ba la na smad pa med do //
T08TD4106.2E:262a-19: spyad pa shas ches che chung dang yun ring thung la na smad pa med do //
T08TD4106.2E:262a-20: 'di'i byed pa po ni dge slong gis gos dang gdeng med par spyod pa'o //
T08TD4106.2E:262a-21: 'di la yan lag lngas dngos gzhi'i ltung byed du 'gyur te /
T08TD4106.2E:262a-22: dge slong gi dang dge slong gi yo byad gzhan ma gtogs pa'i gos nyid dang /
T08TD4106.2E:262a-23: rang gi phar byin pa dang /
T08TD4106.2E:262a-24: pha rol bo'i gdeng med par rang gi blos nye bar 'tsho ba dang /
T08TD4106.2E:262a-25: gzhi des dga' bar mi 'gyur bar spyod pa'o //
T08TD4106.2E:262a-26: de dag las yan lag ma tshad na ci rigs par na smad do //
T08TD4106.2E:262a-27: sbyor ba'i ltung ba ni nyes byas te /
T08TD4106.2E:262a-28: ji srid du byin pas nyes bar 'tsho ba'i ltung byed kyi sbyor ba brtsams nas dngos gzhi la ma thug gi bar du nyes byas so /
T08TD4106.2E:262a-29: dngos gzhi la sbyor ba tha dad pa ji snyed brtsams pa re re la nyes byas re re'o //
T08TD4106.2E:262a-30: gos las gzhan pa'i yo byad la nyis byas so //
T08TD4106.2E:262a-31: chos 'di pa'i dge slong las gzhan ba la nyes byas so //
T08TD4106.2E:262a-32: phyir blang ba med par stan byin pa ma yin pa la nyes byas so //
T08TD4106.2E:262a-33: sbyor ba'i sbyor ba'i ltung ba ni nyes byas phra mo ste /
T08TD4106.2E:262a-34: sbyor ba ji snyed pa la sbyor ba'i sbyor ba yang de snyed de /
T08TD4106.2E:262b-0: sbyor ba nyes byas kyi sbyor ba'i sbyor ba yang @262b nyes byas te nyes byas phra mo'o //
T08TD4106.2E:262b-1: ltung ba med pa ni pha rol pos gnang ba'i gdeng yod pa la ltung ba med do //
T08TD4106.2E:262b-2: gal te gzhi des pha rol po de dga' bar 'gyur ro snyam pa'i bsams pa la ltung ba med do //
T08TD4106.2E:262b-6: tshor ba dag gis nyen pa la ltung ba med do //
T08TD4106.2E:262b-7: bslab par bya ba ni dge slong gis yul thams cad la gnas skabs thams cad du byin pas nye bar 'tsho ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ba rnam pa thams cad mi bsten par bslab par bya'o //
T08TD4106.2E:262b-8: gzhan la byin pa phyir gtams pa la rang gi 'du shes mi bskyed do //
T08TD4106.2E:262b-10: / der thug thub tu mi spyod do //
T08TD4106.2E:262b-11: phyir bcos pa ni snga ma bzhin no //
T08TD4106.2E:262b-12: byin pas nye bar 'tsho ba'i ltung byed de drug bcu brgyud pa bshad zin to /
T08TD4106.2E:262b-14: // / skur ba 'debs pa'i ltung byed kyi gleng gzhi ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab 'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan da ka'i gnas na bzhugs so //
T08TD4106.2E:262b-15: de'i tshe tshe dang ldan pa gyad bu nor rgyal bo'i khab na bya rgod phung po'i ri la rdzing bu rdo rtsi ga can zhes bya ba'i 'gram na 'dug go //
T08TD4106.2E:262b-16: dge slong ma autpa la'i mdog bcom ldan 'das dang /
T08TD4106.2E:262b-17: dge slong gnas brtan gnas brtan rnams kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal nas tshe dang ldan pa gyad bu nor ga la ba der dong ste phyin nas tshe dang ldan pa gyad bu nor gyi rkang pa gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te chos mnyan pa'i phyir mdun du 'dug go //
T08TD4106.2E:262b-18: de'i tshe na dge slong mdza' bo dang /
T08TD4106.2E:262b-19: sa las skyes gnyis kyis phyag dar khrod cig rnyed cing de gnyis tshe dang ldan pa gyad bu nor dang tshe rabs tshe rabs nas rjes su 'brel ba'i khon yod pas rtag tu klan ka tshol ba la brtson pa yin pas de gnyis phyag dar khrod kyi gos de khyer te rdzing bu rdo rtsig can du 'khur bcug nas nyi ma la bting ste 'khod do //
T08TD4106.2E:262b-20: de'i tshe na tshe dang ldan pa gyad bu nor gyi chos gos kyi grva rlung gis bskyod nas /
T08TD4106.2E:262b-21: dge slong autpa la'i mdog gi mgo la reg go //
T08TD4106.2E:262b-22: de mdza' bos mthong nas sa las skyes la smras pa /
T08TD4106.2E:262b-23: sa las skyes gyad bu nor 'di la dge slong ma autpa'i mdog dang lhan cig lus kyi reg pa'i dge 'dun lhag ma byung gi 'dod la dge slong rnams la brjod par bya'o zhes de gnyis dong ste /
T08TD4106.2E:263a-0: @263a * // dge slong rnams la de skad smras so //
T08TD4106.2E:263a-1: dge slong rnams kyis smras pa /
T08TD4106.2E:263a-2: tshe dang ldan pa gnyis khyed cag gnyis lha dang mi rnams gcig tu yongs su btang zhing sems can dmyal ba dang /
T08TD4106.2E:263a-4: dud 'gro rnams su gcig tu gnas sam /
T08TD4106.2E:263a-5: di nas dge slong dgra bcom pa rnam par thar pa brgyad la bsams gtan pa mi'i chos bla ma'i rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul rnam par ston pa de la khyed gnyis gzhi med pa'i dge 'dun lhag ma'i chos kyis skur pa 'debs bar byed ces zer ba'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang ;
T08TD4106.2E:263a-6: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa //
T08TD4106.2E:263a-7: dge slong dag khyed kyis de gnyis la ji zhig mthong /
T08TD4106.2E:263a-10: khyed gnyis ci'i phyir der son pas der mthong zhes legs par rab tu gleng zhing rtogs shig / dge slong rab tu mang po dag gis legs par rab tu glengs shing brtags ba na de gnyis kyis smras pa /
T08TD4106.2E:263a-11: tshe dang ldan pa dag tshe dang ldan pa gyad bu nor la dge slong ma autpa la'i mdog dang lhan cig lus kyi reg ba'i dge 'dun lhag ma byung ste /
T08TD4106.2E:263a-12: 'di ltar bdag cag gnyis kyis tshe dang ldan pa gyad bu nor la 'dun pas smras pa /
T08TD4106.2E:263a-15: 'jigs pas smras so zhes so zhes zer nas dge slong don nyung du dag ci'i phyir dge slong dag dge slong dag ba ltung ba med ba la gzhi med par dge 'dun lhag ma'i chos kyis skur pa 'debs par byed ces smod par byed /
T08TD4106.2E:263a-17: kha zar bar byed pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol to /
T08TD4106.2E:263a-18: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byung ba 'di dang /
T08TD4106.2E:263a-20: skabs 'di la dge slong gi dge 'dun bsdu ba mdzad de /
T08TD4106.2E:263a-21: mdza' bo dang sa las skyes la rmas nas dge sbyong gi tshul ma yin pa /
T08TD4106.2E:263a-22: rjes su mthun bam yin pa /
T08TD4106.2E:263a-24: tshul dang mthun pa ma yin pa /
T08TD4106.2E:263a-25: de ni rab tu byung bas bya ba ma yin no zhes rnam grangs du mar rnam bar smad de /
T08TD4106.2E:263a-26: bslab ba bca' ba'i phan yon bcu yang dag par gzigs pas nga'i nyan thos rnams kyis 'dul ba la bslab ba'i gzhi 'di ltar gdon par bya ste /
T08TD4106.2E:263b-0: yang dge slong gang khros @263b shing zhe sdang bar gyur nas dge song dag pa lhung ba rnam pa med pa la gzhi med par dge 'dun lhag ma'i chos kyis skur na ltung byed do zhes bca' ba mdzad de /
T08TD4106.2E:263b-2: gang zag ni mdza' bo dang /
T08TD4106.2E:263b-4: nyon mongs ba ni khon du 'dzin ba /
T08TD4106.2E:263b-5: nyes pa ni dge slong la gzhi med par dge 'dun lhag ma'i chos kyis skur pa 'debs pa'o //
T08TD4106.2E:263b-6: de la yang dge slong gang zhes bya ba ni mdza' bo dang sa las skyes sam zhan yang de lta bu gang yin pa'o //
T08TD4106.2E:263b-7: khros shing zhes bya ba ni 'khrugs shing ngo //
T08TD4106.2E:263b-8: zhe sdang bar gyur nas zhes bya ba yid mi dga' bar gyur nas de 'khrugs pa ma bsal bar ro //
T08TD4106.2E:263b-9: dge slong dag pa zhes bya ba ni tshe dang ldan pa gyad bu nor ram gzhan yang de lta bu gang yang rung ba'o //
T08TD4106.2E:263b-10: ltung ba med pa la zhes bya ba ni gzhi de'i ltung ba med ba'o //
T08TD4106.2E:263b-11: gzhi med par zhes bya ba ni gzhi gsum po mthong ba'i gzhi dang thos pa'i gzhi dang dogs pa'i gzhi med par ro //
T08TD4106.2E:263b-12: dge 'dun lhag ma'i chos kyis zhes bya ba ni bcu gsum bo gang yang rung ba ste /
T08TD4106.2E:263b-13: de ni chos ma yin pa la chos kyi sgra gsungs pa yin no /
T08TD4106.2E:263b-14: skur na zhes bya ba ni skur ba 'debs na'o //
T08TD4106.2E:263b-15: ltung byed do zhes bya ba ni snga ma bzhin no //
T08TD4106.2E:263b-16: de la ltung ba ji ltar 'gyur zhen /
T08TD4106.2E:263b-17: 'dir yang dngos gzhi dang sbyor ba dang sbyor ba'i sbyor bas ltung ba rnam par gzhag pa dang /
T08TD4106.2E:263b-20: phyir bcos pa rnams kyis 'di'i mtshan nyid shes par bya'o //
T08TD4106.2E:263b-21: de la 'dir dngos gzhi'i ltung ba rnam par gzhag pa ni /
T08TD4106.2E:263b-22: dge slong gis skur ba 'debs par 'dod pas dge slong la 'du shes bsgyur te /
T08TD4106.2E:263b-23: dge 'dun lhag mas skur pa gsal ba'am bag tsam gyis kyang brjod na skur ba 'debs pa'i ltung byed kyi dngos gzhi 'gyur ro //
T08TD4106.2E:263b-24: de'i bye brag ni 'di ltar ltung ba 'byin par byed pas pha rol po la skur ba 'debs pa'i bsam pas mthong ba dang /
T08TD4106.2E:263b-26: dogs pa'i gzhi gang yang med par brdzun gyi tshig gis dge slong yang rung /
T08TD4106.2E:263b-28: pham par 'gyur ba byung yang rung /
T08TD4106.2E:264a-0: ma byung yang rung ba la dge 'dun lhag ma'i chos bcu gsum pa'am nyi shu gang yang rung bas skur pa de nyid dang @264a * //
T08TD4106.2E:264a-3: skyes pa'am bud med dam ma ni nga la sogs pa gang yang rung ba la mngon sum mam brgyud pa la sogs pa'i thabs gsal ba'am //
T08TD4106.2E:264a-4: bag tsam gyis brjod pa gang yang rung bas brad sprod cing go bar byas na dngos gzhir 'gyur te /
T08TD4106.2E:264a-5: de dag la na smad pa med do //
T08TD4106.2E:264a-6: dge 'dun lhag mas skur pa gdab pa'i bsam pa gang yang rung ba lan smad pa med do //
T08TD4106.2E:264a-9: dogs pa'i gzhi gsum po dang /
T08TD4106.2E:264a-10: brjed pa gang yang rung ba lan smad pa med do //
T08TD4106.2E:264a-16: lta ba bsgyur ba'i brdzun gyi tshig gang yang rung ba la na smad ba med do //
T08TD4106.2E:264a-17: dge slod dang dge slong ma bsnyen par ma rdzogs pa dang bcas pa gang yang rung ba la na smad pa med do /
T08TD4106.2E:264a-18: de gnyis pham par 'gyur ba'i chos dang /
T08TD4106.2E:264a-19: dge 'dun lhag mas nyams pa dang /
T08TD4106.2E:264a-20: ma nyams pa gang yang rung ba lan smad pa med do //
T08TD4106.2E:264a-21: dge 'dun lhag ma'i chos thun mong ba gang yang rung ba la na smad pa med do //
T08TD4106.2E:264a-22: nyan pa po nyid dang mi'i 'gro ba bo khyim pa 'am rab tu byung ba dang /
T08TD4106.2E:264a-23: skyes ba'am bud med dang ma ning la sogs ba gang yang rung ba la na smad pa med do //
T08TD4106.2E:264a-24: brda sprod pa'i thabs mngon sum mam /
T08TD4106.2E:264a-28: brda la sogs pas go bar byed pa gang yang rung ba la na smad pa med do //
T08TD4106.2E:264a-29: gang zag ma nyams pa dag la gzhi bcus ltung bar 'gyur te /
T08TD4106.2E:264a-30: ma mthong ba dang ma thos pa dang ;
T08TD4106.2E:264a-31: mi dogs par 'du shes bsgyur te mthong ngo zhe'am /
T08TD4106.2E:264a-33: dogs so zhes zer ba gsum dang /
T08TD4106.2E:264a-35: dogs la brjed pa las 'du shes bsgyur te thos te ma brjod do zhe'am /
T08TD4106.2E:264a-36: dogs te ma brjod do zhes zer ba gnyis dang /
T08TD4106.2E:264a-37: thos pa la yid ches nas mthong ngo zhe'am /
T08TD4106.2E:264a-38: thos pa la yid mi ches par ma thong ngo zhe'am /
T08TD4106.2E:264a-39: thos pa la dogs nas mthong ngo zhe'am / thos pa la mi dogs par mthong ngo zhe'am //
T08TD4106.2E:264a-40: dogs pa la dogs nas mthong ngo zhes zer ba lnga ste /
T08TD4106.2E:264a-41: de ltar gzhi bcu po de dag gang brjod kyang na smad pa med do //
T08TD4106.2E:264b-0: gang zag @264b dag pa ma dag pa ltar bcos pa la yang gzhi de bcus ltung bar 'gyur ro //
T08TD4106.2E:264b-1: gyur zag nyams pa ma dag pa la ni gzhi bcu gcig gis ltung bar 'gyur te /
T08TD4106.2E:264b-4: mi dogs par 'du shes ba sgyur te mthong ngo zhe'am /
T08TD4106.2E:264b-6: dogs so zhes zer ba gsum dang mthong la brjed ba dang /
T08TD4106.2E:264b-8: dogs la brjed pa las 'du shes bsgyur te mthong ste ma brjed do zhe'am /
T08TD4106.2E:264b-9: thos te ma brjed do zhe'am /
T08TD4106.2E:264b-10: dogs te ma brjed do zhes zer ba gsum dang /
T08TD4106.2E:264b-11: thos pa la yid ches nas mthong ngo zhe'am /
T08TD4106.2E:264b-12: thos pa la yid ma ches nas mthong ngo zhe'am /
T08TD4106.2E:264b-13: thos pa la dogs nas mthong ngo zhe'am /
T08TD4106.2E:264b-14: thos pa la mi dogs bar mthong ngo zhe'am /
T08TD4106.2E:264b-15: dogs pa la dogs pa na mthong ngo zhes zer pa lda ste /
T08TD4106.2E:264b-16: de ltar gzhi bcu gcig po dag gang brjod kyang na smad pa med do /
T08TD4106.2E:264b-17: gang zag ma dag ba dag pa ltar bcos pa la yang gzhi bcu gcig bo de dag gis ltung bar 'gyur ro //
T08TD4106.2E:264b-18: mtshan dang lta ba las rang gi phyogs ma yin pa la na smad pa med do //
T08TD4106.2E:264b-19: yid gnyis ni 'du shes dang 'dra bas yid gnyis dang bcas bas skur pa la na smad pa med do /
T08TD4106.2E:264b-20: gzhi gsum po dag ni tha dad pas de dag nang bsnur ba la na smad pa med do ;
T08TD4106.2E:264b-21: / brjed pa ni med pa dang 'dra bas brjed bas skur ba la na smad pa med do //
T08TD4106.2E:264b-22: don gyi de nyid ni mi brdzun par smra ba nyid kyi rgyu ma yin pas de nyams pa yin yang gzhi med par 'du shes bsgyur ba la na smad pa med do /
T08TD4106.2E:264b-23: dge slong 'gro ba gzhan gyi rnam par bsten pa na dge slong gi 'du shes yod pa la na smad pa med do //
T08TD4106.2E:264b-24: dngos po bzang ngan dang 'dra ba la na smad pa med do //
T08TD4106.2E:264b-25: mtshan gyur ba lta ba thun mong gi yul la na smad pa med do //
T08TD4106.2E:264b-26: 'gro ba gzhan las skyes pa dang /
T08TD4106.2E:264b-27: 'gro ba gzhan gyi rnam par bsten pa la na smad pa med do //
T08TD4106.2E:264b-28: gnas skabs gzhan thob ba la na smad pa med do //
T08TD4106.2E:264b-29: gzhi gcig la bslab pa du ma bcas pa nyid la na smad pa med do //
T08TD4106.2E:264b-30: dngos po la the tshom zabs bsam pa dang bcas par zhugs pa la na smad pa med do //
T08TD4106.2E:264b-31: yul bsams pa dang ma bsams pa la na smad pa med do //
T08TD4106.2E:264b-32: rang dang gzhan gyi don du byed pa la na smad pa med do //
T08TD4106.2E:265a-1: skur pa 'debs par 'dod pas gzhi med par dge slong la dge 'dun lhag ma'i chos kyis kur pa 'debs ba'o //
T08TD4106.2E:265a-2: 'di la yan lag ldas dngos gzhi'i ltung bar gyur te /
T08TD4106.2E:265a-4: pha rol po bsnyen par rdzogs ba nyid dang /
T08TD4106.2E:265a-5: gzhi med par 'du shes bsgyur ba dang /
T08TD4106.2E:265a-7: gsal ba'am bag tsam gyis brjod de don go ba'o //
T08TD4106.2E:265a-8: de dag las yan lag ma tshad na ci rigs par na smad do //
T08TD4106.2E:265a-9: sbyor ba'i ltung ba ni nyes byas te /
T08TD4106.2E:265a-10: ji srid du skur pa 'debs ba'i ltung byed kyi sbyor ba brtsams nas dngos gzhi la ma thug gi bar du nyes byas so //
T08TD4106.2E:265a-11: dngos gzhi la sbyor ba tha dad pa ji snyed brtsams pa re re la nyes byas re re'o //
T08TD4106.2E:265a-12: mi bsten pa la dge 'du na lhag ma'i chos kyis skur pa 'debs na nyes byas so //
T08TD4106.2E:265a-13: des na dge slong la pho'i dbang po med pa ma ning pho lta bu dang dge slong ma la mo'i dbang po med pa ma ning mo lta bus skur pas 'debs na nyes byes so //
T08TD4106.2E:265a-14: skur pa gdab par bya'i ming ma smos par skur ba 'debs na nyes byas so //
T08TD4106.2E:265a-15: dge slong 'gro ba gzhan gyi rnam pa bsten pa na dge slong gi 'du shes med pa la nyes byas so //
T08TD4106.2E:265a-16: khros par gyur pa dang rgod bag dang /
T08TD4106.2E:265a-17: byung rgyal gyis skur pa 'debs na nyes byas so //
T08TD4106.2E:265a-18: dud 'gro'i 'gro ba la go bar byas na nyes byas so //
T08TD4106.2E:265a-19: bsnyen par ma rdzogs pa la skur pa 'debs na nyes byas so //
T08TD4106.2E:265a-20: de bzhin gshegs pa la ngan sems kyis khrag phyung ba dang dge 'dun gyi dbyen byas pas skur na snyes byas so //
T08TD4106.2E:265a-21: gzhi gsum po dag med par bdag gis bsams te smras so zhes bya ba la sogs pas gzhogs smos byed na nyes byas so //
T08TD4106.2E:265a-22: ltung ba gzhan gyis skur na nyes byas so //
T08TD4106.2E:265a-23: sbyor ba'i sbyor ba'i ltung ba ni nyes byas phra mo ste /
T08TD4106.2E:265a-24: sbyor ba ji snyed pa la sbyor ba'i sbyor ba yang de snyed de /
T08TD4106.2E:265a-25: sbyor ba nyes byas kyi sbyor ba'i sbyor ba yang nyes byas te nyes byas phra mo'o //
T08TD4106.2E:265a-26: nyes byas kyis skur na yang nyes byas phra mor 'gyur ro //
T08TD4106.2E:265a-27: ltung ba med pa ni gang zag ma nyams pa dag la gzhi 'di ldas ltung bar mi 'gyur te /
T08TD4106.2E:265b-0: mi dogs pa la 'du shes @265b ma bsgyur bar ma mthong ngo zhe'am /
T08TD4106.2E:265b-2: mi dog so zhes zer ba gsum dang /
T08TD4106.2E:265b-4: dogs la brjed pa las 'du shes ma bsgyur bar thos te brjed do zhe'am /
T08TD4106.2E:265b-5: dogs te brjed do zhes zer ba gnyis te /
T08TD4106.2E:265b-6: de ltar gzhi lnga po dag gang brjed kyang ltung ba med do //
T08TD4106.2E:265b-7: gang zag dag pa ma dag pa ltar bcos pa la yang gzhi de lnga la ltung ba med do //
T08TD4106.2E:265b-8: gang zag nyams pa ma dag pa la ni gang gzhi drug gis ltung bar mi 'gyur te /
T08TD4106.2E:265b-10: dogs pa la 'du shes ma bsgyur bar mthong ngo zhe'am /
T08TD4106.2E:265b-12: dogs so zhes zer ba gsum dang /
T08TD4106.2E:265b-13: mthong la ma brjed pa dang /
T08TD4106.2E:265b-14: thos la ma brjed pa dang /
T08TD4106.2E:265b-15: dogs la ma brjed pa la 'du shes ma bsgyur bar mthong stem brjed do zhe'am /
T08TD4106.2E:265b-16: thos te ma brjed do zhe'am //
T08TD4106.2E:265b-17: dogs te ma brjed do zhes zer ba gsum ste /
T08TD4106.2E:265b-18: de ltar gzhi drug po de dag gang brjod kyang ltung ba med do //
T08TD4106.2E:265b-19: gang zag ma dag pa dag pa ltar bcos pa la yang gzhi de drug la ltung med do //
T08TD4106.2E:265b-20: dril bsgrags pa la ltung ba med do //
T08TD4106.2E:265b-21: ros la ri mo bris la phan chad pa ji ltar bdag gis shes pa de bzhin du 'jig rten thams cad kyis kyang shes so snyam na ltung ba med do //
T08TD4106.2E:265b-25: tshor ba dag gis nyen pa la ltung ba med do //
T08TD4106.2E:265b-26: bslab par bya ba ni dge slong gis yul thams cad la gnas skabs thams cad du skur ba 'debs pa'i ltung bed du 'gyur ba rnam pa thams cad mi bsten par bslab par bya'o //
T08TD4106.2E:265b-28: gzhi med par smra bar mi bya'o //
T08TD4106.2E:265b-29: phyir bcos pa ni snga ma bzhin no //
T08TD4106.2E:265b-30: skur pa 'debs pa'i ltung byed de drug cu dgu pa bshad zin to /
T08TD4106.2E:265b-32: // / bud med dang lhan cig 'gro ba'i ltung byed kyi gleng gzhi ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyam yod na rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' rab na bzhugs so /
T08TD4106.2E:266a-0: rgyal po'i khab na tha ga pa spyi cer zhes bya ba zhig 'dug pa des mnyan yod pa'i tha ga ba zhig gi bu mo bag mar blangs nas des bu mo de la yang dang yang du khu tshur dang thal lcag gis rdeg par byed nas dus gzhan zhig na tha ga pa spyi cer tshod khang du @266a * //
T08TD4106.2E:266a-1: chang 'thungs te ra ro nas rang gi khyim ga la ba der song ste phyin nas des bu mo de shin tu brdegs te gnyid log pa dang /
T08TD4106.2E:266a-2: des thag pa de gnyid log par rig nas sgo dang po phye ba kho na nas byung ste bros so //
T08TD4106.2E:266a-3: dge slong zhig rgyal po'i khab tu dbyar gnas par khas blangs nas mnyan yod du bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal du 'phags pa de yang sgo dang po phye ba kho na nas byung ste song ba dang /
T08TD4106.2E:266a-4: bu mo des dge slong de mthong nas des smras pa /
T08TD4106.2E:266a-8: bdag kyang mnyan yod du mchi yis 'phags pa dang lhan cig 'grogs te mchi'o //
T08TD4106.2E:266a-9: de ltar gyis shig / bu mo de dge slong de dang lhan cig 'grogs te 'gro bar brtsams so //
T08TD4106.2E:266a-10: ci tsam na tha ga pa spyi cer ra ro ba sangs te sad pa na bu mo snang nas des song ste sgo ba la dris pa /
T08TD4106.2E:266a-11: kye nang rje sgo 'di nas bu mo zhig phyir byung ngam /
T08TD4106.2E:266a-13: sgo dang po phye ba kho na nas byung ste song bo //
T08TD4106.2E:266a-14: thag pa de ra ba la 'dzegs te phyi bzhin bltas pa dang ci cam na thag ring ba kho na nas song ba mthong nas de myur ba myur bar bab ste bsnyegs pa dang /
T08TD4106.2E:266a-15: ci tsam na dge slong zhig dang lhan cig 'gro ba mthang nas des bsams pa /
T08TD4106.2E:266a-16: bdag ni gcig pu yin la 'di gnyis ni gnyis yin pas gal te bzung na 'di gnyis log ste bdag la brdeg bar 'gyur ba yang yin pa de lta bu'i gnas yod par 'gyur gyi ra mda' bzlog go snyam nas te brags shig na thag pa lnga brgya tsam 'khod pa dag gi gnad du song ste smras pa /
T08TD4106.2E:266a-17: shes ldan dag kho bo'i chung ma sh'akya'i bu'i dge sbyong gis phrogs kyi de la grogs gyis shig ces ra mda' bzlog tu bcug go //
T08TD4106.2E:266a-18: tha ga pa dag ni yongs su mi rtogs pa yin pas de dag gis thag bzangs lnga brgya tsam thogs te ri brags nas phyir byung ste de dag gis dge slong de shin tu brdegs te lhung bzed kyang bcag / phor bu dang khar ba dag kyang bcag / chos gos dag kyang dral nas shi'o snyam du bsams te por ro //
T08TD4106.2E:266a-19: bu mo des dge slong de la smras pa /
T08TD4106.2E:266b-0: 'phags pa khyed cag gis rgyal po las gzhon nu'i yongs su spang ba thob pa @266b lags kyi rgyal po'i khab tu bzhud de gsungs la 'di dag gi lag pa dang rkang pa dag gcod du gsol cig / de dag skrag nas dge slong de la bzod par gsol ba dang /
T08TD4106.2E:266b-1: dge slong gi snying mar dang 'dra bas des bzod par byas so //
T08TD4106.2E:266b-3: gal te 'phags pas bzod kyang bdag gis mi bzod do //
T08TD4106.2E:266b-4: de dag gis bu mo de la yang bzod par gsol ba dang /
T08TD4106.2E:266b-6: khyed cag la ni bzod na tha ga pa spyi cer 'di la mi bzod de bdag gis 'di'i lag pa dang rkang pa dag gcad par bya'o //
T08TD4106.2E:266b-8: 'di la yang bzod par gyis shig / bu mo des smras pa /
T08TD4106.2E:266b-9: gal te phyin chad bdag la mi brdeg na de lta na bzod par bya'o //
T08TD4106.2E:266b-10: dge slong de mthar gyis mnyan yod du phyin nas dge slong rnams kyis de la smras pa /
T08TD4106.2E:266b-11: tshe dang ldan pa 'ongs pa legs so 'ongs pa legs so //
T08TD4106.2E:266b-12: ji ltar bde bar brgyus sam tshe dang ldan pa dag ji ltar bde bar brgyus ;
T08TD4106.2E:266b-13: kho bo tha ga pa dag gis had por srog dang de'u phul lo //
T08TD4106.2E:266b-14: ci'i phyir des skabs de rgyas par brjod pa dang /
T08TD4106.2E:266b-15: dge slong rnams kyis smras pa /
T08TD4106.2E:266b-16: khyod skyes pa med par bud med dang lhan cig 'gron lam du 'gror rung ngam gang gi phyir mi rung ba de nyid kyi phyir nyes dmigs 'di lta bu byung ngo ;
T08TD4106.2E:266b-17: / dge slong don nyung du dag ci'i phyir dge slong dag skyes pa med par bud med dang lhan cig 'gron lam du 'gro zhes smod par byed /
T08TD4106.2E:266b-19: kha zer bar byed pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol to //
T08TD4106.2E:266b-20: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byung ba 'di dang gleng gzhi 'di dang skabs 'di la dge slong gi dge 'dun bsdu pa mdzad de /
T08TD4106.2E:266b-21: dge slong de la rmas nas /
T08TD4106.2E:266b-22: dge sbyong gi tshul ma yin pa /
T08TD4106.2E:266b-23: rjes su mthun pa ma yin pa /
T08TD4106.2E:266b-25: tshul dang mthun pha ma yin pa /
T08TD4106.2E:266b-26: de ni rab tu byung bas bya ba ma yin no zhes rnam grangs du mar rnam par smad de /
T08TD4106.2E:266b-27: bslab pa bca' ba'i phan yon bcu yang dag par gzigs pas nga'i nyan thos rnams kyis 'dul ba la bslab pa'i gzhi 'di ltar gdon par bya ste /
T08TD4106.2E:267a-0: yang dge slong gang skyes pa med par bud med dang lhan cig 'gron lam du 'gro na tha na grong bar du yang rung ste @267a * //
T08TD4106.2E:267a-1: ltung byed do zhes bca' ba mdzad do /
T08TD4106.2E:267a-3: gang zag ni dge slong chos 'di pa zhig / nyon mongs pa ni shes bzhin ma yin pa /
T08TD4106.2E:267a-4: nyes pa ni skyes pa med par bud med dang lhan cig 'gron lam du 'gro ba'o //
T08TD4106.2E:267a-5: de la yang dge slong gang zhes bya ba ni chos 'di pa 'am gzhan yang de lta bu gang yin pa'o //
T08TD4106.2E:267a-6: skyes pa med par zhes bya ba ni de dang de'o //
T08TD4106.2E:267a-7: bud med dang lhan cig ces bya ba ni bud med dam gzhon du ma mi tshangs par spyod pa 'khrig pa'i chos bsten nus pa dang ngo //
T08TD4106.2E:267a-8: 'gron lam du 'gro na zhes bya ba ni dgon pa'i lam du 'gro na'o //
T08TD4106.2E:267a-9: tha na grong bar du 'gro yang rung ste zhes bya ba ni tha na rgyang grags kyi bar du yang rung ste'o //
T08TD4106.2E:267a-10: ltung byed do zhes bya ba ni snga ma bzhin no //
T08TD4106.2E:267a-11: de la ltung ba ji ltar 'gyur zhe na /
T08TD4106.2E:267a-12: 'dir yang dngos gzhi dang sbyor ba dang /
T08TD4106.2E:267a-13: sbyor ba'i sbyor bas ltung ba rnam par gzhag pa dang /
T08TD4106.2E:267a-16: phyir bcos pa rnams kyis 'di'i mtshan nyid shes par bya'o //
T08TD4106.2E:267a-17: de la 'dir dngos gzhi'i ltung ba rnam par gzhag pa ni dge slong skyes ba gzhan med par mi'i 'gro ba pa'i bud med dam gzhon nu ma mi tshangs bar spyod pa 'khrig pa'i tshes bsten nus pa rang gi bsel byed pa dang lam du 'jud pa dang /
T08TD4106.2E:267a-18: mi nus pa 'khrid pa ma gtogs pa dang /
T08TD4106.2E:267a-19: lhan cig 'dod pas lam du 'gro na rgyan grags re re'i mthar bud med pa nyid la na smad pa med dang lhan cig 'gro ba'i ltung byed kyi dngos gzhir 'gyur ro //
T08TD4106.2E:267a-20: gzhan gyi dbang ma gtogs pa dang rang dga'i 'dod pas 'gro ba la na smad pa med do //
T08TD4106.2E:267a-21: bud med bsel byed pa dang /
T08TD4106.2E:267a-23: mi nus pa la brid pa ma gtogs pa dag la na smad pa med do //
T08TD4106.2E:267a-24: lam 'jigs pa med pa nyid la na smad pa med do //
T08TD4106.2E:267a-25: mi'i 'gro ba pa'i bud med dam gzhon nu ma mi tshangs par spyod pa 'khrig pa'i chos bsten nus ba gang yang rung ba la na smad pa med do //
T08TD4106.2E:267a-26: sngar thams cad pa la na smad pa med do //
T08TD4106.2E:267a-27: lam gcig pa la na smad pa med do //
T08TD4106.2E:267a-28: rgyang grags kyi mtha' las 'das pa la na smad pa med do //
T08TD4106.2E:267a-29: nyin mtshan gyi cha la na smad pa med do //
T08TD4106.2E:267b-0: 'di'i byed pa po ni mi'i 'gro ba pa'i bud @267b med dam gzhon nu ma mi tshangs par spyod pa 'khrig pa'i chos bsten nus pa nyid dang /
T08TD4106.2E:267b-1: lam rgyang grags kyi mtha' nyed do //
T08TD4106.2E:267b-2: 'di la yang yan lag lngas dngos gzhi'i ltung bar 'gyur te /
T08TD4106.2E:267b-3: mi'i 'gro ba pa'i bud med dang gzhon nu ma mi tshangs par spyod pa 'khrig ba'i chos bsten nus pa nyid dang /
T08TD4106.2E:267b-4: rang dgar 'dong pas lam du 'gro ba nyid dang /
T08TD4106.2E:267b-7: mi nus pa 'khrid pa ma gtogs pa nyid dang /
T08TD4106.2E:267b-8: rig pa'i skyes pa med pa nyid dang /
T08TD4106.2E:267b-9: lam rgyang grags kyi mtha' las 'das pa nyid do //
T08TD4106.2E:267b-10: de dag las yan lag ma tshang na ci rigs par na smad do //
T08TD4106.2E:267b-11: sbyor ba'i ltung ba ni nyes byas te /
T08TD4106.2E:267b-12: ji srid du bud med dang lhan cig 'gro ba'i ltung byed kyi sbyor ba brtsams nas dngos gzhi la ma thug gi bar du nyes byas so //
T08TD4106.2E:267b-13: dngos gzhi la sbyor ba tha dad pa ji snyed brtsams pa re re la nyes byas re re'o //
T08TD4106.2E:267b-14: mi tshangs par spyod pa 'khrig pa'i chos bsten mi nus pa la nyes byas so //
T08TD4106.2E:267b-15: mi'i 'gro ba mo ma yin pa la nyes bya so //
T08TD4106.2E:267b-16: rig pa'i skyes pa la legs par smra ba dang /
T08TD4106.2E:267b-17: nyes par smra ba'i chos rnams kun shes par mi nus pa la nyes byas so //
T08TD4106.2E:267b-18: mi'i 'gro ba ma yin pa'i rig pa'i skyes pa la nyes byas so //
T08TD4106.2E:267b-19: rig ba'i bud med la nyes byas so //
T08TD4106.2E:267b-20: rgyang grags kyi phyed nyid du nyes byas so //
T08TD4106.2E:267b-21: sbyor ba'i sbyor ba'i ltung ba ni nyes byas phra mo ste /
T08TD4106.2E:267b-22: sbyor ba ji snyed pa la sbyor ba'i sbyor ba yang de snyed de /
T08TD4106.2E:267b-23: sbyor ba nyes byas kyi sbyor ba'i sbyor ba yang nyes byas te nyes byas phra mo'o //
T08TD4106.2E:267b-24: ltung ba med pa la bud med de dge slong rang gi bsel byed pa dang /
T08TD4106.2E:267b-25: dge slong gis lam nor ba des lam du 'jug pa dang /
T08TD4106.2E:267b-26: dge slong 'gro mi nus pa la des khrid pa de la ltung ba med do //
T08TD4106.2E:267b-27: lam tha dad pa la ltung ba med do //
T08TD4106.2E:267b-28: rig pa'i skyes pa yod pa la ltung ba med do //
T08TD4106.2E:267b-29: rang dbang med pa la ltung ba med do //
T08TD4106.2E:267b-33: tshor ba dag gis nyen pa la ltung ba med do //
T08TD4106.2E:268a-0: bslab par bya ba ni dge slong gis yul thams cad la gnas skabs thams cad du bud med dang lhan cig 'gro ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ba rnam pa thams cad mi bsten par @268a * //
T08TD4106.2E:268a-2: phyir bcos pa ni snga ma bzhin no //
T08TD4106.2E:268a-3: bud med dang lhan cig 'gro ba'i ltung byed de bdun cu pa bshad zin to /
T08TD4106.2E:268a-5: // / so sor thar pa'i mdo rgya cher 'grel pa 'dul ba kun las btus pa /
T08TD4106.2E:268a-6: bam po sum cu brgyad pa //
T08TD4106.2E:268a-8: rku dang nyi shu ma lon dang /
T08TD4106.2E:268a-9: rko dang mgron dang bslab pa dang //
T08TD4106.2E:268a-11: mi gus chang 'thung dus min pa'o //
T08TD4106.2E:268a-12: zhes bya ba ni bcu pa brgyad pa yin te /
T08TD4106.2E:268a-13: sdom la zhes bya ba'i tshig gi don dang /
T08TD4106.2E:268a-14: dgos pa ni snga ma bzhin no //
T08TD4106.2E:268a-15: bcu pa brgyad pa 'dis kyang ltung byed kyi chos bcu pa bstan te /
T08TD4106.2E:268a-16: rkun ma dang lhan cig 'gro ba dang /
T08TD4106.2E:268a-17: ma lon par bsnyen par rdzogs par byed pa dang /
T08TD4106.2E:268a-19: mgron du gnyer ba las ring du 'dug pa dang /
T08TD4106.2E:268a-20: bslab pa la nye bar 'jog pa spong ba dang /
T08TD4106.2E:268a-21: nyan rna las gyur pa dang /
T08TD4106.2E:268a-25: dus ma yin par 'gro ba'i ltung byed do //
T08TD4106.2E:268a-26: de la rkun ma dang lhan cig 'gro ba'i ltung byed kyi gleng gzhi ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so //
T08TD4106.2E:268a-27: dge slong zhig rgyal po'i khab 'do ma'i tshal ka lan da ka'i gnas su dbyar gnas par khas blangs so //
T08TD4106.2E:268a-28: de nas dge slong de dbyar gyi zla ba gsum bo dag 'das nas chos gos byas pa dang ldan /
T08TD4106.2E:268a-29: chos gos zin pa dang ldan zhing lhung bzed dang chos gos thogs te /
T08TD4106.2E:268a-30: bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal du 'phags nas mnyan yod du 'gro ba'i don mthun btsal ba dang /
T08TD4106.2E:268a-31: des tshong pa sho gam 'dral ba dag mthong nas des smras pa /
T08TD4106.2E:268a-34: shes ldan dag kho bo yang khyed dang lhan cig tu mnyan yod du 'gro'o zhes de dag dang lhan cig 'phags so //
T08TD4106.2E:268a-35: ci tsam na ri drags shig tu sho gam gyi gnas su phyin pa dang /
T08TD4106.2E:268a-36: tshong pa sho gam 'dral pa de dag sho gam gcod pa dag gis 'jigs pas lam gol ba nas 'gro bar brtsams pa dang /
T08TD4106.2E:268a-37: dge slong de yang mdun du song ngo //
T08TD4106.2E:268a-38: de dag sho gam gcod pa dag gis mthong nas /
T08TD4106.2E:268b-0: kva'i tshang @268b pa sho gam 'dral ba dag gar 'dod /
T08TD4106.2E:268b-1: de dag gis dge slong de mdun du 'gro ba mthong nas de dag gis smras pa /
T08TD4106.2E:268b-2: shes ldan dag tshong pa sho gam 'dral ba 'di dag gis ma nyes kyi sh'kya'i bu'i dge sbyong mdun du 'gro ba 'dis nyes kyi 'di gsad par bya'o zhes de dag gis dge slong de shin tu brdegs te lhung bzed kyang bcag / phor bu dang khar ba dag kyar bcag / chos gos dag kyang dral te shi'o snyam nas bor ro //
T08TD4106.2E:268b-3: tshong pa sho gam 'dral ba de dag gis dge slong de la smras pa /
T08TD4106.2E:268b-4: 'phags pa khyed kyis rgyal po las gzhon nu'i yongs su spang pa thob pa lags kyi rgyal po'i gan du bzhud de gsungs la /
T08TD4106.2E:268b-5: shog ma pa 'di dag gi lag pa dang rkang pa dag gcod du gsol cig / de dag skrag nas dge slong de la bzod par gsol ba dang /
T08TD4106.2E:268b-6: dge slong gi snying ni mar dang 'dra bas /
T08TD4106.2E:268b-8: sho gam 'dral ba dag gis smras pa /
T08TD4106.2E:268b-9: gal te 'phags pas bzod kyang bdag cag gis mi bzod do //
T08TD4106.2E:268b-10: de dag gis sho gam 'dral bde dag la yang bzod par gsol ba dang /
T08TD4106.2E:268b-11: sho gam 'dral ba de dag gis smras pa /
T08TD4106.2E:268b-12: gal te khyed cag sho gam pa ji snyed pa dag gis kho bo cag tshod pa ji snyed pa dag sho gam 'jal du mi 'jud na kho bo cag gis kyang bzod par bya'o //
T08TD4106.2E:268b-13: dge slong de mthar gyis mnyan yod du phyin nas dge slong rnams kyis de la smras pa /
T08TD4106.2E:268b-14: tshe dang ldan pa 'ongs pa legs so 'ongs pa legs so //
T08TD4106.2E:268b-15: ji ltar bde bar brgyus sam /
T08TD4106.2E:268b-16: tshe dang ldan pa dag ji ltar bde bar brgyus /
T08TD4106.2E:268b-17: kho bo sho gam pa dag gis had por srog dang de'u 'phral lo //
T08TD4106.2E:268b-18: ci'i phyir des skabs de rgyas par brjod pa dang /
T08TD4106.2E:268b-19: dge slong rnams kyis smras pa /
T08TD4106.2E:268b-20: khyod don mthun rkun ma dang lhan cig 'gron lam du 'gror rung ngam /
T08TD4106.2E:268b-21: gang gi phyir mi rung ba de nyid kyi phyir nyes dmigs 'di lta bu dag byung bar 'gyur to zhes zer nas /
T08TD4106.2E:268b-22: dge slong don nyung du dag ci'i phyir dge slong don mthun rkun ma dang lhan cig 'gron lam du 'gro zhes smod par byed /
T08TD4106.2E:268b-24: kha zer bar byed pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol to //
T08TD4106.2E:269a-0: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byung ba 'di dang gleng gzi 'di dang skabs 'di la @269a * //
T08TD4106.2E:269a-1: dge slong gi dge 'dun bsdu ba mdzad de /
T08TD4106.2E:269a-2: dge slong de la rmas nas dge spyong gi tshul ma yin pa /
T08TD4106.2E:269a-3: rjes su mthun pa ma yin pa /
T08TD4106.2E:269a-5: tshul dang mthun pa ma yin bde ni rab tu byung bas bya ba ma yin no zhes rnam grangs du mar rnam par smad pa mdzad de /
T08TD4106.2E:269a-6: bslab pa bca' ba'i phan yon bcu yang dag par gzigs pas nga'i nyan thos rnams kyis 'dul ba la bslab pa'i gzhi 'di ltar gdon bar bya ste /
T08TD4106.2E:269a-7: yang dge slong gang don mthun pa rkun ma dang lhan cig 'gron lam du 'gro na tha na gro bar du yang rung ste ltung byed do zhes bca' ba mdzad de /
T08TD4106.2E:269a-9: gang zag ni dge slong chos 'di pa zhig / nyon mongs pa ni shes bzhin ma yin pa /
T08TD4106.2E:269a-10: nyes pa ni don mthun rkun ma dang lhan cig 'gron lam du 'gro ba'o //
T08TD4106.2E:269a-11: de la yang dge slong gang zhes bya ba ni chos 'di pa'am /
T08TD4106.2E:269a-12: gzhan yang de lta bu gang yin pa'o //
T08TD4106.2E:269a-13: don mthun rkun ma dang lhan cig ces bya ba la rkun ma zhes bya ba ni chom rkun pa grong 'joms par byed pa dag dang /
T08TD4106.2E:269a-14: tshong pa sho gam 'dral ba dang go //
T08TD4106.2E:269a-15: 'gron lam du 'gro ba zhes bya ba ni dgon pa'i lam du 'gro na'o //
T08TD4106.2E:269a-16: tha na grong bar du yang rung ste zhes bya ba ni na rgyan grags kyi bar du yang rung ste'o //
T08TD4106.2E:269a-17: ltung byed do zhes bya ba ni sems can dmyal ba dang /
T08TD4106.2E:269a-20: ngad 'gro dang log par ltung ba dag tu sreg par byed /
T08TD4106.2E:269a-23: gzhan yang ji srid du ltung ba de ma bshags shing so sor ma bshags na dge ba'i chos rnams la sgrib par byed pa ste des na ltung byed do zhes gsungs so //
T08TD4106.2E:269a-24: de la ltung ba ji ltar 'gyur zhe na /
T08TD4106.2E:269a-25: 'dir yang dngos gzhi dang sbyor ba dang /
T08TD4106.2E:269a-26: sbyor ba'i sbyor bas ltung ba rnam par gzhag pa dang /
T08TD4106.2E:269a-29: phyir bcos pa rnams kyis 'di'i mchan nyid shes par bya'o /
T08TD4106.2E:269a-30: de la 'dir dngos gzhi'i ltung ba rnam par gzhag pa ni dge slong grong 'joms par byed pa'i rkun ma dag gam /
T08TD4106.2E:269a-31: sho gam 'dral ba'i tshong pa rang gi bsel byed pa dang /
T08TD4106.2E:269a-33: mi nus pa 'khrid pa ma gtogs pa dang /
T08TD4106.2E:269b-0: lhan cig 'dod pa las lam du 'gro na rgyang grags re re'i @269b mthar rkun ma dang lhan cig 'gro ba'i ltung byed kyi dngos gzhir 'gyur ro //
T08TD4106.2E:269b-1: gzhan gyi dbang ma gtogs par rang dga'i 'dod pas 'gro ba la na smad pa med do //
T08TD4106.2E:269b-2: rkun ma dang sho gam 'dral ba bsel byed pa dang /
T08TD4106.2E:269b-3: lam du 'jug pa dang mi nus pa 'khrid pa ma gtogs pa dag la na smad pa med do //
T08TD4106.2E:269b-4: lam 'jigs pa med pa nyid la na smad pa med do //
T08TD4106.2E:269b-5: mi'i 'gro ba pa'i chom rkun dang sho gam 'dral ba gang yang rung ba la na smad pa med do //
T08TD4106.2E:269b-6: sngar thams pa la na smad pa med do //
T08TD4106.2E:269b-7: lam gcig pa la na smad pa med do //
T08TD4106.2E:269b-8: rgyang grags kyis mtha' las 'das pa la na smad pa med do ;
T08TD4106.2E:269b-9: / nyin mtshan gyi cha la na smad pa med do //
T08TD4106.2E:269b-10: 'di'i byed pa po ni mi'i 'gro ba ba grong 'joms par byed pa'i chom rkun pa dag gam sho gam 'dral ba'i tshong pa dag dang lam rgyang grags kyi mtha' nyid do //
T08TD4106.2E:269b-11: 'di la yan lag ldas dngos gzhi'i ltung bar 'gyur te /
T08TD4106.2E:269b-12: mi'i 'gro ba pa grong 'joms par byed pa'i chom rkun pa dag gam /
T08TD4106.2E:269b-13: sho gam 'dral ba'i tshong pa dag dang /
T08TD4106.2E:269b-14: rang dgar 'dod pas lam du 'gro ba nyid dang /
T08TD4106.2E:269b-17: mi nus pa 'khrid pa ma gtogs pa nyid dang //
T08TD4106.2E:269b-18: zol pa dag dang rku thabs su rab tu byung ba ma gtogs pa nyid dang /
T08TD4106.2E:269b-19: lam rgyang grags gyi mtha' las 'das pa nyid do //
T08TD4106.2E:269b-20: de dag las yan lag ma tshang na ci rigs par na smad do //
T08TD4106.2E:269b-21: sbyor ba'i ltung ba ni nyes byas te /
T08TD4106.2E:269b-22: ji srid du rkun ma dang lhan cig 'gro ba'i ltung byed kyi sbyor ba brtsams nas dngos gzhi la ma thug gi bar du nyes byas so //
T08TD4106.2E:269b-23: dngos gzhi la sbyor ba tha dad pa ji snyed brtsams pa re re la nyes byas re re'o //
T08TD4106.2E:269b-24: zol pa dag dang rku thabs su rab tu byung ba dag dang lhan cig 'gro ba la nyes byas so //
T08TD4106.2E:269b-25: rgyang grags kyi phyed nyid du nyes byas so //
T08TD4106.2E:269b-26: sbyor ba'i sbyor ba'i ltung ba ni nyes byas phra mo ste /
T08TD4106.2E:269b-27: sbyor ba ji snyed pa la sbyor ba'i sbyor ba yang de snyed de /
T08TD4106.2E:269b-28: sbyor ba nyes byas kyi sbyor ba'i sbyor ba yang nyes byas te nyes byas phra mo //
T08TD4106.2E:269b-29: ltung ba med pa ni rkun ma dang sho gam 'dral ba de dge slong dang gi bsel byed pa dang //
T08TD4106.2E:269b-30: dge slong gis lam nor ba des lam du 'jud pa dang /
T08TD4106.2E:269b-31: dge slong 'gro mi nus pa des khrid pa la ltung ba med do //
T08TD4106.2E:270a-1: pa la ltung ba med do //
T08TD4106.2E:270a-2: rang dbang med pa la ltung ba med do //
T08TD4106.2E:270a-6: tshor bdag gis nyen pa la ltung ba med do //
T08TD4106.2E:270a-7: bslab par bya ba ni dge slong gis yul thams cad la gnas skabs thams cad du rkun ma dang lhan cig 'gro ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ba rnam pa thams cad mi bsten par bsal ba par bya'o //
T08TD4106.2E:270a-8: phyir bcos pa ni snga ma bzhin no //
T08TD4106.2E:270a-9: rkun ma dang lhan cig 'gro ba'i ltung byed de bdun cu gcig pa bshad zin to /
T08TD4106.2E:270a-11: // / ma lon pa bsnyen par rdzogs par byed pa'i ltung byed kyi gleng gzhi ni /
T08TD4106.2E:270a-12: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so //
T08TD4106.2E:270a-13: gang gi tshe tshe dang ldan pa mood gal gyi bu chen pos nyes ba 'khor la sogs pa sar pa skyes bran gzhon nu bcu bdun sde'i tshogs dag rab tu byung zhing bsnyen par rdzogs par byas pa de'i tshe na de dag mtshan mo'i tho rangs kyi dus kyi tshe bkres pas nyam chung bas yongs su gzir nas du'o //
T08TD4106.2E:270a-14: bcom ldan 'das kyis de dag gsan nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la smras pa dang /
T08TD4106.2E:270a-15: tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos skabs de rgyas par gsol to //
T08TD4106.2E:270a-16: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
T08TD4106.2E:270a-17: kun dga' bo dge slong dag gang zag lo nyi shu ma lon pa dge slong gi dngos por bsnyen par rdzogs par byed dam /
T08TD4106.2E:270a-19: kun dga' bo gang zag lo nyid shu ma lon pas ni grang ba dang /
T08TD4106.2E:270a-26: sbrang bu ma chu rings dang /
T08TD4106.2E:270a-27: sdig sbrul dag gis reg bdag dang /
T08TD4106.2E:270a-28: gzhan las kyi tshig gi lam dan pa smras pa dang /
T08TD4106.2E:270a-30: lus kyi tshor ba sdug bsngal mi bzod pa dang /
T08TD4106.2E:270a-33: yid du mi 'od ba srog 'phrog par byed pa 'byung ngo co gdag mi bzod cing zag bdag la ci mi snyam par bya ba yang mi bzod cing dang du len mi nus pa'i rang bzhin can yin no //
T08TD4106.2E:270a-34: gang zag lo nyi shu lon pa ni de las bzlog pa yin no //
T08TD4106.2E:270a-35: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byung ba 'di dang /
T08TD4106.2E:270a-37: skabs 'di la dge slong gi dge 'dun bsdu pa mdzad de /
T08TD4106.2E:270b-0: tshe dang @270b ldan pa mod gal gyi bu chen po la rnas nas /
T08TD4106.2E:270b-3: ma brtags par spyod pa rnam par smad de /
T08TD4106.2E:270b-4: bslab la bca' ba'i pan yon bcu yang dag par gzigs pas nga'i nyan thos rnams kyis 'dul pa la bslab pa'i gzhi 'di ltar gdon par bya ste /
T08TD4106.2E:270b-5: yang dge slong gang zag lo nyi shu ma lon pa dge slong gi dngos por bsnyen par rdzogs par byed na ltung byed do //
T08TD4106.2E:270b-6: gang zag de yang bsnyen par rdzogs par mi 'gyur la /
T08TD4106.2E:270b-7: dge slong de dag kyang smras par 'gyur te /
T08TD4106.2E:270b-8: de la de ni cho ga yin no zhes bca' ba mdzad de /
T08TD4106.2E:270b-10: gang zag ni tshe dang ldan pa mod gal gyi bu chen po /
T08TD4106.2E:270b-11: nyon mongs pa ni bag chags ma byang bas so sor ma brtags pa /
T08TD4106.2E:270b-12: nyes pa ni gang zag lo nyi shu ma lon pa /
T08TD4106.2E:270b-13: dge slong gi dngos por bsnyen par rdzogs par byed pa'o //
T08TD4106.2E:270b-14: de la dge slong gang zhes bya ba ni chos 'di pa'am gzhan yang de lta bu gang yin pa'i //
T08TD4106.2E:270b-15: gang zag ces bya ba ni dge slong du bya ba gang yin pa de'o //
T08TD4106.2E:270b-16: lo nyi shu ma lon pa zhes bya ba ni /
T08TD4106.2E:270b-18: dge slong gi dngos por bsnyen par rdzogs par byed na zhes bya ba ni gsol ba dang bzhi'i las kyis so /
T08TD4106.2E:270b-19: ltung byed do zhes bya ba ni snga ma bzhin no //
T08TD4106.2E:270b-20: gang zag yang bsnyen par rdzogs par mi 'gyur la zhes bya ba ni gang zag gang yin pa de'o //
T08TD4106.2E:270b-21: dge slong de dag kyang smad par 'gyur te zhes bya ba ni /
T08TD4106.2E:270b-22: de na dge slong gang 'khod pa de dag go //
T08TD4106.2E:270b-23: de la de ni cho ga yin no zhes bya ba ni /
T08TD4106.2E:270b-24: bslab pa'i gzhi bca' ba mdzad pa de la de ni nges pa'i rjes su mthun pa'i chos yin pa'o //
T08TD4106.2E:270b-25: de la ltung ba ji ltar 'gyur zhe na /
T08TD4106.2E:270b-26: 'dir yang dngos gzhi dang sbyor ba dang /
T08TD4106.2E:270b-27: sbyor ba'i sbyor bas ltung ba rnam bar gzhag pa dang /
T08TD4106.2E:270b-30: phyir bcos pa rnams kyis 'di'i mtshan nyid shes par bya'o //
T08TD4106.2E:270b-31: de la 'dir dngos gzhi'i ltung ba rnam par gzhag pa ni dge slong gang zag dge slong gi dngos por bsnyen par rdzogs par bya ba na tshod lo nyi shu nyid kyang ma lon la dge slong gis kyang de ltar shes bzhin du mkhan po nyid kyis bsnyen par rdzogs par byed na lo nyi shu ma lon pa bsnyen par rdzogs par byed pa'i ltung byed kyi dngos gzhir 'gyur ro//
T08TD4106.2E:271a-0: @271a * // gang zag bsnyen par rdzogs par bya ba na tshod lo nyid shu ma lon pa nyid la na smad pa med do //
T08TD4106.2E:271a-1: der 'du shes pa la na smad pa med do //
T08TD4106.2E:271a-2: yid gnyis za ba la na smad pa med do //
T08TD4106.2E:271a-3: skyes pa dang bud med gang yang rung ba la na smad pa med do //
T08TD4106.2E:271a-4: mkhan po nyid byed pa la na smad pa med do ;
T08TD4106.2E:271a-5: / bsnyen par rdzogs par byas pa la na smad pa med do //
T08TD4106.2E:271a-6: 'di'i byed pa po ni bsnyen par rdzogs par byed pa lo nyi shu ma lon pa nyid la 'du shes gtso cher byed pa po nyid yin no //
T08TD4106.2E:271a-7: 'di la yan lag lngas dngos gzhi'i ltung bar 'gyur te /
T08TD4106.2E:271a-8: bsnyen par rdzogs par bya ba nyid dang /
T08TD4106.2E:271a-9: de'i dus na lo nyi shu ma lon pa nyid dang /
T08TD4106.2E:271a-11: mkhan po nyid byed pa dang /
T08TD4106.2E:271a-12: dge slong gi dngos por bsnyen par rdzogs par byed pa'o //
T08TD4106.2E:271a-13: de dag las yan lag ma tshang na ci rigs par na smad do //
T08TD4106.2E:271a-14: sbyor ba'i ltung ba ni nyes byas te /
T08TD4106.2E:271a-15: ji srid du ma lon pa la bsnyen par rdzogs par byed pa'i ltung byed kyi sbyor ba brtsams nas dngos gzhi la ma thug gi bar du nyes byas so //
T08TD4106.2E:271a-16: dngos gzhi la sbyor ba tha dad pa ji snyed brtsams pa re re la nyes byas re re'o //
T08TD4106.2E:271a-17: sbyor ba'i sbyor ba'i ltung ba ni nyes byas phra mo ste /
T08TD4106.2E:271a-18: sbyor ba ji snyed pa la sbyor ba'i sbyor ba yang de snyed de /
T08TD4106.2E:271a-19: sbyor ba nyes byas kyi sbyor ba'i sbyor ba yang nyes byas te nyes byas phra mo'o //
T08TD4106.2E:271a-20: ltung ba med pa ni der 'du shes pa med pa dang /
T08TD4106.2E:271a-21: yid gnyis mi za ba la ltung ba med do //
T08TD4106.2E:271a-25: tshor ba dag gis nyen pa la ltung ba med do //
T08TD4106.2E:271a-26: bslab par bya ba ni dge slong gis yul thams cad la gnas skabs thams cad du ma lon par bsnyen par rdzogs par byed pa'i ltung byed du 'gyur ba rnam pa thams cad mi bsten par bslab par bya'o //
T08TD4106.2E:271a-27: mkhan po des bsnyen par rdzogs par bya ba de la lo nyi shu lon pa nyid mi 'dri bar mi bya'o //
T08TD4106.2E:271a-28: mkhan po las gzhan pa'i dge slong der gtogs pa gzhan gyis kyang mi 'dri bar mi bya'o //
T08TD4106.2E:271a-29: lo nyi shu lon pa nyid du nges par mi shes par de bsnyen par rdzogs par mi bya'o //
T08TD4106.2E:271a-30: rnam pa thams cad du lo nyi shu lon pa ni bsnyen par rdzogs pa 'chags so //
T08TD4106.2E:271b-0: lo nyi shu ma lon pa ni lon par 'du shes pa nyid na @271b 'chags so //
T08TD4106.2E:271b-1: lo grangs mi shes pa dang /
T08TD4106.2E:271b-2: lo tshigs mi dran pa dang /
T08TD4106.2E:271b-3: lon nam ma lon yid gnyis za ba dag la yang lo nyi shu lon pa nyid du 'du shes pa nyid na 'chags so //
T08TD4106.2E:271b-4: lo nyi shu ma lon par bsnyen par rdzogs pa lo nyi shu ma lon par 'du shes na sngar sngom pa 'chags pa de 'jig go ;
T08TD4106.2E:271b-5: / gal te bsnyen par rdzogs pa'i 'og tu bdag nyid lo nyi shu ma lon no snyam pa'i 'du shes skyes pa'i gnas skabs de'i tshe na dge slong des lo nyi shu lon par gyur na ni de'i sngom pa sngar 'chags pa ni mi 'jig go //
T08TD4106.2E:271b-6: lo nyi shu ma lon par bsnyen par rdzogs par de ltar the tshom skyes pas de'i tshon mngal na gnas pa'i zla ba dag dang shol gyi zla bdag gis kyang bsnan te lo nyi shur tshang na sngar sngom pa chags pa de mi 'jig go /
T08TD4106.2E:271b-7: bsnyen par rdzogs kar ni de dag gis bsnan te brtsi bar mi bya'o //
T08TD4106.2E:271b-8: phyir bcos pa ni snga ma bzhin no //
T08TD4106.2E:271b-9: ma lon par bsnyen par rdzogs par byed pa'i ltung byed de bdun cu gnyis pa bshad zin to /
T08TD4106.2E:271b-11: // / sa rko ba'i ltung byed kyi gleng gzhi ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra na bzhugs so //
T08TD4106.2E:271b-12: de'i tshe na drug sde dag rang gi lag gis sa rko bar byed /
T08TD4106.2E:271b-16: yur ba 'dren par byed 'dren du 'jud par byed nas gzhan mu stegs can dag shes ldan dag sh'kya'i bu'i dge spyong 'di dag ni rang gi lag gis sa rko bar byed /
T08TD4106.2E:271b-22: bram ze dang khyim bdag dag kyang de ltar byed na shes ldan dag sh'akya'i bu'i dge sbyong 'di dag dang /
T08TD4106.2E:271b-24: khyim bdag dag la bye brag ni ci yod /
T08TD4106.2E:271b-26: tha dad du bya ba ni ci yod /
T08TD4106.2E:271b-27: su zhig dge sbyong mgo reg 'di dag la bsod snyoms sbyin pa dag bya par sems zhes smod par byed /
T08TD4106.2E:271b-29: kha zer bar byed pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol to //
T08TD4106.2E:271b-30: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byung ba 'di dang /
T08TD4106.2E:271b-32: skabs 'di la dge slong gi dge 'dun bsdu ba mdzad de /
T08TD4106.2E:272a-2: dge sbyong gi tshul ma yin pa /
T08TD4106.2E:272a-3: rjes su mthun pa ma yin pa /
T08TD4106.2E:272a-5: tshul dang mthun pa ma yin pa /
T08TD4106.2E:272a-6: de ni rab tu byung bas bya ba ma yin no zhes rnam grangs du mar rnam par smad de /
T08TD4106.2E:272a-7: bslab pa bca' ba'i phan yon bcu yang dag par gzigs pas nga'i nyan thos rnams kyis 'dul ba la bslab pa'i gzhi 'di ltar gdon par bya ste /
T08TD4106.2E:272a-8: yang dge slong rang gi lag gis sa rko'am rkor 'jud par bgyid na ltung byed do zhes bca' ba mdzad de /
T08TD4106.2E:272a-11: nyon mongs pa ni dge sbyong gi tshul ma yin pa /
T08TD4106.2E:272a-12: nyes pa ni sa rko ba'o //
T08TD4106.2E:272a-13: de la yang dge slong gang zhes bya ba ni drug sde 'am gzhan yang de lta bu gang yin pa'o //
T08TD4106.2E:272a-14: rang gi lag gis zhes bya ba ni rang gi lag pas so //
T08TD4106.2E:272a-15: sa zhes bya ba ni sa gnyis te rang bzhin can dang rang bzhin can ma yin pa'o //
T08TD4106.2E:272a-16: rang bzhin can zhes bya ba ni char chu zhod na zla ba gsum gyis sa 'thas par gyur pa'o //
T08TD4106.2E:272a-17: char chu ma zhod na zla ba drug gis 'thas par gyur pa'o //
T08TD4106.2E:272a-18: rang bzhin can ma yin pa ni de las gzhan pa'o //
T08TD4106.2E:272a-19: rko 'am zhes bya ba ni bdag nyid kyis so //
T08TD4106.2E:272a-20: rkor 'jud na zhes bya ba ni gzhan no //
T08TD4106.2E:272a-21: ltung byed do zhes bya ba ni snga ma bzhin no //
T08TD4106.2E:272a-22: de la ltung ba ji ltar 'gyur zhe na /
T08TD4106.2E:272a-23: 'dir yang dngos gzhi dang sbyor ba dang sbyor ba'i sbyor bas ltung ba rnam par gzhag pa dang /
T08TD4106.2E:272a-26: phyir bcos pa rnams kyis 'di'i mtshan nyid shes par bya'o //
T08TD4106.2E:272a-27: de la 'dir dngos gzhi'i ltung ba rnam par gzhag pa ni dge slong lag gi blas rgyu skar gyi sbyor bas rung bar byed pa med na thur ma sor bzhi tsam 'dzugs pa ma gtogs par sa tshig pa dang /
T08TD4106.2E:272a-31: bye ma la sogs pa ma gtogs pa'i sa'i sa rnag bzhin can 'thas pa nyid dang /
T08TD4106.2E:272a-34: 'dus pa dag la sa'i shas che ba la sogs pa dag la de ltar 'du shes pas gzhig pa'i blos rko'am /
T08TD4106.2E:272a-35: rkor 'jud na lan re btab pa'i sbyor ba re re las sa rko ba'i ltung byed kyi dngos gzhir 'gyur ro //
T08TD4106.2E:272a-36: sa rang bzhin can la na smad pa med do //
T08TD4106.2E:272a-37: rang bzhin can ni dang po 'thas pa las zhig pa'i yan lag rnams gal te char chu zhod na zla ba gsum lon pa'i 'thas pa'o //
T08TD4106.2E:272b-0: de char @272b chu ma zhod na zla ba drug lon pa'i 'thas pa ste /
T08TD4106.2E:272b-1: de dag la na smad pa med do //
T08TD4106.2E:272b-3: khang thog la na smad pa med do //
T08TD4106.2E:272b-4: sa'i tshogs 'dus pa bye ma dang 'dres pa la yang sa phal che ba nyid yin na na smad pa med do //
T08TD4106.2E:272b-5: gzhig pa'i blo nyid la na smad pa med do //
T08TD4106.2E:272b-6: sar 'du shes pa la na smad pa med do //
T08TD4106.2E:272b-7: rko'am rkor bcug pa la na smad pa med do //
T08TD4106.2E:272b-8: lan re btab pa'i sbyor bar re re'i dngos gzhi la na smad pa med do //
T08TD4106.2E:272b-9: 'di'i byed pa po ni sa'i sa rang bzhin can 'thas pa nyid la sogs pa 'du shes gtso cher byed pa po nyid yin no //
T08TD4106.2E:272b-10: 'di la yan lag lngas dngos gzhi'i ltung bar 'gyur te /
T08TD4106.2E:272b-11: dge slong lag gi blas rgyu skar gyi sbyor bas rung bar byed pa med na thur ma sor bzhi tsam 'dzugs pa ma gtogs pa nyid dang /
T08TD4106.2E:272b-12: sa'i sa rang bzhin can 'thas pa nyid dang /
T08TD4106.2E:272b-16: de dag las yan lag mtshang na ci rigs par na smad do //
T08TD4106.2E:272b-17: sbyor ba'i ltung ba ni nyes byas te /
T08TD4106.2E:272b-18: ji srid du sa rko ba'i ltung byed kyi sbyor pa brtsams nas dngos gzhi la ma thug gi bar du nyes byas so //
T08TD4106.2E:272b-19: dngos gzhi la sbyor ba tha dad pa ji snyed brtsams par re re la nyes byas re re'o //
T08TD4106.2E:272b-20: sa'i sa rang bzhin can 'thas pa nyid ma yin pa la nyes byas so //
T08TD4106.2E:272b-21: 'dus pa la sa'i shas chung ba la nyes byas so //
T08TD4106.2E:272b-22: sa tshig pa ni nyams pa nyid yin pas de la nyes byas so //
T08TD4106.2E:272b-25: de'i skyang nul grugs pa dag la nyes byas so //
T08TD4106.2E:272b-28: sa'i ngo bo nyid ma yin pa'i rdzas lhag ma dag la nyes byas so //
T08TD4106.2E:272b-31: sa'i phye ma 'dren pa'i lci ba 'gogs pa dang /
T08TD4106.2E:272b-33: 'dam rdzab dang 'brel ba'i phru ba la sogs pa 'degs pa dang /
T08TD4106.2E:272b-34: 'jig pa'i bdag nyid kyi tsha sgo dga' nyes byas so //
T08TD4106.2E:272b-35: sbyor ba'i sbyor ba'i ltung ba ni nyes byas phra mo ste /
T08TD4106.2E:272b-36: sbyor ba ji snyed pa la sbyor ba'i sbyor ba yang de snyed de /
T08TD4106.2E:272b-37: sbyor ba nyes byas kyi sbyor ba'i sbyor ba yang nyes byas te nyes byas phra mo'o //
T08TD4106.2E:272b-38: ltung ba med pa ni lag gi blas rgyu skar gyi sbyor bas rung bar byed pa med na thur ma sor bzhi tsam 'dzugs pha la ltung ba med do //
T08TD4106.2E:273a-0: gzhi pa'i blo dang mi ldan pa @273a * //
T08TD4106.2E:273a-2: sang 'du shes med pa la ltung ba med do //
T08TD4106.2E:273a-3: bgrang ba dang shod dgos pa la sogs pa'i bsam pa la ltung ba med do //
T08TD4106.2E:273a-7: tshor ba dag gis nyen ba la ltung ba med do //
T08TD4106.2E:273a-8: bslab bar bya ba ni dge slong gis yul thams cad la gnas skabs thams cad du sa rko ba'i ltung byed du 'gyur ba rnam pa thams cad mi bsten par bslab par bya'o //
T08TD4106.2E:273a-9: phyir bcos pa ni snga ma bzhin no //
T08TD4106.2E:273a-10: sa rko ba'i ltung byed de bdun cu gsum pa bshad zin to /
T08TD4106.2E:273a-12: // / mgron du gnyer ba las ring du 'dug pa'i ltung byed kyi gleng gzhi ni bcas pa dang gnang ba'i dbang gis rnam pa gnyis te /
T08TD4106.2E:273a-14: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sh'akya rnams kyi nang du ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs pa na ser skya'i gnas su byon nas ser skya'i gnas n+ya gro dha'i kun dga' rab na bzhugs so //
T08TD4106.2E:273a-15: sh'akya ming chen gyis de thos nas bsams pa /
T08TD4106.2E:273a-16: bdag gis bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang bcas pa lan mang du gdugs tshod la khyim gzhan du spyan drangs te /
T08TD4106.2E:273a-17: bshos gsol nal na 'ga' yang yo byad thams cad kyis spyan drangs kyi /
T08TD4106.2E:273a-18: bdag gis bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang bcas pas zla ba bzhir yo byad thams cad kyis spyan drang ngo snyam mo //
T08TD4106.2E:273a-19: de nas sh'akya ming chen bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te mtha' gcig tu 'dug go //
T08TD4106.2E:273a-20: mtha' gcig tu 'dug nas bcom ldan 'das kyis sh'akya ming chen la chos dang ldan pa'i bka' mchid kyis yang dag par ston par mdzad /
T08TD4106.2E:273a-21: yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug par mdzad /
T08TD4106.2E:273a-22: yang dag par gzengs stod par mdzad /
T08TD4106.2E:273a-23: yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad do //
T08TD4106.2E:273a-24: rnam grangs du mar chos dang ldan pa'i bka' mchid kyis yang dag par bstan /
T08TD4106.2E:273a-27: yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad nas cang mi gsung ngo //
T08TD4106.2E:273a-28: de nas sh'akya ming chen stan las langs te /
T08TD4106.2E:273b-0: bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di @273b skad ces gsol to //
T08TD4106.2E:273b-1: bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang bcas pas dgung zla bzhir bdag gis na bza' dang /
T08TD4106.2E:273b-5: sman gyi yo byad dag bzhes par ci gnang /
T08TD4106.2E:273b-6: bcom ldan 'das kyis sh'akya ming chen la cang mi gsung bas gnang ngo //
T08TD4106.2E:273b-7: de nas sh'akya ming chen gyis bcom ldan 'das kyis cang mi gsung bas gnang par rig nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo pos phyag 'tshal te /
T08TD4106.2E:273b-8: bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas song nas des bsnyung ba'i rung ba'i rung ba'i khang pa rtsig tu bcug cig /
T08TD4106.2E:273b-9: bsnyung ba'i sman dag 'jog tu bcug / bde ba'i sman dus su rung ba dang /
T08TD4106.2E:273b-10: thun tshod du rung ba dang /
T08TD4106.2E:273b-12: 'tsho ba'i bar du bcang ba dang /
T08TD4106.2E:273b-17: 'bras bu'i sman dag kyang 'jog tu bcug zhun mar bskol ba dang /
T08TD4106.2E:273b-18: ma bskol ba dag kyang 'jog tu bcug /'bru mar bskol ba dang /
T08TD4106.2E:273b-19: ma bskol ba dag kyang 'jog tu bcug / ba dag dang /
T08TD4106.2E:273b-21: ra zhon pa dag kyang 'jog tu bcug / yo byad thams cad dag kyang 'jog tu bcug / sman pa dang bsnyung g-yog dag kyang 'jog tu bcug ste /
T08TD4106.2E:273b-22: dge slong dag la yang yo byad thams cad kyis bstabs so //
T08TD4106.2E:273b-23: drug sde dag gis smras pa /
T08TD4106.2E:273b-24: dga' bo nye dga' bo bca' ba dang /
T08TD4106.2E:273b-25: bza' ba 'di lta bu rnyed kyi thabs shig bya'o zhes de dag gis sman pa la dris pa /
T08TD4106.2E:273b-26: bzhin bzangs dag kho bo cag la nad ci yod pa je ltos shig / sman pas bsams pa /
T08TD4106.2E:273b-27: 'di dag ni dge sbyong hral po dag yin pas za 'dod kyi 'di dag dang mthun par smra bar bya'o snyam nas des de dag la smras pa /
T08TD4106.2E:273b-28: 'phags pa dag khyed cag ni shul gyis dub pa dag lags pas je bskur snum bag gsol la /
T08TD4106.2E:273b-29: de'i 'og tu bska ba dag gsol cig / de dag gis smras pa /
T08TD4106.2E:273b-30: dga' bo nye dga' 'di ni sman pa chen po nad dang nad kyi gzhi dang khams la mkhas pa rgyal po la mkho ba yin te /
T08TD4106.2E:274a-0: gal te bdag cag thams cad kyis dus gcig tu de ltar bya bar brtsams na myur du zin par 'gyur @274a * //
T08TD4106.2E:274a-2: je dang por gnyis kyis snum bag bsten cing bzhis nad g-yog bya'o //
T08TD4106.2E:274a-3: de'i 'og tu yang gnyis kyis snum bag bsten cing bzhis nad g-yog bya'o //
T08TD4106.2E:274a-4: de'i 'og tu yang gnyis kyis snum bag bsten cing bzhis nad g-yog bya'o //
T08TD4106.2E:274a-5: de ltar bya'o zhes de dag las gnyis snum bag bsten par brtsams shing bzhis nad g-yog byed pa na ci tsam na zla ba gcig 'das so //
T08TD4106.2E:274a-6: de'i 'og tu gzhan gnyis kyis snum bag bsten par brtsams shing bzhis nad g-yog byed pa na zla ba gnyis pa 'das so //
T08TD4106.2E:274a-7: de'i 'og tu yang gnyis kyis snum bag bsten par brtsams shing bzhis nad g-yog byed pa na zla ba gsum pa 'das so //
T08TD4106.2E:274a-8: zla ba bzhi pa la thams cad 'dus te bza' bar brtsams nas zla ba bzhi pa 'das pa dang sh'akya ming chen gyis bcom ldan 'das gshegs ston la spyan drangs pa dang /
T08TD4106.2E:274a-9: nye dgas phyag tshang la phrin spring ste /
T08TD4106.2E:274a-10: bzhin bzangs deng kho bo la khu sha dang /
T08TD4106.2E:274a-12: sha tshod dag gyis shig ces spring ngo //
T08TD4106.2E:274a-14: 'phags pa dgung zla bzhi 'das te sh'akya ming chen gyis bcom ldan 'das gshegs ston la spyan drangs na khyed kyi bya ba dung yang ma rdzogs sam /
T08TD4106.2E:274a-16: bkren pa sh'akya ming chen pos sang rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun zla ba bzhir yo byad thams cad kyis spyan 'dren na /
T08TD4106.2E:274a-17: gal te spyan drang ba 'di lta bus sang rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun spyan drang du rung na ni nye dgas kyang sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun ji srid 'tsho'i bar du spyan 'dren par spro'o //
T08TD4106.2E:274a-19: khyed cag zla ba bzhir sha dang khu ba sha stag zos par gyur kyang 'on kyang khyed cag smod par byed na gnas brtan gang dag gis zla ba bzhir aa ru ra 'bru gcig kyang ma gsol ba de dag ni shin tu dka'ang dbye pa yin no zhes zer nas dge slong don nyung du dag ci'i phyir dge slong dag ha cang slong bar byed smod par byed /
T08TD4106.2E:274a-21: kha zer bar byed pa'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /
T08TD4106.2E:274a-22: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
T08TD4106.2E:274b-0: de lta @274b bas na dge slong gis ha cang bslang bar mi bya'o //
T08TD4106.2E:274b-1: ha cang slong na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro zhes bstabs pa la yang ha cang bslang bar mi bya ba dang /
T08TD4106.2E:274b-2: de'i nyes dmigs kyang byung ba'i mtha' sngon grong med pa'i dgon pa'i gnas cig na drang srong zhig 'dug pa la klu gzhon nu zhig rtag tu bsnyen bkur byed cing lus kyis 'khri bas drang srong de la gnod par gyur nas /
T08TD4106.2E:274b-3: drang srong gzhan zhig gis smras pa /
T08TD4106.2E:274b-4: khyod klu gzhon du de phyin chad 'ang bar mi 'gyur bar 'dod na /
T08TD4106.2E:274b-5: gang gi tshe glu gzhon nu de khyod la yo byad thams cad kyis stobs par byed pa de'i tshe na /
T08TD4106.2E:274b-6: de'i mgo la nor bu 'dug pa de slongs shig dang /
T08TD4106.2E:274b-7: klu rnams ni ser sna can yin pas mi ster bas phyin chad 'ong bar mi 'gyur ro //
T08TD4106.2E:274b-8: drang srong des de bzhin byas pa dang klu gzhon nu des pha ma la dris na yang nor bu sbyin du mi rung ngo zhes zer nas phyin chad mi 'ong zhing mi snang ba'i lam la 'dug par gyur pa dang /
T08TD4106.2E:274b-9: gzhan yang sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na grong med pa'i dgon pa zhig na drang srong zhig 'dug pa de'i bsti gnas su bya mang po dag 'du zhing sgra byin te /
T08TD4106.2E:274b-10: bsam gtan dag gi tsher ma ni sgra yin pas drangs srong des bya mang po dag gi sgra des sems rtse gcig pa nyid ma thob po //
T08TD4106.2E:274b-11: drang srong gzhan zhig gis de la smras pa /
T08TD4106.2E:274b-12: khyod bya de dag phyin chad 'dir 'ong phar mi 'dod na tshes nyi shu dgu'i mtshan mo rtsva'i sgron me spor la shing ljon pa dag gi drung du song ste 'di skad ces sgo bdag bza'o //
T08TD4106.2E:274b-13: phru gu dag bza'o zhes smros shig dang phyin chad 'ang bar mi 'gyur ro //
T08TD4106.2E:274b-14: des de ltar bya bar brtsams pa dang /
T08TD4106.2E:274b-15: bya de dag gis bsams pa /
T08TD4106.2E:274b-16: drang srong 'di smyos par gyur tam snyam nas bya de dag gi phru gu dag 'dab ma skyes par gyur pa dang /
T08TD4106.2E:274b-17: de dag dong ste phyin chad mi 'ong zhing ci tsam na mthar gyis de dag thams cad mi snang ba'i lam la 'khod do //
T08TD4106.2E:274b-18: dge slong dag re zhig dud 'gro'i skye gnas su skyes pa'i srog chags de dag kyang ha cang bslangs pa na mi snang ba'i lam du 'khod na mi rnams lta smos kyang ci dgos /
T08TD4106.2E:274b-19: de bas dge slong gis ha cang bslang bar mi bya'o //
T08TD4106.2E:274b-20: ha cang slong na 'gal tshabs can du 'gyur ro zhes stsal nas /
T08TD4106.2E:275a-0: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byung ba 'di dang gleng gzhi 'di @275a * //
T08TD4106.2E:275a-2: skabs 'di la dge slong ge dge 'dun bsdu ba mdzad de /
T08TD4106.2E:275a-3: nya dga' la rmas nas dge sbong gi tshul ma yin pa /
T08TD4106.2E:275a-4: rjes su mthun pa ma yin pa /
T08TD4106.2E:275a-6: tshul dang mthun pa ma yin pa /
T08TD4106.2E:275a-7: de ni rab tu byung bas bya ba ma yin pa zhes rnam grang sdu mar rnam par smad de /
T08TD4106.2E:275a-8: bslab pa bca' ba'i phan yon bcu yang dag par gzigs pas nga'i nyan thos rnams kyis 'dul ba la bslab pa'i gzhi 'di ltar gdon par bya ste /
T08TD4106.2E:275a-9: dge slong gang gis zla ba bzhir mgron du pos pa bdag gir bya'o //
T08TD4106.2E:275a-10: de las lhag par bdag gir byed na ltung byed do zhes bca' ba mdzad de /
T08TD4106.2E:275a-14: nyes pa ni mgron du bos pa'i zan la ha cang slong ba'o //
T08TD4106.2E:275a-15: gnang ba'i gleng gzhi ni de nas bcom ldan 'das ser skya'i gan su ci dgyes par bzhugs nas rgyal po'i kha ba ga la der logs su ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs te mthar gyis rgyu zhing gshegs pa na rgyal po'i khab tu byon nas /
T08TD4106.2E:275a-16: rgyal po'i khab na 'od ma'i tshal ka lan dka' gnas na bzhugs so //
T08TD4106.2E:275a-17: ma ga dha'i rgyal po'i bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying pos de thos nas bsams pa /
T08TD4106.2E:275a-18: sh'akya ming chen gyis bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang bcas pa zla ba bzhir yo byad thams cad kyis spyan drangs te bdag gis kyang bcom ldan 'das dge slong dge 'dun dang bcas pa lan mang du gdugs tshod la khyim gzhan du spyan drangs te bshos gsol na /
T08TD4106.2E:275a-19: lan 'ga' yang yo byad thams cad kyis spyan ma drangs kyi bdag gis bcom ldan 'das dge slong ge dge 'dun dang bcas pa zla ba bzhir yo byad thams cad kyis spyan drangs ngo snyam mo //
T08TD4106.2E:275a-20: de nas ma ga dha'i rgyal po bzo sbyongs gzugs can snying pos bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te mtha' gcig tu 'dug go //
T08TD4106.2E:275a-21: mtha' gcig tu 'dug nas bcom ldan 'das ma ga dha'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs can snying po la chos dang ldan pa'i bka' mchid kyis yang dag par ston par mdzad /
T08TD4106.2E:275a-22: yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug par mdzad /
T08TD4106.2E:275b-0: yang dag par @275b gzengs stod par mdzad /
T08TD4106.2E:275b-1: yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad do /
T08TD4106.2E:275b-2: rnam grangs du mar chos dang ldan pa'i bka' mchid kyis yang dag par bstan /
T08TD4106.2E:275b-3: yang dag par 'dzin du bcug / yang dag par gzengs bstod /
T08TD4106.2E:275b-4: yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad nas cang mi gsung ngo//
T08TD4106.2E:275b-5: de nas ma ga dha'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying po stan las langs te /
T08TD4106.2E:275b-6: bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas /
T08TD4106.2E:275b-7: bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
T08TD4106.2E:275b-8: bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang bcas pa la dgung zla ba zhir bdag gi na bza' dang /
T08TD4106.2E:275b-12: sman gyi yo byad dag bzhes par ci gnang /
T08TD4106.2E:275b-13: bcom ldan 'das kyis ma ga dha'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying po la can snying po la cang mi gsung pas gnang ngo //
T08TD4106.2E:275b-14: de nas ma ga dha'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying pos bcom ldan 'das kyis cad mi gsung bas gnang par rig nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te /
T08TD4106.2E:275b-15: bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas song nas des bsnyung ba'i rung ba'i khang pa brtsig tu bcug cing /
T08TD4106.2E:275b-16: bsnyung ba'i sman yang 'jog tu cug / bde ba'i sman dus su rung ba dang /
T08TD4106.2E:275b-17: thun tshod du rung ba dang /
T08TD4106.2E:275b-19: 'tsho ba'i bar du bcang pa dang /
T08TD4106.2E:275b-24: 'bras bu'i sman dag kyang 'jog tu bcug / zhun mar bskol ba dang ma bskol ba dag kyang 'jog tu bcug /'bru mar bskol ba dang ma bskol ba dag kyang 'jog tu bcug / ba dang ma he mo dag dang /
T08TD4106.2E:275b-25: ra bzhon dag kyang 'jog tu bcug / yo byad thams cad kyang 'jog tu bcug / sman pa dang bsnyung g-yog dag kyang 'jog tu bcug ste /
T08TD4106.2E:275b-26: dge slong dag yo byad thams cad kyang gon byas so /
T08TD4106.2E:275b-27: de'i tshe na tshe dang ldan pa pi ling da'i bu'i sring mo'i khyo bram ze zhig gis bcom ldan 'das sh'akya rnams kyi nang du ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs pa na rgyal po'i khab tu byon nas rgyal po'i khab na 'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan da ka'i gnas na bzhugs pa zhes thos so //
T08TD4106.2E:276a-2: sh'akya ming chen gyis bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang bcas ba zla ba bzhir yo byad thams cad kyis spyan drangs te /
T08TD4106.2E:276a-3: bdag gis kyang bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang bcas pa lan mang du gdugs tshod la khyim gzhan du spyan drangs te bshos gsol na lan 'ga' yang yo byad thams cad kyis spyan ma drangs kyi /
T08TD4106.2E:276a-4: bdag gis bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang bcas pa zla ba bzhir yo byad thams cad kyis spyan drang ngo snyam mo //
T08TD4106.2E:276a-5: de nas bram ze de bcom ldan 'das gal ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te mtha' gcig tu 'dug go //
T08TD4106.2E:276a-6: mtha' gcig tu 'dug nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bram ze de la chos dang ldan pa'i bka' mchid kyis yang dag par ston par mdzad /
T08TD4106.2E:276a-7: yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug par mdzad /
T08TD4106.2E:276a-8: yang dag bar gzengs stod par mdzad /
T08TD4106.2E:276a-9: yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad do //
T08TD4106.2E:276a-10: rnam grangs du mar chos dang ldan pa'i bka' mchid kyis yang dag par bstan /
T08TD4106.2E:276a-11: yang dag par 'dzin du bcug / yang dag par gzengs bstod /
T08TD4106.2E:276a-12: yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad nas cang mi gsung ngo //
T08TD4106.2E:276a-13: de nas bram ze de stan las langs te bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
T08TD4106.2E:276a-14: bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang bcas pa dgung zla bzhir bdag gi na bza' dang /
T08TD4106.2E:276a-18: sman gyi yo byad rnams bzhes par ci gnang /
T08TD4106.2E:276a-19: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
T08TD4106.2E:276a-20: bram ze nga de'i dang por ma ga dh'a'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying pos spyan drangs so //
T08TD4106.2E:276a-22: 'phags pa pi lin da'i bu bdag gi nye du yin pas de spyan drangs na gnang bar 'gyur grang snyam nas de'i gan du song ste de spyan drangs pa dang /
T08TD4106.2E:276a-23: tshe dang ldan pa pi lin da'i bus smras pa /
T08TD4106.2E:276a-24: bcom ldan 'das la zhu'o zhes de bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar song ste gsol ba /
T08TD4106.2E:276a-25: btsun pa bdag gi dmag pas bdag dgung zla bzhir g-yar drangs na de la mchid kyis 'tshal lam /
T08TD4106.2E:276b-0: bcom ldan 'das kyis @276b bka' stsal pa /
T08TD4106.2E:276b-1: de lta bas na so sor mgron du bos pa ma gtogs te /
T08TD4106.2E:276b-2: dge slong gis so sor mgron du bos pa bdag gir bya'o //
T08TD4106.2E:276b-3: dge slong gzhan dag phyis lhags pa de dag gis bsams pa /
T08TD4106.2E:276b-4: bdag cag rgyal pos mgron du ma bos kyis bsod snyoms la 'jug par bya'o snyam nas de dag bsod snyoms la zhugs pa ma ga dh'a'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying pos mthong nas /
T08TD4106.2E:276b-5: 'phags pa dag yang dang yang du mgron du bod do zhes zer ba'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa dang /
T08TD4106.2E:276b-6: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba /
T08TD4106.2E:276b-7: de lta bas na yang dang yang du mgron du ma bos pa ma gtogs te /
T08TD4106.2E:276b-8: dge slong gis yang dang yang du mgron du bos pa bdag gir bya'o /
T08TD4106.2E:276b-9: dge slong dag gis bsams pa /
T08TD4106.2E:276b-10: rgyal po gzugs can snying po ni bya ba mang ba dang /
T08TD4106.2E:276b-11: byed pa mang ba yin la /
T08TD4106.2E:276b-12: bdag cag ni bya ba nyung ba dang byed pa nyung ba yin gyi bdag cag bsod snyoms la 'jug par bya'o snyam nas /
T08TD4106.2E:276b-13: de dag bsod snyoms la zhugs pa ma ga dh'a'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying pos mthong nas /
T08TD4106.2E:276b-14: 'phags pa dag dus kyis mgron du bod do zhes zer ba'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba dang /
T08TD4106.2E:276b-15: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
T08TD4106.2E:276b-16: de lta bas na dus kyis mgron du bos pa ma gtogs te /
T08TD4106.2E:276b-17: dge slong gis dus kyis mgron du bos pa bdag gir bya'o //
T08TD4106.2E:276b-18: rgyal po gzugs can snying pos bcom ldan 'das gshegs ston la spyan drangs nas /
T08TD4106.2E:276b-19: phyi de nyin par dge slong rab tu mang po dag bsod snyoms la zhugs pa ma ga dh'a'i rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying pos mthong nas /
T08TD4106.2E:276b-20: 'phags pa dag rtag tu mgron du bod do zhes zer ba'i skabs de dge slong rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba dang /
T08TD4106.2E:276b-21: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
T08TD4106.2E:276b-22: de lta bas na rtag tu mgron la bos pa ma gtogs te dge slong gis rtag tu mgron du bod pa bdag gir bya'o //
T08TD4106.2E:276b-23: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bslab pa 'dod pa dang /
T08TD4106.2E:276b-24: bslab pa la gus pa dang /
T08TD4106.2E:276b-25: bslab pa la yo byad bsnyungs pa'i bsngags pa brjod nas /
T08TD4106.2E:276b-26: dge slong rnams la de dang mthun pa dang /
T08TD4106.2E:277a-1: 'tsham pa'i chos dang ldan pa'i bka' mchid mdzad nas /
T08TD4106.2E:277a-2: dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa /
T08TD4106.2E:277a-3: dge slong dag de lta bas na snga ma ni bcas pa yin la 'di ni gnang ba yin te /
T08TD4106.2E:277a-4: da'i nyan thos rnams kyis 'dul ba la bslab pa'i gzhi 'di ltar gdon par bya ste /
T08TD4106.2E:277a-5: dge slong gis zla ba bzhir mgron du bos pa bdag gir bya'o //
T08TD4106.2E:277a-6: de las lhag par bdag gir byed na ltung byed do zhes so sor mgron du bos pa dang /
T08TD4106.2E:277a-7: yang dang yang du mgron du bos pa dang /
T08TD4106.2E:277a-8: dus kyis mgron du bos ba dang /
T08TD4106.2E:277a-9: rtag tu mgron du bos pa ni ma gtogs te /
T08TD4106.2E:277a-10: de la de ni dus yin no zhes gnang ba mdzad de /
T08TD4106.2E:277a-12: gang zag ni 'phags pa pi lin da'i bu la sogs pa dge slong don nyung du dag / nyon mongs pa dang nyes pa ni med do //
T08TD4106.2E:277a-13: de la dge slong gis zhes bya ba ni chos 'di pas so //
T08TD4106.2E:277a-14: zla ba bzhir zhes bya ba ni zla ba bzhi tshun chad du'o //
T08TD4106.2E:277a-15: mgron du bos zhes bya ba ni bstabs pa'o //
T08TD4106.2E:277a-16: bdag gir bya'o zhes bya ba ni khas blang bar bya'o //
T08TD4106.2E:277a-17: de las lhag par bdag gir byed na zhes bya ba ni de las 'das par ro //
T08TD4106.2E:277a-18: ltung byed do zhes bya ba ni snga ma bzhin no //
T08TD4106.2E:277a-19: so sor mgron du bos pa zhes pa ni 'di lta ste dge slong so so so sor tha dad par mgron du bos pa'o //
T08TD4106.2E:277a-20: yang dang yang du mgron du bos pa zhes bya ba ni 'di lta ste dge slong yang dang yang du mgron du bos pa'o //
T08TD4106.2E:277a-21: dus kyis mgron du bos pa zhes bya ba ni 'di lta ste dge slong nan gyis mgron du bos pa'o //
T08TD4106.2E:277a-22: rtag tu mgron du bos pa zhes bya ba ni 'di lta ste /
T08TD4106.2E:277a-23: dge slong gtan du mgron du bos pa'o //
T08TD4106.2E:277a-24: ma gtogs te zhes bya ba ni gzhag ste'o //
T08TD4106.2E:277a-25: de la de ni dus yin no zhes bya ba ni bslab pa'i gzhi bca' ba mdzad pa de la de ni gnang ba'i rjes su mthun pa'i chos yin no //
T08TD4106.2E:277a-26: de la ltung ba ji ltar 'gyur zhe na /
T08TD4106.2E:277a-29: sbyor ba'i sbyor bas ltung ba rnam par gzhag pa dang /
T08TD4106.2E:277a-32: phyir bcos pa rnams kyis 'di'i mtshan nyid shes par bya'o //
